Text_lang: <This map bears many markings within Tanaan Jungle, including drawings of fortifications and troop movements. Hellscream seems quite interested in that region.>
Text1_lang: <This map bears many markings within Tanaan Jungle, including drawings of fortifications and troop movements. Hellscream seems quite interested in that region.>
Kajassa got ya, mon. I be here ta help ya.
Shhhh... keep dem eyes an' ears open.

Text_lang: I've heard of Warlord Bladefury. She is a masta a da blade, undefeated across da orc clans. Those who underestimate her, die.
She be ambitious, clever, an' cruel. Now dat she has risen ta Warlord, we had betta watch our backs.
I have heard of Warlord Bladefury. She is a master of the blade. Many underestimate her, but she is undefeated across the orc clans.
She is ambitious, clever, and cruel. Now that she has risen to power, I fear we must face her soon.
Is everyone in their places? Good, let us begin!
It was written in the "Tome of the Falling Sands", "Time waits for no one". The Raven Mother knew we would have one who is not of the flock here for the ritual! Oh, You are truly blessed!
Get on in there, champ!
[Placeholder Scene!]
What good are a handful of slaves against the Blackrock war machine?
Blackrocks... CRUSH THEM!
Khadgar! Get us out of here!

Text1_lang: So it is true. The heart CAN infuse life into these creatures.
Ah, hero... I knew you would come. You are just in time to witness the heart's power.
This magnaron walked Draenor before the first orc took breath. And now, it... and an endless army of these destroyers... bend to MY will!
Follow me, $n. She's up this way.

Text_lang: But first... I think I need to wash my hands. I will meet you back at your camp.
Commander, what's wrong?

Text1_lang: Argghh! Looks like we'll have to deal with that gronn.
Well, at least we took care of that thing. Come on, hero. We'd better report this back to headquarters.

Text_lang: What progress do you have to report? This better not be like last time!

Text1_lang: We have learned how to dominate the minds of gronn.

Text_lang: Good. Finish your work and bring them to me.

Text1_lang: Yes, Commander Gar.

Text_lang: Many leagues of deadly land yet stand between us and the Blackrock.

Text1_lang: We should have brought an army to fight the Iron Horde!
Ha! Your size makes you weak, giant.

Text_lang: They took Corporal Thukmar!

Text1_lang: For the light!

Text_lang: Commander, our aerial squadron has weakened the magnaron, but we're pinned out here. We need your help to assault the main compound.
I don't like da look a' dis ting, hero.

Text1_lang: Ah, welcome, Vindicator Yrel. I see you have come for Maladaar's trial.
The spirits sense your purpose. They already grow eager to challenge you.
It is my honor to face the heroes of the ancient past. They will not find me lacking.
Good luck, Lady Yrel.

Text_lang: Yrel, this is how I always wished to see you. Do not let me down.

Text1_lang: Greetings, teacher. Let me show you what I have learned in my travels.

Text_lang: You have exceeded all my hopes, Yrel. You may proceed.

Text1_lang: Now, to lay Maraad's ashes to rest.

Text_lang: Yrel... how you have grown since last we met. But... is it enough? Are you worthy of leading our people?
Now, it is my turn to test your strength.
When you face a more powerful foe, will you stand strong?

Text1_lang: Do not fear, for I will stand!

Text_lang: When our people look to you, will you be ready to command?

Text1_lang: I shall not let them down!

Text_lang: When all hope is lost, will you... still... fight?

Text1_lang: I shall never yield!
I... can...

Text_lang: When you look inside yourself and see only darkness, can you still find the Light?
What was that?

Text1_lang: Because... in this world... we are never...
Hero! Use the hammer, now!

Text_lang: Yrel... it is true. The student has surpassed the teacher. You are ready.
If only Prophet Velen could see you now... he would be proud.
Rise, Yrel. It is your charge to unite the draenei. Prepare them for what's to come.
Farewell...

Text1_lang: Maraad, my friend... be at peace.
Thank you, hero. I will meet up with you later. I just need a moment to pay my respects to the ancestors.

Text_lang: One final trial awaits, Yrel. US!
You have chosen your champion. Now, let us begin!
Ahh, I am defeated.

Text1_lang: Such strength!

Text_lang: I submit!
Yrel, today, you have completed the trials of the exarch.
You have proven courage, kindness, faith, and strength... pillars upon which our society has arisen.
However, we measure a leader not only by her merit, but also by the character of her companions.
Champion, we have watched you throughout this trial.
We saw your bravery in Frostfire, your persistence in Nagrand, and your loyalty in Auchindoun.
Your dedication to Lady Yrel proves to us that she is worthy. We did not choose the next Exarch. YOU did.
Yrel, do not forget that an exceptional leader inspires greatness in others. Trust in your people, and trust in yourself.
Now, RISE...
EXARCH YREL!

Text1_lang: Gaze upon the source of your demise, heroes.
This magnaron walked Draenor before the first orc took breath.  And now it bends to my will.
It will crush your armies and your pitiful fortress.  But first, it will crush YOU!

Text_lang: The beast is defeated, but we cannot rest yet. One enemy still remains.
I am needed near the gates. Warchief Hellscream has been spotted on the battlefield.
Find Bladefury. Bring me her head!
Taz'dingo! Well fought, mon. But we ain't leavin' until da she-orc be dead.
I be needed near da main gate. Dey say Grommash has joined da battle.
Take care a  Bladefury. Bring me her head!

Text1_lang: I grow tired of our games, little mouse. It's time to finish this.
My blade thirsts for your blood!
No... noooo... Warchief... I have... failed you...
Halt! Hellscream approaches.

Text_lang: Look! Hellscream shows himself.

Text1_lang: The battle is finished! We've routed the Iron Horde and pushed them back to the gates!

Text_lang: The Iron Horde is never beaten! I will NEVER surrender!
I will remember this day, heroes. I will remember your names and your faces, and when the time comes, I will carve you limb from limb.
The entrance to the main vestibule opens!
The barrier behind Exarch Hataaru slides open!
The teleporter to the central platform is now active!

Text1_lang: ALONE!

Text_lang: Thanks, pal! You're a life saver!
Knowledge is half the battle.
Keep your wits about you, commander.
The battle is heating up. We must push forward!
This is our chance to send the Iron Horde scattering. Steel yourself. We must hold the front line!
Good luck $r, I am going to find a nice warm fire!

Text1_lang: Good luck, $r. Don't waste time, ever!

Text_lang: If you dare challenge me, I will be waiting in Tanaan Jungle. You will find only death beyond these gates.

Text1_lang: Follow me, hero!
Give up, Grommash! Look around you. You are beaten!
Very well, Grommash... then we will come for you.
Congratulations, hero. This victory is ours.

Text_lang: Commander, our rylak riders have weakened da magnaron, but we're pinned outside. We need ya help ta break inta da main compound.

Text1_lang: The battle is finished. We've pushed the Iron Horde army back to the gates.

Text_lang: Lay down your weapons, Grommash! Look around you. You are lost.
Wait then, Grommash. Wait, because we are coming for you.
Thank you, hero.  Today, we taste victory! Lok'tar ogar!
My next pet won't be so easy!
All's fair in tiny monkeys and war.
What? How?? I will have my revenge, you liver-scented codswallup!
A fitting conclusion to yet another epic battle, featuring me!
Prepare for the smiting of a lifetime!
Ah, lucky for you I was not paying attention this time!
As powerful as I am, I cannot be everywhere at once.
But you, commander, are my greatest resource. Between the skill of your allies and the might of your garrison, there is not a stronghold that can withstand you.
Under your leadership, the full might of the Alliance expeditionary force will engage the Iron Horde.
Under your command, the Horde's greatest warriors will engage Grommash and his army.
But I will be concentrating on the single greatest threat to the safety of Azeroth:
Gul'dan. Darkness incarnate.
In all my years, Gul'dan is the craftiest, most diabolical foe I have ever encountered. I hold myself accountable for his release.
We MUST find and eliminate Gul'dan and his nascent Shadow Council network.
With your help, I can track him down. I will ask a great deal of you. I will task you to the very edge of your abilities.
But I will also help you as much as I am able. Together we will create for you an artifact of legendary power.
With a core forged from the heart of Draenor's sun, this ring is a foundation upon which we will build a wonder.
...there! It is done. Now to find Gul'dan.
Follow me, commander!
Once we locate Gul'dan, we may have to move quickly...
My eyes are open: Van shalach, om aeschis, khaz'tolim!
Come on, come on... Where are you...
Wait - here - what...?
Hiding! He's countering my spell.
Champion, killing Teron'gor must've shaken him up. That's good. But now he knows we're getting closer.
We need... more power!

Text1_lang: We'll track you from the air!

Text_lang: The trail will not be easy to follow. Start by heading east.

Text1_lang: Follow the trail of time anomalies like this.
Here! It looks like Garrosh came down this way alone after he first arrived on Draenor. But where was Kairoz?

Text_lang: Look at Garrosh. His hands are bound. But he's alone. When did he and Kairoz part ways?

Text1_lang: Hmmm... That ogre shouldn't be here. Something strange must've happened up on this ridge.

Text_lang: Who is that?

Text1_lang: That's Kairoz in disguise. Garrosh killed him! But where was the body?

Text_lang: We must be close!
I know now how to defeat Gul'dan's magic and reveal the Shadow Council. But we'll need more power.
We will have to tear artifacts from the very heart of the Ogre Empire.
I can help you. Let us augment the power of that ring of yours...
Hold out your hand, and step into the light!
I'm sorry, I should've mentioned that you would be... slightly killed.
Marvelous... we have everything we need!
Gul'dan will NOT be able to hide from my gaze this time.

Text1_lang: Archmage, be careful.

Text_lang: We have him where we want him!
My eyes are open: Val'mir, khar abra, mal ozymius...
Come, come, come... I will find you...
...there! Gul'dan! He is -
You! The human mage from Tanaan...
I have found you!
I've been inquiring about you, "Khadgar." It would seem we have a history.
Then you know how this ends. Give yourself up.
Your clumsy magic works both ways. I have also found you.

Text1_lang: Archmage, look ou-

Text_lang: Foolish mage. Your death will be excruciatingly slow. I only wish I could be there to enjoy it.

Text1_lang: Champion - The archmage!
Be still, Khadgar. Garona's dagger was enchanted.

Text_lang: %s groans in pain.

Text1_lang: This wound is grisly. You should see a priest.

Text_lang: No - no priest. Cordana, stitch me up.
Come, this way. This will only hurt - well, quite a bit actually.
The power once reserved for the Sorcerer Kings, I place in your hands.
Omnivus, al-vitrade! Arcanum totalus!

Text1_lang: These are dangerous forces you're working with, archmage.

Text_lang: Our friend needs them. The hardest trials are yet to come.

Text1_lang: I'll be keeping my eyes on you.
Good luck, champion. Be careful in that foundry!

Text_lang: Now, stand perfectly still.
This magic is extremely reliable and - maybe a tiny bit fatal. Hold still, I said!
I draw my strength, from the HEART of Draenor...
Come, Grommash. Drink.
I told you - get out!
They assault your foundry. They murder your allies. Mine is the only way.
Go!

Text1_lang: It worked.

Text_lang: I maintain a pair of goblin jumper cables for just such an emergency. Are you well, commander?
Come with me. Gul'dan will not give up control of his pet without a fight.

Text1_lang: Just kill me and be done with it, archmage.

Text_lang: I'm not here to kill you, assassin.

Text1_lang: %s reels in pain.

Text_lang: Where is your master? Tell me!

Text1_lang: Burn... in a thousand... hells...

Text_lang: You first. Where is Gul'dan!?

Text1_lang: Argghgh - he - will undo you -

Text_lang: Where is he hiding?

Text1_lang: Archmage...

Text_lang: TELL ME!

Text1_lang: %s grasps her head.
Khadgar, stop! What's the difference between this and torture?

Text_lang: But she knows...

Text1_lang: I don't even know what you're fighting for anymore.

Text_lang: You - you're right. Gul'dan has butchered her mind already.
I am sorry, Garona. We will find another way.
If she is searching for this "Heart of Gorgorek," then we must find it before her. I will notify you as soon as I learn more.
Commander, this will be a protracted campaign. I should have more information for you in a week's time.
If she and da Iron Horde be searchin' for dis "Heart a Gorgorek," den we must find it first. I will send for ya when I hear more.
Commander, dis will be a long campaign. I will have more information for ya in a week's time.
It looks like everyone is in position. Ka'alu, give the signal and get us out of here!
There are still Iron Horde in the northern courtyard.
Gro the Uncreator, I call to you!
The spirits of the Laughing Skull have spoken. We must join together to fight our common enemy, the Iron Horde!
Yes! It is working! The spirits were right!
Xuk...
Ahhh, there it is. There's MY artifact. How foolish of me to trust Brak with something so valuable.
It's a shame that you're too late to stop me. Surrender the artifact, and I will allow you to escape with your lives.
Hahahaha, so be it! IRON HORDE, ADVANCE!
See what weapons I have in my arsenal!
You will never withstand the might of Goc!
RELEASE THE IRON STARS!
Gronnlings, attack!
ARGH... UNBELIEVEABLE! You will DIE for your insolence! I'LL TEAR YOU LIMB FROM LIMB!
NO! I will DIE before I let you take what is mine! YOU... WILL NOT... WIN... THIS... WAR! AAARRRRGHH!
Hahaha! Not so confident now, are we?! Face me on even ground, cowards!
The Laughing Skull will rise again!

Text1_lang: It is done! As for you, I think it is fitting that one of my tools dispatches the others...

Text_lang: For Skettis!
You trust your eyes too much, fool.

Text1_lang: The Light prevails, because WE stand against the darkness.
What ARE these creatures?

Text_lang: Go ahead, Ga'nar. Take the clan. Slay your own brother in cold blood. See who follows you then.
You think THIS is what father wanted?
My totem will empower you!
Stand nearby to use my totem's strength.
Stand beside my totem to gain its power.

Text1_lang: My wolves will tear your pets apart!
%s glares intensely at you.

Text_lang: Come! You have your orders. I ride for Tanaan.
I only hope my people will understand.

Text1_lang: Oh, this should be interesting.  You don't mind if I take notes, do you?
It's easy to see why objects such as these would have been highly prized by their cultures!  Er, sorry about your pets.
Very interesting results.  Thanks for helping me test them out!
Well, what can you expect from something that's been buried in the ground for a millennium?
In its native culture, that pet might have been revered as a martyr.
Huh, I kinda thought that might happen.
Fortunately, Gyraxle can repair anything.  Even himself.
Now, was that result the device performing as expected, or did it just explode?
All in the name of science.
I've got bandages in my field kit if you need some...
You have to respect the ingenuity of such an ancient device.
I'll add a special thanks to your pet when I publish this research.
Here we go!
Oh my pets did so good.  They're going to get so many extra snuggles for that.
Oh, that's okay I guess.  Doodle will need a new eye though.
Don't worry, I'll kiss the boo-boo all better.
Soup will make you all better!
Oh no!
She's not dead, she's just sleeping.
We'll put the rainbow bandage on that.
Oh no!
Is your pet sleeping too?
You can make your pet all better, right?
You are lucky my wolves are not yet full grown, or else you would have been the meal.
Only defeat truly exposes our weaknesses.  This loss will improve their training.
That one was too stupid.
That one did not lack courage.
That one won't make that mistake again.
That one was too slow.
That one will need some healing.
A good kill.
A clean kill.
Hardly even a challenge.
Why are your pets so weak?
An easy kill.  My wolves will learn nothing.

Text_lang: Gladiators, kill!
I remain the greatest warlord in all of Nagrand!
What?  How is this possible?  You must have cheated!
What is one death when I have an army of three?
My gladiators fight to the death!
You make Tarr angry!
I told you to kill, not die!
Haha, puny $r has puny pets.
Gladiator smash!
Are you not entertained?
Tarr will rock you!
This is why Tarr is the greatest warlord in all of Nagrand!

Text1_lang: I may be small, but if you hurt my pets, I'll hurt you.
Thanks $gMister:Lady;!  I bet 100 coppers on this fight.
This is just like the time my home town was overrun by demons.
It's okay, they're used to dying.
Not the first time someone has hunted that one to the ends of the earth.
Easy now!  I paid a pretty copper for that one.
I'll sell ya a Stone of Jordan if you promise not to do that again.
Bad luck just runs in my family.
Sorry, $gMister:Lady;.
Don't throw that one away, it can still be fixed up.
That's right!  My pets are from the mean streets of Caldeum.
That's a bit of bad luck there, $gMister:Lady;.

Text_lang: Our hopes lie in what these pets will become.  They are sacred to us.
Glory to Anzu!
We are Arakkoa.  We are not broken by a single defeat.
A bad omen.
Anzu protect your children!
No!  The guardians cannot fall!
Doom and gloom!  Dooooooooom and glooooooom!
The curse of Sethe is upon us.
A good omen.
The strength of the Arakkoa is with us.
The raven god blesses us today.
The guardians stand strong.
Anzu protects his children.

Text1_lang: Pay attention, $n.  Strength is often found where you least expect it.
I hope you have learned something today.
I hope you have learned something today.
I am sad for the loss, but glad for your victory.
Fear not, a simple healing spell will set that to rights.
Life is full of surprises.
The Light has not yet taken her.  She simply rests.
The moth is drawn to the flame, it seems.
Life is full of surprises.
It is folly to underestimate the stength of nature.
The moth is delicate, but not without defenses.
Do not despair. Both you and your pet can learn from this.
A tender lesson learned too late.

Text_lang: The darkness... it flows within me. It seeps from every vein.
Come, strangers! Cross into the realm of the Shadow Lands! I shall deliver you to your death.
Any bites yet?  I have found that patience (and beer) really helps bring in the big catch!
Did you bring a cooler?  Don't EVER go fishing without a cooler!
Any bites yet?  I have found that patience (and beer) really helps bring in the big catch!
*HIC!*  Was that a dolphin?!  *HIC!*  I love dolphins!
Seriously?  I think I would actually just throw that one back.
See ya!
I will be back later, save me a beer!
Good luck on the lunkers!
Howdy $n!  Any luck out here?
$n, I found ya!
Greetings $n!
The Exarchs are charged with leading the draenei people. We represent and uphold the values of our society.

Text1_lang: It's been years since I've been out in the field like this.$B$B<The stately archmage takes a deep breath.>$B$BThere's nothing like the smell of clean air and danger.
If it were up to me, I'd be the one to carry out this mission. But Archmage Khadgar insisted that you would have a more delicate touch.

I still bear old wounds from the demons' first coming to Azeroth. I remember the horror, the madness, and the stillness that descended upon a city destroyed.$B$BI will do anything in my power to prevent that from happening again.
I cannot fathom why anyone would pledge themselves to the Legion.$B$BThere are those who lust for power, and do not know how to wield it.

The Sargerei village is like a beehive.$B$BDisturb its denizens, and we will get stung. Destroy it in flames, and we will destroy the precious honeycomb as well.$B$BThe only way to retrieve the information we seek is through sublety.
Exarch Othaar's betrayal was sudden. How could a leader of the draenei turn his back on the Light, and embrace the enemies who persecuted his entire race?
His new allies have given him a new name, and a new identity - "Socrethar." He is a powerful enemy, and I fear what he is capable of.

Have you heard of me, $n? I am Modera, archmage of the Council of Six, which rules the Kirin Tor and Dalaran.$B$BI could wipe out this entire village if I chose.$B$BBut that is not why we are here. As I have learned through the years, sometimes you need honey to catch a fly.
Ah, hero... I knew you would come. Gaze upon the source of your demise!
Now, I will leave you a taste of the Iron Horde's new power!

Text_lang: How about we see who is on the other side of these anomalous shenanigans?
Temporal juxtaposition incoming!
Wow! It worked. And we haven't been temporally inverted.
I'm sorry, Cenarius. I believed in your cause, but I couldn't bring myself to turn against...

Text1_lang: You've done me a great service today, Farondis.
What a shame that you won't LIVE to reap the benefits of my gratitude.

Text_lang: ...what?!

Text1_lang: This whole valley is filled with plotters and schemers.
Cavorting with Cenarius behind my back? I will NOT tolerate dissent!
Here it is, my Prince: The Tidestone of Golganneth, one of the seven Stones of Creation, and treasured relic of the kaldorei.

Text_lang: Very good. Leave me.
Commander, Morthis Whisperwing from the Druids of the Talon was looking for you. He can be found beneath the great tree to the south.
BLACKHAND
Text1_lang: BLACKHAND

Text_lang: GUL'DAN
Text1_lang: GUL'DAN

Text_lang: KARGATH
Text1_lang: KARGATH

Text_lang: KILROGG
Text1_lang: KILROGG

Text_lang: NER'ZHUL
Text1_lang: NER'ZHUL

Text1_lang: You must all be taught a lesson.

Text_lang: Ten thousand years ago, I found myself mixed up with a rebel alliance of sorts.
This was during the pinnacle of Queen Azshara's power over the elves. Her abuse of magic had grown dangerously strong.
We plotted to use the Tidestone of Golganneth against the queen.
Cenarius. I can wield the Tidestone, but I must warn you: we risk destroying the entire Well of Eternity!
That, my friend, is precisely the plan.
Fah! We need simply to do away with Queen Azshara herself, not the very source of our people's power.
I agree. We are firing a cannon at sparrows.

Text1_lang: We are fighting the greatest danger our world has ever seen!
Even now, Queen Azshara colludes with demons. She puts our world at risk.

Text_lang: Very well. Prince Farondis, you can secure the Tidestone of Golganneth?
I shall have it arranged, Cenarius.
My queen.
This is a fortified high-security bastion. Only a fool would go into there without an army.$b$bI mean... good luck, Champion.$b$b<Khadgar gives you a comforting pat on the shoulder.>
Come with me. This is exactly what I need to undo Gul'dan's hold on Garona.
We're using the tools of our enemy against them.
Not 'til my dying breath. I will end your torment, Garona.
Om na ka om, Fel na om kal...
Quickly, destroy that thing!
Awaken, Garona. You are free at last.
Come with me, Garona. Together we will plan for Gul'dan's downfall.

Text1_lang: Archmage. That is dark magic you're working with.
You are using the tools of our enemy!
I do not like this.
Give me that orb, Khadgar. I will destroy that hideous thing.
Haven't you given up already, mage?
%s gasps in pain.
Gul'dan... he's not in my head anymore...
I owe everything to you! To both of you!
I will do whatever it takes to stop Gul'dan. Wherever you lead, I will follow... commander!
Ha ha ha haaa... my wrath is coming.

Text_lang: Let us begin.
Text1_lang: Let us begin.

Text_lang: Impossible!
Text1_lang: Impossible!

Text_lang: I am victorious again.
Text1_lang: I am victorious again.

Text_lang: That was unexpected.
Text1_lang: That was unexpected.

Text_lang: Your pet will recover with time.
Text1_lang: Your pet will recover with time.

Text_lang: Let's see how you handle a different threat.
Text1_lang: Let's see how you handle a different threat.
We seek Solog Roark!
We don't want you dead. We need a shipwright.

Text_lang: You found him. If you wish me dead, put a hammer in my hands and let's make a fight of it.
Hah! There's none better.
Forget the Tidestone, brothers. Let the lizards and the lowborn have their crystal.
We will feast on the dragons instead!
You pull the Ashbringer out of the ground, holding it up triumphantly. A moment later, Balanazzar appears in front of you.
Paladins of Azeroth, you've gathered to mourn the loss of Highlord Tirion Fordring. Many of you looked to him as an ideal, the paragon of what we all strive to be.
We seek Solog Roark!
No, friend. We have a common enemy and need your skills.
Tell me more...
Lion's Watch
Vol'mar

Text1_lang: Welcome, commander! Khadgar tells me you've accomplished so many great things...
Take your knee, champion. It is a rare and special privilege to be blessed by a Naaru.

Text_lang: Blessed are the torchbearers, who bring the light to darkness.
Blessed are the valorous, who stand fast in an unjust world.
Champion. A great darkness has taken root on Draenor.
The righteous will flock to your banner. You must not falter.
Go now, with the Light's blessing. Take the fight to our enemies.
The fate of two worlds hangs in the balance...

Text1_lang: Did you hear anything? Did the Naaru speak to you?
Commander, whatever you should do next, know that you have the full support of the draenei people.
We stand with you!

Text_lang: Commander, is that you? Your aura has grown quite strong.
The very elements of Draenor tremble, friend. Can you hear them? Listen... listen...
Spirits of stone, lend your strength to our champion.
Spirits of air, grant our champion quickness of mind and body.
Spirits of water, give our hero the gift of your wisdom.
Spirits of flame, lend us your fury, that our enemies will be driven before us!
Arise, champion. Know that the primal heart of Draenor burns within you.
Gul'dan will do all he can to sever our connection to the elements, to deprive us on their power. You must stop him.
The fate of our world is in your hands, commander. Lok'tar ogar.

Text1_lang: Oh no...

Text_lang: This isn't possible. There are so many of them.
Hold fast, Alliance! We will not fall this day! Push them back to the portal!

Text1_lang: There are demon hunters on my world, doom commander. This is unacceptable.
Do not let them enter the volcano. The key to the Legion's worlds must not fall into their hands, Beliash.

Text_lang: My eredar are summoning in more demons to attack them from behind, your highness.
Transport
Carrier
Destroyer
Battleship
Submarine
Transport
Submarine
Battleship
Destroyer
Carrier
I will personally deal with their leader, my queen.

Text1_lang: See that you do.

Text_lang: My forces are yours.
We will assist in establishing the volcano foothold.
Ashtongue, forward!
Curse Helya! Curse her cowardly followers! I'll not rest until she is dead!
I was Illidari once... left for dead at the Black Temple. Now you will witness the might of my new master!
I have wasted too much time here. No more!

Text1_lang: Cenarius's loss has left Malfurion unable to see reason.
Make haste to the World Tree. He may be headed there, all too ready to take reckless risks.
Meanwhile, you and I will follow his trail from here. Malfurion must not fall.
Illidari $n, I present the Coilskar.
Lord Illidan sends his best wishes for a speedy success.
I assume the foothold has been established?
Lovely... another fel volcano.
Ah, there you are. Lord Illidan has placed my Shivarra at your disposal.
A small force has infiltrated the Black Temple, but the Sha'tari army is still being repelled.
We are to obtain the Sargerite Keystone with all due haste and return to aid in the defense.
If you will excuse us. Come my dears. Up the volcano to the foothold.

Text_lang: You have proven yourself the greatest living warrior on Azeroth. It is for this reason I have saved you.

I have foreseen the coming of a mighty champion to these shores. One who would slay countless foes and prove their valor time and again. One who would lead my armies to victory against the great darkness that seeks to devour this world!
I name you Valarjar! Bring glory to these halls on the wings of my val'kyr!
Knights of the Ebon Blade! Assemble as we honor one of our own!
You have all heard the legends of countless battles fought... of trials overcome at great cost.
His exemplary deeds in the name of the Ebon Blade have shown him to be one of the best of us, worthy of our highest honor.
By the will of the Lich King and upon my authority as Highlord, I declare that $n, wielder of the Blades of the Fallen Prince, will henceforth be known as Deathlord of the Ebon Blade.
By the will of the Lich King and upon my authority as Highlord, I declare that $n, wielder of the Maw of the Damned, will henceforth be known as Deathlord of the Ebon Blade.
By the will of the Lich King and upon my authority as Highlord, I declare that $n, wielder of Apocalypse, will henceforth be known as Deathlord of the Ebon Blade.
You will all bow to him as you once did to me, and carry out his will against the Legion!
S - Save the temple! <choking sound> Hurry!

Text1_lang: So HE is the key to Azeroth's downfall.

Text_lang: Before us this day stands our comrade in arms, $n.
Enough! I will break you myself!
It is time you be given a position that befits your accomplishments, $n.
You will die!
Your precious 'earthen ring' will shatter!
Your world will succumb!!
THE LEGION WILL--
They're retreating.
I get the feeling this fight isn't over yet.

Text1_lang: Varian, I found him! Look, across the chasm, Tirion!

Text_lang: All forces, to Jaina!
What?
Dat's no invasion force. Dat's an army!

Text1_lang: Nock your arrows! Hold! Fire!

Text_lang: Dey be retreatin'.

Text1_lang: That was too easy, something's wrong.

Text_lang: There, across the chasm, Gul'dan! He has Tirion!
All da Horde, get ta Thrall!

Text1_lang: Cordana! You will answer to the High Council for this.

Text_lang: Soon. The body is cold, but his soul is not done fighting. We have work to do before he is ready.
Illidan Stormrage. At last, I meet the great Betrayer.
By this hammer, I claim this mountain!
Flummox no need pets! Flummox eats them NOW!

Text1_lang: Bring it on!
Don't tell anyone, ok?
Take it!
Aw, come on!
Seriously?!?
What the heck is wrong with you?!
Are you AFK?
Maybe use your good pets.
Are you even trying?

Text_lang: So powerful!
Stay in school!
Ha! Try harder!
Sic 'em!
I'm unimpressed.
Should have brought a beast!
No! How could you?
Are you using mechanicals?
It's all part of the plan.
Now, let's see about activating that gateway.
Only one of us is coming out of this alive...  Wait...
I will take you to Helheim myself, "hero" of Azeroth!
What doesn't kill you makes you stronger!
Try again, if you dare!
My guide didn't say anything about this!
How? My plan was foolproof!
Grrrrr....
You just aren't very good.
My strategy is flawless!
You're no match for my pets!
Cyana, Jace, Allari... find the keystone.
Bah, what is this sorcery?
This hammer... I must claim it for my masters...
They're coming through!
Stand your ground, warbraves!
Well done. You must have a strong connection with your companions.
If we must...
When you stop calling them pets and begin calling them friends, then can you defeat me.
I take no joy in this.
You should take better care of your friends.
Your bond is not yet strong enough.
Are you okay little guy?
Take a rest my friend.
After this is over, we'll all go out for a pet treat.

Text1_lang: You are truly a master strategist.
Let the bravest prove victorious!
It's okay, you can try again.
Maybe a stronger pet would be better?
That last pet seemed a little weak.
You'll have to work harder to win.
Now I am getting serious!
That was a warm-up.
You fought bravely little one.

Text_lang: What?! You must have cheated!
This'll be easy!
Ha! You call yourself a pet tamer?
I always hit my mark.
Boom, baby!
Smoked.
Who sold me this junk?
I thought this was pay to win!
Can I still get a refund?
My nightmare! This is the Junior Argent Tournament all over again!
Back to training for you! Fifty lance squats!
It seems I have a new nemesis!
I can do this blindfolded if you prefer.
A valiant effort.
The tip of the spear is always sharpest.
You can always be my squire.
Are you ready Sir Murkeston? Fight gallantly!
Good show! Good show!
When you fight the ocean, the ocean always wins.
Sun's out! Pets out!
My guys need more time out on the water I think.
A storm is coming!
Waves crash and I crush!
You need more training before you paddle out.
Not every wave is a winner.
Wipe out!
Rub some sand in it.

Text1_lang: It would appear the pit lord is planning an invasion.

Text_lang: Ready your weapons, children of my wrath! Tonight we strike at the heart of the mortals' defenses!

Text1_lang: Oh no... the portal!
They must have linked their gateway to our summoning portal. They plan to attack Dalaran! We need to close that portal!
Assuming we can even reach the gateway...

Text_lang: What is this commotion I hear? Why has the portal been closed?
What is this? The petulant mortals disrupt my portals and invade my archives? I should have simply destroyed you like that petty little gnome.

Text1_lang: Judge me all you like, sister, but you cannot stop us.

Text_lang: You are too late, Warden. This vault will be your tomb.

Text1_lang: Demon hunters, you have to survive. Find the one named Archmage Khadgar. You can trust him.
Illidan is still my charge!
Hurry, then. The Wardens are coming, with the Illidari in tow.

Text_lang: They ARE desperate.
For generations, the tauren of this mountain fought. Countless lives--even entire tribes--were lost.
Once, upon returning from such a battle, Huln Highmountain found his people slaughtered by a previously unknown foe.
Battling his grief, Huln spoke with the leaders of the remaining tribes. He convinced them to unite under one banner to oppose this new threat.
I will tell you the story of Huln Highmountain.
And now you will bear witness to Huln's trials...

Text1_lang: The beast is there! An'she protect us!
Let's go.
It went into that deep patch of mist. It could be hiding anywhere! Hero, do you have a trap strong enough to hold the beast?

Text_lang: You stand in my way.
We stand with Highmountain.

Text1_lang: It claws at us from the mist! Hurry!
It worked! Slay the monster!
It is... over for me... you must... finish this.

Text_lang: We are Legion.
You cannot hide from me.
Everyone must pay the blood price!
Children of the deep, rise and crush these shan ronir!
Illidan... now, you belong to the Legion.
Insolent wretches!

Text1_lang: It would appear we've been discovered.

Text_lang: Did you think you could escape my grasp so easily?

Text1_lang: Ungh... Unhand me, wretch!

Text_lang: Haughty warlocks! You presume to issue commands to my kind! Face the consequences for your insolence!

Text1_lang: Shinfel! No!

Text_lang: I will smash you like the insignificant gnats you are!
Burn! Burn in fel fire!
You will not get away! I'm not done with you yet!
Your skull will make a fine trophy!

Text1_lang: Ungh! Press on, warlock... close the portal!

Text_lang: I will burn you to cinders!
This is not over, warlock! I will see the end of you!

Text1_lang: Zinnin, look out!
Zinnin...
Slay... the monster. Find... Talonclaw...
Oh no!

Text_lang: The ritual will focus our energy into a portal at the center of the structure. We must keep it stable!
Excellent! The path is taking form! It grows more stable by the moment!
The Dreamway is ready! Good work, everyone.
UNCROSS THE WIRES TO SAVE MY DIGITAL LIFE
Text1_lang: UNCROSS THE WIRES TO SAVE MY DIGITAL LIFE

Text_lang: The Deacon has started the ritual! He is not to be disturbed!
Text1_lang: The Deacon has started the ritual! He is not to be disturbed!

Text_lang: Master Slaghammer! We have an intruder!
$n, I present you with a gift from Lord Illidan himself.

Text1_lang: We cannot fight the monster until you place the trap! Hurry!
Hold off these beasts until the trap is sprung!

Text_lang: Yes... the Blade is right! I am unstoppable! Once Zakajz lives again, I will hold dominion over this world!
Our old leaders chose to work with pawns. I choose the REAL power!
Defend me, Blade! You said this would work!
This... this shouldn't be happening! Why aren't you protecting me?!
Give me another chance! No! Noooo!
You think to stop me? With this weapon I can do anything! ANYTHING!
Behold Saraka, Destroyer of Worlds! Brought to heel after millennia of wanton destruction.
The draenei sought to devise a ritual that could turn the naaru back to the Light. To aid their quest, I called together many priesthoods to work in unison.
We are close to success. I believe the weapon you obtained will tip the scales in our favor. If you would step into the main circle, we can begin the ritual!
Yes! Use the blade to draw out the Void energy!
Yes! Fill it with healing Light!
Yes! Purge it with holy fire!
Yes! It's working! Can you feel it?
The hunger, the rage, they are gone. The Light has welcomed me home.
The Beacon calls to bring forth light, we will answer in your time of need.
Once again you have proven your worth, my friend. With the aid of Saa'ra and the power of your weapon behind you, there is no one more capable!
Priesthoods from all over Azeroth have agreed to donate time and resources to this new Conclave. We have a singular purpose: the defeat of the Burning Legion!
I hereby bring the Conclave to order! Together we will bring hope and healing to our allies, and banish our foes into the void!
Now, champion, we shall transform this prison into a temple that will serve as the headquarters of our campaign. This shouldn't take long...
The altar is complete, Betild.
You cannot trust your own mind!
See how I bend your mind to my will!
The darkness consumes all!
Gah!
Can you hear me, my friend?
Over here, my friend!

Text1_lang: Aaaahhh!

Text_lang: Look! The Tidestone!
My word...
Follow me. We must address the others.
Behold the power of the Twinblades of the Deceiver. The Fel Hammer is ours!
We are the blades that will strike down the Legion. We are the chosen warriors of Lord Illidan.
We are ILLIDARI!
This way. Your forces await.
The Fel Hammer is ours at last. Gaze upon the might of the Twinblades of the Deceiver!
We will follow $p into battle, and we will strike down the Legion once and for all!
Glory to the Illidari!
Hrnnggggh...
Malfurion, my old friend... the perfect bait!
Ahh, the Mother of Dreams has arrived at last.

Text1_lang: Monks of the Broken Temple!
Today, we have gained new strength thanks to our leader, $n.
With the legendary Storm Brew, our efforts in the war against the Legion will redouble!
Let us fight for the fallen, and bring peace to this world once again!
Thank you again, Master $n.

Text_lang: What are you doing? Run, you fools! The demon is near!
Prepare yourself. Step into the circle when you are ready.
Behold the site of my final battle... and there lies my foe. Even now, Zakajz struggles for consciousness. You must hurry!
Greetings to you both. The tremors from the Emerald Dream grow more potent. We must begin the ritual at once!

Text1_lang: The greatest shaman in the world are gathering below. What's left of 'em, that is.

Text_lang: Go now. Hruthnir waits at the Sky Launch to aid you.
The Ashtongue will fight beside you.

Text1_lang: You may call upon the Coilskar as well.
Our mission is not yet complete. We are all yours to command.
Calm yourself, Wuho!

Text_lang: Your efforts have not gone unnoticed, $n. Time and again you have proven yourself to be one of our finest.
The strength, ferocity, and nobility you have shown are without peer. It is time you were honored accordingly.
It is my honor to welcome $n as an Archdruid of the Cenarion Circle! May all the creatures of the wilds celebrate your ascension!
You think you can best my snails?
At least dead snails are delicious.
You just got snailed!
Ooh! Dinner!
I'll save him for later.
Looks like he's cooked.
You have a little slime on your face.
Too slow!
If you're done with that one, it'd make a great stew!
Tremble before me! I bring darkness to this world.
Free. Free! FREE! Free of that accursed prison.

Text1_lang: Such pitiful creatures. Is that the last of them?

Text_lang: Yes, mistress. The Tideskorn will keep them captive until you are ready to harvest their souls.

Text1_lang: Good. Now tear this monastery to shreds!

Text_lang: Your order is broken, monks! You can do nothing against us.
Our WILL is not broken. We will fight to our last breath, demon-lover.
The Legion lives forever...
You will die by my blade, $c!
Wheee.... fire!

Text1_lang: Hurry, $n. Those fel spreaders are doing incredible damage.

Text_lang: We'll hold them back here. Strike at the demons now, or it will be too late!
Hurry up now, I'm right behind! The King's got your back if you get in a bind!
Master, you have witnessed with your own eyes the Legion's capability for destruction.
I'm your worst nightmare.
Pitiful.
The seed has been sown.
Yes, let the anger swell inside you!
I can feel the corruption spreading!
That one wouldn't have lasted long anyway.
You will pay for your insolence.
I'm in a bad dream.
Tyrande Whisperwind! I have longed for this encounter for many years.
Your adoring husband will be joining me in the nightmare. His was a special invitation.
This way. The rest of the survivors are up here.
And our dear Ysera! Would you believe she has had a change of heart?
She will aid me in my conquest of Val'sharah, starting with your precious Temple of Elune.
Such a dilemma, high priestess!
Kneel beside your beloved as he draws his final breath? Or watch the temple of your goddess burn!
<Maniacal Laugh>

Text1_lang: <Ysera Dragon Roar>

Text_lang: The Fel Hammer is ours at last. Gaze upon the might of the Aldrachi Warblades!
Behold the power of the Aldrachi Warblades. The Fel Hammer is ours!
Let's begin your lesson in humility.
Lesson over.
Begone! I need time to contemplate this affront.
So undisciplined.
You will learn respect or I will continue to educate you in it.
That one isn't fit to clean my quarters, much less battle!
Interesting, show me more.
An unfortunate miscalculation.
You cannot discern between a victory or a sacrifice.

Text1_lang: It is finished! The claws are ours!

Text_lang: Musken! Bless me with fortitude!
Ha! Musken prove to be the strongest once again!
I am disgraced.
Crushed under hoof!
More! Bring me more to crush!
Glory in battle!
Bjorn! Bless me with savagery!
Ha! Bears prove to be the strongest once again!
I am disgraced.
Torn by claws!
More! Bring me more to rip apart!
Glory in battle!
Muster your defenses mortal.
Join me in the depths.
Drowning. I am drowning.
Another soul soon joins us.
Lay still and let the water take you.
Death comes quickly to the weak.
Another takes its place.
You begin to irritate me mortal.
Your death will be slow and savored.

Text1_lang: Let us see if those you have brought are worthy.
These trials are not to be taken lightly.
The hunting ground awaits.
Death should not be feared.
Life is fleeting.
Only greatness endures.
There is another.

Text_lang: You may enter, but spare me your pleas for help, shaman. I know of the Earthen Ring's plan to unite the elements!
The Burning Legion threatens us all, but the power of the Firelands must be earned.
Approach my throne and we shall see just how far you will go to save this world!
I must get back to my cooking!
Finally. Now, back to my preparations.
I cannot work in these conditions!
If you can't take the heat...
Get out of the kitchen!
I have superior ingredients!
Everyone is a critic.
Smells awful.
I have to recheck the recipe.
We have found you... and you have found the grave.
What's the next step?
I will begin the ritual. Focus your will upon the spirit while our friend keeps us safe.
Let's get to it!
I died to ease the pain of my failure. Why do you disturb me?
I've read yer saga. Where did ye find the shield?
It seems you compel me to answer... My journey took me to Stormheim, to a tomb of warrior kings.
We will finish what ye started.
Return to your rest, and be disgraced no more.
Thanks for yer help, Tahu. I won't forget this!
It was my honor to serve. I must go to Netherlight Temple and inform the Conclave of our success. Good luck.
As for us, we should get back to Dalaran. I'll meet ye there!
Want to know the exact time and date of your death?
Just as I foresaw it.
My sight diminishes.
Sacrifices must be made.
All will turn to ash.
I already know your next move.
All answer to their fate.
Your fate betrays you mortal

Text1_lang: Welcome, Lord of Flame! Welcome, Kil'jaeden!

Text_lang: You have done well, Akaari. You have earned my blessing.
Azhir manari kirel. Akim manari galar!

Text1_lang: The fangs... their power is beyond comprehension! I am your humble servant, my lord!

Text_lang: It is time for your true test. Use the Fangs to dismantle Azeroth's kingdoms from within. Let their shattered husks pave our path to victory!

Text1_lang: They will taste blood in your name!

Text_lang: I bid you greetings, Opener of Doors. You are the first.
I am Yrgrim, Champion of Tyr! Let us see if you are worthy to bear his shield.
Long have I waited for one who proves worthy. Face me in battle that we might test your heart!
I must see if you possess the will, the strength, and the stamina to wield this shield. Will you face me in a trial of combat?
I am ready for your trial, Yrgrim.
Text1_lang: I am ready for your trial, Yrgrim.

Text_lang: Let us begin!
I am beaten! You are indeed worthy. Were Tyr alive, he would make you his champion. I hereby bestow Truthguard upon you. Use it to defend Azeroth from its enemies.

Text1_lang: Prophet's mercy! What is that?!

Text_lang: What are you filthy mortals doing near the master's portal? I'll rip the answer from your souls!

Text1_lang: Formations!
Again!
Well done. Make sure to practice every day.
You need to riposte!
Keep at it.
Practice the basics.
Nicely done.
Now for the counter-attack!
Press your advantage.

Text_lang: We have the hammer! Everyone, run! The tomb is collapsing!
Your escape... means nothing. Will find you again...
Apologies for the hasty retreat! The tomb's collapse was triggered by the hammer's removal.
Her exemplary deeds in the name of the Ebon Blade have shown her to be one of the best of us, worthy of our highest honor.
You will all bow to her as you once did to me, and carry out her will against the Legion!
Today, we dealt a great blow to the unseen enemies of the Nightmare.
However, Xavius, Lord of the Nightmare, still lives. Only when he is defeated, will Azeroth truly be safe.
To accomplish this task, I gift you with my blessing. Use my power to serve and protect the wilds.
Thank you, druids of the Dreamgrove. May you prosper under the leadership of your new Archdruid.
Farewell.

Text1_lang: You're all bark and no bite.
Teehee!
I'm going to give you guys the wittle bandages for your wittle boo-boos!
Salty?
Corgis. Am I right?
Woof.
But he was so cute!
You're a monster!
Aww.

Text_lang: By the light of Elune! What happened to the shrine!?
Well done! Now we can begin our counter attack!
Your pathetic barriers mean nothing to the Legion!
The blades are mine!
I'll never let Ashamane's Fangs fall to your kind!
Insolent mortal! We will hunt you down! You only delay the inevitable!
RRAAAUUUGHHHH!
Take a good look, brute! You'll never see the Fangs again!
Verstok was at the shrine! Find out what's going on up there. I'll meet up with you as soon as I can, $n.
Well done! The Legion's attack has been broken!
What the... the Fangs are gone! What happened, $n?
$n, I have been expecting you, though not the traitor, Altruis.
Illidan.
No matter. There is little time.
I entrusted the duplicitous Akama with planning the campaign against the Legion.
He alone knows every detail. You will need his counsel if you are to succeed.
You must also regain the Sargerite Keystone to invade the Legion's worlds.
Find out where the Wardens hid it away.
We have attracted attention. I must move.
You will not be able to contact me like this again. The Illidari are now yours, $n.
$n, I have been expecting you. Ah good... Kayn Sunfury.
My lord.
There is little time. Listen closely.
Can you hear me through this thing, $n? You should be near Verstok's location by now.
My foolish protege was in such a rush to escape the Shrine, I'll wager he failed to mask his scent. Shift into cat form and you'll likely detect it.
Careful! The ruins are infested by withered, pitiful creatures with an unending hunger for the arcane. The power of the Fangs might have lured some to Verstok's trail.
Whatever you did seems to have annoyed those withered. This might work to your advantage. See if you can find another switch.
Has Verstok gone mad? Wielding the Fangs enhances one's senses, but I'm afraid it also heightened his paranoia.
You must get the Fangs away from Verstok, $n. The longer they remain in his possession, the greater his delusion becomes.
The doors are shut? Look around the courtyard for something that might open them. Just be mindful of the withered.
What on Azeroth was that!? Be careful, $n!
Stick around... it's meal time!
What's this? Another intruder approaches!
For your insolence, your end will be painful and slow!
This display is meaningless! Your doom is at hand!
Foolish orc! You will be the first to witness the Legion's arrival into my city.
Long have I waited for this day. Let us not waste another moment!
Ered'nash ila mornu nakuun. Ered'nash ban man'ari!
They come!
I returned in disgrace and sought to wash away my failure in the blood of others.

Text1_lang: Behold, Suramar. Our haven. Our sanctuary.

Text_lang: There I found the shrine to Tyr's champion, but was denied entry. I tried many times, until I could bear the pain no longer.
A good start! You fight well!

Text1_lang: Our prison.
Elisande and the Legion seek to bring us to heel. Through fear. Through hunger.
The flame of the shal'dorei flickers. We must re-ignite it.
We must stir the noble hearts of my people.
YOU... must show them that Azeroth has not forsaken them.

Text_lang: Light, hear our prayers... for shadows close in around us.
Grant us this one audience, so the Ashbringer may yet save our world.
Do you know where it is, Uther? We risk everything if we return to that place.
Maxwell, my old friend! It's been too long.
You're both doing the Light's work, but if you seek to recover the Ashbringer, you must hurry.
I can feel the Ashbringer calling out from an island that lies close to the tomb of the evil one. And the blade is not alone...
Tirion still lives, but his light is fading. You must move swiftly, or he will perish! That is all I can tell you.
Uther, wait! I have more to ask you! Uther!
Good luck, friends. Walk always in the Light.
Uther, it's really you!
Moving into position above Niskara.
Moving into position above Niskara.
Everyone up top. Commence bombardment!
Everyone up top. Commence bombardment!
Silence!

Text1_lang: I did what I thought was-

Text_lang: I will hear no more. The sentence is death. Proceed.
Seize her!
Tylos, jump us back to Mardum.
Tylos, jump us back to Mardum.
The Doomhammer could be anywhere. We'll have to split up.
I will speak with the shaman at the Temple of Earth.
Our evac is almost here. We have to warn the Alliance and Horde.
They must turn their fleets around. The Broken Shore is a deathtrap.
Anything, lieutenant?

Text1_lang: The island is crawling with demons. Far more than we anticip...

Text_lang: So, you have uncovered our little secret.
Let me assure you, your precious fleets will fall into our trap.
You'll never get away with it, Detheroc!
Oh, but I will. And you, Mathias Shaw, will help us to do it.
Now I am the leader of SI:7!

Text1_lang: We were on the Broken Shore mere hours before the Alliance and Horde fleets arrived.
Mathias Shaw led our SI:7 team on a secret recon of the island. We were awaiting extraction.

Text_lang: Ahh a gift fit for a queen. You have my thanks...
Now the power of the arcan'dor is mine!
Ahhh, the defenders of the Light arrive. We have been waiting.
You can go no further, Balnazzar. I will have justice for my slain brethren!
Justice...or vengeance, paladin? Choose carefully, for hatred leads down a dark path.
You will die by my blade!
Auuuuughhhhhh! Auuuughhhh!
Pitiful. Jarvox, take care of his execution. Slowly and with great agony, if you will.
Why hello.
I see a great darkness looming over Netherlight Temple. The shadow of the Burning Legion, ready to strike.
Our order will fall at his hands, everyone within will perish.
This will be our fate. We are doomed to die at the hands of the dreadlord Balnazzar.
This will be our fate... unless...
Noooooooooo!
I see a path that leads to our victory! You are there, walking with the Light, guiding us all.
It's becoming clear.
An old enemy becomes an ally.
Forgotten shadows rise!
All unite under the Light.
Demons in the throne room! Protect the king!
Shatter their portals! Drive out the Legion!
The enemy is among us!
You discovered us too late, Illidari! FELBLADE, ATTACK!
Text1_lang: You discovered us too late, Illidari! FELBLADE, ATTACK!

Text_lang: Portals opening! Here they come!
Did you think I wouldn't see what you truly are, demon?
Dagg find da big treasure dis time!
By order of the Grand Magistrix, you are hereby charged with sedition. You undermine my authority and must pay the price.
Akama. Your duplicity is hardly surprising.
I should have slaughtered you and your malformed brethren long ago.
We've come to end your reign, Illidan. My people, and all of Outland, shall be free!
Citizens of Azeroth.
Today is the day we turn the tide.
Today is the day that we re-take our world.
And send the Legion back to the hell that spawned them.
Our path is clear.
The Pillars of Creation await.
On the Broken Isles!
Boldly said. But I remain... unconvinced.
Bring the Vineyards to heel. I will tolerate no more insubordination.
Archimonde, you will not be allowed further! The very soul of Azeroth rises against you!
The veil is lifted from my eyes, heroes. The shadows retreat, and the Dream beckons.
Thank you, heroes.

Text1_lang: Behold, the enemy is among us!
You cannot hide what you truly are, demon!
More of them are in our midst!

Text_lang: Is this it, mortals? Is this all the fury you can muster?
Behold the Flames of Azzinoth!
Maiev... How is it even possible?

Text1_lang: You discovered us too late, Illidari! FELBLADE, ATTACK!
Their fury pales before mine, Illidan. We have some unsettled business between us.
My long hunt is finally over. Today, justice will be done!

Text_lang: Who shall be next to taste my blades?
Spirits! Sweep these mortals into the tides!!!
All who summon the ferryman, must pay the toll!
You wish for passage to Helheim? Then you shall have it! Ahahahaha!
Those who summon, pay the toll, forfeit now your eternal soul!
You cannot hide what you truly are, demon!
Text1_lang: You cannot hide what you truly are, demon!

Text_lang: Ahahahahaha!

Text1_lang: Praise to the goddess. She has blessed us this night with new life.
The birth of not one, but two healthy males.

Text_lang: Two?

Text1_lang: The Stormrage twins.
Beautiful. Nearly identical, except for-

Text_lang: That one! His eyes are golden!

Text1_lang: Indeed. The child is destined for a great and prosperous future. His name... is Illidan.

Text_lang: Illidan, your anger is misplaced. I have not insulted you.
You have cast me out, Cenarius!
No. You may remain here, but I will no longer be your teacher.
So...
So I must learn from... a NOVICE... instead of a MASTER?
You must learn respect.
To walk this path requires sacrifice, Illidan... Something you have yet to understand.
Brother-
Behold the Legion's power.
<Screams in agony>
No matter how hard this world fights, it will fall.
Our eyes... deceive us.
Beyond this army is another... and another... and another...
Even if we defeat them here, it will mean nothing.
We are doomed...
And I will find that way.
If you wish to continue studying the wilds, you may do so with your brother.
Malfurion will become the first druid because he is a dedicated student. You... are NOT.
The army that marches on Azeroth is but a whisper of the Legion's true strength.
unless we find another way to fight them.

Text1_lang: Behold this motley throng in which the rebels put their faith.
Kaldorei? You disgrace a glorious past, hiding in trees and cloaking yourselves in false piety. You have grown as savage as the trolls that skulk about your forests.
Quel'dorei? You are peasants playing at nobility, all too willing to mingle with lesser races that dilute your bloodline. You are unworthy of the name high elves.
Sin'dorei? Of all the elves, I thought you might understand the choice I made to save my people. Instead, you ally with misfits and monsters.
Each of you has debased your proud lineage. Each of you has forgotten the ancient power that is our birthright.
But Suramar remembers! We are the Nightborne, last of the true elves. The rest of you are hollow echoes of our greatness.
Let this failed rebellion be a lesson to any that would stand against the shal'dorei!

Text_lang: Your actions are illogical. All possible results for this encounter have been calculated.
Enough of this weakness, boy! Contain your magic!
Too... much... power...
Father! No!
Another year of slumber. I wonder if Medivh will ever awaken.
Does our old friend dream? Is he trapped in nightmares?
Now you're ready to oversee the tower's protection in my absence.
Defense protocols activated.
Hmm, I must remember to shut you down from time to time. Overuse might cause you to become... erratic.
It couldn't have been helped, you know. We tried to alter it, but it was all part of a larger scheme.
I know. All part of a greater cycle. A cycle that now at last may be broken.

Text1_lang: As you can see, the Legion's reach still extends beyond the Broken Shore.
Their agents lurk across Azeroth, threatening to subvert our efforts at the tomb. They are some of the Legion's most powerful champions.

Text_lang: If the plans of these fiends come to fruition, all our efforts--all our sacrifices--will have been for naught.
We must enlist your help to hunt these targets down. You may be the only one with any chance of stopping them.
Our power manifests: Kirin'var torel, ahm shalar, azakim!

Text1_lang: Together! We must all lend our strength!

Text_lang: Much has been asked of you in the course of this war, champion. I fear even more is needed.
Our friend lies just in here.
It breaks my heart to see him like this.

Text1_lang: Justice rains from above!
Stay plucky, you will do better next time!
You won on a wing and a prayer!
Swoop in!
It's a feathered frenzy!
Scratch that one.

Text_lang: Wretched mortal! What have you done to my ship?!
No matter! You will pay for this... I WILL DEVOUR YOUR SOUL!
May I have your attention please. This ship is about to Self-Destruct. Please exit this ship at your soonest convenience.
My computer! How... how did you guess my password?! It had many symbols and capitalized letters!
Enough! I have little time for games!
Foolish mortals! Did you truly believe the Burning Legion would be so easily defeated?
Behold the power of the fel!
Careful, champion. Something is emerging from the portal... something powerful!
I... I live, but I'm in no condition for battle. Hurry, champion, you must stop him!
Let us begin.
Text1_lang: Let us begin.

Text_lang: Pitiful.
Text1_lang: Pitiful.

Text_lang: It seems you are ready.
Text1_lang: It seems you are ready.

Text_lang: Again!
Text1_lang: Again!

Text_lang: Try harder.
Text1_lang: Try harder.

Text_lang: Don't give up.
Text1_lang: Don't give up.

Text_lang: Excellent strategy.
Text1_lang: Excellent strategy.

Text_lang: You're improving.
Text1_lang: You're improving.

Text_lang: Good, but can you do it again?
Text1_lang: Good, but can you do it again?
Cue awesome scene of the Fel Hammer destroying one of the Legion ships and the others jumping away!
Be shielded, heroes!
Odyn was a fool to choose you as his champion.
It will be amusing to see his shame when you fall.
Your kind should not be here. This land is OURS, and only we are worthy of entering this tournament!
I wonder if your name will be remembered after you've failed...

Text_lang: Your size probably matches your strength. Puny.
I'd let you work out with me, but these weights are as big as you. Come back when you grow muscles.
It's alright if you want to leave. Most of my opponents lose as soon as they look at me.
I misjudged your strength, brul. I used to believe that size mattered, but perhaps I was mistaken.
When I spoke to the shaman of my tribe, he foresaw a victory for me on this day. Perhaps you should bow out of this one, fellow warrior.
You seem like one of strong will, but my will is stronger. As is my my mind.
I look forward to our match, warrior. If you should survive to see it.
I now know what the shaman meant. I have learned humility, and have grown stronger because of it.
Thank you, warrior.
Welcome, warriors, to the Trial of Rage!
Our first combatants are the mighty Battlelord $p and the infamous drogbar, Damrul the Stronk!
I'm gonna toss you around like a ragdoll, $r!
Battlelord $p's next challenger is Omanawkwa Steelhoof of the Highmountain tribe.
Let us see if $p's skill can break the infamous Steelhoof shield!
My shield has fended off armies of warriors. I don't believe one $r will be able to pierce it.
It will be my pleasure to crush you.
Do not feel shame when you fall. My defense is impenetrable.
It was my honor to be welcomed here by Odyn. I will prove his choice in my strength was not misjudged.
Battlelord $p's next opponent is Asrea Moonblade of the proud nightborne of Suramar.
Her blade has felled many a warrior inside this ring. Can the Battlelord find a way to triumph?

Text1_lang: It's been a while since my blade has tasted blood. I wonder if it will be pleased with yours...

Text_lang: Wait! Stop, I... I cannot go on. You're clearly the stronger brul here.
I yield, Battlelord. You have proven yourself beyond a shadow of a doubt to be the superior warrior.
Death comes soon.
An excellent first round! It seems Damrul underestimated the strength of Battlelord $p.
The vaunted Steelhoof defense has fallen before $p's skill! But will that skill be enough to best the next challenger?
A melee for the ages! Asrea has been so dominant that many spectators considered her unbeatable. It would seem her hubris has ushered in her downfall!
Battlelord $p, when you are ready to face your final challenger, step onto the rune.
The Battlelord has bested all challengers! The trial is complete!
Let us revel in our champion's victory! All hail the Battlelord!
Eyir has sent her finest pupil to serve as Battlelord $p's final challenger. I present to you... Aspirant Thyri!
Will Battlelord $p's martial prowess be enough to vanquish one favored in the eyes of Eyir?

Text1_lang: When I defeat you, I shall be one step closer to ascension.
I... I can't believe I lost. Perhaps I am not worthy to ascend...

Text_lang: It is amusing how you continue to fight, even though you're bound to lose.
Your fighting style does not impress, nor concern me. You will fall to my strength soon.
You're so tiny! It's like playing with a rabbit.

Text1_lang: Nerus? Explain yourself, uncle!

Text_lang: They may never forgive me for what I have done, but at least they will be safe. For now, my family will be safe.
The Night of the Wilds is upon us once more, friends.
On this evening, the spirits of the great beasts of legend rise in these very fields.
One among us has been chosen to enter the darkness.
To hunt the noble spirits and return them to their honored rest.
Raise your steins to the Huntmaster, our hunter of beasts!
Let the feast begin!
Behold! Den-mother Fereki, great predator of the earth, and mighty Vetholnir, lord of the skies.

Text1_lang: Archdruid! The Shrine of Aviana is under attack again, and this time it's a full-scale invasion! The Ancient needs our help!
To hell with the front lines! I'm going around back to take out their casters and artillery. You're welcome to join me!
Did you hear that? Screams from the shrine! We've gotta get back there!
Die, demon scum!

Text_lang: Perish before the might of the Legion!

Text1_lang: You wretched... No! The idol!
Noooo!
The shrine is lost. Druids, take flight! Retreat!
What the... Flight Form's not working?! With the idol gone, we've lost our wings! Everyone teleport out and regroup at the Dreamgrove!

Text_lang: What a hunt! This, out here, is the true spirit of the wilds. Let us revel the night away and leave our cares for the morning!
You're ordered to report to the battlefield at once. Take out those demons shredding our front lines!
The mighty Legion has attacked, and we are barely holding off their siege.
How can we help?
Text1_lang: How can we help?

Text_lang: The Helm of Domination shows me many things, Deathlord.
Show yourselves!
Velen. At long last, you return to the home you abandoned.
You turned your back on your people, Prophet. Your world. Such betrayal should be answered with death.
That voice... Hatuun? How did you survive this hell for so long?
We changed, just as Argus did. We endured. What choice did we have?
Enough!
Stay your weapons! The Prophet and his ally are not our foes.
High Exarch Turalyon... we meet at last.
I have no wish to fight you, Hatuun. But I cannot allow your bitterness to impede our war against the Legion.
We must stand together, all of us, if we are to have any chance of defeating the Legion.
For millennia, the Army of the Light has waged war upon the Burning Legion. Battles. Skirmishes. Sabotage.
We were committed to our cause. Either we would end the Legion's crusade... or they would end ours.
When at last our final assault on Argus began, we knew we might not survive it. And when the Xenedar was hit, it seemed all hope was lost.

Text1_lang: I am Jaina Proudmoore. I have come for an audience with Lord Admiral Katherine Proudmoore... my mother.

Text_lang: Your people... your worlds... always crumble.
I am. In no small part thanks to our friend here. But Alleria... there's something else.
Do... not... give in!
We're taking you to Katherine, all right.
You will answer to her for your crimes against Kul Tiras.

Text1_lang: As you wish.

Text_lang: When you are ready to depart, Battlelord, this portal will return you to Skyhold.
When you are ready. We have much to discuss.
But the Light never abandoned us. It called you here and gave us another chance at victory. What we do with that chance... that is up to us.

Text1_lang: Everyone, break ranks! Make your way to safety! Get as far from dese snakes as you can!

Text_lang: There is a way. We will use what power we have to help you.
Talanji brought de mongrel Horde with her. Dis is treason, Your Highness.

Text1_lang: To defeat de blood trolls, we need allies. I did what had to be done.

Text_lang: Enough. I will decide what to do with dis outsider.

Text1_lang: Blood trolls are pathetic savages. Dey have not been a threat for ages.

Text_lang: Jakra'zet speaks true... you seek our fleet's might against de Alliance.
But my daughter is right as well. Rescuing her showed great courage... a trait I admire.
Talanji worries dat I do not see our true enemies. Know dat I am not as blind as she fears.
Let us see if de Horde can prove its worth to Zandalar. Let dem stay in de Great Seal as my guests... for now.
De eyes of de kingdom rest upon you, champion. Dis day, I name you Speaker of de Horde.
De law is what I say it is, for so long as I am king.
Let it be known... Dis day, I name you Speaker of the Horde.
Only de Zandalari may walk those sacred halls! De law states--
Arator... not a day passed that your mother and I didn't--

Text1_lang: Every choice we made was to keep you safe. It broke our hearts to be apart from you.
Kaja, beneath us! What are those things?
We'll need to travel through de swamp. As long as we stay in de air and out of sight, we shouldn't have too much trouble.
Let's keep flying and hope we don't find out.
Andorhal, a few months after the Cataclysm. We're in the middle of a battle between the Horde and the Alliance.

Text_lang: There it is! You have your orders. Slay the dragon!

Text1_lang: See, this is one of the problems with being a gnome. Sometimes Horde soldiers just get the urge to KICK you.

Text_lang: Soldiers of the Alliance! Hold your ground! She can't hide forever.

Text1_lang: The ALLIANCE wants me too? What's going on right now?
The Well of Eternity, just prior to the War of the Ancients. About ten thousand years before your time, $n. Give or take.
Oh no! There I am!
These fel wounds are bad. We need to get me back to Wyrmrest.
There should be a time portal up on the other side of the Well. I know the way. Follow me!

Text_lang: The man'ari torment my kind with their fel magic rituals. Let their dark words be purged... in fire!
The scorched parchment you left behind will remind the Legion that our resistance cannot be silenced. Thank you.
Even when tortured by the Legion, my people rebel against their accursed crusade. The demons may break their bodies, but never their wills. Go, release their spirits so that they may find peace.
The spirits of those who resist the Legion inspire us all.
Aaaah! Try distracting him with a toy!
Text1_lang: Aaaah! Try distracting him with a toy!

Text_lang: Riot, boys! Give 'em hell!
Our people are being used as fodder for vile rituals. Destroy these monstrous creations and help us honor the remains of our dead.
Those fiends capture my people and subject them to heinous rituals. We will no longer be hunted. Help us bring the fight to the Legion!
As the Legion encroaches upon the hunting grounds of the panthara, the starving beasts have grown more aggressive. Thin their numbers, before they wipe out our talbuk herds.
AL'KSH SYR IIR AWAN? IILTH SYTHN AGEV.
Text1_lang: AL'KSH SYR IIR AWAN? IILTH SYTHN AGEV.

Text_lang: Environmental justice!
Bert's bot beats baddie!
The code clearly missing a semicolon!
Bert's bots bested!
Main power turn on!
Code review successful!
Now the ones we've lost can find rest.
The lives and souls of my people are safer, thanks to you.
Those steeds are vital in our battle against the demons. You have my thanks for safeguarding them.

Text1_lang: I'll keep an eye on dis one and make sure he doesn't go anywhere.

Text_lang: My scouts found the remains of Aggonar. We are in your debt, High Exarch. And yours, outlander.
Kil'jaeden's ship. Even after its destruction, its presence vexes us. Clear the surrounding area of its blight.
A pity the memory of Kil'jaeden's existence cannot be purged as easily as you cleansed these grounds.
The Legion is arming a devastator to fire on the Xenedar! We need you to commandeer it.
Nice shooting! With that cursed ship out of commission, we can focus on other fronts.
You're a brave one, aren't you?
Text1_lang: You're a brave one, aren't you?
Strip this camp apart. I want everything Goji and his ilk were working on brought to me.
Clients want the stuff right now! We're shovin' off!

Text_lang: Oh no... I think my barrel has pee in it...

Text1_lang: Helmsman, steer us away!

Text_lang: Wait, do you hear that?
Preeettyyy...
Turn the cannon on Kil'jaeden's ship!

Text1_lang: The darkened naaru pulses with Void energy.
It has become a beacon...
...calling those who would use this power for their own ends.

Text_lang: But your ally saved many of us from the Legion's grasp. Perhaps you have changed.
We seek you as allies. We came to Argus at the call of the Army of the Light to bring an end to the Legion. Stand with us once more!
An end? Pah! Their numbers are beyond measure. It is an impossible task. A death wish!
What is your bidding, master?
The circle nears completion. The mortals must not disrupt the rebirth.
Those who will not serve shall be destroyed. It is the only way.
Become the instrument of my wrath once again, Aggramar. End this incursion of the Light.
The hour of rebirth draws near. Are the souls prepared?
Our kin still resist the true path, master. But they will soon be broken.
One still eludes us. Her essence is needed to ensure the victory of my crusade.
The Life-Binder will soon reveal herself. She will not escape me, master!
When my new Pantheon rises, no power in the universe will stand against the Legion!

Text1_lang: I remember the awakening... how life sprang forth all around us.
I remember unity... until it was shattered by betrayal.
I remember fleeing... to keep him from his prize.
The time for hiding is over. Aid me... or everything ends.

Text_lang: Talgath has turned against us!
No...
It cannot end like this. Take the others and go, Prophet. We will buy you time.
Hatuun! You do not have to do this!
Please... keep my family safe.
K'ure! Help us!
I will hunt you across the stars, traitor! Even if it takes a thousand years!
Swear loyalty to me, pledge the hearts of your people to my cause.
Together, we will become Legion, and defeat the hungering void that would consume us all.
It is little enough to ask, for what he offers us.
Such power... And he speaks the truth.
I had hoped the others would sense the darkness behind Sargeras's words.
The ata'mal crystal soon showed me the horrible truth of what would come to pass if we accepted the titan's offer.
Freehold is a "free people's port." Unlike Boralus, it has no rules or regulations about what vessels are allowed to dock.
Privateers, mercenaries. Even pirates are welcome. Naturally, it's a, uh... colorful town.
I've never seen it this busy before. Something big must be going down.
I'd bet my boots we'll find more Ashvane weapons at the docks. We need to learn who's buying them.

Text1_lang: War demands that we take a more direct approach.

Text_lang: There must be another way, Warchief!

Text1_lang: This is no time for sentiment, High Overlord!

Text_lang: I will transform you, granting you knowledge beyond imagining and might beyond measure.
But they were blinded by their vanity... their hunger for power.
We would be transformed not into wise leaders, but into hateful monsters.
All right, everybody... Hold on!
You've done it again, my friend! Well done!
What is happening? I was sick in my bed... and now... where am I?
Text1_lang: What is happening? I was sick in my bed... and now... where am I?

Text_lang: De voice... he is calling to us... we must obey!
Text1_lang: De voice... he is calling to us... we must obey!

Text_lang: Do you hear it? It's Bwonsamdi's call! Eternity is near!
Text1_lang: Do you hear it? It's Bwonsamdi's call! Eternity is near!

Text_lang: Arrival of the Zandalari Fleet
Text1_lang: Arrival of the Zandalari Fleet

Text_lang: Silence! We are not alone...
Grozztok, deal with dese trespassers! Do not fail me again.
For the Horde!

Text1_lang: Prepare the Blight! Let it rain down upon their armies!
My fellow soldiers, the trials you have endured are proof that the Light shines bright within your hearts.
One final test remains--and it is the most daunting of all.
It will force you to peer into the very core of what you are. Of what you believe yourself to be.
Many worthy draenei have undergone this trial, only to return broken... or worse.
Should you feel the slightest doubt, turn back now. It will be counted as wisdom, not cowardice.
But if you are truly ready, step forward and embrace your fate.
T'paartos... we have discussed this. Each initiate must be accompanied by a second. Where is yours?

Text_lang: T'paartos needs no one to aid him!

Text1_lang: The last initiate who attempted the trial alone came back in pieces. Choose a second, or head back to the barracks.

Text_lang: So be it! T'paartos shall bring... this puny one!

Text1_lang: An unorthodox choice, but... technically within the rules. I have never known $p to back down from a challenge.
Let the trial begin. Light be with you both.

Text_lang: T'paartos!

Text1_lang: The Void. A force of infinite hunger.
Sages and scholars fear the Void.
But we understand a truth that they do not.
The Void has shaped us... changed us. But you will become its master.
We are soldiers.
Through millennia of struggle, the Light has shown us the true path.
At long last, our enemy has fallen. The Legion is no more. Yet our war is far from over. New threats gather in the shadows, awaiting their moment to strike.
You are Lightforged. You must stand as a beacon of hope against the darkness.
For ten-thousand years, Suramar was the only world we knew.
As the ages passed, Azeroth changed around us... and fell into the Legion's grasp.
Our leaders betrayed us, striking a bargain with the demons. But we rose up against tyranny... and drove the devils out. Suramar is ours once more, and we will never again let it fall into darkness.
To secure our people's future, you must help reclaim our place in Azeroth.
First Arcanist Thalyssra and honored guests. Welcome to Silvermoon.
It is a pleasure to visit your fine city at last. Thank you for extending the invitation, Regent Lord.

Text_lang: Please, call me Lor'themar. But where are my manners? Allow me to introduce another guest: Lady Alleria Windrunner, a hero of Silvermoon's past.

Text1_lang: An unexpected honor, Lady Windrunner. Silgryn told me of your courage during the campaign on Argus.
The honor is mine, First Arcanist. I do not mean to intrude upon your visit. Perhaps I should return another time.

Text_lang: Nonsense. Whatever you came to say, you may say in front of our guests.

Text1_lang: As you wish. I come bearing an offer from High King Anduin Wr--

Text_lang: I had hoped your visit was motivated by a love for Silvermoon. Instead, you come at the behest of the Alliance's boy-king. How disappointing.

Text1_lang: Cutting words, Lor'themar. Are they yours, I wonder, or has the dutiful ranger I knew become the mouthpiece of your warchief?

Text_lang: You doubt my words, yet how can we trust your own? Do you deny that the lords of the Void whisper to you? Did you not surrender yourself to the shadows on Argus?

Text1_lang: It seems the offer I bring has been anticipated... and spurned. Very well. But before I leave, I have one request.
It has been a thousand years since I set eyes upon the Sunwell. May I visit it once again?

Text_lang: I advise against it. We cannot trust that she will not--
Whatever she has become, Alleria is a daughter of Quel'Thalas. I will not deny her pilgrimage to our most sacred site. First Arcanist, you and your retinue would be welcome to join us.

Text1_lang: I would consider it an honor to see the Sunwell, Lor'themar. And I prefer that my friends call me Thalyssra.

Text_lang: Rommath, kindly open the way for us.
Please follow me.

Text1_lang: Highmountain stands.
These words speak of more than earth and stone. They tell the history of our people, enduring hardship and conflict to unite against common foes.

At times we were divided. At times we lost our way. But the spirits of our ancestors reminded us that we are bound together by earth, river, and sky. That we are family, and family is worth fighting for.
The time has come for you to venture beyond our sacred peaks.
Look! Blood trolls! Dey must be preparing to attack my city.
Take out those blood trolls! We cannot let dem sink our barge!
Let us hope Rokhan and de others make it back safely to Zul'jan... otherwise dis will be a very short trip.
Undead! Dey are marching toward Zuldazar. We must destroy dem!
