I am glad you recognize dat, Patch. You are a step ahead of my father.
De blood trolls are relentless and unending, feeding on de power of an Old God.
We seem to be in de clear now. We will need to move fast once we land at Zul'jan ruins.
It is as I suspected. General Jakra'zet has troops in de desert, unbeknownst to de king.
They scour de dunes, searching for a weapon dat can destroy de city, killing any who get in their way.
I have no idea what dis weapon is, or where to find it, but it can't be good if Jakra'zet is hiding its existence from de king.
We must find de weapon before Jakra'zet has a chance to get his hands on it.
I did not expect you back so soon, High Exarch. I assume your meeting with the king went well?

Text_lang: The sword of Sargeras is poisonin' the very lifeblood of the world.
The only vessels capable o' containin' that kind o' power... are the mighty weapons you wield.
Raise them up as one.... draw out the corruption from the Dark Titan's blade!
Together, champions! For Azeroth!

Text1_lang: If you want a job done right... use bigger explosives!
Greetings, Lady Liadrin, $p. Welcome back to Suramar. I am pleased to receive you under more pleasant circumstances.
It is good to see your city free, First Arcanist.
For that, we owe you both a great debt. You proved instrumental to our cause.
The Horde was proud to fight by your side against the Burning Legion, my lady.
I must admit, when I first learned of the Horde, I was skeptical that we would share common ground.
I thought our kin from Kalimdor would make obvious allies. But their arrogance and mistrust soon proved otherwise.
Arcanist Thalyssra. I remember where your order stood in the War of the Ancients. How do we know you won't betray us and become the next Elisande... the next Azshara?
We do not intend to be slaves to the Nightwell. We seek to drive the Legion from Suramar and put an end to Elisande's oppression.
The kaldorei will fight to see the Legion defeated and the Nightwell destroyed. Beyond that... we shall see where Elune's wisdom guides us.
It would seem "Elune's wisdom" guided her away from the bond we once shared. So be it.
The sin'dorei are also scorned by Tyrande and her prideful lot. Yet for many ages her people slept in dens or hid in trees while my people fought to save this world.
The Alliance feels too walled off... too cloistered. My people will never endure such stagnation again.
That is why I am grateful for your invitation to Silvermoon. I would like to inquire whether there could be a place for the nightborne in your Horde.
I am sure the regent lord will be pleased to learn of your interest. Are you ready to depart?
It would be an honor, Lady Liadrin. Oculeth has the coordinates to your capital. I will gather Silgryn and Valtrois, and meet you in Silvermoon.
Drown these insects, my children. Show yourselves worthy of my pride.

Text_lang: Brothers and sisters of Zandalar, de time has come to cut off de heads of dese traitors who have sworn demselves to Zul.
Gonk, loa of de hunt, lead your followers to de Temple of de Prophet and slay any foes you find. Flush our enemies out into de open.
Pa'ku, loa of de winds, take to de skies and seek out de heretics. Divine their goals and meet us at de temple.
Rezan, let's go hunting.
For Zandalar!

PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Hezrel reveals G'huun being an old god, being experimented upon, and reveals blood trolls want to destroy Zuldazar in order to free G'huun. No way of fixing current containment, must protect Zuldazar. Ateena, blood troll matriarch, arrives, badly damages Hezrel, and prepares to strike.
Text1_lang: PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Hezrel talks about G'huun being an old god, being experimented upon, and reveals blood trolls want to destroy Zuldazar in order to free G'huun. No way of fixing current containment, must protect Zuldazar. Ateena, blood troll matriarch, arrives, badly damages Hezrel, and prepares to strike

Text_lang: The ritual complete, a creature coalesced before the hero.
Text1_lang: The ritual complete, a creature coalesced before the hero.

Text_lang: It finished forming and cried out with its newfound life.
Text1_lang: It finished forming and cried out with its newfound life.

Text_lang: It caught the hero's eyes and peered inside his mind, filling it with the knowledge he needed to summon it.
Text1_lang: It caught the hero's eyes and peered inside her mind, filling it with the knowledge she needed to summon it.

Text_lang: His trial complete, the hero finished the last stroke of his story and returned to the material realm."
Text1_lang: Her trial complete, the hero finished the last stroke of her story and returned to the material realm."
Tze'na! Hello, little girl. Did you miss me?

Text_lang: De best way to protect de kingdom would be for me to banish dis... thing... to Vol'dun. De Horde has no place in Zandalar.
Princess.
When you left, you told your father you were going exploring. Not negotiating with mongrels from de Horde.

Text1_lang: My father believes he is indulging me. He heeds de word of his stoic advisors like Zul instead of listening to me.
Time is short, so I will be brief. I plan to lead an expedition into de swamps of Nazmir to deal with de threat to our northern border.
However, if you want our navy, you need de support of my father here in Zuldazar. His advisors plot against you.
And den there are de schemes of Jakra'zet in de deserts of Vol'dun. I have no doubt he is as big a threat to de Horde as he is to my people.
We cannot be in all places at once. I leave it to you to choose your priority. Review your maps and decide which plan you will see to first.
I was able to arrange for your companions to be flown here without General Jakra'zet interfering. You need only signal dem.
Walk the path that Huln took so very long ago, and bring honor to the name... Highmountain.
And in turn, we have been reborn as instruments of its power.
But to those who would threaten this world... or attack our allies... you will embody the Light's wrath.
Venture forth alongside new allies and show the world that the legacy of the nightborne is one of nobility... and strength.
Its whispers have broken the will of dragons... and lured even the titans' own children into madness.
That the Void is a power to be harnessed... to be bent by a will strong enough to command it.
Wield the shadows as a weapon to save our world... and defend the Alliance!
So good of you to finally show up, High Overlord.

Text_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - The gob squad arrives and sets up their gun. The gun sets itself into position and fires at the construct. 
Shot: Up close view of the gun starting to fire with the construct on the triangulation point in the distance.
Text1_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Patch orders the gob squad gun to fire at the giant construct. 
Shot: Up close view of the gun starting to fire with the construct on the triangulation point in the distance.

Text_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - The gun fires and impacts, but a magical barrier protects the construct. 
Shot: View from near the triangulation point of the shot exploding on a magic barrier. The artillery gun is in the distance.
Text1_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - The gun fires and impacts, but a magical barrier protects the construct. 
Shot: View from near the triangulation point of the shot exploding on a magic barrier. The artillery gun is in the distance.

Text_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Grand Mada Ateena, the blood troll matriarch, laughes and taunts you for failing. 
Scene: Camera swings down and looks up at Ateena, the construct is shown behind her, protected and unscathed.
Text1_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Grand Mada Ateena, the blood troll matriarch, laughes and taunts you for failing. 
Scene: Camera swings down and looks up at Ateena, the construct is shown behind her, protected and unscathed.
Is the Undercity evacuated?
Everyone, move! Cut them off with the reserves! Do NOT let them pass!

Text_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Rohkan yells to Talanji to signal the Gob Squad. Talanji casts a big flashy spell.
Shot: Talanji and Rohkan are killing blood trolls on the bridge when Talanji turns her head and sees Ateena drop dead.
Text1_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Talanji casts a big flashy spell, signaling the Gob Squad to fire another round.
Shot: Talanji and Rohkan are killing blood trolls on the bridge when Talanji turns her head and sees Ateena drop dead.

Text_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Gob Squad cannon fires another shot.
Shot: Up close view of the cannon preparing to fire.
Text1_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Gob Squad cannon fires another shot.
Shot: Up close view of the cannon preparing to fire.

Text_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - The shot connects, blasting hard into the construct. After a moment, it lists hard and falls over and collapses through the floor.
Shot: Wide shot of the construct platform, slight pan downwards following the construct as it plummets into the depths.
Text1_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - The shot connects, blasting hard into the construct. After a moment, it lists hard and falls over and collapses through the floor.
Shot: Wide shot of the construct platform, slight pan downwards following the construct as it plummets into the depths.

Text_lang: Rally to me, pack. It's time to end this!
Charge, brothers and sisters! Stop for nothing!
We're gonna load this thing up, row ourselves into that river, and blow us up some trolls. Who's ready for a good time, eh?
I'm gonna pilot this thing. You just tell me where to shoot, and I'll shoot. Let's show these things a good time!
Rokhan's been around for a long time, Princess. He ain't gonna die to some blood trolls!
Yeah that's right buddy, take a walk!
We're gonna blow up your Old God, goblin style!

Text1_lang: Tonight you're sleepin' with the swamp fishies!

Text_lang: Terrible swamp you all got here. Would be real nice if somethin' happened to it!

Text1_lang: <Sigh> Did I really think working with goblins would turn out any other way?
Well excuuuuuuse me, princess!
And BOOM goes the bad guy!

Text_lang: Bet we could blow up a whole lotta gnomes with this baby!
Where's your Blood God now, huh? Bleh, ya creeps!

Text1_lang: Aw! They blow up so fast, I can't even enjoy it! Well... maybe I can enjoy it a little.

Text_lang: Wakey wakey, time to DIE!
That's how goblins from Kezan roll!
Whoa whoa WHOA! Nobody said we'd have to deal with undead!
We WORK with undead all the time, you idiot!

Text1_lang: Uh, boss, I believe the technical term is "Forsaken".

Text_lang: Eh, Princess, I ain't no expert, but I think you guys got a blood troll problem.

Text1_lang: How many more of these goons we gotta blow up before they get the message?

Text_lang: Criminy. I never blew up an Old God before. Maybe I shoulda brought more explosives!
MORE?! Bring it on!
Got it, Princess. You're about to get a front row seat to the latest and greatest of goblin technology!

Text1_lang: Uh, boss... we got some screws missin' in places that the manual clearly says require screws.

Text_lang: Oh, well, yeah... user manuals are for schmucks. Newt, we're doing this live!
This thing ain't a problem, we just gotta use the ol' curveball!
Curveball! Curveball!
YEAH! CURVEBALL!

Text1_lang: We got a BIG problem here!

Text_lang: Haha! Ya tink I gonna let ya die when ya still owe me?
Da rest of dese fellas be all yours. Have fun, but don't forget ya still be payin' me a debt. Send me their souls!
That ain't gonna hit the monster, aim harder!
The city has fallen. Nothing was left in the wake of the battle between Sethraliss and Mythrax. Our loa gave her life to keep us safe, and we will not let that sacrifice be in vain.
Together with Vorrik and Korthek, we sealed the tomb, with the hopes that no one would ever wake the giant buried within. We will not be doomed to repeat the mistakes our neighbors made so long ago.

There is talk within the temple. Korthek is eager to attack the trolls. They are a formidable race that will not fall easily. We've lived in peace for so long... why would he now desire to start a fight he cannot win?
I shall inform Vorrik of my concerns, but first I must safeguard my key. I have a feeling something bad will happen very soon...
Vorrik, if you are receiving this message, then I fear I was too late. Korthek has betrayed our people, and plans to break the barrier we placed on the tomb long ago.

PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Reveal of the true power of the blood trolls, a giant corrupted titan monster, huge armies of blood trolls, and Ateena mocking Talanji. Ends with a horde of blood trolls descended upon everyone.
Text1_lang: PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Reveal of the true power of the blood trolls, a giant corrupted titan monster, huge armies of blood trolls, and Ateena mocking Talanji. Ends with a horde of blood trolls descended upon everyone.

Text_lang: Enough!
It is over, Sylvanas! The walls of Lordaeron will soon come crashing down around you.

Text1_lang: You have no idea what you're up against, boy king. We've only just begun!

Text_lang: I've never seen anything like it...
Anything made can be broken! Genn, follow me!

Text1_lang: DESTROY THEM!

Text_lang: RETREAT!

Text1_lang: No! They must not escape!

Text_lang: This key belongs to the first Keeper. His name was Sulthis, and he died at the hands of Korthek.
Long ago, Mythrax the Unraveler descended upon our lands. He slaughtered all in his path, troll and sethrak alike.
Our loa sacrificed herself to save us from that monstrosity. She struck the C'Thrax down, but not before it was able to destroy the disc at the heart of Atul'Aman.
After witnessing his destruction firsthand, we knew that something must be done to prevent anyone from raising Mythrax again.
Although immensely powerful, Sulthis could not create the barrier alone. Korthek and I lent him our aid, and together, we sealed Mythrax within the great pyramid.
As the sands continued to spread, Korthek grew hungry for war. He plotted to unearth the C'Thrax and use him as a weapon to conquer the continent.
Korthek raised an army of like-minded sethrak, and they began to slaughter those who opposed them... Sulthis was the first to fall, but not before safeguarding his key.
Those of us still loyal to Sethraliss were forced out of our home and into hiding. We have been fighting the Faithless ever since.

Text1_lang: A weapon... dis must be what Jakra'zet is after! A C'Thrax...
We need to warn de princess.

Text_lang: A ship enters the dungeon. Pike expresses grave concern as to why a ship bearing villagers would enter his order's sanctum.
Text1_lang: A ship enters the dungeon. Pike expresses grave concern as to why a ship bearing villagers would enter his order's sanctum.

Text_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Talanji asks if things are really over, Rokhan says evil has a way of surviving and he doubts this will be the last we see of this place.
Shot: Close ups of Talanji and Rokhan, then ominous shot of the now revealed pit.
Text1_lang:
PLACEHOLDER SCENE - Talanji asks if things are really over, Rokhan says evil has a way of surviving and he doubts this will be the last we see of this place.
Shot: Close ups of Talanji and Rokhan, then ominous shot of the now revealed pit.
Dis intrusion ends here! None of ya gonna interrupt de mistress!
Please, Rakera. Don't do dis! You'll get yourself killed!

Text_lang: Wh-what?!
Heretic!

Text1_lang: Your visions had best be right about dis.

Text_lang: Ah, he arrives. De loa of...  Hmm...
Mind your tongue, traitor.
Rezan, Rezan...
I am not your subject,
De time of de loa... is done.
De hour of blood approaches.
No! Habutu!
You should have listened to Talanji.
You have grown stagnant, old friend. You let our kingdom rot and decay. But I have foreseen de troll empire rising again.

I give you dis prophecy. De troll empire will rule dis world, last as it was first. And upon its throne shall sit de king, last as he was first, though neither you or I will live as we do to see it. Such is de vision shown to me by MY god...
No more treaties with outsiders... No more bargains with loa. Blood is our path now... De path of G'HUUN!

Text1_lang: Should we go after dem?

Text_lang: No. In time, dey will come to us.
Come, Mythrax. Come, Unraveller. De final seal must be broken.
Now. Shatter the final seal.
Do not be so hasty, now.
I know you see de flames devouring de city.
You can try to subdue us, and likely succeed.

Text1_lang: No... it can't be.

Text_lang: Seems a mage of your... skill... could be very useful right now, hm?
It's killing her own troops...

Text1_lang: Baine, pull them back!

Text_lang: You face the might of Korthek, the Eternal Emperor!
[PH] No more talking, old friend. Surrender your key to Mythrax's prison. You would doom us all!
[PH] You are right about one thing, though. The time for talking is over!
[PH] The key is deep within my fortress, Vorrik. Or did you think that I was foolish enough to carry it on my person?
[PH] Impressive, "old friend." But it will not be enough to stop me!
Nor you. Your father is displeased dat you have brought dese creatures here. He has ordered me to collect you.
Soldiers of the Horde! Your brothers and sisters lie wounded on the battlefield! There is no honor in this victory if we abandon our own!

Text1_lang: Slay them all, champions! Mark my words, King Anduin and his army did not come here for their amusement. They mean to destroy us! Show them no mercy, for they would show you none in return!

Text_lang: We need ta speed things up. Da King has nosey visitors... dat could pose a problem.
You do your part, General, and I will do mine.
Trespassers!
You will die in these dunes...
Quickly, scavenge what you can. Leave the bodies for the vultures.

Text1_lang: Kiro, they're alive! We can't just leave them here...

Text_lang: Azeroth calls tae ye, champion. She offers a gift... one born of her own essence.
I may be her Speaker, but you are her champion. And she needs ye tae fight fer her.
The very Heart of Azeroth!
Soldiers of the Horde, ready your blades! Today, we march on the kaldorei!
Dis is de resting place of de first king of Zandalar. Dazar was stubborn... but now he serves!

Text1_lang: Despite our efforts to maintain order, Kul Tiras has seen an increase in crime, corruption, and piracy. People are losing faith in the Proudmoore Admiralty.
Lord Admiral Katherine Proudmoore now rules in his place, commanding both the military and the guard.
Kul Tiras is made up of several major houses. They were unified under Daelin Proudmoore's leadership, but that gradually changed after his defeat at Theramore.

Text_lang: Stand down! Don't you know who that is?
But sir... Lady Ashvane ordered--
Lady Ashvane? Do you serve Lady Ashvane? Is that Lady Ashvane's crest upon your shield?
No! You serve Kul Tiras! You wear the crest of Proudmoore! And you take your orders from ME.
Now stand down and let them pass. We shall parley in my office.
N-no, sir.
Aye, sir!

Text1_lang: Patch, now!
Beyond Tiragarde Sound are lands held by the Waycrest and Stormsong families.
To the west lies Drustvar, a mountainous region providing most of the kingdom's ore... and some of our toughest warriors.
In Stormsong Valley, to the north, the tidesages of House Stormsong craft and bless the ships of our legendary fleet.
House Waycrest has been a loyal supporter of Proudmoore's rule for centuries, but their recent absence from council meetings has given rise to troubling rumors.
But nobody has heard from the fleet in months! The tidesages have withdrawn into their cloisters and seem uninterested in finding our missing ships.

Text_lang: Nope, never mind. It's ale. We're good.

Text1_lang: We must unite the houses beneath the Proudmoore banner and locate the missing fleet. Otherwise, Kul Tiras could fall apart before this war even begins.

Text_lang: Our warchief has requested you for a mission of great importance... and secrecy.
Not even I know its nature yet.
Has the warchief summoned you?
This doesn't concern you.
How can we aid the warchief if she keeps things from her advisors?
Perhaps my queen would be more open if she were more assured of their loyalty.
Her advisors are loyal...
...to the Horde.

Text1_lang: Ah, there you are. I was beginning to wonder.
I require the services of one whom I can trust completely.
Certain members of the Horde seem to feel my recent actions have been... indiscriminate.
But I understand discretion very well.
To win this war, the Horde needs allies.
The boy king has something that does not belong to him. I want it back.
You are to infiltrate Stormwind and liberate a political prisoner. One who could change the course of the war... in our favor.
Are you up to the task?

Text_lang: We will not fail you... my queen.

Text1_lang: Oh, I know you won't.
No, you idiot, THE OTHER AWAY!
Steady as she goes, helmsman.

Text_lang: Data recovered. Corruption originates from Old God contained within Nazmir.

Text1_lang: An Old God?! Dis is why de blood trolls assault my city...

Text_lang: Three devices were created to seal the corruption.

Text1_lang: Dat's right, Princess!
No. You will cause no more harm to my people. Your madness ends now!
De shield! It has begun to fade!

Text_lang: You heard the princess! Let 'er rip!
Halt! State your intentions!
Clear the way! Dangerous prisoners coming through!

Text1_lang: I see the city guard is as disciplined as ever. My father was so proud of them.
And now they see me as a criminal.

Text_lang: Get those civilians back! Form a perimeter!

Text1_lang: Mommy, who is that lady?
Come on, we're going home. Now!
Lady Jaina... Is that really her?

Text_lang: It's the daughter of the sea!
Traitor!
Text1_lang: Traitor!

Text_lang: Murderer!
Text1_lang: Murderer!

Text_lang: Sh-she's come back to finish us!

Text1_lang: I will suffer what I must...
I suppose I have earned this.
Do not concern yourself with a few petty crimes. We have far more important matters to address.

Text_lang: Traitor! Seize her!
My king, de Horde has only come to steal our navy for their undead warchief.

Text1_lang: Dis champion defied de might of Stormwind to save Zul and me. Such bravery merits an audience, Father.
I knew de blood trolls were a threat, but I never imagined... dis...
If dat monstrosity is freed, it will mean de end of Zuldazar!
Now ya see! Now ya undahstand! G'huun gonna claim ya all!
For the Alliance.
Let's keep moving. Rakera won't survive dis desert for long.
Strength and honor. Blood and thunder.
Mere words to others... but everything to us.
We are the last survivors of a proud tribe. The uncorrupted... the unbroken... the Mag'har!
Jakra'zet is a traitor, but de king won't act without proof.
You know I must, Kaja. Duty before all else.

Text_lang: Let them through!
Out of the way! Bringin' in the big guns!
Time to earn our pay. Fire at will!

Text1_lang: Fools! G'huun not gonna fail! Ya power be useless!

Text_lang: Oh! Curveball! Curveball!

Text1_lang: Curveball! Curveball!
Princess Talanji was kind enough to inform us of an old portal network we might be able to tap into.
Oculeth, see what you can do with the portal system here. We will need supply lines to the Horde capitals.
Champion, you seem to be on the right track for gaining the trust of the Zandalari. I must attend to my other duties. Good luck.
How tenacious! Feel honor in your accomplishment of living long enough to face my pride.

Text_lang: Alliance... hold!
No! I demand an honorable death!
My father once said that Varok Saurfang embodied the honor of the Horde...
Listen to me. There is no honor in this.
That is not for an Alliance king to decide!
At this moment, it is.
Take him to the Stockades.
When I return, we will speak of honor... and how it may yet be reclaimed.
If... you return.

Text1_lang: Are those gunpowder shipments in from the Ashvane Foundry?

Text_lang: Y-yes, Captain Stone.
Text1_lang: Y-yes, Captain Stone.
Well, load them onto the ship! Those explosives are a safety hazard.

Text_lang: Of course, Captain.
Text1_lang: Of course, Captain.

Text_lang: Almost dere. Dis is de island dat our scouts say holds a lot of Azerite.
We do not know what else is here, though. You have to watch your backs out dere.
Lower de gangplanks. Dis is de place.

Text1_lang: Careful there, John. That gunpowder'll blow your hand clean off.

Text_lang: What? This is a BOMB? I thought it was an avocado.
Sure am glad we got assigned out here today.
Text1_lang: Sure am glad we got assigned out here today.

Text_lang: Captain Stone's really worked up about something.
Text1_lang: Captain Stone's really worked up about something.

Text_lang: I heard it has something to do with all those crates we've been getting from the Ashvane.
Text1_lang: I heard it has something to do with all those crates we've been getting from the Ashvane.
That's far enough.
Mother? Is that... you?
I'm so glad you could join us my dear. Your father has missed you so.
What... What have you done to him?!
Be appreciative, girl! Not only is your father alive and well, but he will soon be lord of all Kul Tiras! Come join us, child...

Text_lang: Keep away from her, you heartless witch!

Text1_lang: Why Marshal, that's no way to talk to a Lady. I should teach you some manners.
Now, Marshal, be a dear and bring Lucille to my quarters, after you dispose of these pests...
Come, Arthur.

Text_lang: As you wish, Mother...
Pretty sure this is the place. Supposed to be a lot of Azerite around here.
You know, there could also be, like, giant spiders here, too. I'm just saying, you never know.
Bring her in, try not to hit anything. And get the gangplanks down, thanks.
Invaders in the Foundry! I repeat, INVA-
Text1_lang: Invaders in the Foundry! I repeat, INVA-
Head into town and round up as many guards as you can!
For the Horde!
If what dis exile says is true, den you must investigate. But use caution. Jakra'zet may still be near.
The mountain gives us life. Grants us strength.
Upon hammer and anvil, our kingdom was forged. With hearts o' fire... and wills o' iron.
The same blood that flows through our veins... flows through Azeroth's as well.
This world must be defended. Forward, Dark Irons! Tae battle we march!
The town we passed by, Bridgeport, seems to be the largest threat in the area.
We need to show the Kul Tirans what it means to make an enemy of the Horde.
Come, hero. Let me show you around.
It is said de Great Seal is one of de only things still standing dat is older than de Zandalari Empire.
My father keeps many of his treasures here in de royal vault.
You can find your nightborne friend in de Hall of Ancient Paths. Come see me when you are done looking around.

Text_lang: But do you have time to waste?

Text1_lang: This isn't over!
Zelling! Damn you, we need you alive!

Text_lang: <wheeze> I'm... sorry. I.. can't... I don't have anything... left in me...
Miss Voss, <cough> please... bring me back... I must help my family... I'll do anything... anything...

Text1_lang: You'll be shunned if you become one of us. You look in a mirror and all you'll see is a monster.
We'll see. Maybe it can be different... just this one time.
Lilian Voss. Why have you called upon me?

Text_lang: Lilian. We can find other tidesages. You know his family won't accept him.

Text1_lang: Bring this man back. He has been chosen to become Forsaken.
As you command, by the will of the Dark Lady.

Text_lang: Infuse this amulet with power... it might be the only way tae save her!
Finally, a challenger steps up!
How is this possible?!
This will not stand! You have not seen the last of Captain Hermes and his trio of ruthless crabs!
Looks like you need to seek some shell-ter. Get it? Shells? Crabs! Victory is mine!
Yeah! Crustacean power!
Brothers and sisters, behold our glorious destiny!
I would... damn my soul... for all eternity... if it meant my family's happiness... please! You must...
You... must...
I... I live! Hahaha! I must see Julia and the children at once. They will be delighted!

Text1_lang: I guess we'll see what happens now.
The rumors are true. Daelin's Gate... has fallen.
A pirate fleet struck the gate with overwhelming force...

Text_lang: Pirates?! The Proudmoores can't even protect us from pirates anymore!

Text1_lang: For shame!
But it has not been enough.
Lady Ashvane has been my rock since those first dark days when we both lost our husbands. Now, she will be the kingdom's rock. Now... she is--
A liar!
So, this was your play all along. Despicable.
What is the meaning of this, girl?!
Lady Priscilla Ashvane, you are under arrest for trafficking, conspiring with pirates, and high treason against the Admiralty of Kul Tiras.
Your company MADE the weapons that destroyed Daelin's Gate using this!
It's called Azerite... and the Alliance and Horde are already at war over it.
You hired the pirate fleet, armed them to the teeth, and set them upon your own countrymen.
And I almost... Priscilla... How could you betray the kingdom? How could you betray me?
You're too weak to rule, Katherine.

Text_lang: It's over, Stormsong! Look around you... You're surrounded!
All I see are lost souls, crying for release.
You brought your end with you, Pike. I must deliver the fleet to our glorious savior... Azshara.
STORMSONG!

Text1_lang: Sam, no!
Dis ends here, General. De plots. De lies. De murders.

Text_lang: <Jakra'zet groans.>

Text1_lang: Give him a clean death. We have seen enough suffering for one day.

Text_lang: Suffering? You have not seen true suffering. Not yet...
But you will!
No... It cannot be!

Text1_lang: He was de final sacrifice... We have failed.

Text_lang: Prepare to face my unbeatable team of highly modified and customized robots!
No pet can compete with my team, I'm unstoppable!
Inconceivable! Next time I'm building bigger robots.
My brilliant mind making even more brilliant machines is an unbeatable combination.
Malfunction!? That's not supposed to happen!

Text1_lang: I dunnae know who that is, but I'm sure she needs killin'!

Text_lang: Hey there, name's Dilbert McClint, Infestation Management.  Always nice to battle a fellow arachnoid enthusiast.
Yeah, that's right.  We're bad! Rock and Roll!
When one falls, another takes its place!
One guy, three spiders, 26 total legs, you didn't have a chance.
Looks like it's time for me to tear out the bad battle spiders and put in some good battle spiders.
Show dem, leader of Zandalar. Show da blade to those dat need to see it da most. Give dem peace.
Ya brought de champion to dese shores against ya father's will. Ya learned da secrets of G'huun when no one be listenin'.
Ya set in motion what be needed ta save ya people. Now, more than ever, dey be callin' for a leader dey can love and trust.
Show dem da blade. Become da symbol dey need.

Text1_lang: Dis was not my achievement.
Behold de blood of G'huun. By his will were borne de deaths of Shadra, Hi'reek, Torga, and ...and Rezan.
By his will were borne de deaths of so many of our brothers and sisters.
Let dis glaive be displayed as a reminder dat no matter how far we fall, no matter how much we lose, we are Zandalari!$bWe adapt, we find a way to survive!
If it were not for dis hero of de Horde, our losses would have been far worse.$bDis proves, more than ever, dat it is time for us to adapt, to become part of de world again.
Zandalar forever!

Text_lang: Brothers and sisters! The Horde is pressing further into Darkshore! Rally at the Wildbend River.

Text1_lang: We are getting out of here!

Text_lang: Sylvanas! Your foul deeds desecrate this sacred place! Andu-falah-dor!

Text1_lang: Malfurion. How gracious of you to join us...
Who would have guessed that you would come to protect your precious trees?

Text_lang: Begone, witch!

Text1_lang: Argh! My eyes! It burns!
Where did you fly away to, little bird?

Text_lang: Mrglrglrgl!
Text1_lang: Mrglrglrgl!

Text_lang: Mrgl? Rgl!
Text1_lang: Mrgl? Rgl!

Text_lang: Mrg? Grml?!
Text1_lang: Mrg? Grml?!

Text_lang: Rgrml grml grml!
Text1_lang: Rgrml grml grml!

Text_lang: Mrglrgl? Mrg! Rgl!
Text1_lang: Mrglrgl? Mrg! Rgl!

Text_lang: Mrrrmgrl!
Text1_lang: Mrrrmgrl!

Text_lang: Rgl... mrg...
Text1_lang: Rgl... mrg...

Text_lang: Mrg!
Text1_lang: Mrg!

Text_lang: Grgl...
Text1_lang: Grgl...

Text_lang: Rgll mgrgl... rgl...
Text1_lang: Rgll mgrgl... rgl...

Text_lang: Mrrg mrgl?
Text1_lang: Mrrg mrgl?

Text_lang: Mrglrggg...
Text1_lang: Mrglrggg...
Katherine Proudmoore has spent her life doing what's best for Kul Tiras!
My dear friend Priscilla and I have discussed this. I believe that what is best for Kul Tiras is that I step down as Lord Admiral...
I will shoulder this heavy burden. I can only hope I will be a worthy successor.
And we have evidence!
Your family has always been too weak.
The Proudmoore legacy of failure dies with you!
OUTRIGGERS! OPEN FIRE!
Look! They're withdrawing!
You think your pets have a chance against my Azerite infused team? You wish!
Can't say I'm surprised, my team is clearly the best.
But my pets are infused with Azerite! It's what pets crave!
Score one for team Fizzie!
That was my least favorite of the bunch, time to play with the real hard hitters, get ready!

Text_lang: Just remember as we start this battle, you asked for this.
Bees are clearly superior. This proves it.
Not my bees! No!
Score one for the bees!
Every time I train up new bees, it's always the same thing. They get big and strong and seemingly unbeatable, and then they sting something and die.

Text1_lang: I've found the toughest sea creatures around to battle for me, you don't stand a chance.
Never a doubt in my mind.
Always more fish in the ocean, right?  Maybe that's not what that saying means now that I think about it.
Looks like that one now sleeps with the fishes!
You're better suited to be chum on a fishing boat than battling for my team.
Strange creatures on this island will make for a strange battle I suspect.
You need much more training before you can handle a master like myself.
This was not supposed to happen, the prophecy spoke otherwise.
Return to where you came from!
Your determination is admirable, but the outcome of this has already been determined.

Text_lang: If you want to beat the likes of me you're going to need a bigger boat to haul these out of here.
One person against one shark, maybe an even fight.  One person against three? You're insane.
Big deal you beat me. I'm still stuck down here for eternity. At least I had a conversation today.
Feeding time, boys!
The smell of blood in the water will just attract more sharks.

Text1_lang: Before we start, I just want to remind you to not feel too bad when my team annihilates yours.
Like I said in the beginning, my team is clearly superior.
Well this is most unexpected. You can bet I will be ready to win the next time we meet.
Annihilated!
Unexpected.

Text_lang: These little guys are pretty strange, but they sure pack a punch. Are you sure you want this fight?
They have a lot of sharp pointy things and look mean, and you thought you could win?
I should diversify my roster of pets now that I think about it.  Three of the same kind of pet, what was I thinking?
Burly's Pet Battle Training Center.  I like the sound of that, and now I'm one step closer to beating you!
This is not the way this is supposed to be going. I'm supposed to be winning!

Text1_lang: We did it...  We actually did it!
Still, they could be back. And if they bring those guns to bear on Boralus...

Text_lang: You trespass upon sacred ground.
What do we call you now?
Do you not understand?
and you have no place among kings.

Text1_lang: You will not escape your crimes any longer.
Dis. Ends. Now.

Text_lang: Designation: G'huun.
Scans indicate Nazmir and Vol'dun devices currently inoperable. Last functioning seal: Zuldazar.

Text1_lang: If de last seal is destroyed, dat monster will be unleashed upon Azeroth!
Ya fight be hopeless... G'huun gonna be free!
Once Zandalar lies in ruins, da empire of da Old Gods be risin' again!

Text_lang:
You're helping de princess. Dat's good. You keep doing dat. Destroy de blood troll threat before it consumes us all.

De person you want to speak with is at de Zul'jan Ruins. Her name is Provisioner Lija. She will help you with what you need.
Text1_lang:
You're helping de princess. Dat's good. You keep doing dat. Destroy de blood troll threat before it consumes us all.

De person you want to speak with is at de Zul'jan Ruins. Her name is Provisioner Lija. She will help you with what you need.
Lets fight with honor, stranger.
Do not be sad about defeat, learn from your mistakes and rise up to the challenge.
I will train and be prepared for the next time we meet.
Hah! Got one!
When one falls in battle, the others gain strength to fight even harder.

Text_lang: Time to get down and battle! Lets do this!
Another win for the best team, me!
I hate losing! I'll be stronger next time, you can count on that.
Another one bites the dust.
You monster! That was my favorite pet.
This place is spooky, lets make this a quick battle.
It was a good fight, but you're no match for me.
This place is cursed, I never lose that badly.
You had best take care of that before it's used for some blood ritual.
That pet was a little creepy anyway, no big loss.
Time for a great adventure!
I won? Excellent, I'll tell all my friends about this!
Shucks, I hate losing.  Good fight.
Good fight little guy, you'll get better!
Time to farm up some more pet bandages.
I always appreciate a good battle with a new challenger.
With some extra practice you'd be a great challenge for even myself, keep at it.
Astounding, I haven't lost a match in years.  Well fought!
Victory is within my grasp, I can almost feel it.
Do not cower in the face of defeat, rise up to the challenge if you can.

Text1_lang: I'm on a winning streak, you have no chance against me and my team.
Hooray, my winning streak increases!
This doesn't really count as a loss, I'm keeping my win streak.
Looks like my win streak is about to increase.
I wasn't ready, this doesn't count!
I have not battled in a long while, I hope I am still a good challenge to you.
My goodness, I guess I had a stronger team than I realized.
I guess I may be out of practice.
Do not be sad about losing that one, your other pets look plenty strong.
Do not worry little one, I will take care of you.
The critters in this land are vicious, I hope you're ready for this.
Like I said, the critters in this land are vicious.  Good fight either way.
I need more time to train with these new species, I will be stronger when we next battle.
That's probably going to leave a scar.
Maybe this isn't the strongest new species out here, I should keep looking for better things to capture.
You come to face me in my own home? Good luck.
Looks like I have an advantage on my home turf.
This is most unexpected, I will win next time we meet, stranger.
The species of Zandalar are unrivaled in power, your other pets stand no chance.
My pets only grow stronger when an ally falls in battle.
I don't know what to do, Daelin. I don't know what to believe in... who to trust.
Priscilla, the greatest friend of my heart... has stabbed me in it.
I have nothing... no one... left...

Text_lang: You have Jaina.

Text1_lang: Jaina betrayed the kingdom.

Text_lang: Jaina did nothing but follow her heart. And she's suffered for that.
... she's suffering even more now. Isn't she?

Text1_lang: ... I see her... in my dreams.
Genn... She's burning.

Text_lang: Katherine, she's calling out to you... You must go to her.

Text1_lang: It's too late for that.

Text_lang: If you can hear her... then it's not too late.
I would give anything to hold my boy again.
You've been given one more chance.
Take it. Bring her home.
He admired you for that, and so do I.

Text1_lang: If you want a job done right... use bigger explosives!

Text_lang: May the Light bless the spirits of our ancestors, for they've chosen to allow my son to rest upon this holy ground.
It is here, surrounded by the heroes and patriots of Gilneas where he belongs.
We'll return, Liam.  I swear this to you.

Text1_lang: You were a true man of the people, Liam.  Unlike any Royal I ever met.  We'll make them pay for this.

Text_lang: Gilneas will remember your courage forever, Liam.

Text1_lang: No one rides the Lady!
No, no, silly $r...

Text_lang: Attack!
How many coconuts can we get for the ugly one?
THREE? He woulda paid five, easy... Dummy!

Text1_lang: Vol'jin, son of Sen'jin, once warchief of the Horde... Hear my voice and appear before us.

Text_lang: Talanji. Ya voice be a mighty one.
Vol'jin! Is it really you, my old friend?
Baine... ya heart beats strong and true... just like ya fadda. I be glad da demons didn't take ya.
Sylvanas led us to victory in the war against the Legion.
But since then... she has done much to strain the honor that binds the Horde together.
I must know... when the voice spoke to you, bidding you to name her warchief... what spirit was it?
Ah, my young friend. Death be... dark. Me memory... not be what it once was.
Was it Bwonsamdi? Did he crave the death she would bring?
Da memory, it be denied me by da shadows. Shadows... dat... dat be comin' for ya! Watch out!
You're the last of your tribe with any sense left.  As a reward for giving us Prince Nadun, I grant you the gift that is your birthright and more!
Your makers failed you... your flawed race succumbed to the curse of flesh!  Lord Deathwing's gift makes you perfect again!
I remember dyin'. I remember glimpsin' da Other Side.
I was expectin' ta see ol' Bwonsamdi, or Shadra, or Hir'eek... any of da loa.
Dere was a presence. Somethin' movin' in da shadows. Somethin' powerful.
Sometin' not be right dat day. Da demons, deir blades slipped past me guard.
Like dey be doin' now. Cannot hear dem, champion. Da voices of da loa be silent.
I been callin' ta Bwonsamdi for a long time. He not be hearin' me... or he be choosin' not ta answer.
I remember it takin' me somewhere, but da memory of where be hidden from me. Ta keep me from sharin' da truth...
Da truth dat it might not be da loa who wanted Sylvanas to be warchief, but somethin' far more powerful.
Ahhhh, ya come back. Did ya find da spirit of Vol'jin? Or ya here ta make a deal?

Text1_lang: Loa of death, your servant Vol'jin has called to you. Yet you have turned a deaf ear to his pleas.

Text_lang: What? Nonono. Ya be mistaken, Talanji.
Speak plainly! Was it you who urged Vol'jin to name Sylvanas warchief?
Mind ya tone, bull-mon... or ya be talkin' with ya father soon enough.
Why would me want da Banshee Queen in charge? Nononono. Sure, I be all for war and death, but dat Sylvanas... she be tippin' da scales too far.
Balance be important! Besides, dat one got a nasty habit of keepin' what she kills. No, ya warchief be no friend to ol' Bwonsamdi.
Lich King. Da voice I heard as I be dyin'... tellin' me to name Sylvanas warchief... was it yours?
The Banshee Queen's schemes threaten the balance. I had no hand in them.
And me spirit bein' trapped in dis world... is dat your doin'?
Vol'jin... your soul has walked on the Other Side and returned. You have been altered... more than you know.
Is it you who be trappin' me soul in dis world? Ta jail me like ya jail da Scourge?
You are neither undead nor damned. You do not belong here. Leave this place at once.

Text1_lang: I do not like de look of dis. I suggest we go... quickly!

Text_lang: Leave now or stay forever. The choice is yours.

Text1_lang: Minions of the Banshee Queen, leave this place or die.
Hold... you DARE bring a priestess of Bwonsamdi into MY halls?

Text_lang: Eyir, speak with me if da others not be to your liking.

Text1_lang: Hmm. Very well. You and your champion may approach. But know that deception will be met with destruction.

Text_lang: Queen of da val'kyr. My spirit was sent to da Other Side, den returned. Was dis your doing?

Text1_lang: Shadow hunter, you are no longer a mere spirit. What you have become is something beyond my power to forge.

Text_lang: Who be havin' such power? Could it be da same one who bid me ta name Sylvanas warchief?

Text1_lang: You have been touched by the hand of valor. Such a noble force does not scheme for mortal thrones.

Text_lang: So whoever whispered to me's not da same as who sent me back?

Text1_lang: You have been granted all the knowledge I am willing to share. Leave now, and never return.

Text_lang: Free... at last.  Your reward will be substantial, friends.

Text1_lang: This is the most moronic... half-assed... ridiculous plan you've ever come up with, Budd!
But I suppose it's the only plan we've got.
What am I grabbing again?

Text_lang: Your approach is... unorthodox.  Though, I suppose with the smoke from the fires, all they'll see is your silhouettes.
LOOK AT ME!!!!  I'M A MANATAUR!!!

Text1_lang: Shut your stupid face, Budd.  SHUT IT!!

Text_lang: Let's go!

Text1_lang: Zuldazar requires additional forces along de coast!
Our vintner refuses to work with the staff you have provided.
De naga have been advancing on Zuldazar's shores. We must push dem back before dey pose a greater threat!
Baine sent assistants to Suramar to aid with our arcwine production, but managing them has proven... difficult.

Text_lang: Though I am honored by your request to join us, I am afraid that I must decline.
Meeting the needs of our current allies has stretched the Horde thin. It would be unwise for us to take your people under our wing.
[DNT] You understand, don't you?
But please, enjoy the hospitality of Orgrimmar as our guests. Horde or not, the vulpera will always be welcome here.
[DNT] Now, where were we?

Text1_lang: We must all do our part.

Text_lang: Baine must act before things get worse.

Text1_lang:
Zuldazar has sent de Horde our finest warriors, but at what cost? Our coastlines are left defenseless. 

De naga have been advancing along de southern shores. Their presence causes me great concern. 

De Horde must protect its allies! Especially those dat cannot defend themselves.

Text_lang:
I oversee all war-related construction. 

The Horde has new outposts going up all over Azeroth. 

Things were going as planned, until work at the Crushblow camp came to a stop. 

The peons just disappeared! 

We won't meet our deadlines unless Baine does something.

Text1_lang:
Since joining the Horde, we've been asked to increase our arcwine production. 

Baine was kind enough to send us some help, but unfortunately, it's had the opposite effect. 

I'm not sure what can be done...

Text_lang: Nisha, head for Zuldazar and do what you do best.
Meerah, can you sort things out with the vintner in Suramar?
Good. Let's get to work.

Text1_lang: Those naga won't know what hit 'em!
You got it, Kiro!

Text_lang: Fine, if my troops can't kill you, then I will! For Daelin Proudmoore!
The Dark Pharaoh has fallen!  His immortal colossi tumble like toys!
Throw down your tools and raise up your fists!
What's this? Someone from Orgrimmar?
Are you finally ready to hear our demands?
Yeah!
Neferset City will fall!  ATTACK!!!
Me no take orders from the Horde no more.
Me not go back there!
Foreman Magrok cares about us peons.
Me won't build that outpost!
This meeting's for peons only!
The Crushblow Peon ignores you.
Tools broken. Had to use hands. Now they break too!
Peons treated like da poop. Never get nothing nice.
Always been a peon. Never nothing else. Maybe want more?
Did you really zhink you vould get avay vizh it, $p? Hmm?
First, you come traipsing into Uldum as if you owned zhe place...
Clumsily interferink vizh my operation...
Zhen you mercilessly kill my loyal vorkers...
NO BUT! Silence! Keep Movink!
But -
Text1_lang: But -

Text_lang: If zhat vere not enough, you sabotaged my ritual and caused Gobbles' death!
You vill pay, $p. Deazh by firink sqvad!
Zhat's far enough!
I can take it from here, my friends. Report to your master zhat zhe problem has been dealt vizh.
Tell him zhat zhere vill be no furzher interruptions.
Be certain there aren't, Schnottz. Deathwing's patience wears thin.
Now, zhen, vhere vere ve?
Ahh, yes. Any last vords? Hmm?
Beat it, Schnottz!
You haven't seen zhe last of me, $p!
Every Kul Tiran would gladly lay down their life if it meant bringing Daelin's killer to justice!
Quick scene of Azerite tank's shield going down and firing on the gang.
Text1_lang: Quick scene of Azerite tank's shield going down and firing on the gang.

Text_lang: Dis mean me da boss?
Momma gonna be so proud!
Me important now!
That oughta do it!
Would you look at that...
$p! We've done it!
Vell done, Doctah Jones!
Not only haf you led me right to zhe coffer, but you haf removed its protektions!
Such a pity...
I vould offer you a prestigious position in my organization if I didn't haf to kill you.
But first!
You shall vitness zhe destruction of zhat vhich you hold so dear!
The Coffer!? You wouldn't...
Oh, don't be such a fool! I never vanted your silly chest for myself.
Zhat artifact is zhe only zhink preventink Deazhvink from activatink zhe reorigination mechanism!
Vonce his lust for vengeance is sated, I vill be free to rule Azerozh as I see fit!
Och! Come on now, ye buggar...
Hmm? Vhat vas zhat?
No matter! In a moment, nozhink vill remain of any of zhis!
Close your eyes, kid. This ain't gunna be pretty...
This is how things get done, $p. If you want something, you have to demand it!
You'd better be here to help the peon's plight, otherwise--get out!
You challenge the future warchief of the Horde? I'll cut you down to size!
You're not gonna hit me again, are you?
All right, I give! You win!
You hear that? The Horde's finally listening to us!
Party back at Crushblow! Let's go!
I gonna need to walk around, be in dis place, kick over some bones. Ya best keep your weapon handy just in case.$b$bLet me know when you be ready.
Destroy zhe - Vait... vhat is ZHAT?!
Ahah! Fresh air at last!
Two steps ahead of ya again, junior! As usual.
I wish things were different, High Priestess. But with the war raging in both Arathi and Zandalar, an assault on Darkshore would stretch us too thin.
I vow we will recover Teldrassil before the war is over. But we face dwindling resources and rising casualties. If I can ask your patience for a while longer--

Text1_lang: My people need action, not excuses! We will not languish in Stormwind while the Horde defiles our lands!
No. We will reclaim our home now.
Let's slay that slimy sea witch and end this invasion!
Who knew killing naga could be so fun?
This one's mine! Taste my blades, tidebreaker!

Text_lang: Work has resumed, High Chieftain. I'm pleased to see the Horde takes these issues seriously.
We do, Commander. But I cannot take credit for this fortunate turn of events.

Text1_lang: Thank you for dealing with dis matter swiftly. De Zandalari are fortunate to have such dependable allies.

Text_lang: This was not my doing, Sonji. But I am grateful that the threat has been dealt with.
Quick, $n! Into the chests!
Greetings, Master $p. I was just resting my eyes for a moment. How can I help you?

Text1_lang: Thank the sands you're here. There's nothing quite right about this at all!

Text_lang:
Greetings, $p. 

I've never made wine before, but it can't be too difficult, can it?
Iltheux has put me in charge of the vintage. I decide what goes in the wine to make it palatable for the Horde.

Text1_lang:
Look at Kazit, workin' so hard. 

He'll get the hang of it eventually.
Iltheux tells me to jump in the vat, so I tell Kazit to jump in the vat. Easiest job ever.

Text_lang: I'm gathering ingredients for the wine, but it's a tiring job. I think I'll just take another quick break...
You are too kind, $p.
I look forward to helping in any way I can.
Understood. I will do whatever is needed.

Text1_lang: I really am, aren't I? Tellin' this one what to do 'aint as easy as it looks!
You got it! I'll send Kazit out to find whatever ingredients ya need.
Okay, sure. I can have Kazit make the wine, and long as you don't expect me to drink it.
It's really great to see you, $p.

Text_lang: That sounds wonderful! I do love working with food and drink.
I'll do what is asked, but does this mean I'll have to get my feet wet?
You're too kind. We both know the truth though.

Text1_lang: Whatever ya need, we got it.

Text_lang: Kiro. I must apologize for so hastily dismissing you earlier.
The Horde endures because we band together in times of adversity.
Though I turned you away, you selflessly came to our aid. Just as you did in Vol'dun.
Such is the true spirit of the Horde. If you still desire to join us, you would be most welcome within our ranks.
[DNT] For a moment I forgot this.
[DNT] Burdened by the troubles facing our new allies, I turned you away.
[DNT] Even still, you worked to lessen the strain, without being asked.
It would be our honor, High Chieftain.
Then it is decided. From this day forth, the vulpera of Vol'dun are allies of the Horde!

Text1_lang: They don't eat alpacas here, right?
A fair exchange. Shadows guide you, my dear friend.
With ancient words, I invoke your most ruthless phase.
With this offering, I demand to wear your darkest face.
Elune! Make me the instrument of your vengeance!
Now, we shall have justice. The Night Warrior lives... within me.

Text_lang: PLACEHOLDER scene of Lightforged beacons dropping and troops moving out
Alright, here we go! We got the fuel, we got the plan, and we got the hands to push the buttons to make it happen!
We're gonna show Mekkatorque that we ain't so stupid after all. Once his ship's on fire, we'll land on it and send out one of them SOS things.
He's gonna be flying back, and I bet he'll be all, oh no, I've been outwitted by Gallywix, he destroyed my ship, I better save everyone!
Then when he gets there, we'll tag team him! I'll take him from the mech, you do, uh, whatever is you do outside of it.
That's the part where you and me blow him up on his burnin' airship. You can't get more dramatic than that!
I'm so excited, all my chins are shakin'! One thing at a time, let's blow up that ship.

Text1_lang: Hear me, God of the Deep! I have brought you the Opener... the Bringer of Truths... the Torch That Lights the Way!
Honor our bargain... free me to find my own fate!

Text_lang: Go... but the blade must remain... to serve my will.
I have dreamed your destiny, mortal.
The hour is close at hand.
Quick! Into the plane!
Get zhem!! Now! Go, go, go!
Ya words be troublin', though. Step forward, Speaker of da Horde. Maybe dere be a way ta find da answers ya seek.
Sylvanas!
What reason could you possibly have for this madness?!

Text1_lang: Derek Proudmoore was a hero to the Kul Tirans.
And once his mind has been properly conditioned, we will allow the Proudmoores to recover their long-lost prince...

Text_lang: This is too far!

Text1_lang: There can be only victory or death for us, Baine.

Text_lang: What... what is this? Why am I... What have you done to me?!

Text1_lang: Why Lord Proudmoore, I've given you a chance to reunite with your family.
For Kul Tiras!

Text_lang: <Derek Wailing>
<Derek groans as being revived.>
Tyrande...

Text1_lang: We shall have vengeance for the slain, and show Sylvanas that she has not won! And if the Alliance will not aid us...we shall do so alone.
Victory is ours this night!
Elune has given us the power to save ourselves!
The Horde burned our forests thinking to kill our hope.
They died for that folly. For our hope resides not in the trees, but in our bonds to each other!
We... are... Kaldorei!

Text_lang: Da Lich King didn't bring me back. Eyir be claimin' she don't got da mojo. Bwonsamdi be as confused as da rest of us. And none of dem were eager ta see Sylvanas in charge.

Text1_lang: No matter de circumstances, she is leader of de Horde. I will do all I can to ensure dat her rule is a just one.

Text_lang: Zandalar still stands because of your courage, Talanji. Your father was mired in da old ways, dreamin' of a troll empire lost to time.
But you be da first to look to da future... to see what da trolls can become. You be young, but you be righteous. Call on me spirit if ya ever need advice from an old chieftain.
For now, I gonna keep searchin' for answers. If dere be new enemies gatherin'  in da shadows, den I best be huntin' dem... before dey be hunting us.

Text1_lang: You only broke me out of that cell because you need something from me.
Very perceptive, Lady Ashvane. I believe we have... mutual interests to discuss.
Such is the way of things.

Text_lang: Seems we need to find our own way back.
Indeed, my friend. The Horde is at a crossroads... once again.

Text1_lang: This war has taken many turns. It seems to me our current path is... perilous.
They are sure to stage a rescue attempt when they learn of his fate.
... so he can slaughter them in their sleep.

Text_lang: How many times must we forsake our honor?

Text1_lang: And death is mine to master.
You should be grateful.

Text_lang: Careful...
Don't worry. They've got this.
Now do we worry?
Nope, nope. Now, we run.
Dis be givin' me a bad feelin'. Why bring da fog if dere be no ships ta hide?

Text1_lang: It does not make sense. Unless... dey wanted us to be in Nazmir...
Dey have deceived us! My father stands alone to defend de city!

Text_lang: Dose Alliance snakes!

Text1_lang: Our home is under siege! Return to Zuldazar at once!
Helm, bring us to de docks! By de loa... what has happened here?

Text_lang: Bwonsamdi!
Oh my my my... Does da mighty Rastakhan need ol' Bwonsamdi's help yet again?
Aid us... or you will be de loa of a ruined kingdom with no one to remember your name.
Hmph.
Rise, fallen ones!
Let da streets run red with da blood of dese outsiders!
Zandalar be ours... FOREVER!

Text1_lang: We've weakened them enough, we must return to signal the armies to move forward!

Text_lang: WORK IN PROGRESS

Text1_lang: Every Kul Tiran shares a bond with the sea.
For a time, we let fear and distrust divide us.
Today, Kul Tiras proudly flies the Alliance flag once more. Whatever awaits us on the horizon, we will face it... together.
De Zandalari have ruled dis land for thousands of years.
But over time, our empire grew stagnant. We stood alone.
Now, I am queen.

Text_lang: Storm above and tides below, hear us now!
Breathe strength into our sails, and guard us against the crushing depths!
Let this vessel be one with the vast ocean, and us with her.
Sea to sea, storm to storm, tide to tide.

Text1_lang: People of Zandalar.
Many questioned my judgment when I reached out to de Horde.
But without their aid, we would have collapsed under de weight of our pride. These mighty allies have given Zandalar new strength.
A glorious future awaits our empire, and we must embrace it together. Will you stand with me?
Zandalar forever!
I have troubling news.
Most of you need fear nothing.
But Derek Proudmoore didn't flee to Kul Tiras by himself.
... Zelling?

Text_lang: You raised him as a Forsaken. But you planned to deny him his free will. To violate his mind.

Text1_lang: Thank you for your honesty.

Text_lang: Banshee!

Text1_lang: No. He did. And so did you.
Take him.

Text_lang: Others will see you for what you are, Sylvanas.

Text1_lang: There is no place for weakness in our ranks.
Greetings. I am the Matron of Tenacity, Herald of Endless Research. Designation: MOTHER.

Text_lang: Pleased tae meet ye. I'm Magni--

Text1_lang: Visitor identified. Designation: Speaker. Presence of Speaker indicates imminent threat to Azeroth.

Text_lang: Exactly! We need yer help, MOTHER. Azeroth's dyin', and nothin' we do seems tae heal her.

Text1_lang: Error: Uldir facility designed for Old God experimentation and containment. Planetary rehabilitation not within operational parameters.
Recommendation: Relocate MOTHER unit to Chamber of Heart facility.

Text_lang: Uh, no offense, but if me flyin' machine couldn't carry Magni, I doubt it can haul a titan watcher all the way tae Silithus!

Text1_lang: Acknowledged. Waygate activation advised. Destination coordinates encoded within Heart of Azeroth.

Text_lang: Well, ye heard her, champion. Let's get tae it!
Guided your hand.
Receive my gift and see all truths before you.
That which was sunken shall rise.
All that were sleeping... shall be awakened.
As my hand got close to the book, it began to write all on its own...
Text1_lang: As my hand got close to the book, it began to write all on its own...

Text_lang: "At the moment the hero's pen touched the empty parchment, something began to stir within the pages.
Text1_lang: "At the moment the hero's pen touched the empty parchment, something began to stir within the pages.

Text_lang: He could feel his very essence being pulled into the book.
Text1_lang: She could feel her very essence being pulled into the book.

Text_lang: The hero's vision began to fade...
Text1_lang: The hero's vision began to fade...
We will meet again... I am certain of it.

Text_lang: ...and as it refocused he found himself in a strange chamber.
Text1_lang: ...and as it refocused she found herself in a strange chamber.

Text_lang: Suddenly a voice filled the hero's mind, and in a lyrical tone it recited a poem,
Text1_lang: Suddenly a voice filled the hero's mind, and in a lyrical tone it recited a poem,

Text_lang: "What spills from pen, and spills from vein$b$bIntermingled here within.$b$bBeware the jet, collect the crimson,$b$bAnd your blood-bound slayer shall be arisen."
Text1_lang: "What spills from pen, and spills from vein$b$bIntermingled here within.$b$bBeware the jet, collect the crimson,$b$bAnd your blood-bound slayer shall be arisen."

Text_lang: Perfect!
Good Job!
Keep Trying!
The hero tried to open one of the doors, but it wouldn't budge. He'd have to press on through the creatures before him.
Text1_lang: The hero tried to open one of the doors, but it wouldn't budge. She'd have to press on through the creatures before her.

Text_lang: As the hero entered the chamber, a larger version of the creatures he'd been fighting stood before him. Perhaps this was the trial he was here to complete?
Text1_lang: As the hero entered the chamber, a larger version of the creatures she'd been fighting stood before her. Perhaps this was the trial she was here to complete?
With de loa's blessing, our sacred blades and mighty ships commanded de seas.
Threats from without and within rose up to challenge us... to test our faith.
And together with de Horde, we take our rightful place among de great kingdoms of Azeroth. Zandalar forever!
I stand before you, having proven myself to de loa.
But it is your trust dat I must earn.

Text_lang: Stop!
I could not stand by and permit such depravity to unfold.

Text1_lang: Remember your loyalties.
Welcome back, champion. Facility contamination levels minimal since successful purge of specimen G'huun.

Text_lang: DO NOT DISPLAY in the subtitle & chat - (Frightened Zelling stammers)
You are a soldier of the noble Alliance, a coalition of kingdoms upholding the ideals of valor and justice across Azeroth.
An Alliance expedition sent to explore an uncharted island has recently gone missing.
As a bold new recruit, you have joined the rescue mission departing from Stormwind.
Worthless...
Peer into the gateway I command, cross into the realm of the Shadow Lands, I shall deliver you to your death!
The darkness... it flows within me. It seeps from every vein. Come, strangers, gaze into the eyes of the void. Tender your souls to me.

Text1_lang: From the tides, we draw our strength. Our courage.
Lost in a storm of doubt, we forgot what it meant to stand as one people.
As one family.

Text_lang: DO NOT DISPLAY in the subtitle & chat - (Shocked gasp)
Ha ha! This way!

Text1_lang: It seems there are traitors in our midst.
He had help. Didn't he...

Text_lang: I returned Derek Proudmoore to his family.
Are we nothing more than pawns in your game?
You betray the Horde!
You will leave the Horde in ruins!
Tell our champion what ye've found, MOTHER.

Text1_lang: World unit Azeroth cascading toward terminal failure.

Text_lang: Amplify it, ye say? How?

Text1_lang: Infuse Heart with magical essences capable of nurturing world unit Azeroth.

Text_lang: The dragon aspects? But they gave up their powers tae save the world from Deathwing!

Text1_lang: Readings indicate other compatible essences coalescing in numerous forms and locations.

Text_lang: We've got a lead on where tae find the first o' these essences.
When Azeroth called me tae be her Speaker, she sensed a time o' great darkness drawin' near.
Through the rise of unspeakable evil, we've clung to a single hope...
You, champion. You are Azeroth's hope!
Thanks tae all ye've done, that amulet has become mightier than we ever thought possible!
Now, let's get back tae savin' this world!
Glorious! This is the greatest discovery of our time: Mechagon!
Mechagon? That's just a gnomish fairy tale...
Naturally, I will lead this expedition. A matter of this magnitude demands it!
I'm afraid there's no room for you in my gyrocopter. You will have to wait for Gila to pick you up.
He's not sending Gila to come get us, is he?

Text1_lang: Not a chance.

Text_lang: Azshara's forces are routed. We have broken her hold on the Tidestone.

Text1_lang: Our way into the palace remains blocked.
Perhaps we could... together.
What are you waiting for? We have the enemy in our sights!
Fire!
Ah, good. Our guests have arrived.
The finest sight your eyes will ever behold... and the last.
Please, do stay. Explore all the comforts my kingdom has to offer.
Queen Azshara, more landwalkers approach.
They seek the Tidestone... but I will not leave it unguarded as they so foolishly did.
At once, my queen!
The Tidestone's power could be used to shatter the barrier...
But I cannot control its energies on my own.
I must say, that was a delightfully dramatic entrance.

Text_lang: $n! Fenn informed me of your incursion into the naga camp. What have you found?

Text1_lang: You are bound to the Tidestone's might, Zharessa. Use it to wash away this unsightly intrusion.

Text_lang: A most devious arcane puzzle will lock my prized possessions, so that I may return one day and claim them. Now, to deal with all of this water flooding my chamber...
I have sealed the chamber, nonetheless this is quite alarming. I shall finish locking these chests and then enact a most brilliant escape that I simply have not thought of yet.

Text1_lang: Example: Energies once granted by titan watchers to primitive draconic lifeforms.
I must say, you naga excel at taking orders. These weapons are among the most powerful I have ever created.
You again? I should have known.
Workers! Deal with this intruder. Nothing halts production!
This won't end well for you, I'm afraid.

Text_lang: Only the most brilliant, like myself, will be able to complete my intricate puzzles. This one I have fashioned after the ley lines that cross our world.
Ah, another puzzle complete. Let us see the thieves take my possessions now. What in the world is going on outside? It sounds like... the ocean?

Text1_lang: $n! Adaru told me of your task. What were you able to find?
Blademaster Okani has offered to aid us. Let's ensure the ankoans have whatever they require.
I will lead our allies back to safety. Be cautious, $n. The naga won't relinquish their weapons easily.

Text_lang: I will lead our allies back to safety. Be careful, $n. The naga will not part with their armaments easily.
An arcane lock will protect this chest as well. The key, of course, is to never cross the ley lines.
Another of my possessions, secured for the ages. One day, I will return for you.
Yet, what if another of my genius should happen upon this cache? Ha! I made myself laugh. Another of my brilliance... how droll.
Another ley lock secured. Even with the water entering my abode, to use my mind in such a fashion... I astound myself.
The most difficult lock, for the most delicate prize. Try your mind against this, looter.
The whispers from the deep call to me, but I have been hearing whispers for far longer than this. My things are all that matter to me now!
Fools! Did you think I would retreat so easily after your puny ritual?
The Tarragrue? I hoped you would get deeper into the Maw before that beast caught your scent.
Be wary. It moves slowly, but if you tarry for too long, it will find you!

Text1_lang: Hand over the Eye of Fire and we will not be required to take it by force.

Text_lang: You still stand. Your little ritual actually managed to weaken me.
I've got him free!

Text1_lang: Stay close. I'll get us out.
Thrall...

Text_lang: The Alliance? Here?
Our king sent us to rescue his friend.
We too have come to save Baine.

Text1_lang: His odds will improve if we work together.

Text_lang: Hmm... Agreed.
Time is short. Let's move.
Baine!
Th--Thrall? Jaina?
These chains are warded against magic. I'll need time to pick the lock.
This feels wrong. Sylvanas must have known we were coming.
Indeed she did, traitor. You and Lady Proudmoore.

Text1_lang: I have no quarrel with you.

Text_lang: Have you forgotten the purge of Dalaran, murderer?  Today, the Sunreavers will be avenged.

Text1_lang: Then your vendetta is with me, and me alone!

Text_lang: No! You will watch your friends die--just as I did!
Rangers! Kill them all! FOR THE SUNREAVERS!

Text1_lang: The Tarragrue? I hoped you would get deeper into the Maw before that beast caught your scent.
Be wary. It moves slowly, but if you tarry for too long, it will find you!

Text_lang: Can you get us to safety?

Text1_lang: She is... preventing teleportation...

Text_lang: Jaina... we need a way out!

Text1_lang: She's... blocking teleportation...
I will hold the waters at bay... so long as I remain entertained.
It is done. The way is open.
Azshara's reign must end.
Be quiet!
You face far greater forces than you know.
This is your last warning! I can still offer you mercy.
Leave now and I will call off the assault.
Azshara!
AZSHARA!
You cannot leave me here to die! We had a deal!
Contain yourself, human. Show faith in your queen.
I would not let them take you. Not before you have fulfilled your destiny.
It's safe to assume that the naga are keeping a stockpile of these weapons somewhere nearby.
If we can locate their cache, we can strip them of their arsenal and arm our own forces.

Text_lang: It is safe to assume that the naga are maintaining an arsenal of these weapons.
If we can determine where they are being stored, we can seize them for ourselves and arm our allies.
Oculeth has devised a method to detect trace amounts of Azerite. Provide him with whatever he needs to do so.

Text1_lang: You! Get away from that!

Text_lang: Incompatible presence detected!
Unworthy subjects will be neutralized.
Uh oh. That can't be good.
Skaggit! Get that thing under control!
Hang on, I've got an idea!
Gimme that gnome!
Hey, Brighteyes! Over here!
Phew! Looks like you handled that situation, boss!
Good thing we kept one around. Now we've got a lead on the next location!
Hah! This has gotta pay off!
Unworthy?! I hand-picked these tinkologists myself!
They're the best and the brightest!
Th-This can't be right! It's malfunctioning!

Text1_lang: Amazing! The expedition has been saved by the Tinkmaster's technological expertise.

Text_lang: Most perplexing... I couldn't find a failsafe protocol.
Thank you, Gila!
And now, with the coordinates in hand, our next stop is Mechagon!
Behold, the true power of the Eye of Fire!
Hah! I know fully well how to reverse your little spells. When I return, you will be reduced to cinders.
Now, it is time for you to die. Do not despair, for I shall ensure your allies meet the same fate.

Text1_lang: Circuit established. Restoring power.
Error: Forge operating at thirty-seven percent efficiency.

Text_lang: Thirty-seven! That can't be enough tae keep Azeroth protected!

Text1_lang: Affirmative. Additional power sources required.

Text_lang: It looks like our work isn't done, champion.
Ah, looks like an intruder activated my arcane trap! You poor fool, you simply had no chance against my genius.
This arcane lock is fiendishly difficult if you don't... you know what... you don't need to hear it. It'll probably just confuse your infantile mind. Ha!
Annihilated
Text1_lang: Annihilated

Text_lang: If we are to push further into Azshara's realm and obtain the Tidestone, we will need to know the lay of the land.

Text1_lang: Obtaining the Tidestone must be our top priority. But it would be unwise to press further into Azshara's realm without first knowing what we're up against.

Text_lang: Hold onto the gryphons, they're trained to avoid all sorts of danger. Hopefully it also includes fire from a dragon's artifact!
I'm gonna get meself to Camp Bronzebeard te see how they're doin'. I'll meet up with the rest of ye later!
We'll have to leap off the gryphons when we get to the camp and get to work as fast as possible with whoever is left there.
I'm goin' ahead te make sure Camp Bronzebeard is safe. For the Alliance!
The recruits back at Stormwind are never going to believe this!
Let's hope whoever has the shield up lets us in, or this will be one short ride!
Hang on!
Deal, now hold on tight!
Not if I can help it, ye overgrown lizard!
We'll hold the dragon's attention! Ye best get te Camp Bronzebeard, they need yer help!

Text1_lang: So be it.
Evaluation: Possible to reverse condition by amplifying Heart of Azeroth.
Collection of these essences necessary to fortify Heart of Azeroth--and its wielder.

Text_lang: Are ye ready, champion?
Jaina...?
You found one of my hidden treasures! It's trapped of course, I'm no fool.

Text1_lang: Behold the wonders of Nazjatar.
Amazing!
Ah, champion. I wasn't certain you made it out of Orgrimmar. If the traitors knew of your service to me, they'd have put you in irons...
Saurfang's ill-considered challenge may have ended the war prematurely, but it doesn't matter now.
Countless souls have been fed to the hungering darkness.
Though I cared nothing for the living, I did pity the Forsaken. For the great injustice that made them what they are.
But despite all I taught them, they stubbornly clung to hope. To life.
My bargain with Azshara will yet bear fruit. The armies of Azeroth will fight her master, and he will line their streets with corpses.
Enough reflection. There are preparations to be made.
[DNT]
Nothing lasts.

Text_lang: Welcome to the jam!
Yeah! Get dunked on!
MALOWNED!
You challenge me in my own city? Laughable!
Ouch! That stung.
All according to plan.
I will remember this when we meet again.
There we go! Ye can use that console tae connect us tae the Chamber of Heart.

Text1_lang: Remote link established. Awaiting circuit completion.

Text_lang: Move along, let the real challengers step up.
Hold yer horses, lass. This thing didn't exactly come with instructions.
Wait... it all makes sense now! Connectin' the power circuit!
What's this? Interestin'... I'll remember that fer later.

Text1_lang: Acknowledged. Rerouting power to Forge of Origination.

Text_lang: For all my brilliance, even I never could figure out how to unlock this one. A pity, you may as well not even bother with it.
Impressive! Most impressive!
You defeated my lock! Unbelievable!
My lock, defeated? Well, this was one of my more 'basic' models.
Enjoy your success, looter. My other treasures are far more secure.
Haha! You'll never steal my treasures!
Don't feel bad, you never had a chance.
Begone, looter!
[DNT] I know of your kind. Your people aided the Horde with our efforts on Zandalar.
[DNT] Please, come forward. What can I do for you?
[DNT] I do not disagree, but taking on new allies now, when we cannot address the needs of our current allies would be unwise.

Text1_lang: Ah, Jaina. What a relief to see you safe.
Hello, Calia. Big brother.

Text_lang: Word has spread of what happened at Orgrimmar. Is the war finally over?

Text1_lang: It will take time for all the pockets of fighting to be quelled, but... yes, I believe so.
Azeroth has seen so many wars, so much strife. I pray we have earned a respite.
As do I. Have you been able to find peace in your own heart, Derek?

Text_lang: I still have some rough seas to sail, but I'm much better now, thanks to Calia. Without her guidance, I would have been truly lost.

Text1_lang: I'm so grateful you brought us together, Jaina. This time with Derek has helped me as much as it's helped him.
In the wake of this war, others will need to find their footing. Their future. Perhaps you could guide them, too.
I'm not sure how much help I could be. I don't have all the answers.

Text_lang: Maybe they don't need answers. Maybe they just need hope. Like I did.

Text1_lang: Well said, big brother. Come, let's take a walk. I am so grateful to have you both back in my life.

Text_lang: Sasha's snout says this is the place. Maybe they're in one of these houses?
Let's get moving. The peons can't be far.
Head inside and check things out. I'll keep watch.
We will take your soul, and raise the dragon from the dead!
The full force of the Alliance will rain down upon you!
As a newly arrived soul you should know this is a place of torment and of penance.
Not to fear though, for as you see by these many sinstones, the road to redemption is possible.

Text1_lang: Let's go. Those monsters have my son.

Text_lang: Henry? I didn't see him... but I'm sure he's still alive.
Each of these sinstones represents a soul who has come to this place and cleansed themselves of their sins, eventually moving on from here or accepting the role of a venthyr.
Final judgement comes from the Master. It is he who commands this place. It is he who embraces souls to become venthyr, the tormentors and eaters of sin.
There are always those few who are unwilling to work for redemption.
Or don't agree with their sinstone.
Or are simply just a bunch of bad apples.
Thems get the boot. Down to the Maw and never to come back. Take this poor soul for example. He's on his final warning.
Won't even admit he did somethin' wrong. Still thinks he's someone important.
Hold, creatures. This is a guest, not a charge.
Quick, make yaself presentable. Lord Chamberlain is here.
Mother... I'm sorry. I tried to fight the ogres... but they were too strong.

Text1_lang: Henry... always remember that you are more than your mistakes. Now, Private Garrick, I want a full situation report.

Text_lang: Yes, mother--Captain Garrick! The ogres are using necromancy to raise a dragon from the dead.
They need sacrifices like us to fuel their magic. They're about to start a ritual that--
It's already begun... they're going to use the life force they gathered to reanimate the dragon!
That's far enough, orc! Dismount and submit or die!
Text1_lang: That's far enough, orc! Dismount and submit or die!
Out of our way, fools!

Text_lang: My children, I know the suffering you have endured.
The shortage of anima and the lack of new souls have inflicted terrible hardship upon us all.
I fear further sacrifices must be made if Revendreth is to survive this crisis.
Ah! The mortal who escaped the inescapable prison. A living soul restoring hope to the realms eternal.
This drought has left my people desperate...
But if you were to aid our cause, then I could gratefully provide the aid you seek.
Begging my Master's pardon.
Ravagers and thieves. Stop them before they raid what few anima reserves we have left.

Text1_lang: Elune, please shield us from harm!

Text_lang: As one of the mightiest human kingdoms, Stormwind upholds an enduring tradition of brave knights and legendary heroes.
Representing the stout and enduring dwarves of Ironforge, you have emerged from the mountain and stand ready to face any challenge.
As one of the ancient and elusive night elves, you have ventured forth from the sacred forests to aid your allies and protect the wilds.
Though small in stature, as a gnome your unrivaled ingenuity and fierce determination allow you to stand tall beside your allies.
Fleeing a distant world overcome by demonic corruption, you and your fellow draenei have secured a new home among steadfast allies.
