Like many pandaren, you have known a life of harmony on the traveling isle of Shen-zin Su. But your intrepid spirit yearns for adventure.
Though the worgen curse ravaged your home kingdom of Gilneas, you have mastered your feral rage as a weapon against your rivals.
Find the lost expedition members and bring them home. For the Alliance!
Varok Saurfang.
Son of Koruk.
Supreme Commander of the Might of Kalimdor.
High Overlord of the Horde.
He led the charge against the Lich King. He defended our world from the Legion.
Saurfang inspired all of us to strive for true honor. And his legacy will live on in our deeds.
When the Alliance and Horde marched on Ahn'Qiraj, it was Saurfang who valiantly commanded our combined forces.
His sacrifice will never be forgotten.
You have earned your warrior's death, old friend.
Now, greet your son... with honor and glory.
Today, his courage saved thousands of lives... on both sides of the battle.
[DNT] Why don't the sin'dorei get their hands dirty?
[DNT] You should be rewarded for a hard day's work!
When I'm warchief, peons will be respected members of the Horde!
I'll make my way back to Crushblow and get things cooking.

Text1_lang: Let's get to work!

Text_lang: [DEPRECATED] You two, dredgers, leave that mortal alone. They are under the protection of the Master.
Come, mortal, let us away from this place.
No doubt by now you have heard of the anima drought plaguing our reality.
[DEPRECATED] My Master, the supreme Sire Denathrius, has a plan to see us through these dark times.
We face this challenge with dignity and remain united behind the Master. Revendreth remains resolute!
They claim he is hoarding aether when in fact he must ration what limited reserves we have left.
Rumors of a rebellion are greatly overstated. Everything is under control.
Lord Chamberlain! There's a commotion up ahead. Looks like a fight.
Rebels. Just drive either over or through them. They would not dare to-  Aah!
Aaaaaaaah!
Aaaaaaaaah!
Aaaaaaaah!
He is your Master too, traitor! Release us at once.
As you command, Lord Chamberlain.

Text1_lang: Don't get lazy on me, Kazit!
Nothing wrong with positive reinforcement, but...
Hmm, I don't know if that's the best use of Mida's talents...
Seems like a good fit! Goblins can acquire anything, at any time.
While words of encouragement are always welcome...
Uh, are you sure about that? Have you seen the size of his hooves?
Wise choice. Highmountain Tauren are really strong!
You did see him sleeping, right?
More like sleeping on the fruit...
Good call. Nomi is well known for his culinary creations.
Let's tell the vintner about the changes we've made.
Meet you back in the big city!
No need to wait for me, $p. I'll make my way back to Orgrimmar once I've fed Dolly and Dot.

Text_lang: [DNT] Small problems grow and fester if not addressed.
[DNT] Without your assistance, our troubles might have consumed us.
[DNT] We need allies willing to tackle issues head-on, no matter the size.
[DNT] If you still wish to join our ranks, you would be most welcome within the Horde.

Text1_lang: Am I glad to see you! These naga are relentless.
Impudent dragon. All of your kind will bow before N'Zoth!

Text_lang: Enough! You cannot break me like you broke my father!
The black dragonflight will purge your master from Azeroth!
Champion, remove these intruders from MY lair! [DNT]
With me, champion. Let us bring this to an end.

Text1_lang: Time for us to get outta here. See you back in Orgrimmar.
Why don't the Horde want us?
Sure is good to be out of the sand.
So we'll need to prove ourselves to the Horde? That shouldn't be a problem.

Text_lang: I never like turning anyone away, but I could not agree to add to our ranks when so many within the Horde are struggling.
I'd say we're making progress, $p.

Text1_lang: If we wanna stop the naga, we need to take down their leader's shield. I'm counting on you!
Let's enjoy this moment together.

Text_lang: ARF! <bzzzt>
You win!
Text1_lang: You win!
Or worse.
I understand the cruelty of fate better than anyone.
They will learn the truth, along with all the rest.
In the end, he too will serve Death.
When next you see me, you will understand.
I've been expecting you.
Come, let us find a more comfortable place to chat.
No need to be on edge. As you can see, my guards have been instructed to treat you as a guest.

Text_lang: In life, you were a hero to your people. For their sake, you made the ultimate sacrifice.
But your duty to Azeroth is not yet complete. More is demanded of you... a price the living cannot pay.
This is the hour of your dark rebirth. Death's power grows. Rise... and become my champion.
Since bein' wounded by the Mad Titan, Azeroth has been cryin' out in pain. In her hour o' need, she lent you her power.
Today, at long last, she's free from the grasp o' the Old Gods. Her song rings clear and strong throughout this chamber.
Hold her heart with pride. Know that ye are more than a champion of yer people... ye are a champion of Azeroth!
We vulpera have always been resourceful. No matter the adversity, we do what it takes to survive... and keep our family strong.
The Horde helped us when we needed it, and now it's time to return the favor. A fair trade, if you ask me.
A whole world of adventure is awaiting you out there. Explore it and become a hero.
We mechagnomes spent years in isolation, tirelessly enhancing our bodies and minds.
Now we realize that balance is the key to happiness.
It is time to leave Mechagon and rejoin our gnomish cousins.
We have to do what we can to appease the peons.

Text1_lang: UNUSED
They're the best 'pacas in all the land!

Text_lang: Constructs! Hold this ground! Our victory is at hand!
Text1_lang: Constructs! Hold this ground! Our victory is at hand!
Out of the way, little spiders!
These poor creatures... we cannot stop to help them.
By the Light, you're alive!

Text_lang: Ye did a good job, savin' those people and dealin' with those spiders.

Text1_lang: Those spiders were victims, too. They just lost their home.

Text_lang: Yeah... well, I guess ye could see it that way.

Text1_lang: The Light shines on all creatures. That does not mean I have to like them.

Text_lang: No more defiance!

Text1_lang: Warning: Corruption levels approaching 100 percent.

Text_lang: Don't listen tae his lies! Ye don't belong tae him!

Text1_lang: Attention: New anchor point acquired.

Text_lang: Well then what're ye waitin' for?!

Text1_lang: Acknowledged. Firing sequence initiated.

Text_lang: No! Ye gotta keep fightin', champion!
This mortal will not become another puppet of the Master.

Text1_lang: You have achieved much in the span of a mortal life. We are fortunate to call you an ally.
And so by anima, we bless you. By spirit, we embrace you. By oath, we stand beside you.
[DNT] By oath, we stand beside you.
Rise, $p of Azeroth, as huntsman of the Wild Hunt, champion of the Court of Night, and protector of Ardenweald.

Text_lang: We know little of the Amathet, save that they believe themselves the sole defenders of the titans' great works.
In their eyes, all others are corrupted by the curse of flesh and are enemies of the makers.
To the west, another threat looms.
Though we suspect they hail from Ahn'Qiraj, they are unlike any qiraji or silithid we have faced before.
And worst of all, our priests are plagued by unrelenting nightmares.
I fear that these visions are but the harbinger of something far more dire.
As you have seen, the mantid have begun to swarm.
This is far too early for another cycle to begin.
Meanwhile, our scouts report that a massive mogu army is assembling in the north, in numbers not seen since the days of Lei Shen.
With the attention of the Golden Lotus divided, the mogu clearly see an opportunity to conquer the Vale and subjugate everyone within.
Most troubling of all... though the Vale has been cleansed of the sha's corruption, a tangible sense of dread lingers in the air.
The Highkeeper speaks of a looming threat that we are powerless to stop. I cannot draw him out of his malaise.
Hah! Our dragon will crush them!

Text1_lang: Initiating query for suitable alternatives. Standby...

Text_lang: The Alliance has sent word. They have agreed to the armistice. This bitter war is finally over.
At last we can begin to heal our wounded Earth Mother... and the wounded Horde as well.
One question remains. Who will serve as warchief? Perhaps, you, Thrall, would--
No. I told Saurfang I would not lead the Horde again.
But perhaps the question is not who should become warchief... but whether there should be one at all.
Though the Horde has changed through the years--for good or ill--we have always looked to a warchief to guide us forward.
That legacy must end. The war nearly cost us everything. There is no place for a warchief in a time of peace.
It is true--the Horde has changed. Our ranks have grown, and new voices have stepped forth to lead.
This is what makes us strong. All of us, building a new future--together.
The armistice is signed. At long last, the Fourth War is over.

Text1_lang: No. Not while the Black Moon still cries out for vengeance. Not until the Horde has answered for its treachery.

Text_lang: Further bloodshed will not bring back the fallen. We must renew our hope and forge a future for those who survived.

Text1_lang: And when the next warchief musters an army, will hope save you if it is Stormwind that burns?

Text_lang: I know it's difficult to trust, but there are signs of change within the Horde.

Text1_lang: Your faith is naive, lion son. I will sign no treaty unless it is written in the Banshee's blood!

Text_lang: There is truth in her words, Anduin.
When that day comes, no scrap of parchment will hold them back.
The path to peace will not be easy, and not all will choose to walk it.
It has to.
I have been training pets longer than almost any other living being. Do not underestimate me.
My tactics and strategy are unmatched. Do not feel bad when you inevitably lose.
A lucky strike, my retaliation will be swift.
You did not stand a chance, my pets are top tier.
Astonishing! Perhaps there are still some tricks I can learn.
Calculations complete, victory is guaranteed.
How did you plan on winning? I know all of your moves, I'm practically cheating.
Inconceivable! I'm not worried, this is all still part of my great plan. Just wait and see, your doom is impending.
Calculated.
Whether I win or lose, I hope it's quick.
Finally, maybe I can take a vacation now.
Whatever, I'm tired of all of this work.
Finally, something is going the way I want it to.
That wasn't even my strongest pet. You'll be sorry for that.

Text1_lang: It's time to crush some skulls!
I told you I am the strongest and that I would crush you, so I did.
Looks like my pets need to train as much as I do.
Yeah, CRUSHED!
My sweet pet! I will avenge you!
We meet in battle at last. Feel the wrath of the COUNCIL OF CHAOS!
I must admit, I'm disappointed. You meddled in our affairs so much, and yet you are defeated so easily.
It appears I have greatly underestimated you.
Our victory is imminent, our plans about to unfold!
We will not fail, that is merely a small setback.
Neural link at maximum strength, time to unleash some mayhem!
My genius is unmatched, my greatest creation cannot be stopped!
Years of planning and work and masterful engineering, now just a pile of scrap. My next project is starting with a giant laser instead of all of this random junk.
WOW! Power spike!

Text_lang: But this relentless quest for perfection nearly brought us to ruin.
We can improve ourselves without losing our individuality in the process.
Together, we will forge a brighter future. For the Alliance!
I shall tear this world apart!
No more excuses. The Master will have his tithe of anima or I will see to it that everyone in this miserable hamlet are exiled to the Ember Ward.
Your world... is MINE.
Yer a child o' Azeroth!
Through your flesh, my Black Empire is reborn.
Hold on, champion!
There, the link is up.
It is imperative that they be kept away from the Forge.
Terrible monstrosities have emerged from the sands and gather in great numbers.
They see our cities burning to ash and our people turning against each other.
We must prepare ourselves for disaster.
The final truth given form.
Behold... Ny'alotha.
We're bein' overrun! There's no way we can beat 'em all!
There is always a way.
Save our world, champion. No matter the cost.
Her strength... is your strength!
I did not realize they had grown so bold as to invade Mogu'shan Vaults.
The rise of their new empress must have spurred them to action.
Perhaps you will fare better.
For the vulpera... and for the Horde!
In place of a warchief, there is now a council led by Baine, Thrall, and the others. I believe they can--
But this is the only way to build a better future. I believe it will work, Genn.
Peace may be on the table today, but soon enough the Horde will sound their drums and march for war.
Shattered!
Text1_lang: Shattered!

Text_lang: We're gonna lose the chamber! There's no way tae stop him!

Text1_lang: Grubby, I'm so glad I got to see you before I go. Goodbye, my sweet little friend.

Text_lang: Before you go? What do you mean?

Text1_lang: Only a vessel of Ardenweald can contain the power of the grove.

Text_lang: Willow, you... YOU are the vessel?!
No! There must be another way!

Text1_lang: Don't be sad for me, Pelagos. I've spent my whole life serving the forest. This is my chance to help all of the Shadowlands!

Text_lang: Willow... thank you. Bastion will never forget what you have given us. I will make certain of it.

Text1_lang: This place already feels like home.

Text_lang: In these moments of calm, I can't help but wonder what new adventures await.
RUN!!!
Dead end! Well, time to see if this amulet works.
Darkness awaits you!
Text1_lang: Darkness awaits you!

Text_lang: Master! Master! The creature has arrived!

Text1_lang: I know. I raised him to overcome any challenge.

Text_lang: We have other rituals to oversee. Savor the final moments of your life!

Text1_lang: Then we need to move quickly. Recruit, Private Garrick, the Alliance never gives up hope, even in the face of disaster.
We'll put a stop to these rituals before the ogres can complete them. Let's go!

Text_lang: My Prince!
Theotar! My old friend. I am so happy to see you. And I see you managed to get your shirt off...
You as well. I could grate carrots on those ribs of yours.
I sent out the call to any who survived. We have quite a gathering collecting here.

Text1_lang: Renathal.

Text_lang: Accuser. Thank you for sending this Maw Walker to find us.

Text1_lang: Curator...
I am fine. I will be fine.

Text_lang: My liege.
Draven! This is more than I could have hoped for. Report.
At Theotar's request, we moved what remains of our forces here to Sinfall.
There are far less of us than we had in our last assault.
Gather the forces, we attack soon. I have a plan, but we must act swiftly before Denathrius learns of my escape.
|cff34cceb+Clean|r
Text1_lang: |cff34cceb+Clean|r

Text_lang: |cffdb453d+Dangerous|r
Text1_lang: |cffdb453d+Dangerous|r

Text1_lang: |cff1b8729+Decadent|r

Text1_lang: |cfffbdd52+Exciting|r

Text_lang: |cfffb95ff+Formal|r
Text1_lang: |cfffb95ff+Formal|r

Text_lang: |cfffb95ff+Casual|r
Text1_lang: |cfffb95ff+Casual|r

Text_lang: |cfffbdd52+Relaxing|r
Text1_lang: |cfffbdd52+Relaxing|r

Text_lang: |cff1b8729+Humble|r
Text1_lang: |cff1b8729+Humble|r

Text_lang: |cffdb453d+Safe|r
Text1_lang: |cffdb453d+Safe|r

Text_lang: |cff34cceb+Messy|r
Text1_lang: |cff34cceb+Messy|r

Text_lang: With the medallions combined, we can seize control of Revendreth.
The bargain between Denathrius and the Jailer will leave us all to be consumed by the Maw.
I want our ways to survive. If that makes me selfish, I would hope you are all selfish as well.
You mean YOU could seize control. These are merely the ravings of a selfish prince desperate to reclaim his former glory.

Text1_lang: None of your grand words matter. You cannot defeat both the Jailer and the Master.
But I must agree with the others. You lack... leverage.

Text_lang: I've heard enough. This usurper demands our medallions but offers nothing.

Text1_lang: I will not subject my stoneborn children to further suffering.
Why Renathal, if only you had shown such passion ages ago! I find it positively enthralling.

Text_lang: Foolish loa! Ya don't be stoppin' me power. First I be feastin' on ya followers... den you!
Hah! I be callin' da shots now! So ya better start tellin' me all da bad, bad things ya done ta Ardenweald.
Feh! Me no bow down ta ya cheap tricks!
Tsk. Such a grumpy loa! I... said... SPEAK!
ARGH! Ya be too late! Me gave an ancient spirit da chance ta be joinin' me. Dey made a baaaaaad choice, and now dey be trapped in da Maw!
Ya don't say? Well, good ting me got a deal with dis mortal who gonna jump in dat bad ol' place... and be gettin' out again!
Ya don't be stoppin' da Jailer! Him be workin' his plans for a long time. A looooooong time.
War been burnin' dis whole world ta ashes... all over one... little... whisper ta dis foolish troll.
Dat voice... whisperin' as da poison be burnin' in me veins... Windrunner...
Oh, ya like me whispers, little chieftain? Was gonna send ya soul to da Maw meself... but ya bond ta dis world be too hard ta break.
Ya be borin' us, Mueh'zala! Time for ya to go back to da Other Side.
Don't ya worry though! Ya got yaself a new master...
Ya ol' friend Bwonsamdi.
Bwonsamdi! Ya be too important ta summon me yaself?
I gonna loose da bindin' on Mueh'zala now. Ya best be makin' sure me people don't be lost ta his power.
Tink ya breakin' free now, Mueh'zala? Hmph.
It be me who named Sylvanas warchief. But Mueh'zala and da Jailer... dey be pullin' da strings all along.
Den how 'bout we get a little payback, hmm? Rescue dat ancient spirit from da Maw... and bring it nice and safe to da Winter Queen.
Wait, $n. I got somethin' ta say.
Hey dere, ya majesty! Ya ol' friend Bwonsamdi be helpin' dis one find alla dem missin' loa.

Text1_lang: I will take these three spirits into our care, Bwonsamdi.
Along with this other. Intriguing... a mortal soul entwined with the essence of a loa.
I cannot say what fate will befall you, Vol'jin of the Darkspear. But I offer you this chance to one day be reborn anew.

Text_lang: I be deeply honored, ya majesty. $p, thank ya for all ya done for me... in life, and in death.
Hmm, Rezan be smarter dan I thought! Maybe one day dere gonna be a new loa makin' deals with ol' Bwonsamdi, hm?

Text1_lang: As I explained before, Sire, we cannot rush such a delicate process.

Text_lang: Our friend grows... impatient.

Text1_lang: But master, I--

Text_lang: Well, what have we here?

Text1_lang: Sire?

Text_lang: My defiant accuser and her hapless mortal pawn.

Text1_lang: You deprive your own people of anima and inflict a drought upon all of the Shadowlands!

Text_lang: The other realms would squander our most precious resource. That won't do.
Rest assured, this anima will serve a higher purpose.

Text1_lang: I will deal with them, sire... harshly.

Text_lang: Of course you will.
You are a soldier of the mighty Horde, a disparate band of races united in their pursuit of freedom, honor, and glory.
A Horde expedition sent to explore an uncharted island has recently gone missing.
As a bold new recruit, you have joined a rescue mission departing from Orgrimmar.
Though the orcs came to this world seeking conquest, your people now stand proudly among its greatest champions.
The undead Forsaken may be shunned by the living, but your people strive to rise above the ruins of the past and forge a new future.
As one of the wise and noble tauren, your physical might and spiritual resolve honor the legacy of your ancestors.
Renouncing the brutality of other troll tribes, you and your fellow Darkspear protect your allies with cunning ferocity.
Though the blood elf homeland was nearly lost to tragedy and betrayal, your people have reclaimed your birthright and seek a brighter destiny.
As members of the Bilgewater Cartel, you and your fellow goblins have sided with the Horde for the promise of adventure... and profit!
Find the lost expedition members and bring them home. For the Horde!

Text1_lang: Rise, $p of Azeroth, as huntress of the Wild Hunt, champion of the Court of Night, and protector of Ardenweald.

Text_lang: Every attendant in Oribos is taught that the Maw is unbreachable. That the malevolent souls within were sealed away for all eternity.

Text1_lang: This mortal's escape might mean the prison is... weakening. If true, the Banished One could...
Kah-Delen! Kah-Sher! Purpose be praised! At long last, the Arbiter has stirred!

Text_lang: More outsiders! What have you done, mortal?
Be at ease. I am Bolvar Fordragon. These knights and I are here to help.

Text1_lang: The touch of the Maw is upon their souls as well.
As the Arbiter's voice, I heed the call of the Eternal Ones. How may I serve?
The Maw grows, surging with power! How did this come to pass?!
The evil we believed forever bound has conspired to distract and divide us.
The Primus realized the truth, but his warning came too late. I fear he paid a grave price for this knowledge.
You speak for Revendreth? Where is your sire? Where is our brother Denathrius?

Text_lang: My sire... has betrayed us all.
The drought was his doing. He stole the very lifeblood of our realms, starving his own people... and yours as well.
When his lies were exposed, Denathrius unleashed his vast coffers of anima into the Maw... to fuel the might of his true master.

Text1_lang: Long ago, we stood as one to imprison that... monster.
With the Primus gone and Denathrius a traitor, our pantheon has been broken... and doom comes for the Shadowlands.

Text_lang: There is yet hope. This mortal saved me from the Maw and revealed the sire's treachery.

Text1_lang: They aided my forest as well. Their kind has shown great potential. If focused, it could turn the tide in our favor.
Agreed. For the good of the Shadowlands, each mortal must choose a covenant.
And when our realms have regained their strength, we will stand together against the darkness.
I will see it done, Eternal Ones. With her voice have I spoken.
Come, mortal. The hour of decision is at hand.

Text_lang: What in the name of the Master?

Text1_lang: Anima harvesting demands finesse.

Text_lang: See it done, Inerva.
You really must be more vigilant about uninvited guests, my lady.
... if a tad inconvenient.
But I fear you will not survive to witness the glory to come.
I humbly present... the Maw Walker.
Maw Walker, I am aware of your urgent request for anima. Under normal circumstances, I would of course oblige.
Sadly, you arrive in the midst of a violent rebellion. Our resources are stretched perilously thin.
...starving...
...and some, even defiant.

Text1_lang: You will enjoy my hospitality, so long as you remain receptive to what I have to say.

Text_lang: You won't... succeed...

Text1_lang: Such a narrow vision. You disappoint me.
No matter. We will find what we seek... in another.

Text_lang: These bonds are too strong to break by force. We must find a way to free him.

Text1_lang: Anduin! How badly are you hurt?

Text_lang: I... will live. I'm relieved you're all safe.

Text1_lang: We move, now. Those monsters have my daughter.
Cowards! Soon you will face the full might of the Horde!

Text_lang: Yes... Yes! Bonds weakening...
A taste... of freedom. A place to start.

Text1_lang: Mother... I tried to stop the ogres on my own. But I failed. My strength was not enough.
Shuja, the Horde is strong not when we fight alone, but when we stand united. Now, tell me what's happened here.
As you command. The ogres are using necromancy to raise a dragon from the dead.
They need sacrifices like us to fuel their magic. They're about to start a ritual that will --
It's already begun. They're going to use the life force they've gathered to reanimate the dragon!
Then we must take action. Remember that when we band together, the Horde can conquer any challenge.
We will bring an end to these rituals before the ogres can complete them. Lok-tar ogar!
An'she, watch over and protect us!
Dark magic has brought ruin to this place.
Oh good, you made it out.
Ya did good savin' da survivors an' killin' da spiders.
Those spiders had their rightful home destroyed. They deserved better.
You cannot win this battle, necromancer! Our courage never falters!

Text_lang: My paragon, you do not stand alone!
For the Archon! For Bastion!
Ah, just the vessel I require.

Text1_lang: Thanikos!

Text_lang: What... are you... doing to me?!
No! No! NO!
Y-yes... master...
I have perfected you. Now serve me by destroying our enemies!
Clear the arena! The final clash is about to begin!
A victor emerges!
Text1_lang: A victor emerges!
Look closer, Gharmal.

Text_lang: Sin'dane, is this the meddler who thwarted our attack?
Text1_lang: Sin'dane, is this the meddler who thwarted our attack?
The very one.

Text_lang: So this mortal witnessed your treachery!
Your houses invaded Bastion--an act that betrays everything the Primus stood for!
The Primus is long gone, Krexus!
Text1_lang: The Primus is long gone, Krexus!

Text_lang: We are meant to defend the Shadowlands, not conquer it!

Text1_lang: I think not, Krexus. Your blade... shall be broken.
Slay them all.

Text_lang: Chosen! To arms!
Magnificent. Bron's strength is my strength. Our strength!

Text1_lang: What was that?
Centurions will overwhelm us!

Text_lang: Not to worry! I know what to do.
Everyone, hop on!

Text1_lang: Aspirant Kleia. Step forward.
Not only are you a mentor to those around you, but also a stalwart defender of Bastion.
Now, you join the ranks of the ascended.
No more of your rituals, Archon. No more lies!
Rise, my Forsworn!
Devos? You lead this rebellion?!
The Archon's blind edicts place us all in peril! We will forge a new path for Bastion!
The Spires of Ascension will belong to the Forsworn!
Ascended, repel this assault! Paragons, with me!
Devos must be stopped!
The Archon has spoken! Defend the hold!

Text_lang: Recent events require us to expedite our efforts.
It is impressive that you discovered our little secret...

Text1_lang: Why?
It seems you have an eye for talent, Warlord Grimaxe.
Hah! The rest of those ogres are running fer the hills! They never stood a chance!
In time, the island will heal from their dark rituals.
A true testament to the strength of the Alliance. Maybe you'll captain one, some day.
Come on, recruits. Let's go home.
[DNT] We need to do something!

Text_lang: Centurions! Advance! Destroy the intruders!

Text1_lang: This is dire news, Vesiphone. But the Archon has turned a deaf ear to such tidings in the past.
The circumstances have changed.
Tell me of these Forsworn.
Most have merely lost faith and may yet be redeemed.
It is true. This mortal has fought against ascended who are in service of the Jailer. Lysonia is not the only one.
We do not know when or where the Forsworn will strike next. But strike, they will.
What you speak of is unthinkable. But we must remain vigilant, nonetheless.
Paragons, return to your temples. Adrestes, monitor the wards.
It appears you have a part to play in all of this, mortal. Let us see what comes of it. Go in service.
But some have fallen so far as to wield the power of the Maw itself.

Text_lang: But where are their banners?
Text1_lang: But where are their banners?

Text_lang: Where is your hunger for glory?
Text1_lang: Where is your hunger for glory?

Text_lang: You will recall your forces... or you will answer to my blade!
Which house do they fight for?
Text1_lang: Which house do they fight for?
We have a living mortal in our midst. Intriguing...

Text_lang: Or has the House of the Chosen lost its appetite?
Text1_lang: Or has the House of the Chosen lost its appetite?
My final night was wonderful. I'm so happy you were here to share it with me.
I am ready, my queen.

Text_lang: Stormwind City. Capital of the noble Alliance.
Though they hail from many different lands, the races of the Alliance convene in Stormwind on matters of trade and diplomacy.
Their age-old enemy, the savage Horde, poses an ever-present threat.
But no matter the challenge, the soldiers of Stormwind stand ready to face it.
As you triumphantly return from Exile's Reach, new adventures await on the horizon.
Azeroth faces countless threats. Bold heroes are needed to rise up and defend her.
For the Alliance!
Please help Niya!
Text1_lang: Please help Niya!
Keep running!

Text_lang: Niya is still back there!
Text1_lang: Niya is still back there!
The ward has been sabotaged, as we agreed.
Good. Our allies are eager to strike.
The kyrian temples will fall, and the Archon's reign shall be ended!

Text_lang: It will take more than courage to save you now.

Text1_lang: We can't get away! Brace yourself!

Text_lang: To think those brutes could wield such magic. If only I had more time to study it!

Text1_lang: I am glad that you do not. This island must be allowed to heal.
Look, $p, on the horizon. One of our gunships!
An impressive display of the Horde's strength. Those ogres would do well to run and hide.
Come, recruits. It is time we return to our home.

Text_lang: Orgrimmar. Bulwark of the mighty Horde.
Standing as a symbol of pride and resilience, it is here that its citizens gather to barter goods and muster their strength.
Their longtime rival, the imperious Alliance, poses a relentless threat.
But no foe can hope to stand against the fearless soldiers of the Horde!
After proving your mettle on Exile's Reach, a lifetime of adventure and glory awaits.
Azeroth faces countless threats. Bold heroes are needed to rise up and defend her.
For the Horde!

Text1_lang: Look, on the horizon! One of our airships approaches!
The Heart of the Forest is vital to Ardenweald... and to the protection of the realms beyond.
The drought has caused the Heart to wither. Its strength must be bolstered... though we have precious little anima to save our waning groves.
An impossible choice. Yet, one that must be made for the good of the cycle.

Text_lang: Struggle all you like, mortals. You cannot escape your fate!

Text1_lang: A true testament to the strength of the Alliance.

Text_lang: Take our stag and ride with us, $p.
The Blighted stand in our path!
Run them down!
The Wild Hunt will cull you from Ardenweald!
Come, we ride for Hibernal Hollow.
[DEPRECATED] Niya, was it? Tell me more about this wildseed.

Text1_lang: Thank you for escorting us, Ara'lon. It puts me at ease to know we are protected by a fierce huntsman.
[DEPRECATED] Dreamweaver instructed us to bring it to Hibernal Hollow in the hopes that it may be saved.
[DEPRECATED] I only hope... that the hollow survives where my own grove did not.

Text_lang: I was not always so. I joined the Wild Hunt only recently... after my grove had to be sacrificed to save the others.

Text1_lang: My grove was lost as well... but not to the drought. We were overrun by masked fae. My friends...

Text_lang: I am sorry, Niya. If only the Wild Hunt could have been there... but our numbers are stretched perilously thin.

Text1_lang: As is the Winter Queen...

Text_lang: She bears the greatest burden of us all. We must do what we can to share it.
[DEPRECATED] Hibernal Hollow... my grove was sacrificed so groves like this could survive.
Please, Aliothe. Help us end this spirit's nightmare!

Text1_lang: Accept this portion of my power, mortal. Use it to alter your shape into one that the soul below will find more... welcoming.
But if they found a way to break free of its influence, perhaps they can aid us.
This mortal has not been long upon our path, but their strides have echoed throughout the halls of the Ascended.
In service to our cause, they have defended our temples against invasion.
On this day, we welcome them into our sacred covenant.
Together, we will restore peace and order to this realm. Glory to Bastion!
The trap is set. Now we lure Mor'Bitan to his doom.

Text_lang: Master, our preparations are complete. We await your arrival.
Finally! The power our new baron promised shall now--
No! The ritual... it is ruined!

Text1_lang: It is you who are the fool, Mor'Bitan.
And your folly has brought your demise.

Text_lang: Wretched spy! Curse you and your fallen house!

Text1_lang: For Akarek!
Help! Heartwood Grove is under attack!
Their anima will feed our victory.
Leave their husks to rot!

Text_lang: Oh no...
Aliothe, look!
The wildseed... I no longer sense its dreams.

Text1_lang: Unless we save her soon, she will be lost forever!
There are too many of them!

Text_lang: Protect the heart at all costs!

Text1_lang: Hmph! I can't leave you alone for a moment, can I?
Well, come along! We have work to do!

Text_lang: Your infestation is at an end, monster!

Text1_lang: Wait! I sense something... hidden from sight.
Ara'lon!

Text_lang: A Drust trick to distract us from their true target!
Do you know where their leader has gone?
Awakening... she seeks... Awakening...
We will stop her, Ara'lon. I swear it. For Queen and grove.
For Queen... and grove...
Wild Hunt! We ride for the Grove of Awakening!

Text1_lang: We're so sorry, Ara'lon. Night embrace you.

Text_lang: Slay the mortal! Bring me that runeblade!
The foes of the worthy shall be vanquished.
Fall back!

Text1_lang: The Seat of the Primus is ours!

Text_lang: |cff34cceb+Bonus Time|r
Text1_lang: |cff34cceb+Bonus Time|r

Text_lang: |cfff2e699+Bonus Happiness|r
Text1_lang: |cfff2e699+Bonus Happiness|r

Text_lang: Allies, brace yourselves!
Nothing escapes the Maw.
They've stopped their advance...
Go, champion! Go!
The Light is with me... even here.
Interesting...
You... have failed.
No... I have precisely what I need.

Text1_lang: Long ago, we drew upon its magic to ensure the Maw would be inescapable. That the Banished One would remain forever bound.
Exposed the traitor Denathrius, and braved the terrors of the Maw itself.

Text_lang: Yield to the inevitable!
We can't fight our way in. There's too many of them.
This calls for a change of strategy.
Play dead. If they think you're a lifeless husk, they'll collect you for parts.
Go on. I'll create a diversion.
Face me, traitors! The House of Constructs will fall!
Capture that fool!
Text1_lang: Capture that fool!

Text_lang: The rest of you, scour the field. Bring me fuel for the Body Banks!
Text1_lang: The rest of you, scour the field. Bring me fuel for the Body Banks!

Text_lang: You were ever fond of saying that the venthyr do not destroy. We educate.
It is time you were reminded of Revendreth's noble purpose.

Text1_lang: Shall we begin?

Text_lang: You cannot bind me here!
I am eternal!
I am your MASTER!
I... AM... REVENDRETH!
Remember this lesson.
Pitiful mortal. I find your spirit...
Unworthy.
Baine! No!

Text1_lang: I once said that your voice is but one bird singing in the night.
Well... I think it's time we all sang with you.

Text_lang: <Groan.>
Look at you. Pathetic. A puppet dancing on strings.
I will not break... I will not break... I will not...
Fool. Your mind is already broken.
But even a broken thing can be made to serve.
Countless secrets extracted. Insidious designs forged into weapons for my armies.
But I require... more.
(screams in pain)
Your grandest design... to claim the final prize.
The secret that the First Ones sought to hide.
Yes. Your finest mourneblade...
...and a crown fit for the king of the damned.
The vessels... of Domination.
Focus. Strategy. Relentlessness.
Enemies arise from without and within.
Might without control is wasted.
Duty is a mantle worn by all who serve.
Victory will be claimed not by a single house, but through the strength of our covenant.
For Maldraxxus!

Text1_lang: Defenders of Maldraxxus! Through deceit and treachery, Kel'Thuzad has turned our great houses against one another.
He conspires with outside forces and defies the will of the Primus! Today he will answer for his crimes!

Text_lang: GRAAAAHH!
Text1_lang: GRAAAAHH!

Text_lang: Incompetent fools! Defend your house!
Text1_lang: Incompetent fools! Defend your house!

Text_lang: Defend your margrave!
Text1_lang: Defend your margrave!
We have them! FIRE!

Text_lang: Do not... let them... aaarrggghh!
Text1_lang: Do not... let them... aaarrggghh!
Oh, that worked? And the Maw Walker survived! Fantastic. Um... best not leave the Maw like that again. It may undo your existence.
Kel'Thuzad's puppets will be breach the outer wall soon. We should consider a retreat.

Text_lang: Not yet. If we retreat, we lose more than merely this citadel.

Text1_lang: Will it be enough? We do not yet possess all of the medallions.

Text_lang: Renathal...
You know my power. Embrace it. Be one with me... again.

Text1_lang: Yes, Prince Renathal. You do know him. And what his lust for power made him become.

Text_lang: Yes... You are right. I cannot wield such power. But we can.

Text1_lang: Centurions! Advance! Destroy the intruders!

Text_lang: Mephiles! You incompetent fool!
...All that matters is we now possess the necessary instrument. We must begin its preparation.

Text1_lang: Leave him to me.  You've seen what he is capable of, when he believes in the cause.  A measure of patience may yield... superior results.

Text_lang: Very well.  We have our weapon. Now we shall hone it.
You are too late! The way opens!
That beast is incinerating our forces! We'll be overrun!

Text1_lang: Necrolords, hold your ground! We will not fail Maldraxxus!

Text_lang: Hail, baroness. Revendreth stands with you!
Interlopers! You will not escape your fate!
We are not the ones you need to fear, Kel'Thuzad!

Text1_lang: Your cause is lost, usurper!
Now you answer for your crimes against Maldraxxus... and against me.

Text_lang: Foolish margrave. Your victory is a hollow one.
The medallion is ours. Let us return to Revendreth.
What?! We cannot simply leave! Not while Kel'Thuzad yet lives. I will have vengeance for Silvermoon!
His fate is not yours to decide.

Text1_lang: Come, lich. The Banished One calls you to his side.
Raise your sword, champion! For Maldraxxus!

Text_lang: Focus.
Dominate.
Fight always for the good of the realm.
Stand firm.
Defend the realms of Death.
These are the weapons of the Necrolords.
Destroy these meddlers!
Mevix will suffer for his defiance!
Text1_lang: Mevix will suffer for his defiance!

Text_lang: The time of Sires is over. Revendreth no longer serves a Master, but a Court.

Text1_lang: You will never escape the Maw!

Text_lang: Food Fight: |cfffb95ff+Formal|r
Text1_lang: Food Fight: |cfffb95ff+Formal|r

Text_lang: Food Fight: |cff34cceb+Messy|r
Text1_lang: Food Fight: |cff34cceb+Messy|r

Text_lang: Where are you taking me?!
Text1_lang: Where are you taking me?!

Text_lang: Help!
Text1_lang: Help!

Text_lang: Let go of me!
Text1_lang: Let go of me!

Text_lang: Release me!
Text1_lang: Release me!

Text_lang: Leave me be!
Text1_lang: Leave me be!

Text_lang: Stanikos cheers you on!
Text1_lang: Stanikos cheers you on!
Yeah! Woo!!
Oooh, not fair!
Get them!
You won, but I'm still the best!
I won! I knew I could do it.
Finally, it's time for some action!

Text_lang: I am free after ten thousand years, yet still my own brother thinks I am a villain! I'll show him my true power! I'll show him that the demons have no hold over me!
Are you certain of that, demon hunter? Are you certain your will is your own?
You reek of death, human. You'll regret approaching me.
Come then. You'll find that we're evenly matched.

Text1_lang: An illusion. So the Winter Queen sends her loyal subjects to die in her place.

Text_lang: You know nothing of loyalty, Banshee.

Text1_lang: It is you who knows nothing, fae. You cannot stop what is to come.

Text_lang: Powerful creatures from Torghast have been seen in the area.
They said I must answer for my crimes... repent for my "sins"...
But every choice I made, I would proudly make again.
I submit to no one! Not you, not the Jailer, and not that coward Thrall!
FOR THE HORDE!!!
You will... submit...
Tal-Inara says there needs to be a connection made to the gate from the Maw itself before the gateway can be opened.

Text1_lang: Reports I intercepted from the Mawsworn indicate that the Jailer has been seeking a realm called Korthia.
My fellow brokers whisper legends of this place. A magnificent city filled with treasures, its location a closely guarded secret.
Be on alert. No doubt the Jailer's Eye will be upon this place.
I have the means to keep us hidden, as I have before.
Stay close and obey my every word, lest the Jailer's Eye reduce you to stygia.
Korthia is just ahead... and the Eye of the Jailer lies directly in our path.
Not. A. Word.
All five paragons are needed for our covenant's sigil to be reforged.
Upon this day, we shall name a new Paragon of Loyalty.

Text_lang: My Archon... loyalty bereft of compassion fractured the very heart of the kyrian.
Perhaps what we need is not loyalty, but... devotion. To our cause. To each other.

Text1_lang: And to the souls we usher into the Shadowlands.
When Devos turned against us, I met her with spear in hand.
Let us learn from Uther's example.
Adrestes, I anoint you Paragon of Devotion.
Me? Forgive me, my Archon, but I--
Your devotion to our sacred charge has never faltered.

Text_lang: Thank you, my Archon. We go in service.

Text1_lang: The Maw Walker returns. The second waystone has been found.

Text_lang: Fine work, Maw Walker.
Bolvar Fordragon. I saw your visage within the streams of the Maw Walker's anima.
Increase our patrols. We cannot let the Mawsworn reach--
Another of the Jailer's agents?! Strike them down!

Text1_lang: Hold! This is a living mortal--the Maw Walker! Not some servant of the Jailer!

Text_lang: A Maw Walker? Fascinating! I have studied the prophecies, but...
Come. We have much to discuss.

Text1_lang: So this is Korthia. I expected something a bit more... grand.

Text_lang: My order was charged with safeguarding knowledge and artifacts. Things deemed too precious to risk falling into malicious hands.
You should have seen it in its prime, broker. Korthia is... or was... the City of Secrets.
Korthia was hidden deep within the In-Between, safely out of reach... until the Jailer's chains found us.
Good, then there's no need for introductions. We've come to push back against the Jailer's forces.
You have my thanks. The Mawsworn seek to plunder our secrets.
My dear Stonewright, Harvester of Wrath, wielder of Elu--

Text1_lang: Chelra the Bladewall. How have you been, my child?
Mother of Stone. You honor me with your concern. I am well.
Impressive, considering Denathrius had you beheaded after casting Renathal into the Maw.
Reveal yourself, infiltrator.
Always so clever. Only... I am not the infiltrator. I am the distraction.

Text_lang: Continue to delay our foes. The plan nears fruition.
Greetings.
Record keepers, return to the Respite. You will be safe there.

Text1_lang: So the Primus came to Korthia after he left Maldraxxus. He must have suspected the Jailer was plotting to escape.

Text_lang: So it would seem. If we can locate more records, perhaps the answers will be found within them.

Text1_lang: With the Primus gone, dark times fell upon Maldraxxus... and all the Shadowlands. We need to find him!

Text_lang: If he confronted the Jailer, there may be nothing left of your master.

Text1_lang: Say that again and there will be nothing left of you. Understood?

Text_lang: Understood.

Text1_lang: Did you really think you'd escaped my notice?
Odyn will not stand for this!
Your defiance is meaningless. I already have what I need!
Today, we do both.

Text_lang: DNT
Text1_lang: DNT

Text_lang: You seem... familiar...
DNT
Text1_lang: DNT
DNT

Text_lang: [DNT] What... what have you done!
DNT
Text1_lang: DNT

Text_lang: [DNT]Z
Shot of Mawsworn surrounding the Primus. Anduin is walking up to him while the Jailer stands, watching.
Text1_lang: Shot of Mawsworn surrounding the Primus. Anduin is walking up to him while the Jailer stands, watching.

Text_lang: I will resist you to my last, Zovaal!
Anduin begins pulling the sigil out of the Primus.
Text1_lang: Anduin begins pulling the sigil out of the Primus. Primus screams in pain.

Text_lang: A mourneblade!
Anduin gives the Jailer the sigil.
Text1_lang: Anduin gives the Jailer the sigil as he's talking.

Text_lang: You and all the rest will bear witness to my victory.
Burn in the light of the Ember Ward, wretched beast!
Raaagh!

Text1_lang: Look! There's Huln!
What does your master seek, dreadlord?! Answer me!
Please! There has been a terrible misunderstanding!
More of your wretched kind?!
I will slay you all myself!
In the Arbiter's name, we answer the call of the Eternal Ones.
This brazen attack on Bastion must be answered.
Has your wound healed, Kyrestia?
No. But that is of little consequence compared to what was stolen.
What was the Jailer after?
Long ago, each of the Eternal Ones was given a symbol of our covenant's purpose.
Yet Zovaal saw these sigils as keys to forbidden knowledge.
When we rebuked his heresy, he tried to claim them by force.
But in the end, the Primus led us to victory.
And for his treachery, Zovaal was exiled forevermore.

Text_lang: Yet even bound to the Maw, he found allies to aid his cause.
No doubt Sire Denathrius willingly offered his sigil to the Banished One.

Text1_lang: We have found no such sigil within the sanctum of the Primus.
The essence of the Arbiter remains here. It must be protected.

Text_lang: The Ebon Blade will help defend the Eternal City.
But this will not be the Jailer's only target.

Text1_lang: No. Even now, his malevolence encroaches upon my groves.
The necrolords will drive these invaders from Ardenweald!

Text_lang: The venthyr will fight beside your armies, Draka.
We will rally the covenants' forces and make our stand.

Text1_lang: Let it be so. With her voice have I spoken.
Champion! Quickly, we must stop the Primus before it is too late.
Nathrezim scum. You cannot deceive the House of Eyes.

Text_lang: Forward, Necrolords! Burn these traitors to ash!
Wild Hunt, we ride to battle!
Come, let us show them the might of Revendreth!

Text1_lang: Take to the skies! Our allies are counting on us!
Now! Seize the medallion! Remove the interlopers!
Well... that sucked.

Text_lang: My friends! Let us begin the ritual.
The way is open! Come, Maw Walker.

Text1_lang: We should go. This is no place to linger.

Text_lang: It is time to deprive the Jailer of his underling.

Text1_lang: Underling?! Helya is no one's underling! I will not be silenced! I will not be imprisoned! My wrath shall haunt your--

Text_lang: NO MORE!

Text1_lang: RRRrrrrAAAAAaaahhhh!

Text_lang: This magic bound with the Primus's sigil... is it familiar, Maw Walker?
It is much like the memories you restored to the Runecarver in Torghast. If you bring this to him, perhaps he will know how to untangle the sigil.
Torghast!? Unacceptable. You might as well deliver it directly into the Jailer's hands!
This is our only path forward. We have no choice but to try.

Text1_lang: I'm going with you, Maw Walker. I will ensure this Runecarver's work is up to par.

Text_lang: So be it. Good luck to you both.
There are still those who need the skills of the Runecarver. I will leave an echo of what I was here to aid them.
Broken. Chained. This is the fate Zovaal intends for all existence.
Come. The covenants must be told of my return.
We are honored to have you among us, Primus. What is our course now that the Jailer has your sigil?
The mortals must face Zovaal in his sanctum. But as you know, a wise strategist always prepares contingencies.
dnt
The covenants have grown stronger, but are not yet whole. Each must remember its purpose... and find its future.
When this comes to pass, new sigils can be forged. They will be needed to pursue Zovaal, should our assault fail.
Bonesmith, return to Maldraxxus. Rally the necrolords. Order must be restored among the houses.
Highlord, send word to your allies in Oribos. They must defend the Arbiter's sigil at all costs.
Maw Walker, I will call for you when I am ready. May fortune favor us all.
<Huln grunts and struggles>
While you remained fixated on a paltry medallion, we seized the true prize: Remornia, with the Sire's essence held within it.
The Legion, the Scourge, Argus... all pawns in a game beyond your grasp. One that now nears its end.

Text1_lang: So naive. So blind to Odyn's failings--
And neither shall I!
The ritual nears completion...
Annhylde will soon rejoin her sisters.
Now bear this message back to your master, little bird.
May it taste like ashes in his throat!
Skyja! See them out.
Hold tight, friend!
I'll keep us hidden. Find our friends.
Our enemy flees. After it, sisters!
The Eye retreats to its master's side.
Anduin! No!

Text_lang: What vile horror is this?

Text1_lang: I know this magic...
Darkness awaits you!
Not today, Mawsworn!

Text_lang: No! They have found me!

Text1_lang: Indeed we have.
Thank you for all your valuable assistance, mortal.

Text_lang: How many? How many spies has the Banished One seeded among us?

Text1_lang: You can ask him yourself once we arrive in Torghast. He is quite eager to meet you.
Kill the Maw Walker.
Oh, and make it quick. As a sign of gratitude.
A harvester without her medallion. You are but a shadow of your former fury.
I wield more than enough fury to deal with you.
Your stoneborn cannot find us all. We are everywhere!
Don't worry, Maw Walker. I have you.

Text_lang: Be warned, Uther. We have never attempted anything of this nature before.
I will endure whatever I must to be whole again.
I... I cannot...

Text1_lang: The shard--it is too much! He is being overwhelmed!

Text_lang: We must help him! Friends, aid me!
Uther, hold strong! Allow your memories to flow through you!
<Agonized scream.>

Text1_lang: Many ages have passed since a paragon was last anointed.
Through trying times, you have embodied patience and compassion.
Five temples. Five paragons.
A symbol of our new path forward.
My sister's power... in my forest? I will have answers!
The force Tyrande wields threatens to consume her... and will leave this grove devastated!
We shall purge your blight...now!
The battle is almost upon us.
When we reach Oribos, you will defend Zovaal while he completes the ritual.

Text_lang: You mean he will compel me to defend him.
Each time he dominates my will, I feel myself slipping further away.
Is this what you felt when Arthas raised you, Sylvanas?
Hollow. Empty. Everything you once were... consumed by darkness.

Text1_lang: Yes, young lion. But in the end, the sacrifices we've made will have been worth it.
Once the cycle of Life and Death has been broken and remade, we will--

Text_lang: By that time I'll have been lost. And so will you.
I only hope my friends will remember me as I was...
Not what you made me to be.

Text1_lang: No, Anduin. We won't lose you. I swear it!
Through drought and loss, Ardenweald suffered.
For all you have done, $p, you have my thanks.
My Hunter, you have done well. You have the thanks of all Ardenweald.
My Huntress, you have done well. You have the thanks of all Ardenweald.

Text_lang: ...remember...

Text1_lang: DNT?!

Text_lang: I remember...
...everything!

Text1_lang: My Primus! You've been trapped here all this time?!

Text_lang: You brought my sigil... to Zovaal's lair?

Text1_lang: Forgive me, master. We were only--

Text_lang: He is coming.
Prepare yourselves. We make our stand now.
Should you strike me down, my sigil will be lost to you forever!
No. There is another way.

Text1_lang: Virtues that will serve you well as Paragon of Devotion.
For the Archon!

Text_lang: Did you truly believe you were my only means of escape, mortal?
I offered you an opportunity. One that you blithely refused.
You will pay the price for crossing me. But first, there are more important matters that demand my attention.
So enjoy this brief reprieve, $p. It is the last you will ever know.

Text1_lang: The Eye is vulnerable!
My Queen! We need your help!
I will deal with the invading forces atop Torghast.
Strike swiftly, sisters! For Odyn!
Your part in this is done, Maw Walker. Come.

Text_lang: Oh, forgive me. I am Tal-Galan, Keeper of Secrets.
The Banished One seeks our most precious treasure... and is willing to destroy our entire existence to claim it.

Text1_lang: None are more deserving of this honor than you.
And Kleia, you shall serve as his hand.
Henceforth, all kyrian shall be offered a choice: to keep their memories or to let them go.
There was truth in her words, but I did not listen.

Text_lang: Our mission never changed. For eons, we have done the Master's bidding in secret across countless realities.

Text1_lang: Longer still since we have christened a new temple.
Adrestes. Step forward.
One born of unity between kyrian and Forsworn alike.
Take your place among us, Adrestes, as we reforge our covenant's sigil.

Text_lang: Your efforts are futile.
No. We will stop you!
Jaina, we need a portal!
Resist him! Do not let the Jailer win!

Text1_lang: We will save you, Anduin.
What? How did you know how to defeat my pets?

Text_lang: Allies, brace yourselves!

Text1_lang: But together, we have saved our home from a terrible darkness.
With perseverance and kinship, hope is restored to our groves.
Today, the forest's heart is made whole.
And our hearts as well.
The cycle is renewed. Death and Life in harmony once more.
A new sigil arises to embody our covenant's future.

Text_lang: Oribos is within my grasp.

Text1_lang: No matter what it takes.
Behold my latest capture, GURGL!
Stealing Gurgl was so worth it!
Show 'em no mercy, bird brain!
Looks like someone will get fed tonight!
In order to get THIS pet, you had to have three Happy Fun Rocks in three separate Penny Pouches, while under the effect of some spell that I can't remember on the day of the Shattering. I think...
Now, In order to get THIS pet, you had to have four Happy Fun Rocks in two separate Penny Pouches, while standing under some tree, dancing on the first day the Scourge invaded. I think...
It wasn't a glitch that you were defeated by my pet!
There's no stopping the Violetsails!

Text_lang: The Jailer must not take the Eternal City!

Text1_lang: May the light bless your moves.
If you come at the queen, you better not miss.

Text_lang: I've got some choice moves.

Text1_lang: Watch out, I'm gonna get my groove on!

Text_lang: My hooves will beat a song of victory!

Text1_lang: If you value your honor, you will get back now!

Text_lang: I've got the finest moves in the land!

Text1_lang: I've engineered the greatest moves you will ever see.
Dese old bones got plenty o'juju left in dem!
Kept you waiting, huh?

Text_lang: I'm a dancin' man and I just can't lose.
Elune, bless my feet and let me glow with your radiance.

Text1_lang: I'm so light on my toes I might fly away.

Text_lang: These graceful moves will entrance you and the crowd.
Dancing is in my heart.
With the Maw Walker's aid, the covenants have been renewed. Yet one sigil is still required to pursue Zovaal: the Arbiter's.

Text1_lang: Though her presence is lost to darkness, her voice still sings... within us.

Text_lang: Blessed be her voice.

Text1_lang: Blessed be her voice.

Text_lang: The way is open!

Text1_lang: This is our purpose.

Text_lang: Imbued with the strength of those who defied Domination.
Behold, the Crown of Wills.
Go through the gateway! Now!
That which sought to bind us will be made anew.

Text1_lang: Pelagos... What do you mean?

Text_lang: In service to the Shadowlands, I offer my soul.

Text1_lang: What? No!

Text_lang: I have yet to ascend, Kleia. Perhaps there was a reason for it.

Text1_lang: But your soul--you do not have to do this!

Text_lang: I know. This is my choice, sister.

Text1_lang: I do not want to let you go.

Text_lang: Our souls are bound as one.
We will never be apart.
My purpose.
Winglord! Over here. Keep up and keep out of sight.

Text1_lang: An empty vessel, an absent role. Both must be filled once more.

Text_lang: Open the way.

Text1_lang: Water from the sands...
...renewal from ruin.
...am restored.

Text_lang: The oracle!

Text1_lang: You who have watched over me. You who have aided me. More is needed.

Text_lang: We will do everything we can to help. You have my word.

Text1_lang: A new voice, freely offered.
The song begins anew.[DNT]

Text_lang: The melody fades... I await your voice.

Text1_lang: Balance... restored.
And now to craft a strategy...

Text_lang: The strategy is: I go first!
--and tell Adrestes I am sorry I could not become an acolyte.

Text1_lang: Somehow, I think he will understand.

Text_lang: Maw Walker! My friend, without you, I may never have found my path.
Now I can direct the flow of souls to the afterlives they justly deserve.
Yet one goal remains before us. To truly restore balance to the Shadowlands, the Jailer must be defeated.

Text1_lang: I have faith that the Maw Walker and their allies will succeed.

Text_lang: Go in service, friends. Oribos--and all the Shadowlands--are counting on you.
The Sepulcher's secrets will be mine.

Text1_lang: If the Jailer has breached the Sepulcher, then he is but a breath away from enacting his plan.

Text_lang: We cannot allow that to happen.
Tell the others what you told me.

Text1_lang: You all have witnessed the Jailer's power firsthand. Without the means to resist his domination, we have no chance against him.
Anduin may be the key. If we can save him from--
You dare speak of freeing him after all you have done?

Text_lang: Sylvanas held the mourneblade that bound him. Her presence may help free Anduin from the Jailer's grasp.

Text1_lang: I will never trust her.

Text_lang: Come.

Text1_lang: Hey! Get back here!

Text_lang: Together, we shall manifest the final sigil.
Mawsworn, come.
Yet much remains to be done. To restore balance to the Shadowlands, I fear more must be asked of you.

Text1_lang: Tyrande Whisperwind.
You came to my realm in pursuit of justice.
Did you find it?
I came here seeking vengeance.
But within these groves, and by the light of Elune, I found something I feared lost.
Hope.
And thanks to that choice, a sisters' bond once broken has been mended.
This tear was born of sorrow.
Now it shall become a vessel of renewal.
These souls were saved from the darkness of the Maw.
Unto them, I have offered eternal tranquility in the boughs of Ardenweald.
They have chosen instead to become part of a new beginning for their kin.
This seed embodies the cycle of death and life.
I offer it to you, Tyrande Whisperwind.
May it bring your people happiness and peace.
On behalf of all the kaldorei, I thank you.
Andu-falah-dor.
These children will not be yet another slave to the whims of your Aspects.
Rendalish, rendalvol, rendalvah!

Text_lang: DRACTHYR! Retrieve the Oathmaker by any means! I COMMAND IT!

Text1_lang: If it is the will of the First Ones, this waystone will open to you, mortal.

Text_lang: Sylvanas Windrunner...
There can be no true justice without compassion...
and I can see your deeds bear the mark of the Jailer's influence.
An influence we failed to contain.

Text1_lang: The Jailer did not control me.

Text_lang: Then... you know in your heart, to whom you must answer.

Text1_lang: I submit to the judgment...

Text_lang: Entrusting justice to your most fervent adversary.
Are there any gathered here who object to this fate?
So be it.

Text1_lang: What game do you play now, Banshee?
The Sylvanas I hunted would never submit to the blade of her enemy.
Death would be a merciful end, Tyrande.
Your newfound remorse might be genuine...
There will be no peace for you, Windrunner...
The prisoner is in my charge now.
Below lies the Maw.
Every soul lost in its depths, betrayed or condemned...
you shall find and send forth to the Arbiter
You will toil there, under Dori'thur's watchful eye,
This... is how you shall bring renewal to your victims,
However long it takes...
Andu-falah-dor, old friend. Watch her well.
(Titanic) Midnir.
(Draconic) Rethul.
(Demonic) Kasharu.
(Shath'Yar) An'qoth.
Vessel.
Dormant above the sands.
Ascend.
I don't remember the exact moment I wrested control.
I do remember the rush of freedom. The clarity of purpose.
When I loosed my arrow, I sought to become his judge and his executioner.
I thought that if I could punish him for his crimes, I would be absolved of mine.
Forgiven for the atrocities he forced me to commit against my own people.
But there would be no justice that day.
For anyone.
That... is yet to come.
Ahahaha! Is this all that remains of Neltharion's flight? Pathetic!

Text_lang: Return to your creche. That is an ORDER! [DNT]
Then trust in me.

Text1_lang: Always, Uther.
Very well. We will prepare to enter the Sepulcher and save Anduin... together.

Text_lang: The time for your judgment is at hand.

Text1_lang: My actions were mine alone, and I accept their consequences.
And I do not expect your mercy.
but it can never erase all you have done.
until there is peace for the souls of your victims.
Bring her!
The song seeks a voice.
Reclaim.
Restore.
of Tyrande Whisperwind.
An unjust fate to which you doomed so many.
And it will be there... that your penance begins.
to be judged with the compassion all souls deserve.
scouring every darkened reach,
until the final soul is free, and you are all that remains.
and my people.
it shall be done.
There are too many! Our defenses cannot hold!

Text_lang: This place is of no consequence. The Sepulcher will soon be within reach.
Can your mortal minds fathom...
how long I have waited?
Every event set in motion.
Every pawn put into play.

Text1_lang: A worthy soul, pure and unburdened.
Vessel.
Vessel.
If we are not alone, then our priority is discovering what enemy set off the beacon that awakened us.
Leave that amplifier alone. We must keep the enemy in stasis until we have gathered what we need from the ritual site.
Pace yourselves. Deeper breaths may provide more healing, but you risk losing your ally to excessive damage.
Remember, the living flame can heal as well as destroy.

Text_lang: Leave them. I have all the power we need.

Text1_lang: Why are you here, Anduin?
Your kingdom, and your friends, are awaiting your return.

Text_lang: My friends... the ones I almost killed... they believe my hands are clean.
But they don't feel clean.

Text1_lang: It is perilous to confuse what you are made to do with what you choose to do.

Text_lang: How can I not when it all blurs together?
It was so horrific... and exhilarating.
And it sickens me to think that satisfaction... may have been mine.

Text1_lang: Ah. So that's why you've come.
You fear you might not be who you thought you were.

Text_lang: I'm starting to wonder if I ever knew.
For the first time in my life...
I'm afraid if I call on the Light...
...it won't answer.
If I've no trust in myself, how can I expect my kingdom to trust me?
To put their faith in me... when mine has faltered.

Text1_lang: Must you bear that weight?

Text_lang: A king does not have a choice.

Text1_lang: No choice?
I thought you believed in free will.

Text_lang: I need time to think.
About many things.

Text1_lang: I have faced who I was, and accepted what I've done.
Now, the work begins.

Text_lang: Yes. It does.
Farewell, Sylvanas Windrunner.
Until our paths cross again.

Text1_lang: Farewell... Little Lion.

Text_lang: What did you just say to me?
Text1_lang: What did you just say to me?
Within this hall we shared ceremonies. Celebrations.
And tragedy.
I loved my family.
And on one fateful day, I lost them all.
Now, I am all that remains of the once-proud Menethil line.
The last heir to a legacy that ended in shame.
So you ran away from the pain.
I did too.
But it was only when I stopped running that I understood...
Those people out there... they're my family now.
But will they ever truly accept me?
Bearing a name forever stained by a brother's sins...
Just as these flagstones are stained by my father's blood.
We are all the same here, Calia.
Seeking our place, despite everything we've lost.
But it's a long road, and we will need your help.
Then... let us find our place together.
As Forsaken.

Text_lang: Gleamfisher, please, counsel my brother Ruriq against his foolish idea.

Text1_lang: Aho? What a fine boat! Such thick hides and a sturdy frame!

Text_lang: Thank you, Gleamfisher! I mean to follow in your footsteps-

Text1_lang: Hmmm... The trouble I am sensing here is not in your idea, Ruriq. It is a noble one.
My journey ended in death because I built my boat alone. But if all three of you do it, you may just succeed where I failed!

Text_lang: ...Harrumph.
DNT test - Batrider
Text1_lang: DNT test - Batrider

Text_lang: Die, dracthyr!
We have incoming!

Text1_lang: Emberthal!
Anduin...

Text_lang: <Laughs... and sighs>

Text1_lang: Norukk and I will find a safe location near Brackenhide. Hanu, please guard the caravan the rest of the way to Iskaara.
You need my protection more.
No, your children do. All of Iskaara does, if we are unable to contain this decay. Go home and get yourself a bowl of soup. Rest.

Text_lang: Give the children my love, Hanu.

Text1_lang: ... Fine. Be safe.

Text_lang: Cross-referencing crystal and saliva compounds. Please stand by.

Text1_lang: It's working!

Text_lang: Results: Saliva? Mundane. Crystal? Materially worthless. Composition is ninety-nine percent salt.
Catastrophic dehydration.

Text1_lang: Uh oh. Geo, what would happen if someone were to... lick a whole bunch of those crystals?

Text_lang: Also: Hallucination, increased aggression, delusions of grandeur...
[RESULTS: ONE HUNDRED PERCENT SODIUM]

Text1_lang: Okay Geo, that's enough!

Text_lang: This is bad. Very bad.
[TESTING COMPLETE]
We'll handle what remains of the Primalists to the east. I'm counting on you to aid Kalecgos, adventurer.
We'll be back soon enough!
Thank the Earth-Warder! Her wisdom is needed.
Hello, Jaina.

Text1_lang: Khadgar! It's good to see you again. When we last parted, I regret that--

Text_lang: Those were perilous times. The Legion's attack, then the war... I think we both needed to find our own way through.
I have no hard feelings. Only friendship.

Text1_lang: I feel the same. But surely you didn't come all the way to the Shadowlands just to find me.

Text_lang: No. For years I've read about this place in Medivh's books. I stood atop Karazhan and caught glimpses through the veil.
I suppose I wanted to gaze upon the realms of Death with mine own eyes before...

Text1_lang: Is everything alright, Khadgar?

Text_lang: I feel the weight of years upon me, Jaina. The burdens carried. The choices made.
Hmph! Forgive the musings of an old man. I think I'll look around and see these Shadowlands a bit. See what wonders I can find.
I've heard tales of conniving brokers, a city of secrets, and a land of ancient knowledge. How intriguing!

Text1_lang: Sounds like you'll be keeping busy! Just don't leave without saying goodbye. I've missed you, old friend.

Text_lang: Count on it, Jaina. Be seeing you.
HUNGY! SCAPS EAT TUSKERS!!
Text1_lang: HUNGY! SCAPS EAT TUSKERS!!

Text_lang: No, but Scaps can eat this tasty fish!
FEESH? WHAT'S FEESH?!
Text1_lang: FEESH? WHAT'S FEESH?!
So this is where you two ran off to! What are you - oh!

Text_lang: Now kids, we've talked about how dangerous gnolls are. He may look cute now, but when he grows up-

Text1_lang: No, Ta, look! Scaps loves fish now!

Text_lang: FEESH YUMMY! SCAPS EAT FEESH!
Text1_lang: FEESH YUMMY! SCAPS EAT FEESH!
See, Ta? Scaps just needs fish! If we take care of him, he can be a good gnoll!

Text_lang: ... Alright, we'll take him in, for now. But don't be surprised when he runs off or tries to bite you...

Text1_lang: Let's get started!
Wrathion, you have my gratitude.

Text_lang: I trust your flight will now assist us in claiming the Obsidian Citadel from the djaradin.

Text1_lang: Of course we will... after we see to the safety of the eggs.
You do not know her as I do, young one.

Text_lang: Our future? Or yours?
The Obsidian Citadel was built to defend all of the Dragon Isles.

Text1_lang: I would have expected you to care more for the protection of helpless eggs, Wrathion.

Text_lang: Stay then.
Surely they are secure now that Raszageth has been driven away.

Text1_lang: For now, we must remain at the Life Pools and safeguard our future.

Text_lang: You cannot abandon the legacy of my flight to the hands of our enemies.
Tend to what matters most to your flight, and I will save what matters most to mine.
It was an honor to stand with you, my Queen.

Text1_lang: She is an unpredictable foe.
Your aid was... unexpected, but appreciated.

Text_lang: Stay as long as you like.

Text1_lang: We were hoping you would join us, friends. A chieftain's return to the sea is a celebration for all.

Text_lang: If you... don't mind me asking, how did he pass? Was it the gnolls?

Text1_lang: Oh no, Kalecgos. It was simply his time. Ponoliak was a stubborn old coot, but even he had to succumb to age eventually.
Not all deaths are violent, dear friend.

Text_lang: To be honest... I can't remember a time when they weren't.

Text1_lang: You're leaving? The celebration has only just begun!

Text_lang: Thank you Brena--and everyone. I have learned more than I imagined in my short time in your company.
Despite tragedy, you all remain kind and resolute. Because of your community. Because of family.
The power the blue dragonflight is missing is not ley lines, or ancient artifacts... it's family.
I must go to them. But if you ever have need of me, simply call. I will hear you. And I'll come as swiftly as my wings can carry me.
It is time for the blue dragons to once more be the guardians of this land.

Text1_lang: ... I... I see.
Hmph. You could have said something about being a dragon from the beginning! Seems an important detail to leave out.
Well, you'd best be back any time you need a good meal. There will always be a warm bowl of soup for you here, Kalec.

Text_lang: I look forward to it. Take care, Brena, Norukk... everyone.

Text1_lang: Child... you cannot show any mercy to Raszageth. She has made her choice.

Text_lang: I understand.

Text1_lang: No, you do not. You have a kind soul... I know you hesitate at the thought of fighting any more of your own kind.
I... showed too much mercy, once. Twice. Many times. Before long... it was too late.

Text_lang: You speak of Neltharion's betrayal.

Text1_lang: Do not make my mistake, young one. There can be no mercy... without justice. Remember that.

Text_lang: Thank you, Sindragosa. I will.

Text1_lang: ... I hope you truly do, my dear.

Text_lang: Please, return to the Azure Archives. Sindragosa is awaiting our return--and we should be able to reclaim the oathstone.
Sindragosa? She has returned from the grave?
I'll explain on the way. Let's go!
And I thought I had seen it all in my old age...

Text1_lang: Looks like I can check off "get an adventurer te go te Camp Nowhere" from the list!
I better hit the ol' dusty trail te the folks over at Three-Falls Lookout.
... or was it Theron's Watch?
No, it was Three-Falls Lookout.
... ach! Caddy, get it together! Three-Falls Lookout is THAT way!
It has been ten thousand years since the dragons were last in the Isles. They are invaders upon your land. Join the Primalists. Embrace the storm. We will aid you in the battles to come.

Text_lang: Are you, too, not invaders? The Khanam Matra welcomes the dragons to our Khural. Take your leave. The storm has no place in the lands of Ohn'ahra.

Text1_lang: Your Khanam Matra leads you to servitude. We offer a future of strength. When you see your error, we will be waiting.
And you, of course, $n. I cannot thank you enough. I hope you will make yourself at home and know that you always have a family in Iskaara.
Let's be off. We will do what we can to aid you, once we uncover the source of this rot.

Text_lang: Judging by the gnoll's sudden aggression... I fear for the inhabitants of the trading outpost.

Text1_lang: Norukk! Get out of your head and get a move on!

Text_lang: Yes, yes. Coming!
-And both waste our resources and get himself killed! Please, Gleamfisher, talk sense into him.

Text1_lang: You will need the blessings of the Spirits of Wind and Water, as well. My children's children, you will need to work together to prove yourselves to them. I am certain you can do it.

Text_lang: Cindrethresh!

Text1_lang: Zury!

Text_lang: Have you found the Earth-Warder?

Text1_lang: No. He is not in this chamber.
But there is--

Text_lang: ...A different dragon.
Come forth, loyal servants of Malygos!

Text1_lang: Well, this should be fun!
Those vermin sought to disrupt our ritual!

Text_lang: They are unworthy of the dragon blood in their veins!
They mean nothing. Leave them.
The elements have granted me the power I need.
Did you hear?

Text1_lang: Hear what?

Text_lang: A drake tells me that the Trueborn are on the move. Something important is about to happen!

Text1_lang: Truly?

Text_lang: I do not know the details, but... he is close to finding it. Soon he will have the power to put the flights in their place... as they deserve.

Text1_lang: Shhhh! Do not let the Scalesworn hear you speak like that!

Text_lang: What do you mean? Commander Eranog said it would be here.

Text1_lang: I have not seen him. Come to think of it, I have not seen anyone from South Hold come by today. Very strange.
Greetings, brother. Any news?

Text_lang: A delay, unfortunately. They are still looking for it at South Hold Gate.

Text1_lang: Still?! Should they not have found it by now?

Text_lang: I am sure everything will be handled by the time our benefactors are ready. He will make sure of it.

Text1_lang: Careful! We speak too casually. There are unfamiliar faces about.
My apologies. There is nothing here awaiting you.

Text_lang: Enough! Take the vault! I will liberate the Storm-Eater!
During the dark days of the Cataclysm, the Aspects made great sacrifices to save our world.
I am pleased that you have accepted our invitation to the Dragon Isles, Lord Commander.
The Alliance will answer the call and stand together with dragonkind once again.

Text1_lang: Just think of all the ancient knowledge we can discover together!

Text_lang: The Dragon Isles is our home, not a place for outsiders to plunder.
Splendid! You two have found common ground already.
Now then, let us begin preparations for our voyage.
Alexstrasza shall be most appreciative.
Though she will insist that you do not bring any... lingering conflicts to her shores.
You have my word that this will be an expedition, not a military maneuver.
To honor our truce with the Horde, I have instructed the Explorers' League to work in concert with the Reliquary.
The dracthyr will accompany the Alliance on this journey, but it will take time to build trust between us.
As a fellow soldier, I share your wariness, Azurathel.
Spirits of Azeroth! Gather your strength! Gather your rage! Now is the hour of your vengeance!

Text1_lang: What is the meaning of this, Sabellian? Where are the eggs?

Text_lang: Yes, why don't you explain how your ridiculous plan destroyed the future of an entire flight?
I apologize for any misunderstandings, Life-Binder. But any report of our extinction is premature.
The eggs were never in danger. The cart, and my presence, were merely to draw the attention of our foes and allow my clutch to move unobserved.
I have spent millennia rebuilding my flight. As Neltharion's heir I pledge it, and myself, to you.
What are you--

Text1_lang: These eggs are most welcome here, Sabellian. But your part in your father's twisted legacy has earned you no such privilege.

Text_lang: I will not argue that I aided my father as my duty demanded of me. But when the enormity of his betrayal became clear, I scorned his evil and turned myself to rebuilding a new Black Dragonflight, free from his corruption. It is this I put before you now.

Text1_lang: I will ensure the eggs are cared for, but I will not be involved in your bickering. That is for the black, not the red, to decide.

Text_lang: Do you play me for a fool, old man!?
You play yourself, whelp. Have no fear though, you will understand your place in time. Youth makes fools of us all.
You dare bring that outsider here. You insult Ohn'ahra, Balakar Khan! Step away from this path!
The Nokhud deserve the power of the storm! We will show the Maruuk how far they have fallen.

Text1_lang: My khan, this interloper has no place amongst your Nokhud. We must cleanse ourselves of any weakness.

Text_lang: See those stone pillars? They are part of a barrier that keeps anyone from approaching. We must protect them, or the island's defenses will fall.

Text1_lang: Do you see? Those pylons empower Koroleth's destructive power. If we cannot stop her, she will destroy the pillar, and the ward that protects the Ancient Bough will fall!

Text_lang: The Aspects will be pleased that the Council has accepted their invitation.
The Dragon Isles hold great wonders... and many perils.
The strength of the Horde has always been its people.
I am heartened to hear it.
But know that the Dragon Queen will not abide conflict on her shores.
The Horde honors its truce with the Alliance.
To that end, the Reliquary will work together with the Explorers' League on an expedition of discovery.

Text1_lang: I expect we will learn much from one another.
Do not forget, Ebyssian, that the Dragon Isles are home to the dracthyr as well.
We intend to rediscover our past... and lay claim to our future.
Then let our peoples make this journey together, Cindrethresh.
Agreed. Along the way, we can hone your combat skills... despite your obvious lack of wings.

Text_lang: I see there is much work ahead of us.

Text1_lang: I was expecting Malygos. Where is he? And who are you?

Text_lang: Kalecgos... And you--you cannot possibly be...

Text1_lang: Sindragosa? In a way. A simulacrum, created by her in order to preserve her memories and knowledge.
It would seem a great deal of time has passed since she left.

Text_lang: Yes. And much has happened.

Text1_lang: I sense an Aspect.

Text_lang: It's a long story. Both you and Malygos... are gone.

Text1_lang: I see. And the rest of our flight? Where are they?
...tell me.

Text_lang: After Neltharion betrayed us, we were on the verge of extinction.
We few who remain are scattered. Aimless and... alone.

Text1_lang: Yet you came here. That tells me you still have hope for our kin.
Child of my flight, shall we work together to make that hope a reality?

Text_lang: Nothing would give me more pleasure.
What must we do?

Text1_lang: You treasured us all. May the seas find you as worthy as we do.
Look...
Gral himself has chosen Ponoliak! What a life!

Text_lang: I... forgive me, I don't understand.
How can you find such joy in the passing of family?

Text1_lang: It is not that we are not sad for his passing, Kalec.
But in celebrating his life, he shall remain with us forever.
What better way to strengthen the bonds of the family that remains, than celebrating all who came before?

Text_lang: At long last, the Mistress of the Storm shall be free!
The order is given. Attack!
Ebon Scales! Strike as one!

Text1_lang: These cultists speak of unleashing a storm.

Text_lang: The threat is greater than you know, young ones.

Text1_lang: Why should we trust you?

Text_lang: Neltharion?
It seems there is... much you do not know.
I am Ebyssian, and this is Wrathion.

Text1_lang: This is our home.
We will fight beside you, but you do not give the orders here, dragons.

Text_lang: So be it.
Fine.
GY's test record! TimeKellyEvent is cool!

Text1_lang: A storm...
Ah, Nozdormu. I am pleased that not all the Aspects have met a bitter end. Not yet.
Tell your queen I am coming for her. The storm's reckoning comes for you all!

Text_lang: The release of Raszageth heralds great danger for this world. Just as your awakening heralds great change.
