The kingdoms of Azeroth must be warned. Go to them. Along the way, you may discover a new destiny of your own.
The Primalists are attacking! Get our defenses back up and running.
The Azure Archives have a vast collection of magical items. I won't have much control over this, but surely something useful will come out!
Nope, not that. Definitely not that.
Ugh... I'm losing connection! Come on!
Phew. I think this will do!
Oh my!
I need to fend off the Primalists to the east. It may fall on you to aid Kalecgos, adventurer.
Fine work. Hold though... more Primalists are coming!
Champion!
Fall back! We'll set up defensive positions--
The Kirin Tor shall not fall to these monsters!
I must return to the archives. Send help when you can... the Azure Oathstone is proving difficult to reclaim.
Those shamans are tough! Use a charge or a blast to take them out!

Text1_lang: Just the reinforcements I needed!

Text_lang: Show no mercy to these aberrations!
Can you bring down this barrier?
Raszageth!

Text1_lang: I am glad your daughter could hold onto her father's last gift. No magical research is worth that.
Last gift?

Text_lang: Guess who has a nice haul of fish from the gleamlet!

Text1_lang: DAD! You've been gone forever!

Text_lang: It's only been a few hours! And guess what... Ruriq made you another toy boat!

Text1_lang: This one is WAY cooler than my old boat!
Toolk will be the most spoiled girl in all Iskaara if you keep this up!
Miva Star-Eye stares into the distance.

Text_lang: Arcane buildup detected. Source: nearby tauren.
Soldiers of Stormwind, allow me to--
Wrathion! You were warned against making unannounced visits. Especially when you bring company.
A thousand pardons, my dear spymaster, but I come bearing the tidings of the Dragon Aspects for Lord Commander Turalyon.
As for the dracthyr, you have my word that they will cause no harm. They have come seeking refuge, not conflict.
Their conduct will be on your head, Wrathion. The dracthyr have my leave to roam the city. But know this... SI:7 will be watching.
Let them pass!

Text1_lang: Stand down, warriors of the Horde!
Spiritwalker Ebonhorn! It is good to meet a familiar face at the city gate, even when accompanied by others that are... less familiar.

Text_lang: I am glad to find you well, Mayla. But I fear pleasantries will have to wait.
Events are unfolding that imperil us all. These dracthyr and I must speak with the Horde Council.

Text1_lang: Then let us not linger. Follow me. Soldiers, return to your posts.
If these newcomers have earned your trust, Spiritwalker, then they will have mine as well. The gates of Orgrimmar stand open to them.

Text_lang: Hmph. Mortals...
After that long flight, I need food. Something more filling than our dusty rations from the Reach.
Text1_lang: After that long flight, I need food. Something more filling than our dusty rations from the Reach.

Text_lang: Let us see what this city holds for us.
Text1_lang: Let us see what this city holds for us.

Text_lang: We fear these Primalists seek to release something ancient... something terrible.
We will answer all your questions in time.
But we must join forces and strike now, or the enemy will prevail.

Text1_lang: The dracthyr will defend it.
Were you sent by the Earth-Warder?
Where is Neltharion?

Text_lang: But do try not to get in our way.
After all, I know a thing or two about vanquishing ancient adversaries.
Who are you?
Sabellian, heir of Neltharion. And you are?
Wrathion, heir of Neltharion. And I've never heard of you.
Likewise.
We'll discuss this later.
We'll discuss this later.

Text1_lang: Tell me... what have you learned, child of my flight? What is your oath?

Text_lang: We've been scattered for far too long. Isolated.
But a dragonflight is more than an oath we make--we are a family.
And it's time I brought my family home.

Text1_lang: I do believe you are ready, Kalecgos.
Nozdormu? Are you okay?

Text_lang: Eternus nearly succeeded.
I thought I had more time...

Text1_lang: Oh no! I'm sorry!
I thought I was strong enough to defeat her.

Text_lang: Ah, Chronormu, you have done nothing wrong.
You fought valiantly and well.
But Eternus is right.
My fate is inevitable.

Text1_lang: What do you mean?

Text_lang: ... Each day that passes the future flows into the present which blurs into the past.
Soon it will merge into one, and that is when I will become my darkest self, Murozond.
And when that day comes to pass, I look to you...
To do what must be done.

Text1_lang: Yes, Timeless One.
I will do exactly what you need me to.
I will find another way.

Text_lang: There is none.

Text1_lang: Time encompasses all possibilities.
You taught me that.
I will search every timeline, every moment,
until I find a solution to save you.

Text_lang: Chronormu...
In all timelines please know.
I am and always have been proud of you.

Text1_lang: I owe you my thanks.
You have helped the dragonflights remember our calling.
With the oathstones renewed, we can finally reclaim our aspectral power.
This has to work.
Nothing...
But the oathstones were renewed...
<cackles>
It seems your titans have abandoned you.
Raszageth! What have you done?!
[DNT] Me?
[DNT] Oh no.
You proved yourself unworthy all on your own...
"Queen of the Dragons".
Now, it is our time.
The age of the Incarnates... has come.
She's going to release them...
No!
My friends.
We sensed a great upheaval beneath the earth...
and feared the worst.

Text_lang: We barely survived.
Raszageth is dead, but...

Text1_lang: Her kin have been freed.

Text_lang: Nozdormu?

Text1_lang: What is it?

Text_lang: The timeways.
They are... chaotic, but still obscured.
A dark future looms on the horizon.
We haven't long to prepare for their onslaught.

Text1_lang: Raszageth's reckless haste cost her life, and they will not make that mistake again.
They will regain their strength and choose their next moment carefully.

Text_lang: Then we must take the fight to them.
Strike before they are recovered.

Text1_lang: That... will be difficult.
Iridikron's mastery of the earth will harbor them and keep them out of our reach.

Text_lang: What is it about this "Iridikron" that vexes you so?
Of the three that remain, Vyranoth and Fyrakk were ever loyal to the Incarnate's ideals.
But it was Iridkron who truly embraced the war.
The last captured, and the most difficult to contain.

Text1_lang: At the end, he struck terrible bargains to keep their cause alive.
His violent desperation makes him dangerous.
I believe the other incarnates never knew the true depths of his depravity.

Text_lang: We must not despair.
Their war is coming.
And while we may not yet have our aspectral powers, we can rebuild our unity.
Heal the wounded flights.
Embrace our allies.
Only together do we stand any chance of victory.
Together.

Text1_lang: Together.

Text_lang: I am well known among the heroes of the Alliance, my dear Azurathel.
With my endorsement, I am certain they will welcome you into their ranks.
The Obsidian Warders have trained relentlessly to protect our kin, Wrathion.
Let us see if the Alliance proves worthy of such loyalty.
Children of Neltharion.
You have awakened to face a shattered past... and an uncertain future.
Yet the threads of fate weave a new path to distant shores.
The Sands of Time will speed your wings along the way.
Tell the world of what you have witnessed.
And warn them of the storm to come.
The Horde is full of brave, noble souls, Cindrethresh.
I am certain the dracthyr will find a place among them.

Text1_lang: The Dark Talons are the finest fighters ever trained, Ebyssian.
Perhaps it is the Horde that needs to prove itself to us.
Those who answer the call will face whatever challenges may come.

Text_lang: Come then. The Dragon Isles await!
The Dragon Isles await!

Text1_lang: Thank you, $p. Their annotations are very thorough; it was kind of them to take the time. Now to make some modifications...
I am pleased I have made a contribution to the Expedition! I promise to use my skills to aid our exploration of the Dragon Isles... and beyond!
Wow! You got that titan orb functioning! And it had a recording?!

Text_lang: We have much to learn from you, Eraleshk. It is fortuitous that you are here to join our studies.

Text1_lang: It's very likely! We haven't found a recording like that in some time. This will take our research in a whole new direction!

Text_lang: No one takes to the sky like a Wildhammer. HERE COMES THE THUNDER!
For Aerie Peak!
What a race! I could get used to this dragonridin'.
I'd have beaten ye if I had my Sharpbeak with me. No offense, Scratchy.

Text1_lang: At long last, our absent young are once more among us so that they can be raised together with all the flights.
Though these Life Pools were once bereft of eggs, they now contain our future.
Truly, the calling of my flight has been fulfilled.
I will see that these eggs are protected and loved.
So that they may hatch into dragons, strong and wise.

Text_lang: The Maruuk centaur include many individual clans across the plains.
There are four of us who hold the most power: Clans Teerai, Shikaar, Nokhud, and Ohn'ir.
Clan Teerai are the keepers of our traditions. Their leader, the Khanam Matra, is the cultural khan of all Maruuk. All khanam matras can trace their bloodlines back to our first matriarch, Teera.
We of Clan Shikaar are the strongest hunters. You can find our camps spread throughout the plains, following the patterns of wildlife and game.

Text1_lang: Clan Nokhud has recently come to power. A generation ago, Jhakan Khan led his people to defeat Clan Toghus, taking their place of power amongst the plains.
His son, Balakar Khan, now leads this clan. His father was a man of honor, but Balakar Khan did not inherit his father's patience or wisdom.

My clan, Clan Ohn'ir, is made up of those who feel a direct connection to our god, Ohn'ahra. She guided our founders, Maruuk and Teera, to the Dragon Isles, and she has watched over our people ever since.
The mystics of Clan Ohn'ir are initiated from many different clans, but we all followed Ohn'ahra's call to serve her and our people.

Text_lang: The clans have their differences, but we share one culture. No matter our strengths and weaknesses, we are all Maruuk.
Sabellian? What is he doing?

Text1_lang: Okay everyone!
Get ready!
<Roars in pain.>
Oh no you don't!

Text_lang: My vision came too late.
They have punched a tunnel through time and are tumbling endlessly amongst the infinite possibilities.
You must find them and correct their course before the entire fabric of reality is torn asunder.
We secured the Azure Archives, but Raszageth's storm remains enveloped around Vakthros Tower.

Text1_lang: She seeks to free her kin, but their prison does not lie within the Azure Span.
What else could she be after?

Text_lang: My vision... remains clouded.
The Primalists could already be moving in our midst, and I fear I would not see it.
The city must be protected.
Valdrakken is our people's home.

Text1_lang: If the Primalists are here, we must find them and flush them out.
They cannot be allowed to infiltrate our seat of power.

Text_lang: Your guards did not join our ranks as expected, Eranog.
I am not concerned. Dead soldiers cannot get in your way.
I see you have unearthed the flame stone.
I can sense its strength.
It is now time for your end of this bargain.
<shouts loudly in pain>
Arise.
Primalist Eranog.
I pledge this power to free my kind from the leash of the Aspects.
Then go, while I turn this wretched titan-stained place into ashes.

Text1_lang: We're almost done!
We'll be back soon!
Brace yourselves.
Whew! Our Oathstone... it's restored!
I never want to go so far into the past again!
But I'm glad I had some help getting back!

Text_lang: You have aided Chronormu.
For that, I am grateful and will spare you.
But leave.
Quickly.

Text1_lang: We will bring you to your ultimate fate.
You cannot deny what is to come.
When we meet again, do not expect clemency for what has transpired.
Ummm... Where are we?
Is this even Azeroth?

Text_lang: It is Azeroth.
Though, an exceptionally long time ago.

Text1_lang: We should find Chromie and get out of here.
This place is scary.

Text_lang: Primalists!
Noriko! Call for Kalecgos.
Let the storm envelop you, windsage.
Mother!

Text1_lang: With the oathstones of each flight renewed,
This sacred artifact, and symbol of the unity of dragonkind, lies within Tyrhold.
Koranos, what can you tell us of it?
It has been many centuries since we last walked the halls of Tyr's stronghold.

Text_lang: When the Isles awakened, so too, did the guardians of Tyrhold.
While some have resumed their duties, others have taken to acting... erratically.
Should you go there, I cannot guarantee the greeting you will receive.

Text1_lang: I understand.
However, I have faith that with the help of our champion, we can overcome any danger.
What has happened to this egg?
The energies that surround it are...
This is dire.
If the egg can be saved, it will be here, within the sacred waters of the Life Pools.
Once the young of dragonkind filled this vibrant place.
And the Ruby Oathstone, the very symbol of our calling, cast its bright glow high into the air for all to see.
Now it lies dormant, as do all the oathstones.
I suspect they fell quiet when we relinquished our Aspectral power.
There are so many things we left behind.
But now that we have come home, we can fulfill the callings of our flights and renew the five oathstones.
And through their unity, our absent power shall be restored.
I, the Khanam Matra Sarest, accept this gift to honor the ancient oath made by our most sacred ancestor.
All centaur under Ohn'ahra's wings will aid the green dragonflight in times of need.
And I, Merithra, daughter of Ysera, accept this gift to honor my oath to your ancestor Teera.
Together, dragons and centaur will protect the Ohn'ahran Plains.
The bond that united us in ages past has been renewed.
Should the Dream be threatened again, know that the Maruuk will fight beside you.
Let this oathstone serve as a symbol of our covenant.
I vow to protect the Emerald Dream, and the green dragonflight, with my life.

Text_lang: Behold, Stormwind!
Capital of the human kingdom and crown jewel of the Alliance.
Ruled by a dear, dear friend who is...
...sadly absent.
Impressive walls.
This city could withstand attack by a formidable adversary.
Perhaps even a dragon.
You have no idea.
Now then, to make a proper entrance, pardon me while I assume a more recognizable form.
Ah, yes. The Earth-Warder too had a visage.
So these... humans know you?
Indeed! I have no doubt they will welcome me with open...
...arms.
Orgrimmar.
Within these walls gather the noble races of the Horde.
A city built upon a foundation of strength and honor.

Text1_lang: Traits my people embody as well.
Impressive structure.
But nothing that would hold back the might of the Dark Talons.

Text_lang: I have no doubt your soldiers will be given many chances to prove themselves.
Before we enter, I will assume another form.
One that is more recognizable to the Horde.

Text1_lang: A visage. Yes, I remember the Earth-Warder had one too.
Well, we have arrived. Where are your allies, Ebyssian?

Text_lang: Patience, Cindrethresh.
I am sure we will receive an appropriate...
...welcome.

Text1_lang: Walk with us, $n. We have many stories to share.
Two-foot, you've fought many foes in your time, yes? You will have to share some stories.
Have I ever shared the tale of my first kill, Belika? A mighty hornstrider with horns as tall as its legs were long! I keep its horn as a trophy.

Text_lang: It was a good kill, Tomul. My first was a mighty bear of ice and snow, deep in the frozen tundra of the Azure Span. My bakar and I knew no equals. We were the talk of the Khural!

Text1_lang: Ah, we have reached our first stop. Circle the wagons, Shikaar. It is time for a hunt.

Text_lang: The Horn of Drusahl will be visible once we cross the bridge. You must see it, two-foot!
Ah, yes. The Horn represents the ancient pact formed by Teera and a green dragon named Merithra. Their friendship ended a long enmity between dragons and Maruuk.

Afterward, the centaur hunted the plains, and the dragons tended the gardens. But they agreed to help one another in times of need. The Horn of Drusahl was built as a physical manifestation of their oath.

Text1_lang: But then, the dragons left. And after ten thousand years, they return to these lands! I am interested to hear what the Khanam Matra says about that.
We are guided by Ohn'ahra, Tomul. It was she who granted us these lands, who arbitrated with the dragons. She knows the way.
Ohn'ahra, the Windmother, is the ancestor of all ohuna. She led our founders, Maruuk and Teera, to the plains. My clanmates interpret her songs to advise our people.
Hold! I hear her call. Ohn'ahra will sing to me here.

Text_lang: Maruukai is just ahead. It is a grand and sacred meeting place. Centaur from all around the plains gather there.
Each season we meet for the Khural, a time of truce and communion. Clans large and small come together, sharing our resources and our stories.

Text1_lang: I do look forward to reconnecting to my peers. Perhaps Tigari Khan can help me decipher this omen from the river.
I am going to avoid the Nokhud. They antagonize everyone at these things.

Text_lang: The rest of the Shikaar should have already arrived from the other camps. Our rise should be well settled by the time we arrive.
It seems the other clans beat us here. Between our outsider and the green dragon emissary, this should be a Khural to remember.

Text1_lang: Dark Talons, fall in!
Lead the way, Ebyssian.
The Warders will follow Wrathion.
Thank goodness.
Mother...
[DNT] <Mirthful sigh.>
We have to leave the Reach.
Now!
Let the winds carry us onward! The Emerald Gardens will fall!

Text_lang: Ah, young Wrathion. I owe you my thanks--
Your help was invaluable in securing my rightful place on the Obsidian Throne.
Oh... I believe you are mistaken--this throne, this legacy--is my birthright.
No. The mistake is yours. I was anointed caretaker of this flight by Neltharion himself.
So let me be clear... when all is said and done, I will be the Aspect of the black dragonflight.
Is that so? May the worthiest dragon win.

Text1_lang: Halt!

Text_lang: Get away from... do not...

Text1_lang: Is this what passes for a mystic of the Maruuk?
Ysera, your flight needs you.
We need you.
Whatever the price may be for your return to Azeroth, name it.

Text_lang: Tyrande...
Ohn'ahra... I am sorry.

Text1_lang: Tell us!

Text_lang: It's me.
I must be the one to stay.

Text1_lang: What?

Text_lang: Ysera knows this--though she would never ask it of me.

Text1_lang: No.
Pathetic.
We will find another way.

Text_lang: When she gave her life for mine in Val'sharah, it was not her time.
And now... the balance may be restored.

Text1_lang: Then... then I will stay as well.
Shandris and the others can...

Text_lang: Tyrande...
Should everything we hope come to pass, the Kaldorei will need you.

Text1_lang: I am so tired, Malfurion.
Do not ask this of me.
After everything we have endured...

Text_lang: My love.
You have always been the strength of our people.
They will follow you ever onward, and you will never be alone.

Text1_lang: Until I see you again...
I will dream of the night we may truly rest... together.
How is this possible...
The Maruuk, too, have been plagued by these Primalists.
If Ohn'ahra wills it, I will blow the Horn of Drusahl on the morrow to signal our accord with the green dragonflight.
Merithra, daughter of Ysera, is grateful for your...

Text_lang: Grateful? Ha! Dragons only respect dragons.
No Maruuk blood will be spilled for them.

Text1_lang: You are not the Khanam Matra, Balakar.

Text_lang: A true leader would never surrender this land to outsiders.
You desecrate the memory of Maruuk Thousandbones, Sarest.

Text1_lang: Stand down!

Text_lang: No. These plains belong to the Maruuk.
And Maruukai belongs to the Nokhud!
We'll hold them off as best as we can until he arrives. Hurry!
I... hope that worked. I need my flight.

Text1_lang: We will see in due time.

Text_lang: Khadgar--what's happened?
The Primalists are on the move!
It seems we did far too well at stymieing their efforts at Vakthros.
Raszageth has renewed the attack herself!

Text1_lang: If Vakthros falls, the whole of the Azure Span will fall with it.

Text_lang: Quickly then! We must stop her, before all is lost!
Hopefully we won't have to face her alone.

Text1_lang: Weakling... you need a mortal to defend you!
Abominations, both of you... and you will perish here, cold and alone!

Text_lang: He is not alone!

Text1_lang: You have failed, "Aspect". You will soon learn that killing you would have been a mercy.
Now you can watch your empire collapse alongside your false queen.

Text_lang: Hmm...

Text1_lang: Let us face this enemy together.
Majordomo, protect the eggs below while I distract Raszageth. She will not harm our young!
[DNT][TEST] TimeKellyEvent 10.0!
Destroy the artifact? No! Don't you see? Now that I know where it is, we can use its power to end all the enemies of the Kirin Tor!
The power will consume you like it consumed the others! It must be destroyed.
No. You will thank me upon my return. I will bring peace to the Azure Span!

Text_lang: To'tik... $n... what do we do?

Text1_lang: We destroy the artifact.

Text_lang: Thank you... now we are free.
Text1_lang: Thank you... now we are free.
Please... warn others of my tale. Ensure no one else makes my mistake.
Our ambush was a success.
Go now, infuse them with the elements.
Work quickly.
The convoy yielded enough eggs to begin.
Wash away the stain of Order.
Outsiders have come ashore.
We cannot let them interfere!

Text_lang: Hail and well met, friends.
I apologize if I startled you. Our arcane wards were activated and I felt obliged to investigate.
My name is Khadgar, Archmage of the Kirin Tor.
Is that so? Well, come see me in camp. We'll try and find the answers you seek.
We are not your friends, mage.
That's how they get you.

Text1_lang: Easy now, Telash.
I am Scalecommander Emberthal of the Dracthyr. My companions are $p and Telash Greywing.
We are... new to this area. We come seeking information.
He seemed pleasant.

Text_lang: Over there!
Let's get this over with.
Text1_lang: Let's get this over with.

Text_lang: Yes, there it is!
Text1_lang: Yes, there it is!

Text_lang: Oh! Pretty!
Text1_lang: Oh! Pretty!

Text_lang: OW!
Text1_lang: OW!

Text_lang: No!
Text1_lang: No!

Text_lang: It's--it's okay, it's going to be alright. It's just a little mana burn...
Text1_lang: It's--it's okay, it's going to be alright. It's just a little mana burn...

Text_lang: I do not believe any of this. Lies... all lies! You wanted us locked away in cages.

Text1_lang: Young one, I assure you I had no idea. Nor did the rest of my flight.

Text_lang: Liar! You aren't even real! Merely a spell... yet another falsehood!
I'll find what you are hiding, illusion. And when I do, the world will know the truth!

Text1_lang: My beloved Malygos, why did you inflict such pain on so many?

Text_lang: Nezzie cries.
Text1_lang: Nezzie cries.
Forgive me, I was distracted. You wish to continue your research--allow me to unlock the rest of these tomes for you.
Greetings.

Text_lang: Gah! Not again!

Text1_lang: Well, aren't we an excitable bunch? What brings you to my... the archives?
We are looking for information on our captivity at the hands of the blue dragon Malygos.
Ah... Perhaps I can be of assistance after all.

Text_lang: Enough talk! We demand answers, phantom.
Don't worry! It's not the first time something up here has exploded like that. We've got tough scales!
Text1_lang: Don't worry! It's not the first time something up here has exploded like that. We've got tough scales!

Text_lang: What? The wild magic is up here, too? You've been hurt?
Text1_lang: What? The wild magic is up here, too? You've been hurt?

Text_lang: Oh-! Uh, no--no! Nobody's been hurt, we're totally safe alone up here! Don't... don't send us away...
Text1_lang: Oh-! Uh, no--no! Nobody's been hurt, we're totally safe alone up here! Don't... don't send us away...

Text_lang: You're children! Even I know children shouldn't be left unsupervised...
Text1_lang: You're children! Even I know children shouldn't be left unsupervised...
Almost there....

Text_lang: <Pained groan.>
<Shocked gasp.>
Excellent! You've found another misaligned ley line. Restoring the uninterrupted flow of magic is crucial for the Azure Span's recovery.
Thank you, $n. Each ley line we restore contributes to the health of the Dragon Isles as a whole.

Text1_lang: <breath>
<Breathing heavily>
<breath>
<breath>
<Sighs>
<breath>
I believe we can channel the essence of each into the Mother Oathstone and restore our Aspectral powers.

Text_lang: <Tell Shaw to signal his informant.>
Text1_lang: <Tell Shaw to signal his informant.>
Until I see you again...

Text_lang: No reparation is enough! The Stonemasons deserve every coin in every coffer of Stormwind city! Clessington will lead us there!

Text1_lang: Duncon?! You weren't even a Stonemason! You joined to be a thief!

Text_lang: So you finally show yourself, VanCleef. And with a Stormwind dog in tow! See, Defias? See how she will make us all lapdogs of Stormwind?!
We muster in Northshire! Join us, and we march on Stormwind! For the Defias!
For the Defias!
Text1_lang: For the Defias!
The amulet!

Text_lang: |cffdb453dRequires: Primal Mote|r
Text1_lang: |cffdb453dRequires: Primal Mote|r

Text_lang: |cff34ccebRequires: Primal Mote|r
Text1_lang: |cff34ccebRequires: Primal Mote|r
Grandfather, why are you still tasked with updating these graves? Surely it should go to younger drakes.

Text_lang: Wait, something isn't right...
... Vanessa.

Text1_lang: Noticed my little sleight of hand, did you? No way I'm leaving something like this for Stormwind. The Drakefire Amulet is mine, now.

Text_lang: I don't think so, VanCleef! Hand it over!

Text1_lang: Oh?! You just want its power, just like everyone else!
Wh-what is happening?

Text_lang: Here they are now. Greetings Kalecgos, and to you, Life-Binder.
Senegos nudges Stellagosa to bow.

Text1_lang: Ah, Senegos. I saw the remnants of your arcane ball. I am heartened to see you have not forgotten your old ways.
Kalecgos, you may do the honors to lay the essences of Malygos and Sindragosa to rest.

Text_lang: Thank you. Sindragosa... Malygos... I am sorry it took us so long to give you this peace.
May you have the rest now you were robbed of in life.
How strange... are these remnants from Malygos and Sindragosa's past?

Text1_lang: It would seem so. It appears they were unable to truly depart from this world when they were slain.

Text_lang: I saw many strange phenomenon such as this when I laid to rest the blue dragons that made it back here from Neltharion's betrayal.

Text1_lang: It was a tragedy that so many were killed... including Sindragosa. Even then, the Lich King allowed her no rest. It pained me to see her raised into undeath.

Text_lang: [DEPRECIATED] I hoped against hope that I would see her return. When word reached my brood of what happened to her thousands of years later...
I could not believe it when word reached my brood of what happened to her. It is a small blessing that she did not linger for long in such a state.
Sindragosa and Malygos both deserved better. I hope now we have given them their proper rest.
I will stay here to monitor the situation with the others... and speak to Senegos on a matter concerning his brood.
It should only be a moment of your time, Kalecgos. Stellagosa, Emmigosa, you will want to be here as well.

Text1_lang: Of course, Grandfather. Whatever you need.

Text_lang: Good. You're here.
I would just as soon never set foot in a creche again.
Emberthal awaits you inside.
Oh, and... (clears throat)... thank you. For aiding us.

Text1_lang: Damos speaks highly of you...
Not something he does often.
He and the others are looking for answers... a reason for all of this.
After everything that's happened, everything we've been through...
I'm beginning to wonder if... (sigh)... what I'm looking for isn't here.
Oh no... No...

Text_lang: (death rattle)
Begone. The Reach belongs to the Sundered Flame.

Text1_lang: SARKARETH!
Damos...
(labored heavy breathing, grief turning to rage, building in determination)

Text_lang: Sindragosa and Malygos should be at rest. Yet their anger is growing larger by the moment.
Maybe they want things settled? Didn't they both die very violently?

Text1_lang: Like the spirits of Crystalsong Forest... Sindragosa and Malygos are stranded in their final moments of death.
And now they are reliving those final moments of their lives in an endless loop.
Perhaps all of this chaos was their only way of getting our attention? Wildly lashing out, hoping someone would hear them.

Text_lang: Well we certainly hear them, and we are going to help. $n, recover their essences. We are taking them back to the Azure Archives.
Emberthal!
Leaving me behind? Well, I suppose I am a dragon after all!

Text1_lang: Look around you! Can you see why I fell in love with Pandaria?

Text_lang: It's beautiful!

Text1_lang: Better than frost and snow! Keep up, Kalecgos! Let the warm winds take you.

Text_lang: Haha!

Text1_lang: That boy still has it, doesn't he?

Text_lang: Where are we going?

Text1_lang: My home!
My home.

Text_lang: <Sniff> So many papers... So many papers tae write! It's beautiful! Ach, I knew ye could do it!
Oh, this gives me an idea for a commemorative wood carving that'd sell like frostcakes!
Text1_lang: Oh, this gives me an idea for a commemorative wood carving that'd sell like frostcakes!
I knew I liked you for a reason. Say, $n... If you get tired of talking, there're always more beasts to hunt!

Text_lang: The tribes are united once again. Thank you, $p.
A new home...
Text1_lang: A new home...

Text_lang: For $p! For the Winterpelt!
Text1_lang: For $p! For the Winterpelt!

Text_lang: When I was young... the centaur took me.
It was Bovan who found me, and aided in my rescue.
Without him, I never would have...
It was my turn to rescue him.
And they have robbed me of it.
<Agonized cry of loss and fury>
They will never hurt anyone again.
A few years after the Third War, Marshal Reginald Windsor suspected there was evil in Stormwind.
Where others saw Chaos, he saw Treachery.
In the corrupt dealings of the nobles, and the rise of the Defias Brotherhood.
Through perseverance, he discovered a grand conspiracy,
But you know this. You were there.
That day, he confronted the most powerful noble in Stormwind, Lady Katrana Prestor.
With her lies exposed, she burst forth, revealing her true form:
Windsor laid down his life to free Stormwind, shattering Onyxia's hold on the city.
After she fled, we discovered the cursed amulet she had used to control and persuade so many.
Do you see now, Emberthal? We are Neltharion's ultimate vision. His masterpiece.

Text1_lang: Yet you would throw dracthyr lives away for power? What could we be owed that demands so bloody a price?

Text_lang: Purpose, Emberthal. We are owed a purpose.

Text1_lang: I won't let you lead our people to ruin, Sarkareth.

Text_lang: Emberthal...
You would heed the command of a dragon rather than face me in battle? Pitiful! You have forgotten what it means to be dracthyr.
Concerns arose that Onyxia's power may still linger within, and so it was locked away and forgotten...

Text1_lang: I... I don't want to fight you.

Text_lang: Until now.
Better that your soldiers died in stasis rather than live to see what you've become. Stay here with your new master. Follow me, and I will end you.
Neltharion's secrets are hidden somewhere in the Dragon Isles. And when I find them, his legacy will be mine.
While there were concerns Onyxia's power may still linger within, it remained in your possession...

Text1_lang: Well struck.

Text_lang: I... did not believe you would come.

Text1_lang: Honor is of great importance to my people.

Text_lang: Yes... as it is to mine.

Text1_lang: Come. Let us gather our dead.

Text_lang: Thank you all for honoring us with your presence here.
When our people came to Azeroth from Draenor, ours was not an easy road.
And along the way, many of our ancient traditions were lost.
This champion is the first to complete the new rite of om'gora.
Let their footsteps be followed for generations to come.
Lok-tar!
DNT
DNT

Text1_lang: And so, we bring the first Kosh'harg of Azeroth to an end.
May the spirits guide us as we renew old rites, and forge new traditions.
And may the honored ancestors watch over us all, until next we meet.

Text_lang: But the time has come to remember the rites of old...
If you were to follow him... what would you do?

Text1_lang: Extinguish my enemy. As I was trained to.

Text_lang: By Neltharion.

Text1_lang: How dare you presume to know us?

Text_lang: You are right.

Text1_lang: Why didn't you?

Text_lang: Because I too am Neltharion's offspring, and it brought me only shame.

Text1_lang: You must be disappointed.

Text_lang: No. Just now, you defied his voice inside you.

Text1_lang: Family.

Text_lang: Emberthal.

Text1_lang: Will you help me, Ebyssian?

Text_lang: We... will help each other.
What is that? There! In the caldera.

Text1_lang: May the honored ancestors watch over us all, until next we meet.

Text_lang: I smell the blood of dragons...
Fyrakk!
Sabellian is wounded! Champion! We must flee!
Fly away little dragons.
...and to build new traditions that honor our proud legacy.
leading to the hallowed halls of Stormwind Keep itself.
Onyxia, daughter of Deathwing.

Text1_lang: (exhales)
I'm so sorry.

Text_lang: A living legend...
Text1_lang: A living legend...

Text_lang: There walks a hero.
Text1_lang: There walks a hero.

Text_lang: Make way!
Text1_lang: Make way!

Text_lang: ...nerves of thorium.
Text1_lang: ...nerves of thorium.

Text_lang: A moment I shall remember for always.
Text1_lang: A moment I shall remember for always.

Text_lang: I shall use the gem to pull fragments of the past forward. We shall see if we glean anything from this.
You three shall be the examples all dracthyr will follow.
Sarkareth, my devastator. You shall rend your foes with the powers of the red and blue dragonflights.
Viridia, my preserver. You shall heal our allies with the grace of green and bronze dragonflights.
And Emberthal, you will wield the essence of the black dragonflight to augment all those around you with my power.
By my command... kneel and obey!
Here! Neltharion is activating Oathbinder... this is our chance to pull the memories of this time to forge a new device.
Aagugh!
It is good to see all of you here. I once believed that our flight was better off in pieces, each dragon pursuing their own interests. I was wrong.
The blue dragons work best when we are a family, when we are united. Together, we--
Kalecgos! I need aid at the Veiled Ossuary. The memories of Sindragosa and Malygos are destroying this place!
I see. Friends, I'm sorry to ask you this so suddenly, but it seems we have need of your aid already.

Text1_lang: Grandfather?

Text_lang: Ah... no tears, my dear.
A life as full as mine should be celebrated, not mourned.
It is up to you to lead the Azurewing now.

Text1_lang: You cannot go -- I am not ready!

Text_lang: We rarely are, my dear starlight.
Carry my lessons close to your heart, and I will never be far from you.
Ah, my good friends. What treasures have you brought me?
Ignore him. He has no claim to my father's possessions.
Is that truly the matter at hand?
Who is the rightful heir to a legacy of deceit, control, and fear?
So you did find something.

Text1_lang: We did. And I destroyed it.

Text_lang: You had no right!

Text1_lang: I had every right.

Text_lang: What has she done?
While you two bicker like petulant whelps, she did what was right for her people.
Let go of the past.

Text1_lang: You are broken, Tyr.
Corruption will claim you all...
...even your precious Aspects.

Text_lang: Perhaps you will be proved right.
Yet the courage of the Aspects, and the promise of the mortals, fills me with hope.
So if by the destruction of this body you are purged from this world... so be it.
<screams in pain>

Text1_lang: Alexstrasza laughs maniacally.

Text_lang: Well, I... Thank you, Sabellian.
The situation is dire, Queen Alexstrasza.
We pursued Fyrakk to a great cauldron below, a font of elemental fire.
He consumed the energies within and emerged -- wreathed in shadowflame.

Text1_lang: Shadowflame... We cannot risk losing you to its corruption.

Text_lang: Respectfully, Life-Binder, it was Deathwing who fell to that corruption.

Text1_lang: Ebyssian -- Neltharion has cost us too much already. We cannot risk the corruption of your flight.
All of you?

Text_lang: This... is our battle to fight.

Text1_lang: Very well. When you are ready, return to Zaralek.

Text_lang: Let us see what they are guarding...
Those massive djaradin...
Those are djaradin elders. Not just dragonslayers, but slayers of entire bloodlines.
Look there!
That one appears to still be slumbering.
And the Primalists are awakening her. We must stop them. Quickly.
Wait. Do you sense it?
Is it...
Yes. I felt it as we entered the cavern.
Shadowflame. The poison that drove Neltharion to madness.
We must end this. The corruption cannot be allowed to spread.
THIS POWER... IS NOW... MINE!
RISE UP FROM YOUR SUBJUGATION, ELDERS OF THE DJARADIN!
HONOR OUR BARGAIN, AND TOGETHER -- NONE WILL WITHSTAND THE UNDYING FLAMES OF OUR FURY!
Augh! -- We cannot hold here!
Elder Igira! Do not let that child of Neltharion escape!

Text1_lang: Argh!

Text_lang: Primalists! Zaqali! Onward! PURGE THIS CAVERN -- AND THEN, THE DRAGON ISLES!
Loamm...
These serpent creatures may prove useful, if they can be made to serve the flight.
They are not creatures, Sabellian; they are our kin.
They are my father's failed experiments, nothing more.
How we were created does not define us.
Yes. That is precisely what you are.
You are wrong.
Do you not see that your fates are bound?
He's consuming... shadowflame?
He is consuming...
Ahhhhhhhhhh!

Text1_lang: May his name be ever remembered.

Text_lang: After what he has done, why treat him with such respect?

Text1_lang: He was dracthyr, and his memory will be a lesson.
Malygos... is it truly you?

Text_lang: My treasure -- what happened?

Text1_lang: I believe I hold the answer to that.
Oh... I see.
My dear, dear Kalecgos. 'Aspect of the blue dragonflight'.

Text_lang: I... remember you. I am so sorry, Kalecgos. My burden should not be yours to bear.
You did not leave a burden. You left a brilliant legacy. One I... and our flight... will carry onward.

Text1_lang: It seems they are in good hands.
Together. Always.
You have come so far, my child.
My work is done, for now.
Thank you, Kalecgos. Lead them well.

Text_lang: ...thank you, my lady. For everything.

Text1_lang: Instead of helping our people heal, he led many to despair and ruin
chasing the illusion of Neltharion's power.

Text_lang: If only Sarkareth had taken Deathwing's tragedy to heart
and understood that his legacy was poisoned long ago.

Text1_lang: It is time for the dracthyr to make our own path.

Text_lang: Where do you hope it will lead?

Text1_lang: Far from the shadows of the past that have haunted us,
Let it go, Sarkareth. There is no victory beyond that threshold--only ruin.
and free to build a legacy of our own.
To a future you inspired me to believe in, Ebyssian.

Text_lang: Even the most painful moments have something to teach us.
Neltharion was my teacher. My father and my commander.
I aspired to lead the flight as he would have,
unable... or perhaps, unwilling...
to acknowledge the true malignancy of his vision.
No! You will not stop me! Aberrus is mine!
I never knew Neltharion. Only Deathwing.
Invading my nightmares. Reveling in the certainty that I would become as twisted as he was.
That is not who you are... my brother.

Text1_lang: Then you have made your choice.

Text_lang: I thought my destiny was to guide our flight to its future.
And I shall, but simply as myself... not as an Aspect.
We cannot let that zealot take control of the lab.
Nor shall I seek that mantle.
What are you looking at me for? Let's go!
Agreed.

Text1_lang: It would seem your days of hiding are over for good.

Text_lang: I am... humbled.
May your trust and faith in me guide my every step.
For today, we emerge from all the shadows that sought to sow doubt and shame within us.
The black dragonflight's legacy is ours to create.
You... will not pursue him?

Text1_lang: I know he will face justice but...

Text_lang: Those two must face this without me. I hope... in their pursuit...

Text1_lang: Then let us find the dracthyr who have not yet succumbed to that fate.

Text_lang: Lead the way, Emberthal.
By the time Ebyssian finds his dracthyr friend, the Primalists will have completed their schemes.
For once we are in agreement.
Every moment we delay works to our foe's advantage.
Then let us be off!

Text1_lang: Through great heroism and resilience, the threat of Aberrus has been quelled.
The Incarnates sought to use our fallen brother's memory as a weapon.
To divide us, turn us against each other, and weaken our resolve.
They failed.
Confronting these shadows has only made us stronger.
Look upon us now.
For the first time in an age, FIVE Aspects will take up our ancient charge once more,
and stand beside the mortal champions who have aided us at every turn.
For soon, Azeroth will welcome from the Dream
a symbol of hope.
And together, we... shall protect it.

Text_lang: Ugh! I've got muck in my boots. Disgusting!
See, Wrathion? They have been marshaling a defense while we tarried.
Did you hear that? A voice--
WRATHION!
Hah! I must admit, Wrathion... You acquitted yourself well in the fight!
Yes! Of course...
Once we have dealt with this flame incarnate, I will be sure to find a place for you among my troops.
Your troops?!
Sabellian!

Text1_lang: <laughs>

Text_lang: No! Oathbinder... is MINE!

Text1_lang: Is this why you came here? To enslave us again with Neltharion's devices? That's how you would create unity?

Text_lang: What... have you done?
Our father calls to us, Emberthal! Can you not hear Neltharion drawing us to Aberrus? Telling us to take what is ours?

Text1_lang: You are not well, Sarkareth... Come with me.  Perhaps Ebyssian can...

Text_lang: No! I will claim the legacy we were promised! VOX, initiate transport!

Text1_lang: Coordinates confirmed. Initiating transport.
Sarkareth, wait!
...He's gone. I... have accomplished nothing.

Text_lang: This is not over yet. Do you know where he has gone?

Text1_lang: Ebyssian... he said he's hearing Neltharion's voice. He's going to Aberrus!

Text_lang: Whispers in the dark. This may be worse than I'd imagined.
But at least the dracthyr here are no longer under his control.
Or am I just fodder to you as well?
Fodder for the battlefield.
Deny it as you might, he is your brother, and you are his.
Two wings, that must learn to fly, or fail, together... before it is too late.
We should press on.
Wrathion?
Pay attention!
These Primalists do not stand a chance.

Text1_lang: The other flights will hunt Fyrakk, and work to stop the Sundered Flame.
You cannot return to Zaralek.

Text_lang: I believe that we have the strength to resist what lies below.

Text1_lang: May the true spirit of the Earth-Warder guide you.

Text_lang: The world must be shown that the black dragonflight can bear its responsibilities.
Shadowflame?!
Begone worms!
I will master what your flight could not control.
they are beyond anything we encountered in the Waking Shores.
That flame infusing the lava...
I was... your loyal soldier, father.
Did everything... you asked.
Did I not... uphold your legacy?
Was it all just... an illusion?
Empty... promises...
leading us only...
to oblivion...

Text1_lang: Compliance.

Text_lang: VOX, initiate containment protocol.

Text1_lang: Ebyssian...?!

Text_lang: Still hiding in Ebyssian's shadow, I see.

Text1_lang: Sarkareth... our conflict must end. Our people must unite.

Text_lang: I agree.

Text1_lang: The Oathbinder? Sarkareth, no!

Text_lang: You will all bow to ME!

Text1_lang: Champion... I can't... you must stop him...
Our Elder was taken from us by the dragons long ago. Imprisoned in Aberrus, they await.
But the djaradin have not forgotten, and we will soon breach that prison and free them.

Text_lang: You are broken, Tyr.
I will heed its call!
I will heed his call!
But this time, the "enemy" is one of your own,
as are the dracthyr that follow him.
Soldiers who, like you, were conditioned to claim victory at any cost.

Text1_lang: You, who hid among mortals while other dragons fought and died to protect our world!

Text_lang: I was content to be simply "Ebonhorn," and Highmountain was my home.
I should have done more.
I came here to face that, and found you.
Chose compassion over violence.
Our family does not have to live in his shadow.

Text1_lang: When I awoke... they were gone... all of them.
For the first time, I was alone. And it terrified me.
And when Sarkareth killed the others...

Text_lang: He will face justice for what he has done.
Ahhhhhhh!

Text1_lang: That'll do it.
You look like you're new around these parts.
Let's get you out of here!
The key is to bonk them in just the right spot... with a ten ton crystal.
Oof! My joints will be hurting later tonight. Anywhoo...
Welcome, uplander! I'm Honeypelt.
Let me help you out of here!
Looks like the uplanders you were waiting for have already settled in with us. Told you the niffen were hospitable!

Text_lang: You have failed, and your vrykul will perish.

Text1_lang: You have failed, and your vrykul will perish.

Text_lang: That mortals are weak and destined to fall into darkness.
Hope that they will carry on the titans' legacy.
Unite as we were meant to.
Bound to the hand of our father, Neltharion.

Text1_lang: So long as that device existed my people would never be free.

Text_lang: Your flight needs you here and now.

Text1_lang: He is lost and I grow weary of fighting my own kin. But you...

Text_lang: They will finally see that Neltharion's legacy is death and nothing more.

Text1_lang: Hnhk!

Text_lang: <Zzztt> Console matrix disrupted. Repairs required before <zzztt> credentials can be verified.
Access <Zzztt> granted.

Text1_lang: <laughs maniacally>
How can I help?

Text_lang: Let's do it!
My vigil is eternal.
I am nature's rage!

Text1_lang: For Elune!

Text_lang: Sound effect for troops
Nature seeks balance in all things.
Sound effect for troops
Text1_lang: Sound effect for troops
Sound effect for troops
Your spirit burns bright.
Let me at 'em!

Text_lang: Sound effect for troops
We will protect the wilds.

Text1_lang: Our lands are under attack. Tend to those in need and see to it that the threat is removed.

Text_lang: You dare to steal from my crucibles?! I am coming for you, little worms. You will perish in flames!

Text1_lang: Have you seen some of these creatures in the Ohn'ahran Plains? Adorable!
One of our foragers spotted food nearby. See what you can gather.

Text_lang: Are you ready to rumble?

Text1_lang: Truly a challenge of the senses. Bring honor to your ancestors, heroes.

Text_lang: For our next challenge we have a creature ripped from a nightmare, possibly literally!
I hope you brought some nose plugs, because you're about to face an incarnation of decay itself! Let's hear it for Nightrot!
Round two, fight!
Wow! What a fight! The arena may need some deep cleaning after that match.
Join us, and we can see how your skills are coming along.

Greetings, dragonrider! Looking for something a little different?

This is the Maruukai Dash. a course that takes you on a tour of centaur lands. 

As a "dash" course, you may lead your drake through the course's rings in any order.

Choose the route that suits you or gives you the fastest time.

Would you like to try this dash course?
Text1_lang:
Greetings, dragonrider! Looking for something a little different?

This is the Maruukai Dash. a course that takes you on a tour of centaur lands. 

As a "dash" course, you may lead your drake through the course's rings in any order.

Choose the route that suits you or gives you the fastest time.

Would you like to try this dash course?

Text_lang: Ready!
Text1_lang: Ready!

Text_lang: Set!
Text1_lang: Set!

Text_lang: GO!
Text1_lang: GO!

Text_lang: Excellent work! I can see that the two of you will soon be formidable competitors.

Text1_lang: When it comes to training proto-drakes, there's no one in this world as good as I am.

Text_lang: It is an excellent day for a race! Come fly with us.

Welcome to the Wild Preserve Slalom. This scenic course offers an aerial safari of the surrounding wilds.

It's the wildest ride in the Wild Preserve!

Would you like to try it?
Text1_lang:
Welcome to the Wild Preserve Slalom. This scenic course offers an aerial safari of the surrounding wilds.

It's the wildest ride in the Wild Preserve!

Would you like to try it?

Text_lang: Nicely done! You and your drake are exceptional.

Text1_lang: A pod o'Tideskippers off to port!

Text_lang: The rivers of the Waking Shores are teeming with life today, but I'm busy answering fan mail. Think you can catalog the wildlife for me?
And off we go...
Though the river is calm the elements seem restless. Steady yourself.
%s takes a deep, calming breath.
Excellent work. Let's bring those pictures back to camp.
These pictures will surely bring fame to the Waking Shores and the Dragonscale Expedition. Nice work!

Greetings, dragonrider!

Are you ready for a brisk, wintry ride?

The Frostland Flyover loops around the Upper Frostlands through snow-dusted trees and icy peaks.

Would you like to try it? I do hope you're wearing something warm under that armor...
Text1_lang:
Greetings, dragonrider!

Are you ready for a brisk, wintry ride?

The Frostland Flyover loops around the Upper Frostlands through snow-dusted trees and icy peaks.

Would you like to try it? I do hope you're wearing something warm under that armor...
These gnolls have been harassing us for generations. It pains me, but their chieftain must be taken out.
I think I see a glimmer of somethin' up there on that wall. Give it a climb and check, will ye?
Our team at Traitor's Rest were testing bones when an all-out gnoll war broke loose! Please rescue our people... and the bone samples.

Text_lang: Goodness, you do appear to be in a pickle.

Text1_lang: Ah, the things ye find when ye put yourself in mortal danger. Great job up there!
Someday, I wanna see all of Azeroth. Every bit!

Text_lang: Where would you like to fly to?
Text1_lang: Where would you like to fly to?

Text_lang: I've got a lot to learn about pet training, but the only way to get better is practice! Fancy a battle?

Text1_lang: I don't really like when my pets fight, but I love making them feel better when they're done.

Text_lang: $R, I am devoted to training the guardians of Anzu.  Will you aid me in this cause?

Text1_lang: Hello $n.  Would you like to dance with my moths?

Text_lang: You think you can beat Tarr with pets?  Funny.

Text1_lang: Do you wish to offer challenge?  My wolves must train to become strong.
Amazing what you can dig up if you don't mind fighting through monsters, traps, bandits, and any other number of things trying to kill you.

Oh, you must mean my father, Belloc.  What he and the Reliquary do can hardly be called 'archaeology'.  Grave robbing is more like it.$b$bTrue archaeology is the search for fact, not treasure.  I want to learn about the past, study where we came from, and rediscover lost knowledge.
No matter how much I feed them, your pets keep wandering into the town hall and begging for scraps.
Welcome to the Roasted Ram! Seating is open.

Text_lang: Diani is going to give me so much hassle over this.
Hey friend! Come check out our new items in the Trading Post. We just got a new shipment!
Text1_lang: Hey friend! Come check out our new items in the Trading Post. We just got a new shipment!
Find the beast that roams these lands and kill it. We will make good use of the resources it provides.
Come out and hunt, if you are up to the challenge! This quarry is strong and relentless.
We near the end of our hunt. Signal the other hunters by blowing the horn.
A fine hunt! You did better than I expected two-foot. My clan will seek out a new hunting ground.
You did better than I expected. My scouts will search for new hunting grounds while these lands replenish.

Text_lang: Now you are at the bottom of the hill, serene in your place of peace, calm, and relaxation. Let your mind and body drift, not focusing on anything. Simply let it all be.
Feel that heaviness in your shoulders spread down your arms. Feel the force of earth gently pull on your arms, pulling your shoulders down...
Take another step down the hill, and then another, feeling more deeply relaxed with each step. Closer and closer to that place of relaxation.
Move down the hill, down and down, closer to that place of calm, peace, and relaxation. The closer you get to the bottom, the heavier your whole body feels...
Imagine that you stand at the top of a hill. At the bottom of the hill is a place of calm, peace, and relaxation.
Imagine taking one step down that hill. A step toward that place of calm and peace. As you take that step, you feel your shoulders relaxing, becoming heavier...
Let us begin to relax. Find a comfortable position to sit, and let the tension leave your body.

Text1_lang: The ecological diversity in these caves is spectacular, $n!

Text_lang: These titan devices were created to gather data and monitor their environs. See what knowledge you can glean from them while they do their thing!
Brul, do you even train pets?
Ya lookin at one of de best pet battlers in Zaralek Cavern!
I die well...
Text1_lang: I die well...

Text_lang: Ladies and gentlemen, feast your eyes on these feats of prestidigitation!
I am studying the life of this area for...research purposes.

Text1_lang: We must do everything we can to protect the shrines and temples of my people.
This year's harvest yielded more than just crops!

Text_lang: Mo'ruk gonna beat ya!
Braving these wastes has made my pets undefeatable.

Text1_lang: It is within the most sacred realm of Pandaria that you will now face your most difficult challenge.

Text_lang: I have spent countless hours preparing for this battle.
The water never lies.
Hello, I'd like to buy some health potions please.
Sorry, we don't sell healing potions. I can sell you vials if you want to make your own healing potions?
No... No. Thank you though. Have a good day.

Text1_lang: Oh and it needs to be very high grade!
My goodness, I forgot my gold, I am so sorry! I'll be back later!
Hello, I was wondering if I would be able to get some building materials sent to a tower in the Waking Shores?

Text_lang: How may I aid you?

Text1_lang: Aye, this will be good!

Text_lang: Sound effect for troops
Sound effect for troops
Text1_lang: Sound effect for troops

Text_lang: The wind has whispered your name.
I burn with anticipation.
Looks like you need assistance, friend.

Text1_lang: Do exactly as I say, child.

Text_lang: I greet you.
This is what we've trained for!
I am at your call.
Sound effect for troops
What may I do for you, $GSir:Dame;?

Text1_lang:
If Slick weren't so big, I tell you, he'd be my next champion. He's got the fire. The drive. It's all there in those swaying eyes.

But being your mount is fine too, I suppose.

Need more cargo? No problem! Just remember to keep riding Slick until this package is delivered to my buddy in Loamm. 

No dismounting now, you hear?

Text_lang: Hit that fish! Grab the scales! Quick, before it goes into the magma!
Text1_lang: Hit that fish! Grab the scales! Quick, before it goes into the magma!

Text_lang: Most shamans prefer wolves, but this one prefers... corgis? You might think she's barking up the wrong tree, but she's beaten every doggone challenger so far! Who will take down these pugnacious pups?

Text1_lang: Look at their wittle faces! They're so cute I'm going to die!

Text_lang: Welcome to The Ruby Feast! The food is scrumptious and dancing is encouraged!
I don't understand dragonfruit. Do they look like dragons? Do dragons like them? I have so many questions.
Text1_lang: I don't understand dragonfruit. Do they look like dragons? Do dragons like them? I have so many questions.

Text_lang: Could Chef Morsel be the real culinary genius pulling the strings? There's no way, right?!
Text1_lang: Could Chef Morsel be the real culinary genius pulling the strings? There's no way, right?!

Text_lang: You know, I think the food here could even give those chefs in Dalaran a run for its money.
Text1_lang: You know, I think the food here could even give those chefs in Dalaran a run for its money.

Text_lang: Spirits bless your path! Chef Ironpaw has taken a day from her duties at the Halfhill Market to grace us with the culinary wisdom of Pandaria!

Did you know there are animals that can blend in with the snow?

Momma told me to wear these glasses to protect my eyes when I'm outside, but I do it because help me spot the snowy friends better!

Do you want to try?

Text1_lang: The creatures here are frenzied. Kill them, quickly!

Text_lang: Pesky tundra bears managed to get into our supplies and scatter them around. Please bring them back to any of the Supplies Masters in the area.
Text1_lang: Pesky tundra bears managed to get into our supplies and scatter them around. Please bring them back to any of the Supplies Masters in the area.
Ah, the hunt is upon us! This target will test your mettle, two-foot. Are you prepared?
The end of the hunt draws near. Sound the horn to inform the other hunters!
Your skills impress me, two-foot! We must let this land be replenished. My scouts will seek new hunting grounds... and new challenges.

Text_lang: Iskaara here we come!

Text1_lang:
You know the trick to befriending the turtles?

You need to feed them!

Wanna try?

Text_lang: Winds treating you well out there?
Text1_lang: Winds treating you well out there?
Look at all these ancient titan relics scattered about. Never pass up an opportunity to study the past!

Text_lang: Good day, $gsir:madam;!  How may I be of assistance?

Text1_lang: You have journeyed far, adventurer. What is it you seek?
Rebels have raided a caravan of medical supplies and taken them back to this encampment. Reclaim any that you can find!

Text_lang: I can instruct you in mining and how to gather ores of higher quality. Interested?
Text1_lang: I can instruct you in mining and how to gather ores of higher quality. Interested?

Text_lang: It is good to see you again, $p.
Hey there, artisan!

Hello there, Uplander! I'm here on behalf of Loamm to seek your crafts for trade!

It's certainly busy up here on the surface... and bright! Will you lend me a hand and help me find the best things to send back to Loamm?
I can instruct you in jewelcrafting.  Interested?
Text1_lang: I can instruct you in jewelcrafting.  Interested?
Hi, hi, hi! What can the Artisan's Consortium do for you today?

Text_lang: <Precision tools and a magnifying glass adorn the bench.>

Text1_lang: Greetings, mortal.
Welcome adventurer! Would you like to list a crafting order with us today?

Text_lang: Add some shine to your hoard! Gems from across the seas, faceted on demand!

Text1_lang: The Grand Hunt is a long, honored tradition with my people, we do not rest till we have taken our quarry. I will give you a chance to prove yourself. Show me your strength two-foot, take this horn and signal the beginning of the Hunt. We will see how you fare.
Our hunting companions require aid. Find them and help them!

Text_lang: Where the eagle goes, we wander.
Have you come seeking wisdom?
The lands know more than you ever will.
What lesson shall it be today?
My blood is our blood.
What knowledge do you seek today?
The hero of the fearsome Djaradin, Ceeqa the Peacetaker is here to fire up the competition!

Text1_lang: Hopefully he fights as well as he boasts.

Text_lang: Hey, he's got spirit! Respect! Round three, fight!
Our next competitor has been forged by the molten lifeblood of the Dragon Isles itself!

Text1_lang: Looks like I'm not the only one who enjoys slaying mortals. One of you should teach this killer a lesson.
These little sparkling creatures look like they could hold something of value. Use this gadget I've scrounged up to siphon from them.

Well, hey howdy hey, uplander!

The dirt around these parts hasn't been so disturbed since our greatmothers burrowed up to found Loamm oh so long ago.

I won't lie, we'd sure like to get to know you better. All this calamity, it can't be handled unless we work together. 

Am I right?

Text_lang: Hi, friend!
The worms probably have Pipsee's snacks. I know I would, if I was a worm! Let's go!
I smell something un-wormlike.
Let's go show Melati all the snacks we found!
<Pipsee makes a nibbling motion at your hands.>
Yay, Pipsee! Aw, she's cute!

Text1_lang: Okay, Daffs. Bye-bye, Myrrit and Myrrit-buddy!
Pipsee is happy. Things will work out.
We should find a safer place to store our stuff, Mel. Come on.

Text_lang: Let's head back to town.
You resolved that so neatly, $n! Great job. And Pipsee is happy too.
Aw, I don't smell anything.
He had a key! I guess it's up to us to sniff out the treasure now!
Wait! There's LESS burning smell here!
That was amazing. Let's head back with our treasure!
I don't think he was a very good sniffenseeker. Using a big drill feels like cheating!
I smell... burning.
Look out!
Don't let my smellies get away! Quick! Get them back to the pot!
Text1_lang: Don't let my smellies get away! Quick! Get them back to the pot!

Text_lang: I'm calling a team challenge, right here, right now! Come get some, bruls!

Text1_lang:
Naming racing snails ain't so simple. Lots to consider. Slick's name, well, that one took me a while. 

But all that hard work paid off. Big Slick in the City? Perfect.

Text_lang: It is a bright day with exceptionally favourable winds: a perfect day for a race!

The Crystal Circuit race is a great way to see Zaralek Cavern!

Wind your way through the majestic glowing crystal fields, drop in on Glimmerrogg, and race through the Crystal Cascades before gliding to the finish while taking in the cavern's beautiful lava flows.

You're lucky to race here, but I'm lucky I get this view all day!

Ready to race?
Text1_lang:
The Crystal Circuit race is a great way to see Zaralek Cavern!

Wind your way through the majestic glowing crystal fields, drop in on Glimmerrogg, and race through the Crystal Cascades before gliding to the finish while taking in the cavern's beautiful lava flows.

You're lucky to race here, but I'm lucky I get this view all day!

Ready to race?

Text_lang: What have you learned, $n?

Text1_lang: Sarkareth...

Text_lang: There are still dangers remaining in Aberrus. We should not let them travel alone.

Text1_lang: As you said, he chose his path. And yet... though he was deeply misguided, Sarkareth deserves a farewell that befits the dracthyr he once was.

Text_lang: Of course. I will go with you to the place he fell.
Agreed. Champion, will you join us? This is a path best walked together.
I am sorry for the friend you lost.
Steel yourself, $n. Aberrus has darkness within and without.
Oh, $n... my apologies. I was preoccupied. Was there something you needed?
A trait you admired?
I knew of Deathwing's corruption when I was still in the shell. But I had no idea how deeply it ran.
In some ways, yes. But now, seeing what it can lead to, I am... less certain.
Father... pursued his goals with relentless conviction. He was never fond of half measures.

Text1_lang: Loyalists remain in the experiments wing, and the laboratories are still infested with warped beasts.
Sirs!
We're holding against the djaradin, but it is still heavily contested.

Text_lang: And the other wing?
Thank you, Kavia.
Your report?
The djaradin are ruthless adversaries of our flight. But to be imprisoned and have their life siphoned away... it is too cruel a fate, even for our enemies.
How long have they been here?
Long enough.
As... as I have done.
These pitiful creatures... did father truly hold so little regard for life?
You are not him, Sabellian. You wish to see our kind thrive, not dominate. It is an admirable pursuit.
He cared only about forging a future in which the black dragonflight would be dominant.
Thank you, Wrathion. But I must do better.
What is it, $n?
They had no choice or agency in their creation. Neither did I.
We have not known each other long, but I can see that you are every bit the dragon I am. If I have ever made you feel otherwise, I am truly sorry.
Do I disgust you as well?
Wrathion, I did not mean--
Disgusting creatures. Unnatural aberrations!
There are some serpent drakes stationed at the top of the Experiments Wing for us, champion.
They should see us safely to the lower platform.
Well then. Let us get this over with.
I confess... this is the last place I wanted to revisit.
I could say the same for this entire facility.
Ah, there you are. We did not wish to begin without you, $n.
Are you ready to begin, $n?
That is a lesson each of us has had to learn.
Neltharion's abominations have been eradicated. Sadly, not before Sarkareth succumbed to corruption and had to be struck down.
His wisdom and compassion will pave a new path forward for us all.

Text1_lang: Citizens of Valdrakken, hear me! From this day forth, Ebyssian shall serve his people as Earth-Warder and Aspect of the black dragonflight!

Text_lang: I am honored to do so. But I will require my general and my diplomat at my side.
We believe Ebyssian is the right choice to lead us.

Text1_lang: Then let it be so. Come, take your place among our council... Earth-Warder.
As I had hoped you would. Tell me.
I agree. And do you accept this charge, Ebyssian?
Welcome home, my friends. What news from Aberrus?
A heavy price to pay, but a reminder of the cost of seeking power.

Text_lang: Indeed, my brother. And by confronting the darkness of our flight's past, we have found its future.

Text1_lang: Would you like to see what your hard work has wrought, $n?
What've you been digging lately?

Text_lang:
Ah, isn't this cavern beautiful?

Look at how the crystal spires here shimmer and glow...

If you want to see the caves in all their luminescent splendor, you'll want to race the Shimmering Slalom.

Fly over glowing, shimmering crystals, strange geological features, and fly close to the cavern's mysterious wildlife.

Do you want to try the Shimmering Slalom course?
Text1_lang:
Ah, isn't this cavern beautiful?

Look at how the crystal spires here shimmer and glow...

If you want to see the caves in all their luminescent splendor, you'll want to race the Shimmering Slalom.

Fly over glowing, shimmering crystals, strange geological features, and fly close to the cavern's mysterious wildlife.

Do you want to try the Shimmering Slalom course?

Text_lang: *Pant* Please, help! My wagon is too heavy for me to push it!
Text1_lang: *Pant* Please, help! My wagon is too heavy for me to push it!

Text_lang: Deephollow Lake's water is fed by underground currents. Sometimes, strange things wash up from the depths. Help me do some gathering, and maybe we can learn more about what lurks below.
Stop and drop everything! Let's get out of here! We'll pick up our work later. Thanks for your help, adventurers. Take this!
Wow, look at this place! How fancy. I like statues. Let's go see it up close?
Ooh, are those tablets a clue? This is so exciting!
Should I trigger the button on the ground? I'm a good button-stander!
This statue smells like a strange thing I've never smelled before. It reminds me of the sea. Do you recognize it?

<This stone lion statue has a runic inscription that lights up.>

Do not trust the statue with three blue orbs. His lie will be clear.
Look! A spirit!

Text1_lang: Do you think shiny gems will stay in style forever?

Text_lang:
Listen here, you want to be like me? Have lots of bricks? 

Watch and learn, Ponzo will show you how it's done.
Gems so bright you'll want to shine your scales! Come browse the work of the finest jewelcrafters in the Dragon Isles.
Today, your cries of battle and de clash of your weapons will be heard by de great loa! And de fallen will join dem... in de afterlife.
For Zandalar!
Grant her an honorable death...
To de afterlife...

Text1_lang: Oh, hello Zan, it is good of you to visit ol' Auntie Stormstout.

Text_lang: I am not Zan - I am Chen Stormstout!

Text1_lang: Oh Zan! You remind me so much of your father.

Text_lang: Tell me, what has happened here?
Who crashing Ook party!?
Me gonna ook you in the dooker!
Get Ooking party started!
Come on and get your Ook on!
We gonna Ook all night!
Ook! Oooook!!
Whatzit...are they...what are they doin' to our alementals?
Hey...hey YOU! Those are OUR flying...beer monsters?
Yes yes yes! So close! Just a pinch of...oops...
Too bitter! Just a drop of honey, and a cane of sugar, and maybe some corn? Yes, more corn!
Yes, yes, yes...no, no, no no no! Yes! No! Peppers!
Ahh! Help! What is that thing!? It doesn't matter, nothing will stop me now, not when I'm so close! Maybe if I don't look at it...?
Is it...can it be???
Such harmony of flavor, such heady aroma! It is...the perfect brew!
The name of Stormstout will be sung once again throughout the hills!

Text1_lang: Thaldraszus may look deadly to outsiders. But some cute critters will smooth the rough edges!

Whenever I look up at the sky and feel small, I remember something a friend of mine once said: 

"It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves."

I think about that a lot.

Text_lang: Gate?! I'm going to bring this whole wall down!
This will be the bomb.
I... blew it...
We've got to light that signal fire. Without reinforcements, they'll destroy the gate!
But the mantid have overrun the area. There's no clear path!
Don't worry! I can make it!
What are you doing?! There's no way you'll reach it!
You'll get yourself killed!
I'll hurl your corpses from this tower.
Why didn't he listen?
We've gotta stop giving the recruits those red shirts. They're just moving targets in them.
The gates are about to fall. Quickly! Slaughter these meddlers!
There will be no escaping me.

Text1_lang: Oh, when did you get here, $c?

Text_lang: Strength. It is far more than simple physical prowess. When you are truly tested, will you be able to tell the difference between strength and power?
Ha ha! The trial commences!
You are strong, stronger even than you realize. Carry this thought with you into the darkness ahead, and let it shield you.
You dare to disturb these waters? You will drown!
Rise!
Spring to life!
Do not run, it only delays the inevitable.
Come in, the water's fine!
Let death wash over you!
The darkness clears...
I peer into these waters and my reflection is empty...
Waters... claim me...

Text1_lang: Your forces are weak!
The heart of the Great Serpent will not fall into your hands!
Jade Serpent, grant me strength!
The cycle must continue, the Jade Serpent must be reborn!

Text_lang: Be free of doubt, priestess...
Text1_lang: Be free of doubt, priestess...
The haze has been lifted from my eyes... forgive me for doubting you...

Text_lang: Die or surrender. You cannot defeat me.
See how effortlessly you become unraveled.
You cannot escape me. I am... in... every...  breath...

Text1_lang: There's so much to document in the Ohn'ahran Plains, hero. Another photographer is always welcome!

Text_lang:
I have journeyed far and wide to find the best battle pet trainers on Azeroth. 

Are you perhaps such a one?
Useless, all of you! Even the guards you give me in tribute can't keep these lesser beings from my palace.
Redeem, nay, PROVE yourselves now. Deal with these intruders. The clan who brings me their heads will have my favor!
Clan Harthak will show all why they are the truest of Mogu!
Our clan is the true clan! No interloper can change that!
Clan Gurthan will show our King and the rest of you power-hungry imposters why we are the rightful ones at his side!
We will never surrender our right to rule the destiny of our people!
Clan Kargesh will demonstrate why only the strong deserve to stand at our King's side!
Impossible! Our might is the greatest in all the empire!
Who allowed these outsiders inside our halls? Only Clan Harthak or Clan Kargesh would stoop to such treachery!
Only the dogs of Clan Gurthan would point fingers at others for their own failures! Your clan is the most desperate. It must've been you!
Clan Gurthan is right! Only the honorless Clan Harthak could bring in a lesser race to do their bidding. You must be traitors!
A well-scripted exchange; but we are not fooled. Your clans are clearly in league with one another. For the glory of our king, our empire, we will put you all down!
I hear something...
Stop them!
Slay them!
Such a waste...
What is this, more have come to claim my crown? They are small and weak.
You are not the first to challenge me, peons. You will not be the last.
Face the might of my arsenal, weaklings!
MY MIGHT IS ENDLESS!
ENOUGH OF THIS FARCE! You will feel PAIN, cowards!
You call that... a fight...?
Brothers! Dispose of these insolent outsiders!
The Shado-Pan need no outside aid! Remove these interlopers!
Weaklings... let me make room for our guests.
Approach... your death awaits.
Let me show you my power.
Come to me, serpent!  Together we will destroy these intruders.
Serpent, charge me with your power!
Their energy is strong!
No, no! Do not fail me!
Even together... we failed...
You!  You have allowed the Sha to reawaken after all these years!
If you truly wish to undo what your kind have wrought upon our land you must first prove yourselves here in our school.
First, you will face our initiates...
You have much to learn if you wish to defend your people from the Sha initiate.  Stand aside for your fellow students!
Where one falls, another will rise to take their place.
You have bested our most junior of students.  Now you will face two of my most senior.
Flying Snow!  Fragrant Lotus!  Step forward!
You have bested my prize students. Perhaps you can be of use to us after all...
As my master once said, "You cannot truly know someone until you fight them."
Come forward, so that we may be properly introduced.
Very well then, outsiders. Let us see your true strength.
Skill with a weapon is but a physical manifestation of one's martial strength. Let me show you what spiritual power is!
When I was but a cub I could scarcely throw a punch, but after years of training I can do so much more!
I will not be caged again. These Shado-Pan could not stop me. Neither shall you!
So long as violence lurks in your hearts... I... will... return...
Taran Zhu and the Shado-Pan are MINE. Come forward and die by my hand, as all who oppose me shall in the days to come!
Hatred will consume and conquer all!
No... NO!
The Sha of Hatred has fled my body... and the monastery, as well. I must thank you, strangers. The Shado-Pan are in your debt. Now, there is much work to be done...

Text1_lang: Class is now in session.

Text_lang: I and my family fell victim to this place what seems like ages ago.$B$BLet our fate serve as a warning to those who would meddle in necromancy.$B$BHelp me to lift the curse, $c. Destroy Darkmaster Gandling.

Text1_lang: Class dismissed.
Your soul cannot withstand my power!
I can never die!
THIS CANNOT BE!
Ooh, it takes some real stones to challenge the Mistress of Illusion. Well? Show me what you've got!
Come, try your luck! Ha ha haaa...
Feeling a bit... dizzy?
Ugh... death... hurts? Unreal...

Text_lang: My dear, it appears we have visitors!  Friends of yours, Voss?

Text1_lang: You there!  Make yourselves useful and deal with these summoners!

Text_lang: Their deaths only serve to empower my summoners further! Behold!
What's the matter, Voss, getting tired?

Text1_lang: I'll never stop hunting your kind, necromancer.  NEVER.

Text_lang: Isn't it beautiful? The weaving of flesh and bone and soul.
You, too, are beautiful, Voss. Have you looked in a mirror recently?
My dear, you should embrace this gift that has been bestowed upon you.

Text1_lang: Run...necromancer...your life ends once I catch my breath.

Text_lang: Come, Voss, your fate awaits you.
Always pumping, always pumping!
Text1_lang: Always pumping, always pumping!

Text_lang: Did you forget, girl? I am the Darkmaster! I command the undead!

Text1_lang: I...won't let you...

Text_lang: Now turn your lovely runeblades on our guests, and fetch me their bones!

Text1_lang: I can't...fight him...

Text_lang: I can feel her will breaking! Her soul burns so brightly.
Now, Lilian, it is time for your transformation.
What?!

Text1_lang: DIE, NECROMANCER!

Text_lang: The bones! You wretch!

Text1_lang: Leave me...to die...alone...please...

Text_lang: If you haven't come to study, I'll use you to teach a lesson.
School is in session!
Class... dismissed.
Let death wash over you!
Do you want to go to the waterfall with me?
Text1_lang: Do you want to go to the waterfall with me?

Text_lang: Hey, Wogi! What are you doing?
Text1_lang: Hey, Wogi! What are you doing?

Text_lang: What it look like I be doing, child? I be watching you.
Text1_lang: What it look like I be doing, child? I be watching you.

Text_lang: I be having a cup of tea.
Text1_lang: I be having a cup of tea.

Text_lang: No! Ya father say to stay here, so here we be staying.
Text1_lang: No! Ya father say to stay here, so here we be staying.

I needed to keep busy after we defeated the Legion, so I took up pet battling. 

It's almost as good as slaying hordes of demons!

Almost.
The Stronghinges of Three-Falls Lookout forgot to order supplies again! We need someone to hunt and gather to keep the place going.

Text_lang:
Welcome to tuskarr lands, dragonrider! This course is called the Iskaara Tour.

The course doesn't just give you a dragon's-eye view of Iskaara though.

It takes riders over furbolg, gorloc, and even ancient dragon territory.

Would you like to try it?
Text1_lang:
Welcome to tuskarr lands, dragonrider! This course is called the Iskaara Tour.

The course doesn't just give you a dragon's-eye view of Iskaara though.

 It takes riders over furbolg, gorloc, and even ancient dragon territory.

Would you like to try it?

Text_lang: What do ye need directions to?
Text1_lang: What do ye need directions to?

Text_lang: You face not Malchezaar alone, but the legions I command!
The air is so thin when we're this high up. I suppose dragons are accustomed to this sort of elevation.
Text1_lang: The air is so thin when we're this high up. I suppose dragons are accustomed to this sort of elevation.

Text_lang: I binged so much of that talbuk cheese last week that I got some stuck in my hair!
Text1_lang: I binged so much of that talbuk cheese last week that I got some stuck in my hair!

Text_lang: That salad was surprisingly hearty. I hear it gives you vision of the Emerald Dream while you're asleep too!
Text1_lang: That salad was surprisingly hearty. I hear it gives you vision of the Emerald Dream while you're asleep too!

Text_lang: Welcome back! Today's selection revolves around tea and features the brewed creations of Silverpine's own Alchemist Flemthroat!
So quick to presume the void's influence. Have you never wondered where exactly your Light might lead you? Are you certain you will like what lies at journey's end?

Text1_lang: I suppose only time will tell.
Your affinity warps your understanding, Ramaniel. The flow of time is akin to the Light itself. It is a central, singular truth that must be preserved against all threats.

Text_lang: That is not what they mean, Vekkalis.
Text1_lang: That is not what they mean, Vekkalis.
