Kul Tiras still bears the scars of the Third War. No one feels this more deeply than Katherine Proudmoore.
A few days later, he woke up screaming and drenched in sweat. Infection had eaten away at his insides. My friend never saw another sunrise.
Why would you help us?
I was in a battle many years ago. It was... the Second War? Tough to keep them all straight.
In unity, there is strength.
I see. Then we shall prove to Katherine Proudmoore the same truth that I learned at great cost...
By the time he asked for help, it was too late.
The land I love is falling apart... so I'm asking for your help. Kul Tiras needs the Alliance just as badly as you need us.
Katherine Proudmoore turned us away and had her own daughter cast out as a traitor.
Should have been his ticket home, but he was a stubborn one. Refused to leave before the war was won. So he patched himself up and told the healers he was fine.
But she is misguided. Her advisors have kept her blind to the infection that has spread throughout our kingdom.
Hmph... Humor an old knight for a moment, would you?
An orcish juggernaut struck our transport. Splinters from the gunnel ripped across the deck and tore into a friend of mine.

This place is steeped in magic. Can you feel it?

What kind of rituals were they doing here, I wonder?
Text1_lang:
This place is steeped in magic. Can you feel it?

What kind of rituals were they doing here, I wonder?
Sir! The situation report is ready!

Text_lang: Excellent. Hero, Taelia will get you up to speed.

Text1_lang: There's an old saying here in Kul Tiras.$B$BWhen something goes wrong, old sailors will shrug it off and proclaim: "You cannot change the winds."$B$BI hate that saying.

Text_lang: Krenzen sighs to himself.
Text1_lang: Krenzen sighs to himself.

Text_lang: I'll have to limit myself to three!
Text1_lang: I'll have to limit myself to three!

Text_lang: You're right, you're right. There's no way he would miss that many running around.
Text1_lang: You're right, you're right. There's no way he would miss that many running around.

Text_lang: Did you hit your head on the flight here? He'd have your scales for even trying that.
Text1_lang: Did you hit your head on the flight here? He'd have your scales for even trying that.

Text_lang: How many of these do you think I could sneak into our quarters before Azurathel noticed? Ten?
Text1_lang: How many of these do you think I could sneak into our quarters before Azurathel noticed? Ten?

Hey there, $n! Wherever you want to go, I can help you get there!

Time works in mysterious ways, but you don't look like a stranger to mystery.
If you find a powerful weapon, just make sure it isn't corrupted by the Burning Legion or Old Gods, okay?

Text_lang: I cannot find your papers, citizen.
I can help you over here, $n.
Stormwind appreciates your service!
Let's keep the show moving! The Great Akazamzarak appreciates your coin!
And now for my next trick! As you can see, there's nothing up my sleeve...
And... bam!
How are you so cute? Aspects, it's so soft and round I could molt!
Text1_lang: How are you so cute? Aspects, it's so soft and round I could molt!

Text_lang: Look at this thing!
Text1_lang: Look at this thing!

Text_lang: Indeed. I understand that the other races use similar creatures as hunting companions or guardians, but I have a hard time seeing the resemblance...
Text1_lang: Indeed. I understand that the other races use similar creatures as hunting companions or guardians, but I have a hard time seeing the resemblance...
You look quite prepared!

Text_lang: These great beasts know paths that ye can't find on foot, they'll get ye there fast and maybe show ye something new at the same time.
Text1_lang: These great beasts know paths that ye can't find on foot, they'll get ye there fast and maybe show ye something new at the same time.

Text_lang: Welcome to my Inn, weary traveler. What can I do for you?
Text1_lang: Welcome to my Inn, weary traveler. What can I do for you?

Text_lang: Will you do whatever it takes to save your kingdom?
Are you ready to fly? You'll have our fastest mount.
Step right up! Behold the amazing magical talents of the Great Akazamzarak!
Greetings, $n.

Text1_lang: Zaqali! Crush these puppets of the Aspects. I require every last suffused ingot and molded metal for our bargain with Fyrakk. Do not let these thieves interfere!

Text_lang: <Raw heat and shadowflame energies are suffusing the materials within. It would require special gems to survive interacting with such a furnace.>
Text1_lang: <Raw heat and shadowflame energies are suffusing the materials within. It would require special gems to survive interacting with such a furnace.>

Text_lang: <Raw heat and whispering darkness are suffusing the materials within this mold, shaping them into pieces that ripple with shadowflame. Only protections created by Fyrakk himself would allow one to interact with the materials within.>
Text1_lang: <Raw heat and whispering darkness are suffusing the materials within this mold, shaping them into pieces that ripple with shadowflame. Only protections created by Fyrakk himself would allow one to interact with the materials within.>
Master of the forge! Slay these lesser creatures yourself and recover what they have stolen!
Zaqali! You have been made to look weak! Do not make me send more of these soft Primalists to aid you.

Text_lang: <Three locks seal this shipment and require keys of metal folded with everburning flame. Wards cover this chest and will alert Fyrakk upon its opening.>
Text1_lang: <Three locks seal this shipment and require keys of metal folded with everburning flame. Wards cover this chest and will alert Fyrakk upon its opening.>

Text_lang: No! I meant about that amateur spell stick you shoved in its back.
I have strong reservations about this.
Why? This elemental can't feel it. It is like sheering a sheep. It probably would be thanking us if it could talk.
Iskaara! A cold place with a warm welcome. Try not to slip.
We'll be in Camp Antonidas in no time!

Text1_lang: The gnoll presence is a blight upon our lands, festering, growing... It is time we put an end to this.
Flames run wild.
Lava, surge!

Text_lang: Fall in ruin.

A Kilnmaster's work is never done, and he's always tired. Trust me.

So... what did you need, uplander?
Adventure awaits us! Just look at this big cave! I'm excited!
It seems Myrrit has left his backpack here in case you get separated. You find a small toy skunk inside with a nametag that says "Mr. Smelly".
Text1_lang: It seems Myrrit has left his backpack here in case you get separated. You find a small toy skunk inside with a nametag that says "Mr. Smelly".

Text_lang: It's a treasurewhiskers! They steal all sorts of things from us!
Two keys was no match for two great sniffenseekers like us!
You a hunter? I can fix up your beast-beasts quick!
The titan camp has had a contamination lockdown for many years. Rannan thinks you can find the contaminant and neutralize it. You should do that, but you must clear the area first!
What? Oh no... no, no no! Adventurers, the Sundered Flame are back! Quick! Get back to the platform!
I be da predator! You da prey...
Reekroot is one of the most sublime smellies out there! Our snifferscouts left scent trails where they planted them. Use this incense to follow the smells to the roots.
We request your assistance in cleansing the sulfur river. Put these creatures to rest.
A disgusting remnant of our past. Thank you for helping put them to rest.
These shadowflame elementals are threatening to spread their taint to the caverns at large. Stamp them out!
I appreciate the literal approach, soldier. Good work.

Text1_lang: Dargrul commits atrocities against even the wildlife, polluting our rivers with turtles twisted by his crystalline magic. Find the source of these powerful beasts.

Text_lang: Hurry, friends. Every moment we linger, Dargrul kills more of our allies.
My father's ancient lair. There is still power within these rocks that should not be disturbed.
That's got to be the biggest crystal hulk I've ever seen!
These drogbar have been tapping into abilities they should not possess. No doubt it has something to do with the latent power still lingering within these rocks.
Navarrogg?! Betrayer! You would lead these intruders against us?!
Dargrul cannot control the hammer, Ularogg! He will DESTROY Highmountain, not CONQUER it!
Either way, I will enjoy every moment of it. Rokmora, crush them!
Rok SMASH!
Rok shatter!
Nothing beat Rok!
Rok... no... break
They know we're coming now. I hope our allies can keep their main forces occupied long enough for us to complete our mission.
No, I won't be doing that. I will find my own path and rejoin you on the other side.
Quickly, into the barrels! I'll hold them here and join you down river!
The Underking uses slaves to dig at the bones of my father?! He does not know the powers he meddles with.
Please, you've already taken all the food we have.
Where are you hiding your food, maggot?!
Search everywhere! These peasants have been hiding rations from the army! If you're not fighting, you're not eating!
Pay attention, Navarogg. I want you to see your heroes die.
Go ahead and RUN. It will change nothing.
Highmountain itself rises against you!
Highmountain will be your tomb!
So this is what it feels like to break.
If they complete this summoning, our passage to Dargrul will be blocked!
Mother of Worms! Arise!
She comes! Naraxas will feast on your bones!
Yes! AHAHAHA! Wait-nooo! AAAHHHHHhhhhh!
There is no more time! We must strike at Dargrul now!
I am sorry, heroes. It appears the treasure you seek will be found on the "other" end of this beast.
The tauren believed YOU were prophesied to seize MY hammer? Pathetic.
Let them come! Witness the fate of those who stand against one WORTHY of wielding the power of a titan!
Rip them apart!
I am sorry heroes, I must leave you now. Yet know this, I have witnessed your deeds with pride and I am sure you will not fail Highmountain in this final hour.
Yes. TRY to take the hammer from me!
The mountain will gnaw on your bones!
The might of Khaz'goroth flows through ME!
I AM THE SHAPER AND FORGER OF THIS WORLD!
I will reforge this world as I see fit!
Tiny piddle, big puddle.
It is time to end this.
How is this possible?! I... I was chosen...
It's done, heroes. With Dargrul dead and the hammer reclaimed, the drogbar are broken. Now begins the long task of reuniting our tribes, but balance has returned to Highmountain.

The power of the mad king Dargrul is broken and Highmountain has you to thank, heroes. Now, there are other family matters that require my attention. Farewell, I hope when next we meet it is under more peaceful circumstances.
The hammer never chose you, Dargrul. It seeks a wielder who possesses true strength, and you were found lacking.

Text1_lang:
Oh wow, you're not dead! That's so cool!

<Lindormi's eyes light up with admiration>

Do you... maybe need help with your keystone?
The nesting in this area is too dense. The land cannot sustain all these creatures. Clear some out.

Tales of adventure are the best! Dark dungeons, terrifying monsters, shiny treasures... I want to hear all about them!

If you promise to bring back a good story, I might even let you borrow a keystone.
Here, give this one a try!
Know my hunger!

Text_lang:
I may reshape your flesh if you so desire. 

Be aware that you will not be able to be changed in this manner for a time afterwards, and your mind may never be the same.

How may this one serve?
Rise, my soldiers! Rise and fight once more!
Die, trespasser!

Text1_lang: Can you handle this?

Text_lang: The Qalash... will... blaze bright...
A lucky step!

Text1_lang: This ends NOW!

Text_lang: Another trophy for my wall!

Text1_lang: Really...? Is that all you've got?
You be blockin' my sun!

Don' be so serious!

Put down some bait and let dem come to you!

Text_lang: Deep in their fortress, the djaradin force the creatures of this land into their twisted servitude. Put an end to these horrors.
How fares the hunt? Or have you come for lesser concerns?

Respect, above all else, respect.

This creature gave you its life.

Start with respect, follow with care, and let nothing go to waste.

Text1_lang: Great fish gather in droves! Go. Gather meat for us and bring back stories of your exploits!

Text_lang: Um... Excuse me... My drum isn't working. Can you fix it please?
Text1_lang: Um... Excuse me... My drum isn't working. Can you fix it please?

Text_lang:
<After inspecting the drum, you conclude a simple re-attachment of the hide will suffice. However, you note several three-toed footprints of dirt on the hide. 

You suspect Raq has a unique method of playing this drum.>
Text1_lang:
<After inspecting the drum, you conclude a simple re-attachment of the hide will suffice. However, you note several three-toed footprints of dirt on the hide. 

You suspect Raq has a unique method of playing this drum.>

Text_lang:
The migrating ducks spoke of soup in the Azure Span. I had to see for myself. For you see... I love soup. Some call me Great Drinker of Soups.

Too much fish in this soup, though. Not enough vegetables.
Looks like some of my ottuks have taken a shine to you, already! I hope I can entrust one with you someday. They are lifelong companions.
Text1_lang: Looks like some of my ottuks have taken a shine to you, already! I hope I can entrust one with you someday. They are lifelong companions.

Text_lang: Hello outsider, how can I assist you with your animal companions?
Oh hello again, friend! While I prefer the topic of gnolls, if you want to discuss the different forms I've studied that dragons such as your companion can take, I'm the tuskarr for you.

Hello again, traveler. Bring any news from afar? 

I'll have you know my ecological research is not limited to gnolls. I also take a keen interest in dragons, and their many forms. 

Feel free to come and chat with me about them any time.
I specialize in armor for your wrists and shoulders. Seek out Lontupit and Omapurita for other kinds.
Text1_lang: I specialize in armor for your wrists and shoulders. Seek out Lontupit and Omapurita for other kinds.

Text_lang:
Anything I can do for you, friend? 

Arv and I make many wares you may find useful.
Text1_lang:
Anything I can do for you, friend? 

Arv and I make many wares you may find useful.

Text_lang:
The bubbling pot of soup stands before you, its aroma getting better by the minute. Big Kinook has offered you the rare opportunity to taste this soup before it's finished. 

You'd better not mess this up.
Text1_lang:
The bubbling pot of soup stands before you, its aroma getting better by the minute. Big Kinook has offered you the rare opportunity to taste this soup before it's finished. 

You'd better not mess this up.

Text_lang:
Instantaneously, your mouth is coated with the richest, fishiest broth you have ever experienced. Flavors you once thought impossible are revealed to you as the unctuous bits of ocean critter sail past your tongue. You dream of the sea, of your childhood, and of Azeroth's future all at once.

Yeah. It's pretty good.
Text1_lang:
Instantaneously, your mouth is coated with the richest, fishiest broth you have ever experienced. Flavors you once thought impossible are revealed to you as the unctuous bits of ocean critter sail past your tongue. You dream of the sea, of your childhood, and of Azeroth's future all at once.

Yeah. It's pretty good.

Text_lang: I'm always here to help any crafter. Come to me if you'd like to learn new recipes.
Text1_lang: I'm always here to help any crafter. Come to me if you'd like to learn new recipes.

Text_lang:
We tuskarr here in Iskaara have been gathering and crafting what we need to survive for generations. 

I am the keeper of that knowledge, for this generation. 

What would you like to learn? Or perhaps you are here to share your own skills?
Text1_lang:
We tuskarr here in Iskaara have been gathering and crafting what we need to survive for generations. 

I am the keeper of that knowledge, for this generation. 

What would you like to learn? Or perhaps you are here to share your own skills?

Text_lang: From a distance, Tuuku sat and watched one foolish tuskarr observe this shell in the wild.
Text1_lang: From a distance, Tuuku sat and watched one foolish tuskarr observe this shell in the wild.

Text_lang: Tuuku fashioned some fake legs for it and his tribe said it looked real.
Text1_lang: Tuuku fashioned some fake legs for it and his tribe said it looked real.

Text_lang: Tuuku decided to place it in the forest near a river to see if his work could fool an unsuspecting traveler.
Text1_lang: Tuuku decided to place it in the forest near a river to see if his work could fool an unsuspecting traveler.

Text_lang: Tuuku bragged about his clever ploy. We listened to his tale, but felt he wasted his time on a prank that brought joy to no one.
Text1_lang: Tuuku bragged about his clever ploy. We listened to his tale, but felt he wasted his time on a prank that brought joy to no one.

Text_lang: Long ago, a tuskarr named Tuuku from a village not too far from here found an empty turtle shell.
Text1_lang: Long ago, a tuskarr named Tuuku from a village not too far from here found an empty turtle shell.

Text_lang: When the observer slept, Tuuku would move the shell a few feet.
Text1_lang: When the observer slept, Tuuku would move the shell a few feet.

Text_lang: This went on for months, when suddenly Tuuku returned to the village. The turtle was gone.
Text1_lang: This went on for months, when suddenly Tuuku returned to the village. The turtle was gone.

Text_lang: I will thank you then, Allis.
You do not need to thank me.
Save your strength.
T-t-thank you, Scaletender.
Text1_lang: T-t-thank you, Scaletender.

Text_lang: You'd be surprised at what kind of hides you can tan down here!
*Sniff* *Sniff* *SNIFF* *SNIIFFFFF*
Ah, bragging rights. I am familiar with this. I can see why this place would be on your list. There are certainly dangerous creatures around it.
Perisimona, have you been out to these ruins before?
I did not! I just was done proving myself! But, I heard that tale too, so it could be true...
The dash?

Text1_lang: Ha! It's not a challenge because of the animals, it's because of the ghost of Drekazera.
Yeah, tell him Tuberros. You should also tell him why you only ran four dashes before these new times.
The smell here will take some getting used to.
Well met, $p. What business do you have with the Artisan's Consortium?
Something has stirred the creatures of this area. Hold them off!
We're drawing close to the end of our hunt! Blow the horn to signal the other hunters!
Well done, for a two-foot. This area needs to renew, but there are more places ripe for hunting. The Shikaar will seek out new grounds.

Text_lang: Drogbar snails make wonderful smells when they eat a lot. Go feed the snails for them, and get ambergrease for me! It's a win-win!

Let's show the Sundered Flame that they can't take the Cobalt Assembly away from us!

I can help you master the wild arcana that's surging through the area.
Heleth! I think that's one of those bad guys!
Text1_lang: Heleth! I think that's one of those bad guys!

Text_lang: Don't matter, Nezzie! Remember our motto! "Help's on the way, because help's our way!"
Text1_lang: Don't matter, Nezzie! Remember our motto! "Help's on the way, because help's our way!"

Text_lang: Don't worry, Nezzie! Even if he wakes up, he'll never get past these claws!
Text1_lang: Don't worry, Nezzie! Even if he wakes up, he'll never get past these claws!

Text_lang: Uh oh, Heleth! I think he just moved!
Text1_lang: Uh oh, Heleth! I think he just moved!

Text_lang: Yeah! We're gonna help you by giving you some tea! Doesn't that sound nice? Come and have a tea party!
Text1_lang: Yeah! We're gonna help you by giving you some tea! Doesn't that sound nice? Come and have a tea party!

Text_lang: ... I... Okay.
Text1_lang: ... I... Okay.

Text_lang: Nuh-uh! That's not how this works! You're our guest now, so you have to play by our rules! You have to let us help you!
Text1_lang: Nuh-uh! That's not how this works! You're our guest now, so you have to play by our rules! You have to let us help you!

Text_lang: Ugh, I... wait, my mission! You all, give up your secrets! I know there's arcane power stashed up here somewhere!
Text1_lang: Ugh, I... wait, my mission! You all, give up your secrets! I know there's arcane power stashed up here somewhere!

Text_lang: W-what? That doesn't... Are you going to help me or not?
Text1_lang: W-what? That doesn't... Are you going to help me or not?

Text_lang: Venderthvan eyes you warily.
Text1_lang: Venderthvan eyes you warily.

Text_lang:
<Venderthvan looks around in confusion.>

What is happening? 

What are these kids doing up here alone? Where are their parents?

<Venderthvan blinks at you.>

You do realize we are not on the same side here, right?
Text1_lang:
<Venderthvan looks around in confusion.>

What is happening? 

What are these kids doing up here alone? Where are their parents?

<Venderthvan blinks at you.>

You do realize we are not on the same side here, right?

Text_lang: It's not even safe in the central camp. Sometimes your friends charge there, too. But we didn't want to go far, so we promised SUPER hard to be EXTRA careful on top of this tower!
Text1_lang: It's not even safe in the central camp. Sometimes your friends charge there, too. But we didn't want to go far, so we promised SUPER hard to be EXTRA careful on top of this tower!

Text_lang: All the adults, like our parents, have to fight the bad guys like you to get our home back in the assembly!
Text1_lang: All the adults, like our parents, have to fight the bad guys like you to get our home back in the assembly!

Text_lang: Okay, I get it. I was sent up here to "take care of" whatever is up here. But as far as I'm concerned, that never involved kids.
Text1_lang: Okay, I get it. I was sent up here to "take care of" whatever is up here. But as far as I'm concerned, that never involved kids.

Text_lang: Look, Taran was going on about some artifact up here that will stabilize the wild arcana, or something. If you're going to "help", find it, I guess?
Text1_lang: Look, Taran was going on about some artifact up here that will stabilize the wild arcana, or something. If you're going to "help", find it, I guess?

Text_lang: What--what are you kids even doing up here alone, anyway? It isn't safe.
Text1_lang: What--what are you kids even doing up here alone, anyway? It isn't safe.

Text_lang: <The jar is covered in dust, but sparkles faintly. You sense an energy humming within.>
Text1_lang: <The jar is covered in dust, but sparkles faintly. You sense an energy humming within.>

Text_lang: Ah, a rune! Quickly, trace it to activate the magic!
Text1_lang: Ah, a rune! Quickly, trace it to activate the magic!

Text_lang: Whoa, pretty!
Text1_lang: Whoa, pretty!

Text_lang: Oh. So you just... walk on them. Huh.
Okay, why?
Text1_lang: Okay, why?

Text_lang: Why?
Text1_lang: Why?

Text_lang: Er... so we can reclaim what is owed to us. The dracthyr deserve these lands.
Text1_lang: Er... so we can reclaim what is owed to us. The dracthyr deserve these lands.

Text_lang: Why?
Text1_lang: Why?

Text_lang: Because... because, I mean, we're here, too. We didn't want to get locked up in stasis and all...
Text1_lang: Because... because, I mean, we're here, too. We didn't want to get locked up in stasis and all...

Text_lang: Did you see? It branched off into other runes! Go trace those, too!
Text1_lang: Did you see? It branched off into other runes! Go trace those, too!

Text_lang: Why you gotta follow the glowy lights?
Text1_lang: Why you gotta follow the glowy lights?

Text_lang: Because that should activate the power to stabilize arcana.
Text1_lang: Because that should activate the power to stabilize arcana.

Text_lang: Uh, Taran said it's so we can control the arcana and gain more power for the Sundered Flame.
Text1_lang: Uh, Taran said it's so we can control the arcana and gain more power for the Sundered Flame.

Text_lang: You were locked up? That sucks!
Text1_lang: You were locked up? That sucks!

Text_lang: And if these younglings are alone here because of me and my comrades... Well, I know that doesn't feel right.
Text1_lang: And if these younglings are alone here because of me and my comrades... Well, I know that doesn't feel right.

Text_lang: To be honest, the Sundered Flame...
Text1_lang: To be honest, the Sundered Flame...

Text_lang: I will stay and watch over these younglings, at least until their families return and the Assembly is safe again. It feels odd to ask, $r, but please, do what you must to stop my creche mates.
Text1_lang: I will stay and watch over these younglings, at least until their families return and the Assembly is safe again. It feels odd to ask, $r, but please, do what you must to stop my creche mates.

Text_lang: I wish there was a way to make my creche mates stop this madness. But I know there isn't. They've gone too far, seeking power. They'll never listen.
Text1_lang: I wish there was a way to make my creche mates stop this madness. But I know there isn't. They've gone too far, seeking power. They'll never listen.

Text_lang: Yay! Vendie will stay and play with us!
Text1_lang: Yay! Vendie will stay and play with us!

Text_lang: Well, Taran and the others were passionate about Sarkareth's mission. I never quite understood it, but they were my creche mates.
Text1_lang: Well, Taran and the others were passionate about Sarkareth's mission. I never quite understood it, but they were my creche mates.
This area is rich with resources. Collect them!
The dead cry for solace. Their anguish echoes on the wind.

Text_lang: You should receive a pack of incendiary bombs from Erozion before I fly you to Durnholde. You wouldn't want to waste time, after all.

You must use the incendiary bombs at the barrels inside the internment lodges of Durnholde Keep. Once five bombs have been ignited and the diversion has been set, find Thrall in the basement prison of Durnholde and set him free. Follow him and make sure that he does not die!$B$BBrazen will fly you to Durnholde when you are ready.
I can take you to Durnholde directly, if that is your wish.
Who are you?  Just leave me be.

Text1_lang: The local moths produce the sparkliest, stickiest glitter. If you see any floating around, run through it and bring it back to me!

Text_lang: Look how shiny those snail shells are! If you could convince a few to look for new lodging, they'd make a perfect gift for Perisimona!
A swarm of moths is drawing near the central beacon, blocking the light we use to navigate. Mount up and knock them from the skies!
Excellent work, soldier. I can see your results from here.

Ah, an intrepid racer!

Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to race the Brimstone Scramble and get a drake's eye view of the battlefield below!

This course takes racers on a quick reconnaissance survey of Obsidian Rest, the Brimstone Garrison, and Aberrus itself!

As always, watch out for lava, and keep an eye on anyone who looks suspicious.

Are you ready to fly this dangerous mission? I mean... race?
Text1_lang:
Ah, an intrepid racer!

Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to race the Brimstone Scramble and get a drake's eye view of the battlefield below!

This course takes racers on a quick reconnaissance survey of Obsidian Rest, the Brimstone Garrison, and Aberrus itself!

As always, watch out for lava, and keep an eye on anyone who looks suspicious.

Are you ready to fly this dangerous mission? I mean... race?

Text_lang: There's isolated seismic activity in this area... which is a convenient way to collect crystal samples! Catch some before they shatter!
What? It's not my fault if you didn't have a helmet on!
Ooh, the slime makes them extra shiny!

Text1_lang: You look absolutely fabulous! I'm so jealous!

Text_lang: I call to the water's fury! Rise, and drown our enemies!
Oh, this is very good! So fragrant! Thank you, friend!
Huh. Well, looks like the djaradin used this wall as target practice. Get their stuff and get out!
Nice job! No djaradin showed up, right?

I have all the tools necessary to adjust the appearance of your weapons and armor.

Shall we begin?

Enjoying the festival, $c?$b$bWhile the Flame Wardens tend to the fires of the present, I am more of a historian, keeping close the festivals past. I'm also, of course, documenting this year's festivities. Things are going well thus far, don't you think?$b$bYou know, $n, there is power inherent in all festival fires burning throughout the holiday. We're taking care of ours, but I'm certain there are sacred flames burning deep within our enemy's cities...
Text1_lang: Enjoying the festival, $c?$b$bWhile the Flame Wardens tend to the fires of the present, I am more of a historian, keeping close the festivals past. I'm also, of course, documenting this year's festivities. Things are going well thus far, don't you think?$b$bYou know, $n, there is power inherent in all festival fires burning throughout the holiday. We're taking care of ours, but I'm certain there are sacred flames burning deep within our enemy's cities...

Text_lang: He gestured to the waters. Within a moment, Sikrar emerged, belly up, bleeding from harpoon and spear. The creature was dead.
Text1_lang: He gestured to the waters. Within a moment, Sikrar emerged, belly up, bleeding from harpoon and spear. The creature was dead.

Text_lang: There once was a beast known as Sikrar, made of tentacles and teeth and all things wretched. It hunted our fishermen relentlessly, dragging boats into the depths with a single, silent strike.
Text1_lang: There once was a beast known as Sikrar, made of tentacles and teeth and all things wretched. It hunted our fishermen relentlessly, dragging boats into the depths with a single, silent strike.

Text_lang: When finally it appeared, they threw all they had at it! Nets, harpoons, spears--and they struck true!
Text1_lang: When finally it appeared, they threw all they had at it! Nets, harpoons, spears-- and they struck true!

Text_lang: Rulaq shook his head. "It is more important that you can return to your families at all. For look-"
Text1_lang: Rulaq shook his head. "It is more important that you can return to your families at all. For look-"

Text_lang: But Sikrar was not felled! It roared in fury and PULLED! The lines went taught, and threatened to capsize the boat!
Text1_lang: But Sikrar was not felled! It roared in fury and PULLED! The lines went taught, and threatened to capsize the boat!

Text_lang: One day, the great harpooner Rulaq set out with his crew to finally put an end to the beast. For weeks, they sailed the bitter cold, tracking the monster.
Text1_lang: One day, the great harpooner Rulaq set out with his crew to finally put an end to the beast. For weeks, they sailed the bitter cold, tracking the monster.

Text_lang: The crew was awed by Rulaq's wisdom. For he had the eye to see the beast was dead, and the speed to save his people. "Even if it weren't dead," continued Rulaq "have patience. There will be more chances to strike a beast down. But not always the to return home to share the kill with your family."
Text1_lang: The crew was awed by Rulaq's wisdom. For he had the eye to see the beast was dead, and the speed to save his people. "Even if it weren't dead," continued Rulaq "have patience. There will be more chances to strike a beast down. But not always the to return home to share the kill with your family."

Text_lang: In a flash, Rulaq cut the lines, saving his crew. But the crew looked to him, aghast! "Now it shall escape, and continue to kill our families!"
Text1_lang: In a flash, Rulaq cut the lines, saving his crew. But the crew looked to him, aghast! "Now it shall escape, and continue to kill our families!"
I hope you enjoyed your time living in the past, but we need you back in the present $n!
The future of Azeroth needs you to protect it, $n!
Take care of yourself out there.

Text_lang: Meet me in Stormwind, where I shall present the Aspects' invitation to the Alliance.
Heroes of the Alliance! The Dragon Isles have awakened and beckon the dragonflights home.
Absolutely! We have a few available. Please see if ye think any would fit yer home.
Yer going to try to surprise the SI:7 spy master with a purchase ye made in Stormwind? Hah! Good luck!
Oh no, I can't say I was here. He's wanted a pet for ages, although he'll never admit it. I'm going to surprise him!
Thanks, I'll have a look around.
Hey, Wilder... I was wondering if you had any pets for adoption? Shaw has been overworked recently, and I wanted to get him something that would help him unwind.
Hey, I've trained with SI:7! I can be sneaky!
And please pass on my regards to Master Shaw.

Text1_lang: The beast ahead will threaten all who enter Thaldraszus if not stopped. Aid us in this fight!
Those tarasek have made off with our supplies. Get 'em back!
Do what must be done to prepare them. Our combined forces will meet outside Nokhudon Hold. I will await you there.
Time grows short. Ride the winds of Ohn'ahra's fury to reach them quickly.
The Teerai, Shikaar and Ohn'ir clans must rally to free her and defeat Balakar Khan.
Good. You are here.
I welcome Ohn'ahra's rage. When the winds are still, I will suspect the worst.

Text_lang: I can spare no hunters for the Khanam Matra now.
The proto-dragon, Granyth, was nearly in our grasp when Balakar's warriors ambushed us.
We must retake our weapons of war and drive the Nokhud back.
When Granyth's blood soaks the ground, our purposes can align.

Text1_lang: Let fly!

Text_lang: Well done, keep retaking the weapons! Two more remain!
Nearly there! See to the final weapon!
The battle has turned! The weapons are ours!
Granyth has landed! Strike now!
Worthless! I will dispose of the outsiders myself!
Your sky darkens.
Die! This land is mine!
Tremble before primal power!

Text1_lang: Ready to fire!

Text_lang: Incarnates... save... me...

Text1_lang: Clan Nokhud has used Ohn'ahra's song to conjure an avatar of the storm. Blasphemy.
The storm must be quieted, and the elemental within it defeated, before Clan Ohn'ir can join the Khanam Matra.
Their Primalist allies have placed totems that protect this raging tempest. Find them, and destroy them.
Truly a blasphemous idol. Continue your work.
The Primalists' power weakens.
One more totem! Quickly!
The final totem crumbles. Now take down the avatar of the storm!
Fly, Outsider. Balakar's power grows.
Today, we use Ohn'ahra's gifts to free her. We will journey to Nokhudon Hold.

Text_lang: Clan Uhkel has allied with Clan Nokhud. Today, they will regret that alliance.
They have desecrated the graves of our first ancestors, Teera and Maruuk.
Destroy these graverobbers, and return our ancestors to their rest, before they are forced to fight in Balakar's name.
The first ancestors... shall rise...
Text1_lang: The first ancestors... shall rise...

Text_lang: I am the messenger of death.
Text1_lang: I am the messenger of death.

Text_lang: Raise... raise me... again...
Text1_lang: Raise... raise me... again...
Why has our rest been disturbed?
Necromancers? On our sacred grounds?

Text_lang: This is what has become of our legacy?
Flee before me!

Text1_lang: The wind guides my arrows.

Text_lang: Peace... at last...

Text1_lang: Protect... my children...

Text_lang: Balakar Khan is beyond mercy. Clan Teerai will join our khan at Nokhudon Hold.
Shikaar! Follow the thunder of your Khan's attack!

Text1_lang: Ohn'ir! The wind mother calls us to war!
Daughters and sons of Teera! Charge!
Centaur! Stomp your hooves! Blow your horns! Let the rage of Ohn'ahra guide you!

Text_lang: My storm will bring forth a mightier Maruuk. Greatness awaits us!
Ha! I will use Ohn'ahra's power for more than breezes and blessings.
Your skulls will shatter beneath my hooves!
Slashed and skewered!
The weak must die.
If the Eagle Mother will not gift me her power, I will take it.
This land is our birthright!
Thunder and lightning! The true power of Ohn'ahra!
Ancestors... ancestors forgive... me...

Greetings, dragonrider.

The course laid out before you is called the Tyrhold Trial. Dragonriders fly with their drake above the Passage of Time and around the grounds of Tyrhold.

And while you're aloft, remember... This land is the home of dragons! You and your drake may find some helpful magic along the way!

What say you? Care to try the Tyrhold Trial?
Text1_lang:
Greetings, dragonrider.

The course laid out before you is called the Tyrhold Trial. Dragonriders fly with their drake above the Passage of Time and around the grounds of Tyrhold.

And while you're aloft, remember... This land is the home of dragons! You and your drake may find some helpful magic along the way!

What say you? Care to try the Tyrhold Trial?

Text_lang: No! I cannot... face my ancestors...
Text1_lang: No! I cannot... face my ancestors...

Text_lang: I will stomp on your grave.
Text1_lang: I will stomp on your grave.

Text_lang: You shall pay for this blasphemy with your lives.
Fear my wrath!

Text1_lang: He will not take a place of honor with the ancestor khans.
Balakar's weapon will be broken.
My thanks, Outsider. Ohn'ahra now flies free, and without Balakar's influence, Clan Nokhud may heal.
I'm a simple lass. I see a wall, and I want it climbed. Go on, then!

Text_lang: You would look quite fetching doing this with a top hat on.

Text1_lang: Fine work! We'll see if we cannae put those materials ta good use.

Text_lang:
Brr! G-greetings, dragonrider!

This c-course is called the Vakthros Ah-ah-

<The Bronze Timekeeper sneezes loudly>

Excuse me! Vakthros Ascent. It t-takes riders across the F-f-rostlands and up and over Vakthros's s-summit.

D-do you want to t-try it?
Text1_lang:
Brr! G-greetings, dragonrider!

This c-course is called the Vakthros Ah-ah-

<The Bronze Timekeeper sneezes loudly>

Excuse me! Vakthros Ascent. It t-takes riders across the F-f-rostlands and up and over Vakthros's s-summit.

D-do you want to t-try it?
These ruins are teeming with magic ley lines. We must gather all the energy we can for our studies.

Text_lang:
Welcome, dragonrider, to a course as fast as the rapids themselves.

The River Rapids Route follows the course of the nearby river through its rapids and up and down its many waterfalls.

Do you think you have what it takes to master it?
Text1_lang:
Welcome, dragonrider, to a course as fast as the rapids themselves.

The River Rapids Route follows the course of the nearby river through its rapids and up and down its many waterfalls.

Do you think you have what it takes to master it?
Part of the joy of exploring is documenting our finds. There's plenty to document here in the Waking Shores.

Text_lang:
Welcome to the Emberflow Flight, dragonrider!

There's no course like the Emberflow. The lava falls on its route are dangerous, but they also have a sublime beauty...

Would you like to try this course?
Text1_lang:
Welcome to the Emberflow Flight, dragonrider!

There's no course like the Emberflow. The lava falls on its route are dangerous, but they also have a sublime beauty...

Would you like to try this course?

Text_lang: Pleasant day to you.
The old dragon who sat by the ledge? He took off a while ago and headed south.

Text1_lang: Choke on smoke and ash!
Your end comes... soon...
Serve Azshara, puppets, and rejoice.

Text_lang: I smell Daffydil and Melati. They're sniffenseekers too! Do you see them?

Text1_lang: Eeeeeeeeee!

Text_lang: $n, let's see if Daffydil has any more information for us.

Text1_lang: Watch out, there's monsters lurking. One of them stole my key right out of my claws!

Text_lang: I smell something briny over here...
I'm glad my nose came in handy.

Text1_lang: This giant is a plague upon the land. Bring it down!

Text_lang: The black dragonflight asked us to help with retrieving some artifacts. Get your gear on and scale that cliff!
Great job! Maybe we can, uh, ask to borrow just a few of them for study... Just a few... not... all of them.

Text1_lang: Die beneath the ice.
Cowards! You pack of weakling... dogs...
Soon our Elder will be free and dragons will pay the price.
The Elder... will avenge me...

Text_lang:
Helllo $p, nice to see you again. 

I went to Valdrakken to find Ebyssian, but it turns out he had already left, so I came here for the view instead. 

Do you want to stay a while?
Veritistrasz sighs
What is it? Is it a weapon? Is it an ancient artifact that will help my flight defend dragonkind?
I would be happy to have a look for you.
Oh... Well, it is still a piece of history I guess. How did it work?
I will show you if you promise to slow down.
Incredible! We will be able to tap into the ancient knowledge's and utilize it to help our whelps grow!
Thank you! It is quite exciting, you see here, clear black dragon design, and it was in Neltharion's vault so likely very old!
Hmm. This is surprising, I have not seen one of these in thousands of years.
It is an egg tending device.
Oh... no, this is obsolete. We had even moved away from using this before we left the Dragon Isles. We have much better tools for it now.
Beautiful, darling, just beautiful!
Text1_lang: Beautiful, darling, just beautiful!
According to my notes, there should be some unique artifacts in this area. Search the upper areas here while my team scouts below.
Yes, this is it! Thank you, I will have these documented right away.

Text_lang:
Dragonrider!

Good to see someone has made it here to my perch!

This course is called the Academy Ascent. It takes you all around the majestic grounds of the Algeth'ar Academy.

And, as this is a place once home to dragons, there's a little magic here and there to help you stay aloft.

Just... don't look down.

Are you and your drake ready, dragonrider?
Text1_lang:
Dragonrider!

Good to see someone has made it here to my perch!

This course is called the Academy Ascent. It takes you all around the majestic grounds of the Algeth'ar Academy.

And, as this is a place once home to dragons, there's a little magic here and there to help you stay aloft.

Just... don't look down.

Are you and your drake ready, dragonrider?

Text_lang:
Greetings, dragonrider!

This course is the Flashfrost Flyover. It's route is like a flight through four seasons with fall leaves, snow, and spring flowers along your path.

You won't see any of it though if you're racing right! Ha ha ha!

What do you say? Up for a race?
Text1_lang:
Greetings, dragonrider!

This course is the Flashfrost Flyover. It's route is like a flight through four seasons with fall leaves, snow, and spring flowers along your path.

You won't see any of it though if you're racing right! Ha ha ha!

What do you say? Up for a race?
A threat against these lands is a threat against our queen. Remove them and restore the order.

Text_lang: Welcome one and all to the Fields of Ferocity! A new band of competitors has dared to test their honor and lives in the ring!
Really? Place my bet for Maneet then. Round one, fight!
For their first round our hosts have hunted up something truly terrifying. From the depths of the Emerald Swamps our wannabe fighters will be facing...
Seriously? Why does this always happen to me?
A river beast.

Text1_lang: They kill more centaurs than any other creature on the plains.

Text_lang: Amaa, you know your beast lore! That was one terrifying, now deceased, hippo.
Round one goes to our newest fighters! Hopefully they're prepared for their next round.
For this next round, our climbing competitors face off against two draconic champions armed to the teeth!

Text1_lang: I am constantly in awe of the Ohn'ahran Plains.
%s takes a deep breath.
And off we go...
I think Coralie will be happy with your pictures. Let's head back.
I'll add these photos to our collection. You can never have too many pictures from the Ohn'ahran Plains!

Text_lang: Yeesh, okay then. Round five, fight!
This one is going to be a good one. This powerhouse muscled into this competition not for honor, but for revenge!

Text1_lang: And you should show no mercy for the fool in return.

Text_lang: Powered by the elements, this drake certainly packs a punch. They have vowed to show no mercy to defenders of the Aspects!
The day has come--let us take back our home!
Leave me to my grief!

Dragonrider! Hello! 

Welcome to the Emerald Gardens Ascent Course.

It's called an "ascent" because your drake must swiftly climb to the heavens to begin this course.

From there, you and your drake will fly through one of the most verdant gardens in the Dragon Isles.

What do you say? Would you like to try the course?
Text1_lang:
Dragonrider! Hello! 

Welcome to the Emerald Gardens Ascent Course.

It's called an "ascent" because your drake must swiftly climb to the heavens to begin this course.

From there, you and your drake will fly through one of the most verdant gardens in the Dragon Isles.

What do you say? Would you like to try the course?

Text_lang:
Dragonrider! 

Welcome to the Azure Span Slalom.

This course takes you over, around, and through the dense forests, rugged terrain, and ancient ruins in this region.

Are you ready to ride?
Text1_lang:
Dragonrider! 

Welcome to the Azure Span Slalom.

This course takes you over, around, and through the dense forests, rugged terrain, and ancient ruins in this region.

Are you ready to ride?

Text_lang: Ha! There we go--speed that'll last all day! Wonderful!
I don't see what all the fuss is about...
Hmm. They look like regular drums.
Hmm. If I add these Deepstrider hides here...
Oh! Oh my gosh! What a burst of speed!
But too short--and too tired after! No good for working all day!
And do this... Attach this here...
I see some pressure plates... but there's only one of me! What do we do?
Oh wait...
Do you smell that?
It's ALIVE!
The door's opening! Let's go take a peek behind it!
I've never seen treasures come to life to defend themselves! What an adventure, $n!

Welcome to Loamm!

The niffen have given us special permission to put a racecourse near their home!

They call it the Loamm Roamm. It's a quick, meandering course that takes you through all of the niffen's favorite places.

Would you like to try it?
Text1_lang:
Welcome to Loamm!

The niffen have given us special permission to put a racecourse near their home!

They call it the Loamm Roamm. It's a quick, meandering course that takes you through all of the niffen's favorite places.

Would you like to try it?
Oh my! This place is overrun with giant snakes. I don't know how they do things in the uplands, but we chuck stink bombs at the parents, and then go right for the eggs.

Text_lang: Oh! It seems the Catalogers have come to document the creatures of Zaralek Cavern. Care for a ride down the river?
A Primalist is rousing the elements in the caldera. It would be a shame if someone turned their own power against them, wouldn't it?

Text1_lang: Ever since the Primalists came to the plains, it's as if the elements themselves are thrown into chaos. Help return the land back to its natural state.
The magic surrounding this area has gone wild. This untamed instability is a threat to our allies. Do what you can to restore order.

Text_lang: OK Zogi! Do you want to play with me?
Text1_lang: OK Zogi! Do you want to play with me?

Text_lang: Child, you be worst to ma health than da decay!
Text1_lang: Child, you be worst to ma health than da decay!

Text_lang: What? How you be getting to Zogi?
Text1_lang: What? How you be getting to Zogi?

Text_lang: Hey Wogi, I have a question!
Text1_lang: Hey Wogi, I have a question!

Text_lang: Name is Zon'Wogi, Child! Zon'Wogi!
Text1_lang: Name is Zon'Wogi, Child! Zon'Wogi!

Text_lang: What?
Text1_lang: What?
On behalf of Alexstrasza, I thank you for your efforts today champion.
The road is clear! You did good work, uplander. And with such a bad sniffer, you aren't bothered by how bad you smell.

Text_lang: Well done! These critters are a bit too vicious for my tastes, but I'm sure Coralie will be happy.
A perfect fit!
This is exciting!
It's so glowy.
What do we do? Touch the statue? I'm nervous, $n!

Text1_lang: You meddle with what you know naught.

Text_lang: Good job with that guardian. I thought it was going to hurt us, but then I remembered how powerful you are!
If they play with fire, they should expect to get burned.
Hush, lovie. Not yet. Soon.
Text1_lang: Hush, lovie. Not yet. Soon.

Text_lang: Ma, can we go home yet?
Text1_lang: Ma, can we go home yet?

Text_lang:
Not today!

They want to raise our land? Warp our resources? Strip our very world of its nature?

Not today!
Disciple! Show them only hatred! Recover my ingots from their ashes!
Im'bunata growls.
Text1_lang: Im'bunata growls.

Text_lang: Do what you will... you will never get the tuskarr OR the elemental spirits of Imbu to join you!
Text1_lang: Do what you will... you will never get the tuskarr OR the elemental spirits of Imbu to join you!
Cleansing flame!
Surrender to terror!
Such sweet suffering.
I still hunger.

Text_lang: Shadow spreads.
Return to shadow.
Flicker into nothing.

Text1_lang: Molten destruction.

Text_lang: Gloom advances.
Shadows erupt!
We are unstoppable.
A pitiful attempt.
No power can overcome us.
Da sands will consume everyting!
Mmm... time to make my move!
I have pets -- ca-caw! -- of my own!
Nice pets have weapons. No so -- ra-ak -- nice.
Nice pets, yes... raa-a-ak!

Text1_lang: Alythess! Your fire burns within me!

Text_lang: Mmmm... be free. Caw!
The doctor is in!
Text1_lang: The doctor is in!

Text_lang: The Legion's presence has stirred an ancient hydra known as Deepmaw. Destroy this creature before its wrath is unleashed upon our world.
Quickly, bolster our ranks! We must push through!
Yes! Let them come! Their bodies will fuel the flames of their burning world!
Leave none standing! If we fail here, Azeroth burns.
Fall back!
Intruders! Killing you will regain my master's favor!
I will delight in your suffering!
More... agony... to come...
Few understood my use of the naga to obtain the Eye of Sargeras, but it was a necessary tactic to secure the future of Azeroth. Let nothing stop you from doing what needs to be done!
The echo of the Guardian Aegwynn appears, just as she did in the cathedral.
Then we have no time to lose.

Text1_lang: I sealed each level of this temple so that no invader could descend into its depths. I never anticipated that the Legion would find another way to breach its dark heart.

I can sense one of the Legion's masters working to reanimate the Avatar of Sargeras. Should Kil'jaeden infuse that husk with the Dark Titan's power, I do not know whether any force on this world can stop it.
My protective wards now bar your way. Each seal can only be opened with one of the Pillars of Creation. Be warned: the demons will stop at nothing to prevent your advance.

Text_lang: Heroes, the paths are open. Use the Pillars of Creation to bypass Aegwynn's wards before the Legion claims the avatar.

Text1_lang: These fools bring the Tidestone to us! Just as our blessed queen foresaw!

Text_lang: Ash'thero sanguine!
Harjatan... no fight... so good...
Legends tell of Deepmaw's unbridled ferocity. I'm relieved we had our own legendary heroes to stop this threat!

Text1_lang: The Tidestone will be ours!
Face the might that lurks beneath the waves!
My queen has given me dominion over the seas!
Such a death... is beneath me...
From this stone flowed rivers and seas, the very lifeblood of Azeroth. Today it washes clean the darkness that scars our world.

Text_lang: Be on your guard. I doubt the spirits trapped here will be friendly... or forgiving.
An age has passed since I last walked these halls. I did what needed to be done, though at great cost.

Text1_lang: You are ever impetuous, Kasparian.
I claim first blood, sisters!
Goddess guide your hand!
No more dawdling, Kasparian! Victory shall be mine!
I will dismiss these heretics, Yathae!
Elune... forgive us...
No! I... should have... won...
We failed... the goddess...

Text_lang: Your souls are but fodder!

Text1_lang: We must spread word of the Alliance's arrival. Post notice throughout the city that the reign of the Grand Magistrix will soon be ended. Inspire the shal'dorei to resist!

Text_lang: Innocents are being jailed all across the city. This cannot stand! Slay the guards, take their control orbs, and set my people free.

Text1_lang: What madman thought to infuse this creature with the Nightwell's power? Have a care. If this abomination was created to protect lower reaches of the citadel from invaders, it must be particularly deadly.
This is a momentous day, my friends. Until the Legion came, no outsider was permitted inside the corridors of the Nighthold for ten-thousand years.
Now the fate of my people rests in the hands of outsiders... all of you... to save us from the terrible bargain made by our queen.
Shanar daloras! I have no idea how such an entity came to be, but the essence of the Nightwell is surging through it.
Tendrils of power are emanating from the aberration. I believe Elisande is using this creature to maintain the time lock spell.
In order to free our allies at the gate, this monstrosity must be destroyed!

Text_lang: Why defy that which devours all things?
The wheels of time turn against you.
My time has come.
An excellent plan. Good luck, heroes.

Text1_lang: The time lock is broken! They are free!

Text_lang: No doubt our forces will be disoriented. I will inform them what happened and see that they make ready to resume our assault.

Text1_lang: From here, we have access to the palace grounds. We can open the gates from the inside!

Text_lang: Please don't say such things! The master is back, and things need to be kept tidy.
The master has returned! We must ensure the household is immaculate.
Ooo, that would be impressive... considering I still have his hands in a jar.
That's not the master, imbecile! Unless he managed to claw his way out from under two tons of solid stone.
Filthy, filthy, filthy!!!
You're tracking mud everywhere!

Text1_lang: The palace grounds are just ahead. You'll find them even more heavily defended than the lower levels.
I let you strike first and that's the best you can do?
Behold a true mistress of the blade!
Inconceivable! I... am... the... best...
At long last, the battle to liberate Suramar is joined! No more must our resistance hide in the shadows!

Text_lang: The gates are breached! Sorry we couldn't join you sooner, but we had a bit of a mess to clean up out front.
I'll see to fortifying our position here. Thalyssra, your guidance has been invaluable to our champions so far. They'll rely upon your wisdom in the battles ahead.
I'll keep an eye on your progress. Good luck!

Text1_lang: The people of Suramar owe these heroes a debt we can never fully repay. I will stand with them until the end.

Text_lang: Incompetent mortal filth! These Nightborne can't even defend their own palace from invasion! If it were up to me...
You think getting past a few power-addled elves means you can stand against a true son of the Legion?
But I was... supposed to... win...
In the Third War, Tichondrius fell in battle against Illidan Stormrage. I think the demon hunter's spirit is pleased that the dreadlord has met another painful end.
Suramar owes its beauty to my blooms! I alone have mastered the delicate intertwining of magic into nature's grand cycle.
It seems I've a bit of pruning to do!

Text1_lang: What can I say? He took his job seriously.

Text_lang: So the palace gardener turned himself into a plant?
If only you knew what lay beyond...
See for yourself the cruel, frozen void that lies beyond the margin of Azeroth's skies!
Such insolence... very well, I shall show you!
Do not think... the future will be so easy.

Text1_lang: Etraeus thought himself superior to... well, everyone. I confess I enjoyed seeing him humbled.

Text_lang: Come then! Meet your end!
Azeroth... must... burn...
That was for Tirion Fordring, monster! Krosus may not have struck the killing blow, but he played a part in our great champion's fall.
Champions, you've done it! I sense Gul'dan's ritual growing in power, we must hurry.  I can teleport you back to the Nighthold. Are you prepared?
The portal shimmers with images of the spire.
Fear not, I will draw the power of the Nightwell to wipe them out!
Interlopers!

Text1_lang: Courtesans! Defend us while we continue the ritual!
Your deaths ensure the future of the Nightborne. Come forward, then. Let us speed you toward your fate.
The Legion's victory is inevitable. Every time stream shows it to be so. Had we resisted, they would have taken the Nightwell by force and left us bereft of it.
My people faced a similar dilemma. I peered into all possible futures in search of an answer... and found only one.
I could not allow my people to starve, to waste away without its energies sustaining us. So a bargain was struck.
I foresaw your coming, of course. The threads of fate that led you to this place. Your desperate attempt to stop the Legion.
Now I see a future where the Legion is victorious and my people endure. This is the thread that must be preserved. I will do everything in my power to make it so!
Your timelines end here!
You exist in but a single moment. I am far less limited!
Time shifts again, and your doom draws near!
Time is... slipping away! How can it be so?
It's... not possible! I... I was destined to win...
Fates be damned! I cast my lot in with yours, champions. Go now, face Gul'dan. I will aid you as best I can, and perhaps together we can save us all.
Will you defeat the Legion? Will you fail? Time eddies about you in fits and starts. Nothing is certain!
In all the possible futures I scryed, I did not foresee one in which you were victorious. I wonder...
Perhaps you will win. And in saving your world, my people would be freed from the terrible bargain we were forced to make.

Text_lang: Too late! I am unstoppable!
My will is unbreakable!
No more distractions! I have work to do...
Surrender! I may yet show mercy!
Time to return the demon hunter's soul to his body... and deny the Legion's master a host!
I am Gul'dan! I am darkness incarnate! It cannot end... like this.
You topple a pawn and presume to challenge its master? Such arrogance!
Behold the shadow of what is to come, the endless darkness that shall consume your world.
You are not prepared!
Feel the power... of the demon within!
How... is it even... possible?

Text1_lang: Elisande will pay for her treachery.

Text_lang: Hahahaha, Gruul kill you so easy!
Gruul... Fall... Down?
Guards! Intruders are meddling with the Blast Furnace!
Protect the furnace at all costs!
awww...aaaaggg...
My flames will lick the flesh from your bones!
The machinery is damaged. Keep those scum from sabotaging the furnace!
The furnace is overheating! Fools, if the Fury breaks free, our work will be ruined!

Text1_lang: The Fury has broken free!
Quick, get it under control!
It... is free. Warlord, we have failed...

Text_lang: A small victory, but now you will perish in the flame that burns at the heart of Blackrock!
Freeeedommmmm!
My fire is... Exting..uished.
What happened to my furnace? Where are my guards? Shut these intruders down!
Hey Franz? Franzok! We got a jam!
So? Go un-jam it den!
I ain't un-jammin it! I un-jammed it last time!
You wanna tell Blackhand we got a stamper that ain't stampin'?
Ey you! Get in dere and un-jam that stamper!
Ha ha ha! Guess dis batch will have some impurities.
Your bones will be crushed to dust!
Hear me now... and believe me... later....
No, not like this....

Text1_lang: My work. You've interrupted my WORK!
Aknor! You are an embarrassment to your clan.
My flame... burned too bright.

Text_lang: Oggum dror undro dukkar.
Smash you... into mountain.
RRRRRRRRRrrooaaaarrr...
That beast was irreplaceable. Where are the attackers now? I want them dead. DEAD!
Come! Your meat and bones will feed my animals!
I will NOT die here! Faultline, come aid your master!
The others...  will avenge... me...
Live iron on track one!
Send 'er on down the line!
Faster! Bat the stack off her!
Track one.
Track three.
Redball incoming!
Blackhand wants to see these shipments in Talador. NOW!
Blackhand won't tolerate any more delays.
That wasn't on the... schedule...

Text1_lang: Sorka! Ensure the peons are keeping pace!
You insufferable...
Patience, sisters. The sooner we finish our work, the sooner we crush our enemies.
Let's see how well you've trained our soldiers, Gar'an.
I think I see the problem...
My pleasure.
Right.
Marak! Load the ammunition into the main cannon!
What?! The trains are behind schedule?
Sorka! This isn't a game! Get down there!
Ha! What brutality, what bloodshed... Beautiful!
Don't worry, I'm coming... this looks fun.
Sisters, to battle!
It feels... so...
... than battle to death!
Lok'tar ogar!
No greater pleasure...
My... blood...

Text_lang: The Iron Maidens have fallen? They were my favorite! Find these invaders and bring me their heads!

Once I walked these halls with pride, holding my head high as an orc of the Blackrock clan. But this is a wrong path. Our hammers were meant to craft axes, swords... not these machines from the stranger's whispers.
You? You're the dogs who have been wreaking havoc throughout my foundry? Step forward! I will put you in your place.
I will hang your broken bodies from the gates of this foundry!
Everyone DOWN.
We are... the Warchief's weapon... Without us, he...

Text1_lang: Thank you. Quelling these disturbances allows our allies to move without disruption. The Scalesworn shall call upon you again should we require your aid.
I sense powerful magical energy in this area. See what you can discover about it for me.

Text_lang: The Amathet are mustering for another assault on the Halls of Origination. Break their ranks and scatter them to the winds!
Filthy beasts! Your presence in Skywall will not be tolerated!
Pick a card, any card...
No mortal shall turn me from my task.
Wyrmrest Accord, Attack!

Text1_lang: They have broken our defenses... the very earth turns against us in Deathwing's name.

Text_lang: Wyrmrest will fall. All will be dust.
Advance to the front!

Text1_lang: You must hurry... Wyrmrest falls as we speak... all... is lost...

Text_lang: The siege must be broken. Wyrmrest Accord, defend the line!
I will turn this tower to rubble, and scatter it across the wastes.
You seek to halt an avalanche. I will bury you.
You thought to fight me alone? The earth splits to swallow and crush you.
Impossible. This cannot be. The tower... must... fall...
The Twilight's Hammer is retreating! The temple is ours; fortify your positions within!
Vwyq agth sshoq'meg N'Zoth vra zz shfk qwor ga'halahs agthu. Uulg'ma, ag qam.
Once more shall the twisted flesh-banners of N'Zoth chitter and howl above the fly-blown corpse of this world. After millennia, we have returned.
Zzof Shuul'wah. Thoq fssh N'Zoth!
Uovssh thyzz... qwaz...

Text1_lang: A single general remains. You must make haste!

Text_lang: Ak'agthshi ma uhnish, ak'uq shg'cul vwahuhn! H'iwn iggksh Phquathi gag OOU KAAXTH SHUUL!
Iilth qi'uothk shn'ma yeh'glu Shath'Yar! H'IWN IILTH!
Ez, Shuul'wah! Sk'woth'gl yu'gaz yoh'ghyl iilth!

Text1_lang: The flow of darkness abates. It seems you truly are the heroes of legend.

Text_lang: It is no use, the power of the Dragon Soul is too great. I cannot wield it safely; the raging forces contained within it may be the doom of us all.

Text1_lang: Then truly, we are lost.

Text_lang: Not necessarily. I believe...yes...it just might work.
The Focusing Iris within the Eye of Eternity may allow us to converge the magical matrix contained within the Dragon Soul.
Yes, I see.  We can finally turn Deathwing's own power back against him.

Text1_lang: I sense danger...it is a trap...carefully laid for us at this crucial moment.

Text_lang: We have no choice.  We must have faith in our allies.
Then I will open the way into the Eye of Eternity. You must not fail, heroes. The future of Azeroth hinges on your actions.

Text1_lang: Even with the Aspect of Time on your side, you stumble foolishly into a trap?
Don't preen just yet, little pups. We'll cleanse this world of your kind.
You'll not leave this place alive!
Not one of you will live to see the final cataclysm! Finish them!
Swagger all you like; you pups don't stand a chance. Flee now, while you can.
You cross the Stormbinder! I'll slaughter you all.
Cowards! You pack of weakling... dogs...

Text_lang: Heroes, have you succeeded in acquiring the Focusing Iris?

Text1_lang: Praise the Titans, they have returned!

Text_lang: Not entirely unexpected.
Excellent! We will begin the ritual at once!

Text1_lang: The ritual will take much from us, as it requires a very piece of our being. We will be weakened greatly.

Text_lang: Heroes, this burden falls to you once again.
You must protect us from Deathwing's forces while we imbue the Dragon Soul with the power of the Aspects.
Speak to me when you are ready to begin.
Heroes, we must place this burden on your shoulders once again.  You must protect us from Deathwing's forces while we imbue the Soul with the powers of the great Aspects of Azeroth.
It is good to see you again, Alexstrasza. I have been busy in my absence.
Twisting your pitiful whelps into mindless abominations, bent only to my will. It was a very... painful process.

Text1_lang: They... are my clutch no longer.  Bring them down.

Text_lang: Mere whelps, experiments, a means to a greater end. You will see what the research of my clutch has yielded.
Nefarian, Onyxia, Sinestra... they were nothing. Now you face my ultimate creation.
The Hour of Twilight is nigh; the sun sets on your pitiful mortal existence.

Text1_lang: I sense a great disturbance in the balance approaching. The chaos of it burns my mind!

Text_lang: I am the beginning of the end...the shadow which blots out the sun...the bell which tolls your doom...
For this moment ALONE was I made. Look upon your death, mortals, and despair!
Now is the hour of twilight!
But...but...I am...Ul...trax...ionnnnnn...

Text1_lang: It is done! Our power now resides within the Dragon Soul! Our fate lies with you, Earth-Warder!

Text_lang: Taretha...  Cairne...  Aggra...  I will not fail you.  I will not fail this world!
Welcome aboard the Skyfire.  You ready to chase down the end of the world?
Welcome aboard the Skyfire. You ready to chase down the end of the world?
We're catching up to the dragon! I think I can make him out through the cloud cover!
All ahead full. Everything depends on our speed! We can't let the Destroyer get away.
Our engines are damaged!  We're sitting ducks up here!
You won't get near the Master. Dragonriders, attack!
All hands to battle stations; get those monsters away from the ship!
Goriona! Give them hell!
Concentrate everything on the armored drake!
Little hand says it's time to rock and roll. Everyone into the hold: We've got a dragon to kill.
Don't worry about me. Stop the Destroyer! Enshu-falah-nah, dorini.
Ha! I had not realized you fools were still there.
Cling while you can, "heroes." You and your world are doomed.
You are less than dust, fit only to be brushed from my back.
Your efforts are insignificant. I carry you to your deaths.
Your tenacity is admirable, but pointless. You ride into the jaws of the apocalypse.
You have done it!
It is done; at last the Destroyer has met his end. Now, we can begin to heal our world.
You have accomplished the impossible, succeeded where all Azeroth feared you would fail.
Text1_lang: You have accomplished the impossible, succeeded where all Azeroth feared you would fail.

Text_lang: Before you is the Cache of the Aspects: Take from it what you will, for you have more than earned the right.
Text1_lang: Before you is the Cache of the Aspects: Take from it what you will, for you have more than earned the right.

Text_lang: ...although, you may want to hurry.
Do you hear that?  What is that noise!
You have done NOTHING. I will tear your world APART.
I will bring you closer to the Emerald Dream. Seek safety there when the fight becomes too intense.
I will slow the Destroyer's attacks when I can.
I AM DEATHWING, THE DESTROYER, THE END OF ALL THINGS, INEVITABLE, INDOMITABLE; I AM THE CATACLYSM!
Excellent work. The fire of my heart glows with a brilliant purity unmatched; every spark of it I will channel into the Dragon Soul.
Text1_lang: Excellent work. The fire of my heart glows with a brilliant purity unmatched; every spark of it I will channel into the Dragon Soul.

Text_lang: Hurry, heroes. In mere moments Deathwing's Cataclysm will complete what he begun and end the world. Join me in the attack, now!
Welcome to T&W Trading Post!

Text1_lang: Anything good against witches.

Text_lang: Oh, right. We might be able to sort something. Are ye looking for singular or bulk?

Text1_lang: I'm looking for new weaponry for the Drustvar garrison.

Text_lang: Righto, anything else I can get ye?

Text1_lang: Bulk, thank you.

Text_lang: We got a new shipment in recently. Are ye looking for anything in particular?

Text1_lang: No, thank you. Please have them sent to Quartermaster Alcorn.
Welcome to T&W Trading Post!
War does not simply visit these lands, it lives here.  The violence thrives in past, present, and future...

War rages in these lands, repeating patterns set down long ago. The ways of time are ever cyclical.

Apologies. I sometimes forget that your people are so... linear.

How may I help you?

Tirisfal... a place of beauty and darkness. A land fraught with regret... and graves.

Your kind has fought to claim it time and time again.

Do you wish to see it as it was prior to the latest war?

Text_lang: Welcome, $c. Have you come to honor this flame?$b$bRemember: Our festival fires burn in every land with an Alliance settlement. Make time to honor each of them, if you can.$b$bThe Horde, too, burns fires of their own. You would do well to desecrate such unworthy efforts when you see them.
Text1_lang: Welcome, $c. Have you come to honor this flame?$b$bRemember: Our festival fires burn in every land with an Alliance settlement. Make time to honor each of them, if you can.$b$bThe Horde, too, burns fires of their own. You would do well to desecrate such unworthy efforts when you see them.

Silithus has ever been a magnet for ancient, malevolent powers.

I could open a timeway to reveal how the Black Empire once sprawled across these sands. Or show you wars waged between mighty armies.

So much history. So much pain.

But that can wait. I believe you are here for another purpose.
Come, meet with me at the Vindicaar. It is time that we reward your diligence.
Your service to the Alliance has been most impressive, $p. I could not have done better myself. Well, I could... but not by much.

Text_lang: We don't have much time. You'll have to learn fast.
I've taught you the basics. Now find a beast and tame it.
Boss reward us when this over.

Text1_lang: Order the boar to trample! It's the only way to take down the larger ones!

Text_lang: How may I be of service?
Text1_lang: How may I be of service?
You will sate my hunger!
No, ye gotta run! The harpies are usin' me as bait te get the rest of ye!
I'll cast a spell tae get meself outta here. Keep the harpies off of me!
Hang in there! I'm here to help!

Text_lang: Greetings, $c. I can help stable your pets or assist you in recovering lost companions.
Text1_lang: Greetings, $c. I can help stable your pets or assist you in recovering lost companions.

Text_lang: Bring me the supplies. I'll show you how to make a trap with them.

Text1_lang: I got plenty o' ideas on how te deal with these ogres. Let's see which ones don't accidentally blow up the island...
An ice mote? Sure. What're ye gonna do with it?

Text_lang: Place your Freezing Trap within the Ogre Ruins. The beast that's been stalking our camp should emerge.
Look, there it is!
That's no wild animal... it's one of the beasts that was aboard our ship! It must have survived the crash.

Text1_lang: How can I help you, Maw Walker?

Ah, we were deeply saddened when you left us before. 

Your deeds though in protecting and shaping the fate of the Shadowlands warms our hearts and eases our hard feelings. 

Do you wish to rejoin the Night Fae once again?

Text_lang: Welcome. Which path may I assist you with?
There is much to be done for Ardenweald, $n.
Text1_lang: There is much to be done for Ardenweald, $n.

Text_lang: What form will you take?
Text1_lang: What form will you take?

Ah, a fellow aficionado of antiquities.

It's very nice to meet you.

Text_lang: I bring the future generation of a new, uncorrupted black dragonflight. Surely you'll aid us in our efforts to settle here on Azeroth.
With this key we can breach the barrier within the vault, and rid it of the infestations that have grown there!
My friend, our history together is illustrious. Surely you'll lend me your support here at the citadel?

Text1_lang: You have done good work, but danger still looms. Will you come to the aid of the forces here, champion?
Our progress is substantial, the end shall be here soon.

Text_lang: Anything worth doing is worth doing dangerously!
Watch out for those marmoni. Last one tossed a banana right in my eye!
You weren't the one seeing yellow for a week!

Text1_lang: The mountains are mighty here. Plant our banners to mark what the Dragonscale Expedition has discovered!
The spiders are hungry today. Free our friends before they're meals.

Text_lang: Who knows what secrets it contains? It may even have the answer tae defeatin' the Old Gods!
The titans constructed this facility after the fall o' the Black Empire to run experiments on all manner of beasties.
These caves must lead to the legendary Uldir!

Text1_lang: For de glory of G'huun!
G'huun's power take you!
Rot and wither!
G'huun be everywhere!
My blood for G'huun...

Text_lang: Ach! What manner o' beastie is this?!
Harvest!
Grow!
Corruption blooms!
Everything... decays...
I've never seen that kind o' corruption before.
It might be connected to Uldir. Let's hurry and find out!
Planetary infection imminent.
Virulent specimen detected. Containment priority one.
Devour! Consume! Spread!
Cleansing area.
Infected!
Contagion detected. Sanitize.
Must... spread...
Yes, my chosen. You have proven worthy of my gift.
Engaging final safeguard. Destroy virulent source.

Text1_lang: We must gather our forces and stop de rot at its source.
De titan bought us time, but G'huun will not stay contained for long.
I've been saving this one just for you!
Destroy and dismantle!

Text_lang: Can you stand against my might?

Text1_lang: This is the end, defilers.

Text_lang: You will be trampled into dust!
Even in times of war we must care for the creatures of the plains. Bring me eight Ohuna eggs - we will have need of their companionship when this conflict is done.
Text1_lang: Even in times of war we must care for the creatures of the plains. Bring me eight Ohuna eggs - we will have need of their companionship when this conflict is done.
Thank you for your help, $n.

Text_lang: If only you could have understood the righteousness of our cause.
I will not allow you to disturb Melidrussa's work!

Text1_lang: My allies sacrificed themselves so that I could return these eggs to their natural state! I will not fail!

Text_lang: Melidrussa... I have.. failed...

Text1_lang: You will not interfere!
Ice consume you!
Be frozen and shatter!
I am sorry, but I need your strength little ones.
My chill will freeze your bones!
No! These whelps are pure! They will show you the truth!
A miserable...end...
Good work, champion. Now that you have secured the pools below, I require your aid above.

The exposed Life Pools are in grave danger. A powerful Primalist is attempting to burn all the nesting areas! You must clear them to get to her. I will keep watch from above while I confront the dragon who is leading this assault.
Quickly! Take the eggs! Save as many as you can!
Well done, you have secured the first pool! Now see to the others!
Keep clearing them out! Do not let the Primalists desecrate this hallowed space!
You are almost to the master of these minions. Hurry onwards, champion!
The last pool is safe! She is exposed! Attack that Primalist before she can summon reinforcements.
I will honor the sacrifice of my allies and burn through you myself!
Erupt with their power!
You cannot escape the heat!
Bend to the flame.
Fire consume my enemies!
Nothing but ashes.
Be overwhelmed by the flame!
Snuffed out... too... soon...
Vile monster! I protect these Life Pools--No!
Your false queen cannot stop us. We are the truth.
Erkhart, deal with these aberrations.

Text_lang: My pleasure.

Text1_lang: Burn.

Text_lang: That's enough!
Two is better than one. Help me, Kyrakka!
Take off!

Text1_lang: Singe.

Text_lang: More... will... come...

Text1_lang: No! Ours... is the... true... path...
Thank you, champion. The Life Pools are safe for the moment but the Primalists are still a threat. We must be vigilant lest we be caught off guard again.

Text_lang: Okay, for this trick I'll need a volunteer.
Hey! Not that card! Give it back!

It is good to see you, my friend. So much is transpiring it is hard for a Lorewalker like myself to keep up. I have seen many things through my dream brew, but we will need a hero such as yourself to help write this next chapter of our history.
Give in to your anger!

Greetings, greetings!

Care to help us gather some snail slime for our best smellies? 

<Olie snickers> 

We niffen make the best smellies, but... I can help you get good at it too!
Text1_lang:
Greetings, greetings!

Care to help us gather some snail slime for our best smellies? 

<Olie snickers> 

We niffen make the best smellies, but... I can help you get good at it too!

Text_lang: The best way to get snail slime is to sneak up underneath them and then jump out and scare them!
Text1_lang: The best way to get snail slime is to sneak up underneath them and then jump out and scare them!

Text_lang: Mmm, yes, 'specially stinky! And sticky, too!
The healing properties we discovered deserve additional experimentation! Gather them up, and we'll see what we can do.
Hmm, let's see... Distill the essence, liquify... Hmm... Drink? No, no. Not yet.
Hold still, or you won't be rescuing anyone anymore!
Text1_lang: Hold still, or you won't be rescuing anyone anymore!

Text_lang: We've got to go back! We didn't rescue...ergh...enough...
Text1_lang: We've got to go back! We didn't rescue...ergh...enough...

Text_lang: Adventurer! Please help! Gnolls are holding our friends captive!
Text1_lang: Adventurer! Please help! Gnolls are holding our friends captive!

Text_lang: Rescuing them will probably upset Hackclaw and her war-band, so be ready for a fight!
Text1_lang: Rescuing them will probably upset Hackclaw and her war-band, so be ready for a fight!

Text_lang: If you free our friends, we'll make sure they get home safely.
Text1_lang: If you free our friends, we'll make sure they get home safely.

Text_lang: We appreciate your help, adventurer!
Text1_lang: We appreciate your help, adventurer!

Text_lang: Be careful out there!
Text1_lang: Be careful out there!
Who stealing our meat?!

Text_lang: We'll remember you.
Text1_lang: We'll remember you.

Text_lang: My agony is yours!
It hurts!
Watch out below, ye barnacle-bottomed swine!
Bombs away!
Avast, ye bilge suckers!
Aaargh! Sharkbait, come about and blast their broadsides!
Ha Ha! Don't crack yer teacup!
I'll scuttle yer hides!
Guess I... be off... ta the locker...
Sorry you smell like parrot guano! Rawk!
Rawk! Kragg Dead! Sharkbait sorry!
Bottoms up, scallywags!

Text1_lang: Your skulls will be excellent target practice.

Text_lang: Let's put your steel to the test!

Text1_lang: Nice... shot...

Text_lang: Was this... last call...?
