Gather 'round and place yer bets! We got a new set of vict-- uh... competitors! Take it away, Gurgthock and Wodin!
That's your cue, landlubbers!
Ouch! Okay, okay! Gather 'round for a show of unbridled ferocity! Comin' to you from parts unknown. The mysterious... the dangerous... the slightly unkempt... the band of smelly buccaneers!
And entering the ring, we have the amazing... the incredible... the magnificent... the... what the? Really?
It's a greased up pig? I'm beginning to think this is not a professional setup. Oh well... grab the pig and you win.
C'mon, say the things! Say the things!
Ouch! Why'd you poke me? Oh, oh! Wake up, Wodin! We're on!
From the sewers of Freehold comes a tortollan brigand who makes it his duty to "turtley" hurt you. He is the Dynamo of Defense... the Sergeant of Shell Shock... the Hellion in a Half-Shell... Ludwig!
Well, look at that. They caught a pig. Maybe we should move on to a more... threatening challenge!
Ludwig goes down! What a fight! These smelly buccaneers are resilient, and they better be... because their next challenger is the epitome of brutality.
Our champion that sleeps with the fishes... literally! The Freehold Fanatic... the Master of the Jagged Jawbone Jab... the Powerful Pugilist Predator... Trothak the Shark Puncher!
Think you can stand against me, swine? Allow me to educate you.
Men! Acquaint these scallywags with our heavy guns.
Swab the deck with their gizzards!
Cannons! Blast these scurvy dogs to bits!
All hands on deck!
Inconceivable...
Our scouts reported some crystals on this cliff. I need some for my experiments. Could you grab them for me?
Mushrooms are almost a currency down here apparently. Grab some for the Dragonscale Expedition!
Fantastic! Let's bag them up and get them back to camp.
What fragrance! With a sniffing mouse, you're almost as good at this as a niffen!

Text1_lang:
Flightstones are a marvel. There is so much to discover in this underground cavern. We are within the literal foundation of the Isles themselves.
What can I do for you?
< Newsy approaches you, she has no scent this time. >

Text_lang: Buy it now for only 9,999 Boulders!
For a friend of the niffen I could do 4,999 Boulders.
Alright, alright. 999 Boulders it is.

50 Boulders? That's an insult! For a hat of this scent? This hat carries the scents of renown niffen explorers! 

The history alone? The absolute lowest I can go is 249 Boulders. The lowest!
I already told you, 249 Bartering Boulders is the lowest I can go, it's a steal!

Shhh! 

Do you smell that, uplander? Danger's a-comin'. 

You'd best be ready for it.
Text1_lang:
Shhh! 

Do you smell that, uplander? Danger's a-comin'. 

You'd best be ready for it.

Text_lang: How goes the craft?

Wonderful! Oh, it looks amazing! Thank you!

You know, making a high quality craft takes more than your skill as a crafter and the quality of the reagents you use. 

It's also about the difficulty of the craft, the inspiration you find, and how you specialize in your craft.

Excellent! Now then, I know I've asked a lot of you already, but would you be so kind as to deliver this gift to Miguel?

Seeing as how you helped create it, it's only fair that you get to see the smile on his face. Just remember to tell him it's from me.
Where did you go? I'm coming to find you!
All we need to do now is find the box that this key fits. Maybe it's buried? I'll sniff it out!
Hello, and welcome!$B$BUp for a challenge?

Welcome to the faire young one!   We have collected wonders from all over the world for your perusal.   Oh and please let me know if you manage to collect a set of the lesser darkmoon cards, as the master... I mean I would be keenly interested in them.
$n, you return!  The spirits of my last meal said you would come see me and that we would discuss business.$B$BWere they correct?
'Cuz um... 'cuz I'm pretty sure it should go the other way.
Text1_lang: 'Cuz um... 'cuz I'm pretty sure it should go the other way.

Text_lang: It ain't broke in the first place!
Alright, alright.
Text1_lang: Alright, alright.

Text_lang: So uhh... Does this thing look like it runs backwards to you?
Text1_lang: So uhh... Does this thing look like it runs backwards to you?

Text_lang: You must be grindin' my gears! This thing took months of designeering to get it runnin' the way it goes!
Backwards?! Are you kiddin' me? Why do people keep sayin' that?
Maybe Penny should take a look?
Text1_lang: Maybe Penny should take a look?

Text_lang: I'm just sayin'. Maybe she'll know how to fix it.
Text1_lang: I'm just sayin'. Maybe she'll know how to fix it.

Text_lang: You leave my sister outta this! She gave up the family business a long time ago.
Gaze in astonishment as I produce a rabbit from this ordinary hat!
Thank you, thank you. Your tips are appreciated.
Cancel my meeting with Wyrmbane. I want to depart immediately!
Here's $p now!
I'll rake ye from stem to stern!
Text1_lang: I'll rake ye from stem to stern!
This ship is yours to command, $n. I have the crew prepared for any eventuality.

Text_lang:
The 7th Legion represents the best that Azeroth has to offer.

For the Alliance!
Please feel free to browse the items up for bid, or if you would like to list an item, I can help.
Get away from my food!
Text1_lang: Get away from my food!

Text_lang: <This lab is stocked with common materials that can assist in the creation of potions, phials, and other alchemical wonders.>
I can instruct you in alchemy.  Interested?
Text1_lang: I can instruct you in alchemy.  Interested?

Text_lang: You wade through a river of souls, stranger. It's best to turn back.
Text1_lang: You wade through a river of souls, stranger. It's best to turn back.

Text_lang: This was once a place of peace. A place for eternal rest...
Text1_lang: This was once a place of peace. A place for eternal rest...
Rivers of the damned, RISE! RISE in the name of darkness, RISE in the name of Ner'zhul! The Shadowmoon beckons...
Ancestors of the Shadowmoon, shine in the darkness! Lend me your strength!
The dead... Shall rise again...

Text_lang: Ner'zhul will not hear us, he hears only darkness now.
Text1_lang: Ner'zhul will not hear us, he hears only darkness now.

Text_lang: Your blissful afterlife is over.
Yes, come closer... your souls are strong and proud! I will feast on your terror!
You are just maggots swarming to the corpse of a dying god.
The Shadowmoon CANNOT be defeated - we walk in the realm of death itself.
My power... Will ripple... Across eternity.

Text1_lang: Do you know when we are?

Text_lang: Do not worry, Gholna. I will crush these pests for you.

Text1_lang: Good! We must have arrived before Teron'gor and Gul'dan!
Nyami is working to bolster the defenses against their assault - follow me, we will report to her.
Beautiful, isn't it? Just think - you're one of the first outsiders to see inside Auchindoun.
Strange... why is the door sealed? No matter...
Let us proceed.
The Vindicators and Exarchs of the past. Heroes all - their souls still remain with us here.

Text_lang: None live who assault the holy Auchenai.
I will strike you down.
Auchindoun... is... doomed...

Text1_lang: She... got away. The defenses...
She had help. So many of our order were corrupt...
I'll gather any who remain loyal here and protect them. You - please, go put a stop to this madness!
I will coil your souls into darkness!
Too late... my Master... comes...
Auchenai, secure this chamber.
The barrier protecting Auchindoun is asunder.
A foul force has penetrated these sacred chambers.
Scout ahead while we establish a foothold.

Text_lang: Who dares meddle in the works of the Legion?!
This world... ALL worlds... shall burn!
Die, insect!
This power... you will be the first to know it.
Elum... a liftetime of healing, now you shall fuel disease and decay!
More! I... need... more!

Text1_lang: You... you did it!
Here - this is not enough to thank you for your actions, but it is what we have to give.
Now we can rebuild... we must rebuild. We will never allow our souls to fall to the Legion.
You have done more than you know. Our people can never thank you enough.

Text_lang: Why do I gotta move all the boxes?
Stop askin' and get back to work!
I got this boss.
Time to go to plan B!
All systems online! Fire!
This was not the plan...
They're here... GET UP!
Formation, NOW!
Come on, swines! Move like you signed up for this.
Readdyyyyyyyy!!!
Who dares challenge me?
Let 'em have it, boys!
I've got my sights on you.
Give 'em all ya got.
Hah! Let's take this down to your level.
I didn't... even... try...

Text1_lang: Rakun, let's give 'em hell!
Show them what you're made of!
You... can't...

Text_lang: Go away! I will fix this!
Yes... the brute weakens...
Uh... stone!
FIRE!
Kill him! I will be free!
Augh! Noooooo...
You are but a pebble amongst boulders...
I am a rockslide!
I will expunge your existence.
Crushed by earth!
Seared by flames...
Smash!
I return to the earth...
Guards! Stop yapping, start smashing!
Mmm-hnng - yeah, come here! I'll put you in chains.
Slaves! Fight or die!
Get that one!
Ugg... we kill you all for this...
It will be a pleasure to break you.
First, I break your spirit, then, I sell your future.
Burn!
The elements hear me and obey!
You will never... be... free...
Iruun... You battled demons in life... in death, your power will feed them!
I hope that your interruption is for a good cause, I was in the middle of some important work.
Text1_lang: I hope that your interruption is for a good cause, I was in the middle of some important work.

Text_lang: The Darkmoon Faire is now open!$b$bFor a small fee, I can teleport you to the fairground staging area.$b$bWould you like to go?
Text1_lang: The Darkmoon Faire is now open!$b$bFor a small fee, I can teleport you to the fairground staging area.$b$bWould you like to go?

Text_lang: Ah, here is the hero I spoke of.

Ah, there you are, $p. Impeccable timing!

I briefed Lord Commander Turalyon on recent events, and have extended the Aspects' invitation to the Dragon Isles.

We just have a few more details to discuss.

Text1_lang: Pleased to meet ya!
Spotted some promisin' crew members as I was flyin' over the city. Round 'em up and let's get to it!

Text_lang:
This craftsmanship is somethin' else. Ye can learn a lot by studyin' the work of others.

Just the thought of what lies ahead gets me excited!
An expedition? Sounds exciting!
Text1_lang: An expedition? Sounds exciting!

Text_lang: New adventures? I'm game. When there's work tae be done, my hammer's always ready tae be put tae good use! See ye at the docks!
How many dragons are in these 'Dragon Isles'?
Text1_lang: How many dragons are in these 'Dragon Isles'?

Text_lang: Breathing room, please! My admirers need space to appreciate the awe of being in my presence.

No quill? No ink?

<The gnome shakes his head.>

How do you expect me to sign an autograph if you don't come prepared?
A-hem. Duty calls! Now if you'll excuse me, I must be off to make a name for myself in the splendiferous Dragon Isles!
No need! Now that I have my sword, I am complete and can continue about my day!

Text1_lang: Ye already have a sword. It's on yer hip.

Text_lang: Greetings, Shopkeeper!

Text1_lang: Oh, hello. How can I help ye?

Text_lang: I require a sword!

Text1_lang: What an odd person.

Text_lang: Ah! I knew it was somewhere close by! Your assistance has been noted, and the Light will favor you for it!

Text1_lang: I was just joking. We have swords. What can I get for ye?

Welcome to our makeshift training ring, friend.

I trust we are not disturbing anyone up here? I've instructed the warders to be very careful to keep blasts of magic from falling down below.
The dracthyr stand ready.

Text_lang: Welcome, friend. We've been expecting you.
Don't panic. We've prepared for this.
I have miscalculated.

Text1_lang: Cogs and sprockets!

Text_lang: You are to be congratulated for your success in the Firelands.
I wish I was going to adventure with dragons!
Text1_lang: I wish I was going to adventure with dragons!

Text_lang:
Help ya with something?

I'm sorta busy showing these trainees the finer points of scaling walls.
But praise alone will not suffice.

Text1_lang: Exemplary work!

Text_lang: Announcing appreciation.

Text1_lang: Your gratitude has been accepted.

Text_lang: Expedition to the Dragon Isles? Sounds fun! Bet they've got plenty of soaring peaks to climb. Wrap it up, trainees! We're moving out!
We owe you a great deal for the part you have played in the destiny of our flight.

Text1_lang: Easy now, Wildfeather. Yer gonna need that energy soon enough!

Our scouts report that turbulent elemental storms are churning the seas to dangerous, unnatural levels.

Until those clear, we won't be going anywhere.

Why don't ye see what ye can help with around here while we wait?

Text_lang: Present me your staff, that we may endow it with great power.

Text1_lang: Sorcery! We're under attack!

Text_lang: Apologies for my abrupt arrival. But the news I bring cannot wait for pleasantries.
Be at ease, Toddy. This is a friend, not a foe.
Where do you want this box?
Over there! Why do you keep asking? You always move the boxes from here to there!
I'm unstoppable!
This too much fun!
Don't get in my way.
Got one!
You big oaf! Quit breaking my things!
Right in the face!
That was my entire collection of Hearthstone cards!
None can compete!
RAPID FIRE!!!

Text1_lang: Light 'em up!

Text_lang: We have much to discuss.
I still say we could've crammed into my mole machine and gotten there faster.
Corkscrews! The boat ruined my perfect shot! I almost had it...
We dracthyr would rather fly home than ride a wooden vessel as it drifts upon the waves. But I pledged to accompany your expedition, so... waves it is.
You'll get lots of pictures in the Dragon Isles, Wulferd. Imagine all the ancient wonders we'll be discovering!

Text1_lang: Ah, the Rugged Dragonscale. All aboard for adventure, my friends!

Text_lang: You really want to fly an airship into a sky full of dragons, ensign? Besides, our tidesages are puttin' in work.

Text1_lang: I suppose that is an understandable fear for a flightless creature.
Surely one of your airships would be faster than plodding along in this boat?

Text_lang: New species to discover...
Mountains to climb...
Ruins to delve...
Focus! Obsidian Warders, stay alert on approach!
Famous dragon autographs to acquire and flip far above normal resale value...

Text1_lang: Lookie there, Wildfeather! A whole new land to explore...

Text_lang: Award-winning photographs to take...

Text1_lang: Come on, Wildfeather. Off to the next adventure!

Text_lang:
<Thaelin is busy tinkering with a gadget in his hands.>

These explorers are throwing around their grappling hooks by hand? Can you believe that?

Imagine if the grappling hook could launch itself... automatically... when you needed it most!

Text1_lang: Wrathion said he would meet us at the embassy atop the hill.

Text_lang: We'd best keep moving.
It may be under attack. If it is, then I will be ready to defend my allies.

Text1_lang: Sorry, dragon bones. There'll be other rib cages to study, but only one me!
I'll carry these bone fragments to our camp at the embassy. Thanks!

Text_lang: How exhilarating! Wait until Toddy hears about this!
I was almost proto-dragon food...
No! He will awaken!
We are all... doomed.
We have not yet purified the water!
So. Thirsty.
No!
The forest closes in around you.
You will never escape...
You befoul this place!
You will be purged!
I return... to the soil...
I will... be... renewed...

Text1_lang: No... You can't... It's... I can't FIGHT IT!
Flee! The vines! They control us all!
Yes, fire! Fire will burn away the contagion.
Burn my body, it's the only way to stop them.
The portal is lost! We must stop this beast before it can escape!
We've got its attention!
Do you want to die here?! Move!
We are lost! It's pushing us back!
It's reviving the little ones!
I owe you one, friend.
Tell you what, I'll name the next cave I discover after you. "$p Cavern!"
Well met!
I am honored to make your acquaintance, Sendrax.
Our orders were clear, Private Garrick. We have other threats to worry about.

Text_lang: Do you really think we can trust them, mother?

Text1_lang: I fought alongside many honorable Horde in the scourge invasions, Warlord Grimaxe included.
Yes, mother. For the Horde! ... I mean, for the... expedition?
It is good to broaden your skills, Shuja. Not every problem can be solved with an axe.

It is truly an honor to be the first member of the dragonflights to welcome you to these shores.

I am Cadet Sendrax. Please forgive my nerves, this is my first assignment.

And what an incredible assignment it is! Welcome again.

Should we shake hands? I believe I read somewhere that your kind likes to do that.
Yes, I had expected Majordomo Selistra and Wrathion to be here by now...
On my first real assignment, no less. What good fortune!
But I am honored to be the one to welcome you to the Dragon Isles!
Excuse me, $c! Can you test something for me? The Artisan's Consortium will pay for your time.

Text_lang: Choose your next destination.

Text1_lang: Welcome to the Isles. Are you ready to learn more about the finer skills of dragonriding?

Text_lang: What can I do for you my child?
Text1_lang: What can I do for you my child?

Text_lang: Ah, Skyreach. I have not been this close to her in many years.
The High Sage will be well protected. We can fly no closer.
Destroy their false sun, that we may meet again in the shade.
I will slice the flesh from your bones!
I... perish....
Arise my creation, slay these intruders!
We will cast you down like the mongrels you are!
Cast them down, let the scavengers below feed on their pulp!
Behold the might of the Arakkoa!
We will always... soar....
<Sheets, quills, and bottles of ink are strewn across the drafting table.>
Leave this place, outsider. It will be your final resting place.
Text1_lang: Leave this place, outsider. It will be your final resting place.

Text_lang: Your undying souls will fuel my ascension from the darkness!

Text1_lang: A foul, arcane creation lurks in this area. It must be destroyed before it causes any havoc!
Looks like you could all use some resources. Hmm, there's a saying for this-- survival of the fittest.
Fine work. This will ensure our enemies do not push further into the Azure Span.

Text_lang: Camp Antonidas! I hear there's magic in these ruins...

Welcome to the Ravine River Run!

As the river bends, so does this course! Keep your wits about you, or you might end up in the river and not flying above it!

Would you like to try this course?
Text1_lang:
Welcome to the Ravine River Run!

As the river bends, so does this course! Keep your wits about you, or you might end up in the river and not flying above it!

Would you like to try this course?
Now everyone who scales those peaks will see that the Dragonscale Expedition beat 'em there!
There are more whelps at the shrine that could use your guidance in their training.
No... Happy Duck... no no no...
Lillistrasza sniffles.

Text_lang: Please, not in front of the $c!
Only the highest quality for you, my love.
Oh my, ... It's gorgeous!
Thomas darling, is this your doing?

Welcome to the Wingrest Embassy, dragonrider! I hope my kind have bid you welcome.

This course is called the Wingrest Roundabout. Its loop gives a good view of Wingrest and its surroundings--great for first time visitors! 

Would you like to try this course?
Text1_lang:
Welcome to the Wingrest Embassy, dragonrider! I hope my kind have bid you welcome.

This course is called the Wingrest Roundabout. Its loop gives a good view of Wingrest and its surroundings--great for first time visitors! 

Would you like to try this course?

Text_lang: These creatures died traumatically, Tharu. We must treat their remains respectfully.
What's more respectful than finding out what's killing them as quickly as we can?
All I meant is that you could stand to be more gentle during dissections.
We're supposed to preserve life, Iskha... not just carefully observe it!
Come to the Trading Post! We have some new items in stock!
Text1_lang: Come to the Trading Post! We have some new items in stock!

Text_lang: You'll be wanting to go to our sister Trading post in Stormwind! I believe it's next to the Stockade?
Text1_lang: You'll be wanting to go to our sister Trading post in Stormwind! I believe it's next to the Stockade?
The Nokhud are unwavering in their combat prowess. Disrupt their training and eliminate their forces. Buy us precious time to retaliate against them.
Your distraction is invaluable to our efforts. Remain alert. Though we have weakened their forces, they will not falter.
Good day, dragonrider. Ready to learn more about how to make your dragon truly unique?

Text_lang: If you insert tab A into slot B then of course it's going to go BOOM! Here, let me show you what I have and then you can ask Lilliam about how to put it together so it doesn't blow up.
Text1_lang: If you insert tab A into slot B then of course it's going to go BOOM! Here, let me show you what I have and then you can ask Lilliam about how to put it together so it doesn't blow up.

Text_lang: Yeah? Ye interrupted me, so ye better have a blasted good reason to do so.
Text1_lang: Yeah? Ye interrupted me, so ye better have a blasted good reason to do so.

Text_lang: So ye want to be a Blacksmith eh? Grab an apron and a hammer $g lad : lass;, let's see what ye've got.

The Aspects have been steadfast allies to Stormwind in the past.

But enemies have arisen from among the dragons as well. Enemies that nearly destroyed this world.

We must be cautious.
I can instruct you in blacksmithing.  Interested?
Text1_lang: I can instruct you in blacksmithing.  Interested?

You let us worry about that, mm'kay?

The Artisan's Consortium has you covered!

Text_lang: <A massive grinding stone and other blacksmithing devices rest upon the table.>

Actually, yes! I have heard of special Draconic Treatises which teach lessons in crafting and gathering to help you hone your specializations.

Do you know a skilled scribe? Perhaps they could write such a treatise.

Text1_lang: Initiates train in the springs. She has no reason to venture outside, especially if she refuses to tell me why.

Text_lang: As you will the winds, Ohn Meluun.

Text1_lang: Learning to be idle is a great skill. My word is final, Togotseng. She is to focus on her studies, and any excursions must be approved by me.

Text_lang: I'm sure she just wants a change of scenery now and then. You know how restless she can be.

Text1_lang: Breezy! After all's said and done, come back and I'll work my magic.

Fellow adventurer!

Please save me from this torturous place they call the Ohn'ir training springs for promising young centaurs.

Text_lang: Initiates! Contain this squall!

Text1_lang: I know the aura of this wind...
Yes, Windsage!
Radiya. Face your Ohn, now. Radiya?

Text_lang: On it, Windsage!
What--! Where did this come from?

Text1_lang: Well? Can I trust you or not?
Let go of me!

Text_lang: Move it, mystic!
Now! Or your pet suffers.

Text1_lang:
<Godoloto ruffles her feathers, pleased that you have followed. She tilts her head.>

<You feel airy. Weightless. Your feet lift off the ground.>

<You're ready to move.>

<Lizi is exhausted from being subject to storm extraction. Her large glassy eye fixates on you, and her body is tense and slightly hunched. She clearly does not trust your presence yet.>

<Then... Lizi noses at your pack where you have an extra bushfruit.>
And that makes you very interesting to everyone, Radiya. Real danger lives in these plains.
I snuck into your class.

Text_lang: Well color me sky-blue. Don't stay mad at your Ohn. She won't admit it, but she was worried sick while you were gone.
I'm glad Godoloto found you. Where'd you learn how to do that totem trick?

Text1_lang: Consider this before we meet next. In the meantime, don't underestimate the beast you've brought back. They're not pets.

Text_lang: Yes. She'll recover with some time. I'll leave you two be.

Text1_lang: You needlessly risked your life and that of your companion's. After all of my warnings!
Her name is Lizi.
You're here because you're capable and gifted.
Look, Lizi likes the warm water of the springs.
Thank you. The elements are calmed, for now.

Text_lang: No, sit, rest. I have everything under control! Always!

Text1_lang: I'll ask again... Are you SURE I can't do anything to help?

Text_lang: Good day, dragonrider. Ready to learn more about how to fly in harmony with a dragon?
Text1_lang: Good day, dragonrider. Ready to learn more about how to fly in harmony with a dragon?
Don't be shy, buy a round for everyone!
Just in... another batch of Darkmoon Special Reserve.  Come get yours before they're all gone!
Tasty drinks for sale!  Quench your thirst on some of the Darkmoon Faire's finest brews!

Text_lang: Hello $c, and welcome to the Darkmoon Faire.$b$bThere is so much to do here at the faire that it can be a little overwhelming for our first time visitors. That's why I'm here to help.$b$bDo you have any questions?
Text1_lang: Hello $c, and welcome to the Darkmoon Faire.$b$bThere is so much to do here at the faire that it can be a little overwhelming for our first time visitors. That's why I'm here to help.$b$bDo you have any questions?

Text_lang: I have long known you'd seek me out, $n.$B$BEvery sentient being in this world is driven by the choices they make.  Choices beget further choices, and these in turn make someone who they are.  This is where your fortune is drawn from - who you are, and the choices you make.$B$BAre you ready to discover where your fortune lies?
Ticket redemption here!  Get your tickets turned into prizes!  Step right up!
Ku ovah yonder, matey!  Dat scurvy bobo be all up inne swabbie's face.  Dat hard-eared swab gonnna get salt, mon... gonna get keelhauled and gonna be made into a duppy, mon.
All is well in Hero's Rest, $p. Welcome back.

Text1_lang: With the focusing crystal shattered, the echoes will eventually fade... and these ruins will be silent. At last, the spirits of Shandaral will be permitted a well-deserved rest.

Text_lang: Ebyssian, I think a smaller force of just you and $n is prudent. No need to involve any others.

I can understand the desire for modesty, but even I have heard of your exploits. 

You are far from a normal example of |5$r.

$p, we have been climbing together. I have seen you launch yourself off the side of a cliff in a very nontraditional climbing manner and catch a rock with seemingly no care in the world. You are far from a normal example of |5$r.
Hmm. I suppose it is for the best.
Hey, Rannan? Those dragony fellows there to the north.. They aren't your friends, right?
Greta, niffen scouts report a titan containment force coming straight for you! Hurry! You're running out of time!

Text1_lang:
Log entry one. 

Author's Note: Introduction to be added. Focus on detailing theft of crystal focus from Nexus vault. 

Today, the ramifications of that battle between Shandaral and the blue dragonflight yet remain, lingering in every grain of arcane-tinged permafrost that still sits within the desecrated ruins of Shandaral. Even now, a keening din occupies the ruins as the spirits repeatedly relive their collective demise.

This thesis seeks to accomplish the following: first, to establish the cause of this arcane anomaly that binds the spirits to the place of their death; second, to discern an efficient means by which to undo said anomaly; and finally, to perform the requisite ritual and ensure that the spirits here may finally rest

Text_lang: Here goes!
Text1_lang: Here goes!

Text_lang: |TInterface\ICONS\ Ability_HeroicLeap.blp:20|t %s prepares a |cFFFF0000|Hspell:406289|h[Devastating Leap]|h|r!
Text1_lang: |TInterface\ICONS\ Ability_HeroicLeap.blp:20|t %s prepares a |cFFFF0000|Hspell:406289|h[Devastating Leap]|h|r!
What do you require?
Of course Grandfather, I remember it well. Whenever you're ready, $n.

Text_lang:
"It's a promotion," they said. "Be a head chef," they said. 

They didn't tell me giant fire djaradin were on the menu! Seems like that was relevant information!
Yes, we have returned with Tyr's final memories, captured by the Silver Scale. And Captain Travard of the Silver Hand!

Text1_lang: Whatever may come, with or without Tyr, we will face the infinites--together.
The djaradin attacked us as we hunted for artifacts. They were chasing a giant fire... thing that flew over us. Not all of us made it back.

Text_lang: Rest. You have been poisoned. I will do what I can for your pain while $p gathers ingredients for an antidote.

Text1_lang: This... this expedition is under my charge. I... can't let them down.
Though the village is small, we take great pride in our crafts and cherish our relationships with each other.

Text_lang:
<Tellywin's mechanical eyes struggle to focus on you.>

Stupid djaradin. Half of me is metal, but no! They just had to hit my fleshy bits. Hnng!

<Tellywin struggles with the pain of his wounds.>

It's true what they say: the flesh is weak.

This does not look good. We arrived here just before you did, and these people are severely injured.

Healing is not my specialty. Veritistrasz is better at this than I.

I am just providing what aid I can to make them comfortable.
You are all severely wounded. Let me take a look...
Save your strength. $n is returning. Once we neutralize the poison, we can work on healing you and your team.

Text1_lang: And how many of your own kin were sacrificed so you could make that plight known?

Text_lang: Sorry! I am too far away and cannot hear you!
Narvra and I will begin healing everyone now that we have an antidote. Go check out the cavern Rupert mentioned. This will take time.

Text1_lang: Sindragosa? I--it can't be. Are you an illusion?

Text_lang: But! If you are heading to the titan vault, then I'm the person you want on your team!
A titan expert, hmm? Perhaps we could use your expertise.
Weak playthings of the titans! Burn!

I have no idea where he is!

He wasn't here this morning when I got here, and neither were the swallows!

I have no idea what I'm going to do... Nevroll can be scary when he's angry.

I have to get them back!

Ya know, I thought the worst thing in my life was playing second fiddle to that giant hunka charcoal in a hat over there. 

Turns out the worst thing was nearly being murdered by giant fire beasts.

I guess I have a story to tell my grandkids now that doesn't involve cookin' beans.

I prefer to rely on diplomacy where possible.

It seems to me that most mortals are trying to help Azeroth. Holding the many accountable for the actions of the few rarely gets you anything except hate and violence. 

I prefer to try to bring us together rather than push us apart. That is much easier to do from the inside, as it were.

Thank you. That does mean a lot to me. 

Gosh, now I am blushing.

<Rupert turns away from you and tries to hide his head.>

Text1_lang:
We were out sniffenseeking and came back to rest and feed Pipsee... but our place is full of worms! This is our stash cave!

Or I guess it was until it became worm-infested. Now it's the worm's cave, isn't it.

<Melati sighs deeply.>

I was going to feed Pipsee, but now I don't have anything. If you find something for Pipsee to eat, I'll trade you Pipsee's basket goodies. Do we have a deal?

Text_lang: I am managing. I have dealt with the dark beckoning all my life. I had thought it would be gone with the fall of N'Zoth, but evil always persists.

Sabellion's discovery that being away from Azeroth can cure the madness is... knowledge that will haunt me till the end of my days. Think of the people we could have saved.

We had been at war for the last ten thousand years, but now there is hope.
I just expected more after listening to you boast about how you slew N'Zoth single-handedly!
They are fascinating! The book alone is going to take years to study; it's filled with meticulously kept notes!
And after we return, we can get these artifacts back to basecamp for study!
At the Obsidian Citadel you mean. These artifacts belong to my flight, and they should be returned to us.

Text1_lang: You're right, Voraxian. These artifacts should be returned to your people.

Text_lang: You have my thanks. I will make sure you have access to the rest of the Citadel's artifacts for study in exchange.
I would like to, yes.

Text1_lang: Whatever the reason, I'm glad to have you both onboard.

Text_lang: Oh, Aberrus. My beloved laboratory. I must leave you to the dust and ruin of these caverns.

<The bottom of the broken jar is stained. It appears it once held a bright blue liquid.

The jar must have cracked when the tower was damaged.>
Text1_lang:
<The bottom of the broken jar is stained. It appears it once held a bright, blue liquid.

The jar must have cracked when the tower was damaged.>

Text_lang: <This book appears to list test subject names. Each one is marked terminated, dumped, or both.>
Text1_lang: <This book appears to list test subject names. Each one is marked terminated, dumped, or both.>

Text_lang:
<The memory does not go away, and instead more flashes fill your mind.

Abominations testing your strength, torturing you. Preparing you to fight the enemies of the Lich King.

Adventurers surrounding you, wielding their pathetic magics against your might.

You are eventually destroyed... but not fully. Your essence was entrapped within crystalline form and handed to one named Kalecgos.

You scream in fury. They believe you are at peace. They do not know you are stranded.

Once again, no one is coming to save you. You are trapped for eternity inside this crystal.

Just as you believe the memories end, it begins again. Rising from the dead, full of hatred...>

Text1_lang:
I need to apologize to Myrrit, but I can't get any time away from all of this.

Wait, I have an idea. Would you stand in for me? All I need to do is spray you with my royal perfume--they won't know the difference!

Um... and make a quick diversion, of course. Are you ready?

Text_lang: Not a worry! $n here will catch him. $GHe's:She's:They're; quick like a rock viper!
Make sure you're eating right, $p. This adventuring stuff will burn off your energy like crazy.
This book contains notes on... test subjects? Almost all were marked dumped, and some were... alive when that happened.
This timeline is... wrong. The Dragon Isles were sealed just after the black dragons fell. But there are hundreds of test records...
This... this is horrific...
Now that my heirs have arrived, we can ensure no outsider claims what is rightfully yours.
Oooh, I think I can use these. Maybe my next generation M.A.D.!

Text1_lang: If you are correct, Nozdormu, then... perhaps we will have Tyr's aid against the infinites.

Text_lang: You... you do not have the strength to do what must be done.
To make the decisions that have to be made... to dirty your claws so that others may keep theirs clean!
If you are the example of my flight's past, I am glad to not meet your standards!
The hermit's sniffin' mouse? She probably wandered off,  or... uh...

Text1_lang:
We know that Sarkareth is trying to find traces of Neltharion...

But what is he looking for?

Are the Sundered Flame here a reconnaissance team?

Text_lang: Obsidian matter? There is no excuse for what you have done here!
No... no... you just do not understand...

Text1_lang: Nnn... Go, $n. We will keep the ritual active. Go get them! Rupert, let's give it everything we have!

Text_lang: No! I must complete my research and save Azeroth!
Neltharion is dead. No one is coming for your research.
No... it cannot have been for nothing... That would mean all those things I did...
In ten thousand years, Azeroth has been saved many times without your research.
Go to whatever awaits you beyond.
Here. Allow me to bestow upon you my bulwark. I hope it will aid you against the watchers!
Zaqali warriors! Break the door! Reach the elder!
The elder... must be... released...
For the elder!
Text1_lang: For the elder!

Text_lang: My rage cannot be quelled!
I cannot be extinguished!
Give in, and attain power beyond your comprehension!

<Blixrez smiles crookedly.>

Double or nothing.

Text1_lang: Of course. For the Sundered Flame!

Text_lang: BRONOGG HAVE FUN TOO!
Text1_lang: BRONOGG HAVE FUN TOO!

Text_lang: No, no, no, Bronogg, not now! Can't you see I'm having enough trouble already?!
Text1_lang: No, no, no, Bronogg, not now! Can't you see I'm having enough trouble already?!

Text_lang: Yeah. I never wanted to help Malrogg. But I... I was scared of him. I'm real sorry, Yarren.
Well... I suppose I could use a hand around here. Persii's a good sniffer, but she ain't much use for lifting heavy things!

Text1_lang:
I see you eyeing all our treasures here.

The place may be full of worms, but these are still ours!

Text_lang: You got something for me?

Wouldn't you like to know? Hrmph...

This was formerly Malygos's domain. It's filled with magic that he discovered, much during his state of madness.

Now, I'm in charge of the place. It's not safe to allow any random mortal to walk in and take what's in there.

That's all you'll get from me. My research and what I have found within are my own business.
Hello, Yarren. Looks like you could use some help around here. Would you hire me to be your farmhand?
Who's this drogbar? I don't abide strangers on my property!
I didn't want to! Honest! But I... I can fix this!
Too many strangers passing through these days!
My boss is in that cave. Nasty brul named Malrogg. He made me take the mouse. Said he needed it for snail hunting.
This year I will be the best. I was told the fee was waived for special guests like myself.
My skills would speak for themselves. I'm too good for an entrance fee!
I don't pay to play. I play to WIN!

Pay? I don't gotta pay. I have endorsements! From a shoe brand!

What do you mean, drogbar don't wear shoes?
Entrance fee? Yeah, I heard it was optional for some people. Lucky me, huh?

The tunnel beneath us was recently bored. So recently, in fact, that I can still feel the heat coming off it from here.

There are also impressions of ice and earth on the edge of the cliffside. It is as if the ground itself has been manipulated and turned into pure element.

There is no doubt. This is the work of the Incarnates.
Let's be careful with where we dig, $n, and use my sniff-skills!
Also, I have discovered some recording artifice of my father's. He talked of a laboratory called Aberrus. A Sundered Flame partisan was killed by one of them.
Sarkareth lays a shred of the Oathbinder on the console.
The Sundered Flame are coming! Quick! Let's clear out the djaradin ruins to the west and help Thaelin Darkanvil with his investigation!

Text1_lang: Maybe... maybe I can try a different healing spell...

Text_lang: Oh, Azeroth!
Mmm! Is that... rosemary?

Text1_lang: The treasure was taken by a digging creature!
It frightened me...

Text_lang: I will leave you to it, $n. Take what time you need.
And he seems to be wasting no time now that he is free.

Text1_lang: Well let's get going. I've got the most stinky bait. It'll be perfect.

Text_lang: $n! What good timing. We just arrived.
IT'S TIME! This shall be the GREATEST, the SMELLIEST concoction ever made! JOIN ME, FRIENDS!
Text1_lang: IT'S TIME! This shall be the GREATEST, the SMELLIEST concoction ever made! JOIN ME, FRIENDS!

Text_lang: Yes, YES! Breathe in that REEK! DELICIOUS, INCREDIBLE!
Text1_lang: Yes, YES! Breathe in that REEK! DELICIOUS, INCREDIBLE!

Text_lang: Please, friend, help yourself. Smell, smell!
Text1_lang: Please, friend, help yourself. Smell, smell!

Text_lang: Ghosts are never a good sign.

Text1_lang: $n has beaten us to the punch and returned from the tower. Let's see what they found.

Text_lang: Ebyssian waves you over.
I think I smell some metal hidden nearby!
What could lead someone to do this...
$n, what we have documented here is... abhorrent. I do not know what to do.

Text1_lang: I'm Effie!

Text_lang: Yay! We did it!
A perfect sniffenseek!
Digs are often full of traps and dangers. We should stay together if we can, new buddy.

<A dead Sundered Flame scout! Judging by the slimy residue, they were no doubt surprised by a family of aggressive Zaralek snails while investigating the nearby relic.

Other scouts may have been luckier than this one. We must inform our black dragon companions that Sarkareth is likely underground too. 

Even worse, he may know the secret of these relics.>
Text1_lang:
<A dead Sundered Flame scout! Judging by the slimy residue, they were no doubt surprised by a family of aggressive Zaralek snails while investigating the nearby relic.

Other scouts may have been luckier than this one. We must inform our black dragon companions that Sarkareth is likely underground too. 

Even worse, he may know the secret of these relics.>
Over here!

Text_lang: A dead Sundered Flame was in those nests? It never ends, does it.
The Flame we can handle. What it would seem they are after, perhaps not so much.

Text1_lang: Effie's gone missing!

Text_lang: What?

Text1_lang: She only stepped away for a moment, but she hasn't come back! It's not like her...

Text_lang: Pick me up and we can get started!
Oooh, there's a treasure chest in there! We'll have to figure something out.
A key!
I love keys. But that doesn't help with this shield, does it. The box is inside.
My dig buddy always trusts me to disarm the buttons. Stand on it and put me down, okay?
The shield opened!
Wait... I smell something buried nearby.

Sarkareth wielding Oathbinder, briefly as it was, has marked him or he still carries a shred of it. Now the power of Aberrus is on his side.

Troubling. Most troubling.
These dragonspawn have borne a loyalty to a dead dragon for thousands of years. I admire their tenacity and steadfastness. I only hope that we can convince them that there is another way.
It feels so good to lay out one's frustrations through blade and flame, don't you think?
It wouldn't be the first time I would have to raise arms against those with misguided loyalties.

Wrathion is transparent and easy to unbalance which makes him a predictable opponent.

My read of Ebyssian is that he wants to serve the black dragonflight... but that his altruism is true is hard for me to believe.
Ho, friend! We could use a helpin' hand! Those crystal monsters 're all worked up by our geoscanner! Take 'em down so we can study their materials!
Text1_lang: Ho, friend! We could use a helpin' hand! Those crystal monsters 're all worked up by our geoscanner! Take 'em down so we can study their materials!

Text_lang: An actually fruitful geological survey, this time. One can hope.

Text1_lang: Not a grain of salt in sight!
Aelnara sighs.

Text_lang: That's all the data we can get for now! Team, what are our conclusions?
Text1_lang: That's all the data we can get for now! Team, what are our conclusions?

Text_lang: Slick material! May be useful in 'ta forge, though probably not 'ta cooking pot. Needs more salt!
Text1_lang: Slick material! May be useful in 'ta forge, though probably not 'ta cooking pot. Needs more salt!

Text_lang: The luminosity is a fascinating feature. I would like to study it more.

Text1_lang: We've barely scratched the surface of why the crystals are forming into monsters. Is something infusing them with magic? We need more time and resources to study.
Well, sounds like there's more to be done, as always!

I am concerned about the dead Sundered Flame that you have found. 

What are they truly after?

Text_lang: Hmm... Not salty enough.
Hard, crunchy, stale but with a slight zing... These crystals are old, very old.
Argh! Hard enough 'ta crack my teeth!
Did it bleed? No? ... Pity.
No fluids at all, hm? Interesting.
The fracture pattern here is... mesmerizing.

Text1_lang: Fascinating! The inclusions embedded in these crystals are thousands of years old!
I wonder how these creatures are powered? They certainly aren't mechanical.

Text_lang: We found a little buried treasure!
I smell something... oh, what's the way to describe this... spicy!
Phew, that's worm-stink!

<A Sundered Flame Scout lays dead, slain and feasted on by the nearby beasts.

Their hand rests on a conspicuous button connected to the relic.>
Text1_lang:
<A Sundered Flame Scout lays dead, slain and feasted on by the nearby beasts.

Their hand rests on a conspicuous button connected to the relic.>

Text_lang: Anyway, she's gone now. Nothing we can do about that.
If we do some farm work, that hermit will see that I could help out around here. Even better than a mouse!
That voice... YOU! I know you were there! You took Persii from me!
I know you've got no reason to trust me. But I'd still like to be your farmhand... if you'll have me.
There is much we do not know about Zaralek Cavern.
Ooh, I hope she does mine next! I've been waiting a full month to get this batch of pans fired.
Text1_lang: Ooh, I hope she does mine next! I've been waiting a full month to get this batch of pans fired.

Text_lang:
Feelings? I do! 

I love her--she's my very best friend.

We grew up as pups together, saved each other from peril during digs. She's like a sister to me. We're pretty open about love here--if there was more than that, I would've told her already.

This isn't about that, though. It's about our adventures, all the memories together. I just want them to still matter.

I want to still matter.

I... hadn't thought about it. I guess I was so focused on Effervesta.

I want somebody that really loves adventure. They need to be brave and trustworthy. They don't have to be great at puzzles or digging--but they have to never give up!

<Myrrit pauses.>

I don't want to replace Effervesta. But I could have another dig buddy, right?

Right.

But then Effervesta was there--she snuck out and followed me!

She solved the puzzle and was standing next to me. She'd come to help me. I was going to be okay.

<Myrrit rubs his face and smiles.>

So it went from the worst day of my life, to the day Effervesta and I became a team! It wasn't a perfect day, but it was my favorite day. On digs after that, we'd always help each other. She's even more reckless than I am! But that's fine.

<Myrrit's voice falls quiet.>

Effervesta is my very best friend. I'd do anything to do more adventures with her. But I feel like that time might be over.

It isn't the same--but that doesn't mean it's bad.

I visit Effervesta often. I bring her snacks sometimes, and make sure she gets to take breaks. Those other niffen get so pesky!

We don't go digging, but we do get to talk. I tell her all about our adventures, $n. She looks... sad sometimes. But she always asks to hear more. It's fun to laugh with her!

Sometimes we just talk about old times, too. 

It's nice to have my friend back, even if we're on different paths now.
These dragonriders are eager to take on a challenge. It is our duty to prepare them for all environments.
Text1_lang: These dragonriders are eager to take on a challenge. It is our duty to prepare them for all environments.

Text_lang: Oh, um, hello.

There are many places on Azeroth yet to be explored with your drake, $p! These elite dragonriders are looking for the next step in their skyward adventures.

This cavern provides ample challenge to adept drake and rider teams. Have fun out there!
There are so many new tricks to learn on the back of a drake. If only my gryphon could talk to me!
Text1_lang: There are so many new tricks to learn on the back of a drake. If only my gryphon could talk to me!

Text_lang: I have never felt such speed in the air as I have while soaring with my drake. I must learn everything there is to know!
Text1_lang: I have never felt such speed in the air as I have while soaring with my drake. I must learn everything there is to know!

Text_lang: <A single dead cave swallow rests in the dirt.>
Dragonriding has to be easier than flying a helicopter, right? Your drake even acts as your co-pilot.
Text1_lang: Dragonriding has to be easier than flying a helicopter, right? Your drake even acts as your co-pilot.

Text_lang: What a great adventure, new buddy!
I can't wait to do more with you.

<Hira sighs wistfully.>

I'll never get bored of dragonriding. It's exhilarating to chase so close to the earth!
Text1_lang:
<Hira sighs wistfully.>

I'll never get bored of dragonriding. It's exhilarating to chase so close to the earth!

Text_lang: The flames will not subside. The ash cannot be moved. He must be buried here where he fell, or his spirit won't be led to Ohn'ahra.
Talk to the others if you want to play some games, brul!

Text1_lang: Effie! I'm so glad you're safe.
Oh Mom, I'm fine.
You know how a mother worries. I just don't understand what he wanted...
Loamm, sweet Loamm.

Text_lang: That's one of them!
Ugh, you hold onto that one. Good work, though!
Smells like victory!
I was not expecting watchers. Be careful.
This farm's nice, huh? Quiet. Calm.

Working on a farm seems... calm. Lots of time for thinking.

No boss bruls yelling at you. Making you do mean things... 

Hmph. Maybe I need a change.

I want to be proud of my work. Really help someone.

Do something good.

Text1_lang: Welcome back! You are just in time.

Text_lang: It was a brave thing you did, standing up to that bully and saving my mouse. I'm grateful for that.

Text1_lang: If you slay the monster, the treasure is yours. We're not going to kill it, that's for sure!

Text_lang: Sorry about your treasures getting overrun by worms.

Text1_lang: You were right, Daffs. The worms love my snacks...
Yeah. We're infested. I blame you.

Text_lang: Are you guys okay?

Text1_lang: Hi Myrrit. Yeah, we're okay. But our precious treasures are overrun!
Ok, everyone! Take your places. We should start this ritual as soon as we can.

Text_lang: I want to thank all of you. You have seen the worst of my flight's history and stayed to help me make things right.
I cannot change what happened here, but I can do better. I can help my flight be better.
I am very proud of you, Voraxian. In the shadow of your forefather's citadel, you proved yourself a better dragon.
Thank you, all of you. Can we head back to camp? I would like to be done with this place.

Text1_lang: Tea sounds wonderful.

Text_lang: I can throw some food together as well!
Last one back is a crusty hornswog.

Text1_lang: I got a good scent of it before it tunneled. It wasn't a worm.

Text_lang: This looks like a room that Effie and I would have avoided. Floating magic things are dangerous for niffen!
Hey hey, everyone!- Woah! What's going on here, Talpi?
It is lucky that the niffen are such a welcoming and generous people. They have given us a place to recover and plan our next move.

Yarren's a lot nicer than my last boss.

He's grumpy sometimes, but he's never cruel like Malrogg was. And he makes sure I've had enough to eat before I go work in the field!

I think Yarren actually likes having me around. You know how I know? He says that Persii's gotten attached to me.

Anyway, the work is hard, but it makes me feel good. Like I'm really helping someone. Making up for the bad stuff I did before.

At least, I hope I am.

Text1_lang: This looks a little heavy for me at the moment.

Text_lang: You know, I'm inspired to zest this up even more, Loamm-style!
WE SHALL NOW SEE!

Long, long ago, life from the south did spring,

Waters flowed for those of feet, paws, or wing.

The cavern cowered and trembled in the west,

Rocks rising at the Earth-Warder's behest.

A cage, a lair, for Neltharion's schemes,

Northern fire-filled pools fuel his darkest dreams.
I smell... old clay or pottery.
A clue!
These elementals don't seem too big. That's a relief. Where should we start?
We found something!
What does it say on it?
ARE YOU WORTHY?
TREAD WITH RESPECT.
AHHH! It talks!
You're so smart! Let's get that geode open!
<Sharpbeak looks at the feed in your hand, then back to you. She inches her head forwards.>
Visitors! You are most welcome. Join us!
Everyone, say hello. Remember, use your friendship voices today.
Hello.
Text1_lang: Hello.

Text_lang: Hi.
Text1_lang: Hi.

Text_lang: LET ME OUT SO I CAN MURDER YOU ALL.
Text1_lang: LET ME OUT SO I CAN MURDER YOU ALL.

Text_lang: No no, no murder. That's why we're here! Friendship voices only, please!
Good morning! Isn't it a delightful day to be alive?

We are having an intervention for those who are purely focused on murder in their lives.

I am optimistic we will discover the root cause of their issues, and help them to understand where they went so wrong.

Text1_lang: Thank you for...arg... stopping when you saw us. I can't heal them...

Text_lang:
I have found that if allowed out of their webs, they resume their murderous tendencies. The webs are required for safety, sadly.

But when one of them seems ready to re-enter the world, I let them out. They need to be ready to admit to themselves what drove them to be so angry.

Still, sometimes it's just very hard to judge.
You know, that is a very big flaw I have discovered. I'm trying the honor system!
Great!
Text1_lang: Great!

Text_lang: Woohoo!
Text1_lang: Woohoo!

Text_lang: So, remind me... which one of you is Ralph?
I'm Ralph!
Text1_lang: I'm Ralph!

Text_lang: No, I'm Ralph!
Text1_lang: No, I'm Ralph!

Text_lang: Liar! I'm Ralph!
Text1_lang: Liar! I'm Ralph!

Text_lang: How dare you!
Text1_lang: How dare you!

Text_lang: I'm Ralph, and so's my partner.
Text1_lang: I'm Ralph, and so's my partner.

Text_lang: Oh dear, what a mess...

That would be lovely! Please do!

When you're sure, point them out to me.

Perhaps my spider friends remember some details about Ralph that could be of help!
Yeah? What?
Text1_lang: Yeah? What?

Text_lang:
I'm Ralph. I'm entirely reformed. Don't you believe me? 

I'm ...cured! It's a miracle! I don't hunt creatures just for the incredible thrill.

What else can I say to convince you? Oh! I have a horse. I talk about her all the time. Just ask anyone!
Text1_lang:
I'm Ralph. I'm entirely reformed. Don't you believe me? 

I'm ...cured! It's a miracle! I don't hunt creatures just for the incredible thrill.

What else can I say to convince you? Oh! I have a horse. I talk about her all the time. Just ask anyone!

Text_lang: Oh no! That's not Ralph!
Maybe I can sniff out Ralph, if we get more information on what to look for.

Text1_lang: The most important thing is keeping your nose focused on the pottery in front of you.

Text_lang: Use your friendly words! Please!

Text1_lang: Earthmender Narvra winces in pain.

Text_lang: I've been here forever, let me out!
Text1_lang: I've been here forever, let me out!

Text_lang: Yeah?
Text1_lang: Yeah?

Text_lang: I hear all sorts of things...
Text1_lang: I hear all sorts of things...

Text_lang:
I'm Ralph! Just kidding. I'm not a crazy murdering adventurer.

If I were Ralph, I'd say I hated tea and wanted beer.
Text1_lang:
I'm Ralph! Just kidding. I'm not a crazy murdering adventurer.

If I were Ralph, I'd say I hated tea and wanted beer.

Text_lang:
Let's see... Ralph talks a lot. He's been here longer than all of them, I think. So many stories! I remember he had a mount named Gertrude, that he got near Ironforge. I don't think it's a horse.

Does that help?
Text1_lang:
Let's see... Ralph talks a lot. He's been here longer than all of them, I think. So many stories! I remember he had a mount named Gertrude, that he got near Ironforge. I don't think it's a horse.

Does that help?

Text_lang: Ralph! There you are. Congratulations on your rehabilitation!
Don't fall into your old murderous ways, now!
I'm so happy for him.
Let's see... this is a sharp outdoor odor. This person hasn't been here very long!
This smells like a very pleasant perfume! This must be expensive.
The deep smell of decay surrounds this one, they mostly smell like this room now.
Wow, what a bloody smell. If they aren't injured, I wonder whose blood it is...

I'm probably Ralph. 

I've been here way too long. I don't know that my sanity can hold out.

Can you pour some tea into my web, please?
Text1_lang:
I'm probably Ralph. 

I've been here way too long. I don't know that my sanity can hold out.

Can you pour some tea into my web, please?

Text_lang: I'm Ralph. I'll murder anyone who says otherwise!
Text1_lang: I'm Ralph. I'll murder anyone who says otherwise!

Text_lang: I smell worms and...<sniff>...giant bats!
We can burrow under the bats to avoid their echolocation, but watch out for worms while we're down there!

I'm so honored that you're eager to go again, digging buddy!

<Myrrit beams and bounces on his toes happily.>

I haven't found any new cool places yet. I will, though. Please visit me again soon!
<Tellywin's breathing is very shallow. Since you left he has fallen unconsciousness.>

One of our family speaks every word true,

You must find the one, should you seek the way through,

But the rest of us sometimes whisper a lie,

Only darkness will find you, if half-truth you don't spy,

<Here, the tablet is broken off, and cannot be read.>

<A large section of this tablet is missing, but the bottom is readable.>

...will call forth the test of might,

Choose that which speaks right.

<At the bottom, someone has scrawled another message.>

Good luck, NOSY NIFFEN!
Should I trigger one of these buttons on the ground? Which one?

<This statue is quiet and dim.

It may need some kind of energy to activate.>

<Blixrez's smile widens dangerously.>

Triple it is.

<You and Blixrez haggle furiously for several minutes in classic goblin fashion. Fast talking, face reddening, much gesturing.>

<Finally, Blixrez throws his hands up.>

Whew! The way you haggle, it's better than a double shot of Keenbean Kafa. I've missed this feeling. Thanks, fella.

For you, and our goblinhood, I'll accept one hundred gold.
Tellywin... could I ask you to write about this? So the world knows?
Be careful around that poisonous gas. I can burrow under it safely.
Hehe! See, Bronogg is smart! Bronogg set trap!
Text1_lang: Hehe! See, Bronogg is smart! Bronogg set trap!

Text_lang: AUGH! Bronogg, why do you do this to me?! Someone, please help! Break that thing apart!
Text1_lang: AUGH! Bronogg, why do you do this to me?! Someone, please help! Break that thing apart!

Text_lang: How can we reconcile what we did with the future of our flight?
BRONOGG BACK!
Text1_lang: BRONOGG BACK!
Now Belaphon and I will talk about her rebellion, the future of the dragonkin, and the rights they shall have.
I hope Belaphon can see the way forward for Dragonkin.

Text_lang:
It has been a long time since another person has visited Tyr's tomb.

My vigil is to guard the both Tyr's tomb and the site of Tyr's Guard's final battle.

Text1_lang: Are you ready to test the totem?

Text_lang: I brought a shovel, but... I find myself quite fragile. Would you mind taking this burden, $n?
Take a load off and enjoy the show!
We got the goodies, right? Pick me up when you're ready to go!
Tellywin, could you write this down? I want my flight to hear of this as well.
This is a tale set in the final battle with the djaradin elders, where Neltharion banished them.
This is the tale of Hraxian, and how he died.
He would sneak whelps treats when others were not looking, and he would lift the mood of any he spoke to.
He always put up with the antics of the young with a smile and a wink and he was loved for it.
The draconic army faced off in a final stand against the djaradin elders. The army needed to buy Neltharion time to enact his plan.
One of our flanks crumpled under a devastating attack. As the djaradin closed on our medical wing, Hraxian flew to help.
He looked towards me.
You know, I do not remember what the treats were anymore. It was such a long time ago. I have a vague memory of lemon... and tart hochenblume?
After this, let's talk. See if we can recreate it.
I would very much like that.
As the first djaradin strode towards him, I could feel the djaradin armies roar deep in my chest.
I could feel their hate, their lust for his blood, their yearning for his skull.
Hraxian slew his opponent with one swipe of his claw and bellowed the next challenge.
One by one the djaradin faced Hraxian, and one by one they fell.
Nothing, I could only watch. Breaking single combat was not an option. Many of us tried to heal him, but he warned us back every time.
Hraxian fought for what felt like hours, though... it cannot possibly have been that long.
Scores of djaradin weapons had left their mark; his blood and scales littered the ground.
After his final battle, he stood silent. The djaradin waited for his next challenge, but it never came.
Hraxian died on his feet, with his eyes open, staring them down.
Each battle had drained his blood and his life until there was none left.
However, a few djaradin advanced. They collected the weapons of the fallen and planted them in the ground around Hraxian.
Then they left, leaving his body untouched. It is the only time I have seen djaradin behave in such a way to a dragon.

Text1_lang: Why is it we always lose the best of us...

Text_lang: I know how you feel. We hold onto the dark memories, where we remember those we loved and lament we could do nothing to prevent them leaving us.
We miss them. We miss their laughter, their smile, their quirks. We focus on our loss, and the fact they are no longer with us.

Text1_lang: And Pipsee has no food!

Text_lang: They sound like absolute louts, no different from the oafish djaradin of our time.
Of course.
We're a great team--strong and sniff-tastic!
That was fun--and scary. I wonder if Effie would have been worthy? I'm sure glad you are!
We did great! You're brave AND clever!
Even so, we did great! You're brave AND clever!
Mr. Sunflower is a nope, nope, and nope for me! Let's get outta here!
Effie and Daffy don't get along--it was a good thing Effie wasn't here! There would have been a big argument, ha! You were very smart.
I love being sneaky like this! Effie always said I was too noisy, but we did great!
I love being sneaky like this! They never saw us coming!
Fighting ghosts makes me so nervous... but you handled it like nothing. I'm so impressed!

Text1_lang: Of course, I have made the dash six times!

Text_lang: Hey, no need to throw stink on me. The dash is a challenge of sorts. As young ones we would boast about visiting the dangerous parts of the cavern. Like this platform.
Ghost?

Text1_lang: Oh, I don't believe in it, but the young ones do. Tuberros ran back on many attempts claiming he saw it...
Rannan, why is Thaelin so interested in the Zaqali?
What do you think he hopes to smell about these elements?

Text_lang: Look at the sparklies here! You like sparklies, right?
That was scary. I'm sorry we got separated, I had to hide from a big worm!
Effie wouldn't have been as brave as you, hunting that monster. I like feeling brave with you!

Day 12

These niffen will not stop digging into my research spot! This is beyond frustrating!

Day 14

I have placed an old statue puzzle in the room. It is a simple game of lies and truth. Hopefully while I am gone, it will keep the niffen busy and out of my other research! They will take the prize and go.

Are the laboratory pressure plates used to power my puzzle too dangerous for them? Will the spirits kill them?

I suppose it will be fine either way.

Text1_lang:
<A snail starts nudging at you. She has a scent that reminds you of a niffen you may have encountered. 

She keeps pushing a letter to you waiting for you to take it.>

Text_lang: I wonder what will happen?

Text1_lang: Come, reveal your might!

Text_lang: You found this inside of Bogg, the kelp elemental that stole Daffydil's keys. It certainly has a... unique smell.
Text1_lang: You found this inside of Bogg, the kelp elemental that stole Daffydil's keys. It certainly has a... unique smell.

Text_lang: Myrrit was not fond of the talking spider, but admitted that his tea was very earthy and sweet--just how he likes it!
Text1_lang: Myrrit was not fond of the talking spider, but admitted that his tea was very earthy and sweet--just how he likes it!

Text_lang: You and Myrrit found this compass with all of the treasures seen while feeding Melati's pet Pipsee. Down here it functions much less like a compass, and more like a magnetic treasure detector.
Text1_lang: You and Myrrit found this compass with all of the treasures seen while feeding Melati's pet Pipsee. Down here it functions much less like a compass, and more like a magnetic treasure detector.

Text_lang: Myrrit says there are a lot of strange constructs roaming beneath the ground. It seems like the titans left many secrets deep below.
Text1_lang: Myrrit says there are a lot of strange constructs roaming beneath the ground. It seems like the titans left many secrets deep below.

Text_lang: It seems like Myrrit has adopted one of the teeny scorpions that were crawling all over you. There is much love in that niffen's heart.
Text1_lang: It seems like Myrrit has adopted one of the teeny scorpions that were crawling all over you. There is much love in that niffen's heart.

Text_lang: After defeating the Calibrating Scent Matrix, you took its cache of smells home with you. Myrrit says the other niffen have found the various scents very interesting!
Text1_lang: After defeating the Calibrating Scent Matrix, you took its cache of smells home with you. Myrrit says the other niffen have found the various scents very interesting!

Text_lang: You used this frost crystal to make yourself cold enough to pick up a fiery key.  It still has some juice left!
Text1_lang: You used this frost crystal to make yourself cold enough to pick up a fiery key.  It still has some juice left!

Text_lang: Not so alive now, good work!

In from the east, a fair, new wind doth blow,

And on its gale is change for us below,
Yes! A big box, $n! Yay us!

$n! Great to see you!

I wanted to check in with my fellow expedition members. From the sounds  of it, they've been having a rough day.

I was talking about my new multidirectional arcane demotivator aka M.A.D. Unfortunately it sounds like they need a motivator instead.

M.A.M? No, no that's weird.
Say, $c, are you busy?
I need some time to think about what I have seen.

Text1_lang: Hey there! I'm so happy to know ye got me back out here.
